A wrestling bout is a physical competition, between two (occasionally more) competitors or sparring partners, who attempt to gain and maintain a superior position. There are a wide range of styles with varying rules with both traditional historic and modern styles.
name: Wrestling

description:
This character suffers a mental breakdown as a result of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Psychological_trauma]traumatic event[/url]. 

Psychological trauma is a type of damage to the psyche that occurs as a result of a traumatic event.

A traumatic event involves a single experience, or an enduring or repeating event or events, that completely overwhelm the individual's ability to cope or integrate the ideas and emotions involved with that experience. The sense of being overwhelmed can be delayed by weeks, years or even decades, as the person struggles to cope with the immediate circumstances. Psychological trauma can lead to serious long-term negative consequences that are often overlooked even by mental health professionals.

Trauma can be caused by a wide variety of events, but there are a few common aspects. There is frequently a violation of the person's familiar ideas about the world and of their human rights, putting the person in a state of extreme confusion and insecurity. This is also seen when people or institutions, depended on for survival, violate or betray or disillusion the person in some unforeseen way.
name: Psychological Trauma

description:
This character owns a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pet]pet[/url]. 

The character is solely responsible for the welfare of the animal/s in question.
As such, a companionship is formed.
name: Pet Owner

description:
The character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Camera]camera[/url].

A camera is a device that records and stores images. These images may be still photographs or moving images such as videos or movies.

Use this trait for traditional style photo cameras whether or not they record video as well. And for more [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Handycam#Handycam]handycam[/url] like cameras, use the child trait video camera.
name: Camera

description:
The character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unpopularity]not very popular with others[/url].

Whether it is at school, work, around the neighbourhood or anywhere else, this character lacks approval his/her from fellow beings.
name: Unpopular

description:
This character carries and uses a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rapier]rapier[/url]

A rapier is a slender, sharply pointed sword, ideally used for thrusting attacks, used mainly in Early Modern Europe during the 16th and 17th centuries.
name: Rapier

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bow_tie]bow tie[/url].

The bow tie is a type of men's necktie. It consists of a ribbon of fabric tied around the collar in a symmetrical manner such that the two opposite ends form loops. Ready-tied bow ties are available, in which the distinctive bow is sewn into shape and the band around the neck incorporates a clip.
name: Bow Tie

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cuff]cuffs[/url].

A cuff is an extra layer of fabric at the lower edge of the sleeve of a garment covering the arms.

Do not mix this with [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Handcuffs]handcuffs[/url].
name: Cuffs

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swim_cap]swim cap[/url].

Caps are worn for various reasons. Some facilities require the wearing of swim caps, in order to protect filters from becoming clogged with loose hairs which fall from the scalp of swimmers who are not wearing a cap. Caps are also sometimes worn in an attempt to keep the hair relatively dry or free from chlorinated water, to keep the sun off of the hair, and also, when a cap is worn with ear plugs, in order to keep water out of the ears.

Competitive swim caps are made of tightly fitted silicone, latex, or lycra that hugs the skull of its user, providing cover for his or her hair. This reduces drag in the water caused by loose hair. During longer swimming sessions, a swim cap keeps the head warm.
name: Swim Cap

description: This character competes in or engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swimming_(sport)]swimming[/url].
name: Swimming

description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cycling]cycling[/url], either for fun or competitively.

Cycling is the use of bicycles for transport, recreation, or for sport. Apart from ordinary two-wheeled bicycles, cycling also includes riding unicycles, tricycles, quadracycles, and other similar human-powered vehicles (HPVs).
name: Cycling

description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Actor]actor/actress[/url].

A person who acts in a dramatic production and who works in film, television, theater, or radio in that capacity.
name: Actor

description:
This character is a subject of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muteness]muteness[/url]. 

He can't speak because of speech disorder, hearing loss, surgery, mutations, or inability to speak from the begining due to his non-human nature. Don't apply this to ordinary plants and animals, who aren't supposed to speak.
name: Muteness

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doll]doll[/url] or similar item that has somehow come to life.

Dolls are models of human beings generally used as children's playthings.
name: Living Doll

description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Infidelity]infidelity[/url]. That is, they have sexual contact with someone other than their significant other, without their knowledge or permission.

Infidelity is a violation of a couple's assumed or stated contract regarding emotional and/or sexual exclusivity. This violation results in feelings of anger, jealousy, sexual jealousy, and rivalry. What constitutes an act of infidelity depends upon the exclusivity expectations within the relationship.
name: Infidelity

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dragon]dragon[/url].

Dragons are legendary creatures, typically with serpentine or reptilian traits, that feature in the myths of many cultures.
name: Dragon

description:
The character has the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chonmage]Chonmage hairstyle[/url]

A form of Japanese traditional haircut worn by men. It is most commonly associated with the Edo Period and samurai, and in recent times with sumo wrestlers. It was originally a method of using hair to hold a samurai helmet steady atop the head in battle, and became a status symbol among Japanese society.
name: Chonmage

description:
This character has a [url=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/vindictive]vindictive[/url] nature.

Such a character would be disposed or inclined to revenge, or in milder cases would hold grudges for a long time and be slow to forgive.
name: Vindictive

description: This character, of their choice, leads a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Secret_identity]double life in secrecy[/url].
name: Secret Identity

description:
This character is unusually [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Popularity]popular[/url].

Popularity is the quality of being well-liked or having a high social status.
name: Popular

description: This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goggles]goggles[/url], a form of protective eyewear that protect the eye area in order to prevent particulates, water or chemicals from striking the eyes.
name: Goggles

description:
This character has a goal of obtaining money anyway possible. Usually with a 'get rich quick scheme' or demanding money frequently.
This can also mean a character who does not like spending money, like those old meany misers.
name: Money Lover

description: These characters has a special place in their hearts for the environment, wildlife and plant life.
name: Nature Lover

description: This character is a rabbit, hare, or some other animal hailing from the order [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lagomorpha]lagomorpha[/url], or is a humanoid possessing the traits of those animals, such as bunny ears.
name: Rabbit

description:
This character is refered to as a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jock_(athlete)#Stereotypical_characteristics_of_jocks]Jock[/url].

The term jock, when used in the United States and Canada, refers to the classic stereotype of a male athlete. It is generally a negative stereotype, and is attributed mostly to high school and college athletics participants who form a distinct youth subculture. In sociology, the jock is thought to be included within the socialite subculture, which also contains the preps and Ivy-Leaguers. As a blanket term, jock can be considered synonymous with athlete. 

Similar words that may mean the same as "jock" include "meathead," "musclebrain," and "musclehead." These terms are based on the stereotype that a jock is muscular, but not very smart, and cannot carry a conversation on any topic other than one relating to sports or exercise.

This trait does not refer to the job but the personality stereotype that comes with the people that are usually associated with this job.
name: Jock

description:
This character is penetrated [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sex_positions#Multiple_penetration]multiple times[/url] simultaneously.

They may be penetrated by multiple objects (penis, sex toy, tentacle, etc) in a single orifice (vagina, anus or mouth). Alternatively, they may be penetrated in more than one orifice at the same time.
name: Multiple Penetration

description:
This character performs a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Handjob]handjob[/url]. Apply [url=/i1633]i1633[/url] to the receiving character.

A handjob is the act of using one's hands to stimulate a male partner's penis. [url=/i1595]Vaginal Fingering[/url] may be considered the equivalent trait for a female receiver.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/00/119100.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/99/119099.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]
name: Handjob

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bird]bird[/url] or has bird-like physical features.

Birds are feathered, winged, bipedal, warm-blooded, egg-laying, vertebrate animals. Many can fly, although some cannot.
name: Bird

description: This character carries or uses some [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hypodermic_needle]hypedermic needles[/url].
name: Hypodermic Needle

description:
This character uses a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scalpel]scalpel[/url].

A scalpel, or lancet, is a small and extremely sharp bladed instrument used for surgery, anatomical dissection, and various arts and crafts (called a hobby knife). Scalpels may be single-use disposable or re-usable. Re-usable scalpels can have attached, resharpenable blades or, more commonly, non-attached, replaceable blades. Disposable scalpels usually have a plastic handle with an extensible blade (like a utility knife) and are used once, then the entire instrument discarded. Scalpel blades are usually individually packed in sterile pouches but are also offered non-sterile.
name: Scalpel

description:
This character participates in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Motorsport]motorsports[/url].

Motorsport or motorsports is the group of sports which primarily involve the use of motorized vehicles, whether for racing or non-racing competition. MotoSport refers to motorcycle racing specifically and includes off-road racing such as motocross and MotoGP.
name: Motorsports

description: This character wears an outfit with sleeves that aren't attached to a top; instead they're strapped onto the arm close to the shoulder.
name: Detached Sleeves

description:
This character's true form is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grimoire]grimoire[/url], or a book of magical power. 

Such books typically include instructions on how to create magical objects like talismans and amulets, how to perform magical spells, charms and divination and also how to summon or invoke supernatural entities such as angels, spirits, and demons. In many cases the books themselves are also believed to be imbued with magical powers.
name: Grimoire

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Perfectionism_(psychology)]perfectionist[/url].

Perfectionism is a belief that work or output that is anything less than perfect is unacceptable.
name: Perfectionist

description:
This character is (or has the physical attributes of) a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spider]spider[/url].

These can include the ability to create webs, wall crawl or even having eight arms or legs.
name: Spider

description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insect]insect[/url] or bears resemblance to one.

Insects include butterflies, bees, ants, grasshoppers, cockroaches, beetles, flies, mantises, etc.
name: Insect

description:
This characters takes part in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_roleplay]sexual roleplay[/url].

Sexual roleplay is an erotic form of roleplay: it is a sexual behavior where two or more people act out roles in a sexual fantasy. How seriously this is taken depends on the people involved, and the scenario may be anywhere from simple and makeshift to detailed and elaborate, complete with costumes and a script. Nearly any role could become the base material for an erotic experience, and there is no limit to what objects an individual could consider sexual.
name: Sexual Roleplay

description:
This characters is or shares a resmblance to a   [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Primate]primate[/url].

Primates are the family group of species like Apes, Monkeys, Lemurs etc.
name: Primate

description:
This character is or shares resemblance to a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bear]bear[/url].

Common characteristics of modern bears include a large body with stocky legs, a long snout, shaggy hair, plantigrade paws with five nonretractile claws, and a short tail. While the polar bear is mostly carnivorous and the giant panda feeds almost entirely on bamboo, the remaining six species are omnivorous, with largely varied diets including both plants and animals.
name: Bear

description: This character is the victim of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Homicide]homicide[/url] during the course of the story. Homicide refers to the act of a human killing another human.
name: Homicide

description:
The character partakes in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shopping]shopping[/url].

Shopping is the examining of goods or services from retailers with the intent to purchase at that time. Shopping is an activity of selection and/or purchase. In some contexts it is considered a leisure activity as well as an economic one.
name: Shopping

description: This character wears a hat with animal ears on it.
name: Kemonomimi Hat

description:
The character sports a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mohawk_hairstyle]Mohawk hairstyle[/url].

The mohawk (referred to in British English as a mohican) is a hairstyle in which, in the most common variety, both sides of the head are shaven, leaving a strip of noticeably longer hair in the center. It is associated mostly with the punk rock subculture, though today mohawks have entered mainstream fashion. The mohawk is also sometimes referred to as an iro in reference to the Iroquois, from whom the hairstyle is derived.
name: Mohawk

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ferret]ferret[/url].

The ferret is a domesticated mammal of the type Mustela putorius furo. Ferrets are sexually dimorphic predators with males being substantially larger than females. They typically have brown, black, white, or mixed fur.
name: Ferret

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tengu]tengu[/url].

Tengu are a class of supernatural creatures found in Japanese folklore, art, theater, and literature. They are one of the best known youkai (monster-spirits) and are sometimes worshipped as Shinto kami (revered spirits or gods). Although they take their name from a dog-like Chinese demon (Tiangou), the tengu were originally thought to take the forms of birds of prey, and they are traditionally depicted with both human and avian characteristics. The earliest tengu were pictured with beaks, but this feature has often been humanized as an unnaturally long nose, which today is practically the tengu's defining characteristic in the popular imagination.
name: Tengu

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Watch]watch[/url].

A watch is a small timepiece, typically worn either on the wrist or attached on a chain and carried in a pocket, with wristwatches being the most common type of watch used today. They evolved in the 17th century from spring powered clocks, which appeared in the 15th century. The first watches were strictly mechanical. As technology progressed, the mechanisms used to measure time have, in some cases, been replaced by use of quartz vibrations or electromagnetic pulses and are called quartz movements.
name: Watch

description:
This character speaks using an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kansai_dialect]accent from the Kansai region of Japan[/url].

The Kansai dialect is a group of Japanese dialects in the Kansai region of Japan.
It is characterized as being both more melodic and harsher by speakers of the standard language.
name: Kansai-ben

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loincloth]loincloth[/url].

A loincloth is a one-piece garment – sometimes kept in place by a belt – which covers the genitals and, at least partially, the buttocks.
name: Loincloth

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Headphones]headphones or earbuds.[/url]

Headphones are a pair of small loudspeakers, or, less commonly, a single speaker, held close to a user's ears and connected to an audio source.
name: Headphones

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nail_polish]nail polish[/url].

Nail polish is a lacquer applied to toenails and/or fingernails for appearance or for protection of the nails.
name: Nail Polish

description:
This character has prominent [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tan_line]tanlines[/url].

Tanlines are a division between an area or areas on the skin of pronounced comparative paleness relative to other areas of their body that have been suntanned.
name: Tanline

description:
This character has sex in the [url=https://sexinfo101.com/positions/pile-driver]piledriver[/url] position. Apply this trait to the penetrated partner and apply [url=/i1696]i1696[/url] to the penetrating partner.

In this position the receiving partner lies on their head and upper body with their legs and hips up, while the penetrating partner stands above.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/74/84174.jpg]Example[/url] - Lesbians using double-ended dildo.
name: Piledriver

description:
This character's parents were closely related to each other, genetically.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inbreeding]Inbreeding[/url] is the reproduction from the mating of two genetically related parents.
name: Inbred

description:
This character is a famous person. They may or may not be [url=http://vndb.org/i777]popular[/url].

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Celebrity]celebrity[/url], also referred to as a celeb in popular culture, is a person who has a prominent profile in the media implied with stardom, great popular appeal, widely known, prominent or successful in some field, and is easily recognized by the general public.
name: Famous

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/High-heeled_footwear]footwear with high heels[/url].

High-heeled footwear is footwear that raises the heel of the wearer's foot significantly higher than the toes. When both the heel and the toes are raised equal amounts, as in a platform shoe, it is technically not considered to be a high heel; however, there are also high-heeled platform shoes.
High heels tend to give the aesthetic illusion of longer, more slender legs. High heels come in a wide variety of styles, and the heels are found in many different shapes, including stiletto, pump (court shoe), block, tapered, blade, and wedge.

NOTE: this trait is not applicable anymore just use one of his children.
name: High Heels

description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freckle]freckles[/url].

Freckles are clusters of concentrated melanin which are most often visible on people with a fair complexion. They are mostly found on the face, although they may appear on any skin exposed to the sun.
name: Freckles

description:
The character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Traditional_Japanese_clothing]traditional Japanese clothing[/url].

The various traditional ethnic garments worn in Japan, mainly worn for ceremonies and special occasions like weddings or festivals.
name: Ceremonial Japanese Clothing

description:
The character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Familiar]familiar[/url].

In European folklore and folk-belief of the Medieval and Early Modern periods, familiar spirits (sometimes referred to simply as "familiars") were supernatural entities believed to assist witches and cunning folk in their practice of magic. According to the records of the time, they would appear in numerous guises, often as an animal, but also at times as a human or humanoid figure, and were described as "clearly defined, three-dimensional… forms, vivid with colour and animated with movement and sound" by those alleging to have come into contact with them, unlike later descriptions of ghosts with their "smoky, undefined form[s]".
name: Familiar

description:
At some point of the story, this character gets [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spirit_possession]possessed[/url] by another being.

A preternatural entity takes residence in this person's body. The degree of control may vary, but the possessing entity is both foreign and not a naturally occurring phenomenon. Furthermore, the preternatural entity may take residence in an uninhabited vessel (such as a corpse).

Possession only covers being taken over by a metaphysical entity (spirit, ghost, demon, deity, etc.). In case of physical infections by a biological organism, just use [url=/i3580]Parasitism[/url] instead.
name: Possession

description:
During the story, this character exhibits behavior associated with the theme of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loyalty]loyalty[/url].

Loyalty is faithfulness or a devotion to a person, country, group, or cause.
name: Loyal

description:
The character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Curse]cursed[/url].

A curse is any expressed wish that some form of adversity or misfortune will befall or attach to some other entity—one or more persons, a place, or an object. In particular, "curse" may refer to a wish that harm or hurt will be inflicted by any supernatural powers, such as a spell, a prayer, an imprecation, an execration, magic, witchcraft, a god, a natural force, or a spirit. In many belief systems, the curse itself (or accompanying ritual) is considered to have some causative force in the result.

This trait applies only to characters that are actually cursed by supernatural means, not just jokingly cursed by other characters.
name: Curse

description:
This character dresses in the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lolita_fashion]Lolita style[/url].

Lolita is a fashion subculture originating in Japan that is based on Victorian-era clothing as well as costumes from the Rococo period, but the style has expanded greatly beyond these two. 
The original silhouette is of a knee length skirt or dress with a 'cupcake' shape assisted by petticoats, but has expanded into various types of garments including corsets and floor lengths skirts. Blouses, knee high socks or stockings and headdresses are also worn. 

Lolita fashion has evolved into several different sub styles and has a subculture that is present in many parts of the world.
name: Lolita

description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seriousness]serious[/url] personality.

Serious people treat everything with an attitude of gravity and earnestness.

The opposite of [url=http://vndb.org/i432]relaxed[/url].
name: Serious

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Honesty]honest[/url].

Honesty is associated with virtues such as integrity, truthfulness, and straightforwardness.
name: Honest

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/School_nurse]school nurse[/url].

Schools have nurses to promote good health in students, and in preparation for illnesses and emergencies in students.
name: School Nurse

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Promiscuity#Male_promiscuity]womanizer[/url].

A man is considered a womanizer if he has frequent relationships with various women and shows no sign of commitment. 
They may often engage in [url=http://vndb.org/i755]flirting[/url].

This trait is reserved for male characters.
name: Womanizer

description:
This character has one or more body piercings, or they get pierced during the story.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Body_piercing]Body piercing[/url], a form of body modification, is the practice of puncturing or cutting a part of the human body.
name: Body Piercing

description:
This character is the non-blood-related mother of a character in this game.

This may be the result of an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adoption]adoption[/url] or something similar.
name: Non-blood-related Mother

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bisexuality]bisexual[/url].

Bisexuality is sexual behavior or an orientation involving physical or romantic attraction to both males and females, especially with regard to men and women.

It is one of the three main classifications of sexual orientation, along with a heterosexual and a homosexual orientation, all a part of the heterosexual–homosexual continuum. Pansexuality may or may not be subsumed under bisexuality, with some sources stating that bisexuality encompasses sexual or romantic attraction to all gender identities. People who have a distinct but not exclusive preference for one sex over the other may also identify themselves as bisexual, and people who lack sexual attraction to either sex or genders are known as asexual.
name: Bisexual

description:
This character has one or more [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Horn_(anatomy)]horns[/url] on the head.

A horn is a pointed projection of the skin on the head of various animals, consisting of a covering of horn (keratin and other proteins) surrounding a core of living bone.
name: Horns

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Juvenile_delinquency]delinquent[/url].

A delinquent typically refers to a person of [url=http://vndb.org/i78]student age[/url] that occasionally breaks the school rules or engages in minor criminal activities.

Delinquent students are commonly seen [url=http://vndb.org/i264]smoking[/url] and/or [url=http://vndb.org/i262]drinking[/url].
name: Delinquent

description:
This character wears and uses a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Strap-on_dildo]strap-on dildo[/url].

A strap-on dildo is a dildo designed to be worn, usually with a harness, during sexual activity. Harnesses and dildos are made in a wide variety of styles, with variations in how the harness fits the wearer, how the dildo attaches to the harness, as well as various features intended to facilitate stimulation of the wearer or a sexual partner.

A strap-on dildo can be used for a wide variety of sexual activities, including solo or mutual masturbation, as well as penetrative oral, anal, or vaginal sex. Sexual lubricant can be used to ease insertion.

Strap-on dildos can be used by people of any sexuality or gender, upon people of any sexuality or gender.
name: Strap-on Dildo

description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Telepathy]telepathic[/url] abilities.

Telepathy refers to communication between minds by some means other than sensory perception. Examples include the capability of reading the thoughts of others around, influencing them, talking without speaking, etc.
name: Telepath

description:
This character is Irish.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Irish_people]Irish people[/url] are an ethnic group who originate in Ireland, an island in northwestern Europe.
name: Irish

description:
This character engages in photography.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Photography]Photography [/url] is the art or practice of taking and processing pictures.

The use of this trait is not limited to professional photographers, and can be applied to characters who use any kind of instrument that can capture still images.
name: Photography

description:
Clothing of this character has some kind of wings attached.

This trait is intended for characters that have wings on their clothing as an accessory and should not be mixed with the body trait wings which refers to real wings that are a part of a characters body.
name: Wings

description:
This character is someone who is skilled in the art of directing a musical performance by way of visible gestures.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conducting]Conducting[/url] is the art of directing a musical performance by way of visible gestures. The primary duties of the conductor are to unify performers, set the tempo, execute clear preparations and beats, and to listen critically and shape the sound of the ensemble. Orchestras, choirs, concert bands and other musical ensembles often have conductors.
name: Conductor

description:
This character is seen wearing the long dress of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miko]miko[/url], Japanese priestess.

The traditional attire of a miko would be a pair of red hakama (which are long, divided trousers) or a long red slightly pleated skirt tied with a bow, a white haori (which is a kimono jacket), and some white or red hair ribbons. In Shintoism, the color white symbolizes purity.
name: Miko's Dress

description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ambassador]ambassador[/url].

An ambassador is the highest ranking diplomat who represents a nation and is usually accredited to a foreign sovereign or government, or to an international organization.
name: Ambassador

description:
This character engages in the acts of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_harassment]sexual harassment[/url].

Sexual harassment is intimidation, bullying or coercion of a sexual nature, or the unwelcome or inappropriate promise of rewards in exchange for sexual favors. 

Sexual harassment does not have to be of a sexual nature, however, and can include offensive remarks about a person’s sex.

Both victim and the harasser can be either a woman or a man, and the victim and harasser can be the same sex.
name: Sexual Harassment

description:
The character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Homeless]homeless[/url].

Homelessness describes the condition of people without a regular dwelling. People who are homeless are unable or unwilling to acquire and maintain regular, safe, and adequate housing, or lack "fixed, regular, and adequate night-time residence."
name: Homeless

description:
This character becomes a victim of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_harassment]sexual harassment[/url].

Sexual harassment is intimidation, bullying or coercion of a sexual nature, or the unwelcome or inappropriate promise of rewards in exchange for sexual favors. 

Sexual harassment does not have to be of a sexual nature, however, and can include offensive remarks about a person’s sex.

Both victim and the harasser can be either a woman or a man, and the victim and harasser can be the same sex.
name: Sexual Harassment

description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Office_lady]office lady[/url].

An office lady is a female office worker in Japan who performs generally pink collar tasks such as serving tea and secretarial or clerical work. OLs are often unmarried and live with their parents well into early adulthood. Office ladies are usually full-time permanent staff, although the jobs they do usually have little opportunity for promotion, and there is usually the tacit expectation that they leave their jobs once they get married.

Often nicknamed shokuba no hana or "office flower", these women suffer discrimination due to the M-Curve. Office ladies are usually hired right after high school or junior high, with university graduates discouraged from pursuing this type of career. They are kept around the office for the youth they bring to it, hence the "flower" nickname. They are charged with routine, menial tasks meant to support the male workers. This type of career offers very little chance of advancement and was specifically designed so that women would leave for marriage before their thirties. Women between the ages of twenty four and twenty eight often are advised to settle down as a subtle message to quit, as those years are considered the most suitable for marriage.
name: Office Lady

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dancer]dancer[/url].

A person who dances professionally, as on the stage.
name: Dancer

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pink-collar_worker]pink-collar worker[/url].

Pink-collar worker is a term designating a type of worker and is set to contrast with a blue-collar worker or a white-collar worker. A pink-collar worker performs work said to be stereotypical women's work and are typically in the service industry.

Pink-collar occupations tend to be personal-service oriented and are a significant portion of the economy. Waiting on tables is (along with nursing and teaching) part of the service sector, and among the most common occupations in the United States.
name: Pink-collar Worker

description:
This character engages in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parricide]parricide[/url].

Parricide (Latin: parricida, killer of parents or another close relative) is defined as:

*    the act of murdering one's father (patricide), mother (matricide) or other close relative, but usually not children (infanticide).
*    the act of murdering a person (such as the ruler of one's country) who stands in a relationship resembling that of a father
*    a person who commits such an act.
name: Parricide

description: During the course of this game's story, this character dies and later it is revealed that this death was a fake, a ploy of sorts.
name: Fake Death

description:
This character is seen wearing a bondage harness.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bondage_harness]bondage harness[/url] is a piece of BDSM equipment worn for the purposes of sexual bondage. It typically consists of a series of leather straps, typically between 1 and 2 cm wide, attached together in such a way as to allow a person to "wear" the item.

The item is very closely associated with BDSM play, and is often immediately identifiable as being something to do with "bondage" when depicted. For this reason, it is sometimes worn publicly as a way to reference fetish culture and gain attention.
name: Bondage Harness

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Civil_servant]civil servant[/url].

A civil servant or public servant is a person in the public sector employed in a government department or agency. The term explicitly excludes the armed services, members of which are enlisted and thus not considered ordinary civilians, although civilian officials may work at the Defense Ministry in non-enlisted positions.

Civil servants should be distinguished from politicians. A politician is someone who is involved in the decision making in issues concerning public policy, and in democracies they are usually members of a political party, and are elected by vote or appointed. Civil servants, on the other hand, are employees of the public sector, they may range from public administrators and government bureaucrats to law enforcement officers, government clerks and public works workers.
name: Civil Servant

description:
This character is wearing a randoseru.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Randoseru]randoseru[/url] is a sturdy leather backpack most often used by elementary school children in Japan.  They are most often red for girls and black for boys.
name: Elementary School Backpack

description:
Whether it's in books, television, the internet, or games, this character participates in the consumption of  [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pornography]pornography[/url].

Pornography or porn is the explicit portrayal of sexual subject matter for the purposes of sexual arousal and erotic satisfaction.
name: Consumption of Porn

description:
A side tail is like a ponytail on the side of the head.

Different from [url=https://vndb.org/i19]Twin Tails[/url] as only the hair on one side of the head is tied up.
name: Side Tail

description: This trait is a meta-trait to gather all tail hair traits together.
name: Tail

description: This is a meta trait to gather all hair traits that are named by the length of the hair.
name: Length

description: This is a meta trait to gather traits related to the type of a character's hair.
name: Type

description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Angel]angel[/url].

Angels, in a variety of religions, are regarded as spiritual beings. They are often depicted as messengers of God in the Hebrew and Christian Bibles and the Quran.

The term "angel" has also been expanded to various notions of spiritual beings found in many other religious traditions. Other roles of angels include protecting and guiding human beings, and carrying out God's tasks.
name: Angel

description: This character attends middle school. In Japan middle school is typically between the 7th and 9th grades and students commonly range between 12 and 15 years of age. In some countries middle school is 7th and 8th grade only and known primarily as junior high.
name: Middle School Student

description: This character attends elementary school. Also known as primary school and grade school. Grades are typically 1st through 6th grade and the age of students are normally between 6 and 12 years old.
name: Elementary School Student

description: This character has pointed ears. Often found in legends about elves, fairies, and demons they are sometimes known as elf ears.
name: Pointed Ears

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Immortality]immortal[/url], i.e. they don't have a finite lifespan and could live forever, though the character might still be susceptible to violent death.

It is unknown whether human physical immortality is an achievable condition. Biological forms have inherent limitations which may or may not be able to be overcome through medical interventions or engineering. Natural selection has developed potential biological immortality in at least one species, the jellyfish Turritopsis nutricula.

Use [url=/i1604]Longevity[/url] for those characters that are long-lived, but do have a finite lifespan.
name: Immortal

description:
This character sports the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ringlet_%28haircut%29]ringlet hairstyle[/url].

The ringlet hairstyle is achieved by wrapping a lock of hair around the length of a thin curling iron or can be sported naturally by people with sufficiently tightly curled hair.
name: Ringlet

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cape]cape[/url].

A cape is any sleeveless outer garment, such as a poncho, but usually it is a long garment that covers only the back half of the wearer, fastening around the neck.
name: Cape

description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goatee]goatee[/url].

Goatee refers to a style of facial hair incorporating hair on a man’s chin.
name: Goatee

description:
This character engages in Polygamy.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polygamy]Polygamy[/url] is a marriage which includes more than two partners.

When a man is married to more than one wife at a time, the relationship is called polygyny, and there is no marriage bond between the wives; and when a woman is married to more than one husband at a time, it is called polyandry, and there is no marriage bond between the husbands. If a marriage includes multiple husbands and wives, it can be called group marriage.

Compare [url=/i2177]polyamory[/url], which does not require partners to be married.
name: Polygamy

description: This character loves to eat and is often, specially sweet things and desserts.
name: Sweets Lover

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Confident]confident[/url].

A confident person is sure of oneself; having no uncertainty about one's own abilities, correctness or success.
name: Confident

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/old-fashioned]old-fashioned[/url].

Refers to a person that is behind the times, not up to date, preferring the customs of earlier times.
name: Old-fashioned

description: This character is a native of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France]France[/url] or is of French descent.
name: French

description:
This character dresses in the [url=https://buttcape.blogspot.com/2017/04/the-new-ouji-overview-part-1-terminology.html]ouji style[/url].

Ouji style is literally the boys solution to the popular japanese 'lolita' fashion. 
It involves wearing a style similar to what victorian boys wore. Including masculine blouses and shirts, knickerbockers, short trousers, knee high socks, top hats and newsboy caps. This is also what some girls use when they don't want to dress 'up like a victorian doll'.
name: Ouji Style

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swedish_people]Swedish[/url].

Swedes are a nation and ethnic group native to Sweden, mostly inhabiting Sweden and the other Nordic countries, with descendants living in a number of countries.
name: Swedish

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Iranian_peoples]Iranian[/url].

The Iranian people are an Indo-European ethnic-linguistic group that comprise the speakers of Iranian languages, a major branch of the Indo-European language family, as such forming a branch of the Indo-European-speaking people.
name: Iranian

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spaniards]Spaniard[/url].

The term Spanish people (or Spaniards) has two distinct meanings: Traditionally, it applies to people native to any part of Spain. More recently, it has also come to have a legal meaning, referring to people who hold Spanish citizenship.
name: Spaniard

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Exile]exiled[/url].

Exile means to be away from one's home (i.e. city, state or country), while either being explicitly refused permission to return and/or being threatened with imprisonment or death upon return.
name: Exile

description:
This character takes part in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rebellion]rebellion[/url].

Rebellion, uprising, or insurrection is a refusal of obedience or order. It may encompass a range of behaviors aimed at destroying or replacing an established authority such as a government or a head of state. On the one hand the forms of behaviour can include non-violent methods such as the phenomena of civil disobedience, civil resistance and nonviolent resistance. On the other hand it may encompass violent campaigns. Those who participate in rebellions, especially if they are armed rebellions, are known as rebels.
name: Rebellion

description: This character is religious. Which religion doesn't matter, but it is a significant part of their character in the story.
name: Religious

description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Atheist]atheist[/url].

Atheism is, in a broad sense, the rejection of belief in the existence of deities.
name: Atheist

description: This meta-trait is designed to gather all traits regarding characters' [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Religion]religious beliefs[/url] that came strongly forward during games' stories.
name: Religious Belief

description:
This character has a mature personality.

In terms of personality, this is a person fully developed in terms of thinking. If used to refer to a young person, their behavior is not typical of their age, as this person usually acts like a grown up or a more aged and wise one.
name: Mature

description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sideburns]sideburns[/url].

Sideburns are patches of facial hair grown on the sides of the face, extending from the hairline to below the ears and worn with an unbearded chin.

Sideburns can be worn and grown in combination with other styles of facial hair, such as the moustache or goatee, but once they extend from ear to ear via the chin they cease to be sideburns and become a beard, chinstrap beard, or chin curtain.
name: Sideburns

description:
This character is a follower or believes in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pacifism]pacifism[/url].

Pacifism is the opposition to war and violence.

The character does not like war or fighting. Preferring a non-violent, non-confrontational method to settle disputes.
name: Pacifist

description: This character engages in sexual acts in a public location. For example, in a park, a train, or school.
name: Sex in Public Places

description:
This character is a professional [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sniper]sniper[/url]. 

A sniper is a highly trained marksman who operates in one to two man teams which maintain close visual contact with the enemy and engages targets from concealed positions or physical distances exceeding the detection capabilities of the enemy personnel, without being detected.
name: Sniper

description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sniper_rifle]sniper rifle[/url].

In military and law enforcement terminology, a sniper rifle is a precision-rifle used to ensure more accurate placement of bullets at longer ranges than other small arms. A typical sniper rifle is built for optimal levels of accuracy, fitted with a telescopic sight and chambered for a military centerfire cartridge.
name: Sniper Rifle

description:
This character competes in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rhythmic_gymnastics]Rhythmic Gymnastics[/url].

Rhythmic gymnastics is a sport in which individuals or teams of competitors (2 or more people) manipulate one or two pieces of apparatus: rope, clubs, hoop, ball, ribbon and Free (no apparatus, so called "floor routine"). An individual athlete only manipulates 1 apparatus at a time. When multiple gymnasts are performing a routine together a maximum of two types of apparatus may be distributed through the group. An athlete can exchange apparatus with a team member at any time through the routine. Therefore, an athlete can manipulate up to two different pieces of apparatus through the duration of the routine. Rhythmic gymnastics is a sport that combines elements of ballet, gymnastics, dance, and apparatus manipulation. The victor is the participant who earns the most points, determined by a panel of judges, for leaps, balances, pirouettes (pivots), flexibilities, apparatus handling, execution, and artistic effect.
name: Rhythmic Gymnastics

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Medical_student]medical student[/url].

A person accepted into a medical school and enrolled in an educational program in medicine is referred to as a medical student.
name: Medical Student

description: This character works in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Management]management[/url] career. Management is the process of getting people together to accomplish desired goals and objectives using available resources efficiently and effectively.
name: Management

description: This character is in an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Executive_%28management%29]executive career[/url]. An executive is an individual at the highest level of organizational management who have the day-to-day responsibilities of managing a company or corporation.
name: Executive

description: This character is a student in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kindergarten]kindergarten[/url]. The term kindergarten is used around the world to describe a variety of different institutions that have been developed for children ranging from the ages of two to seven, depending on the country concerned.
name: Kindergartener

description:
This character uses a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wig]wig[/url].

A wig is a head of hair made from horsehair, human hair, wool, feathers, yak hair, buffalo hair, or synthetic materials which is worn on the head for fashion or various other aesthetic and stylistic reasons, including cultural and religious observance.
name: Wig

description:
The character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Machine_gun]machine gun[/url].

A machine gun is a fully automatic mounted or portable firearm, usually designed to fire rounds in quick succession from an ammunition belt or large-capacity magazine, typically at a rate of several hundred rounds per minute.
name: Machine Gun

description:
This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crutches]crutch or crutches[/url].

A crutch is a device used to counter a mobility impairment or an injury that limits walking ability.
name: Crutch

description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crossbow]crossbow[/url].

A crossbow is a weapon consisting of a bow mounted on a stock that shoots projectiles, often called bolts or quarrels.
name: Crossbow

description:
This character doesn't act maturely.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maturity_%28psychological%29]Maturity[/url] is a psychological term used to indicate how a person responds to the circumstances or environment in an appropriate manner.
name: Immature

description:
This character frequently uses a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer]computer[/url] for work or a hobby.

The characters makes use out of the benefits a computer can provide including installing/downloading unique programs etc.
name: Computering

description:
This character is never referred by his/her name. Titles such as 'sensei' or 'onii-chan' are used by the characters when they are talking to or about this character. When required, the game displays this character's name as 'Protagonist', 'Player', 'Student A' or something similar.

This should not be mixed with the [url=http://vndb.org/i593]Nameable[/url] trait, since this character's name cannot be changed.
name: No Name

description:
This character's hair has more than one color in it. For example, the hair may be striped or gradated.

Note: ONLY use this trait when the character has several colours in their hair.

Example: [url=http://vndb.org/c10040]Aaron Vanich[/url] has multicolored hair.
Counter example: [url=http://vndb.org/c10551]Crayanne[/url] does NOT have multicolored hair.
name: Multicolored

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Corset]corset[/url]. 

A corset is a garment worn to hold and shape the torso into a desired shape for aesthetic or medical purposes (either for the duration of wearing this item, or with a more lasting effect).

In recent years, the term "corset" has also been borrowed by the fashion industry to refer to tops which, to varying degrees, mimic the look of traditional corsets without actually acting as one. While these modern corsets and corset tops often feature lacing and/or boning and generally mimic a historical style of corsets, they have very little if any effect on the shape of the wearer's body.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/45/129645.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://vndb.org/c42629]Example 2[/url]
name: Corset

description:
[url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140909061051/http://www.japan-101.com/culture/hadaka_apron_japanese_clothing_fetish.htm]Naked Apron or Hadaka Apron[/url] in Japanese is a small niche clothing fetish.

Naked Apron is used to refer to when a person, usually a woman, wears an apron over a nude, or partially underwear or swimsuit covered, body.
name: Naked Apron

description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fashion_design]fashion design[/url].

Fashion design is the art of the application of design and aesthetics or natural beauty to clothing and accessories. Some work alone or as part of a team.
name: Fashion Design

description:
This character performs a hairjob. Apply [url=/i1655]i1655[/url] to the receiving character.

A hairjob is the act of using one's hair to stimulate a male partner's penis.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/10/119110.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Hairjob

description:
This character's nipples are inverted instead of pointing outward typical of most females.

Inverted nipples may be subject to stimulation possibly resulting in the reversal of their initial inversion.
name: Inverted Nipples

description: This character engages in consuming large quantities of semen at once, typically but not necessarily from multiple partners.
name: Gokkun

description:
This character has stubble.

Stubble refers to facial hair which has been shaven and just begun to regrow.  It is short, with a rough texture.  Stubble can be a deliberate grooming choice ("designer stubble") or merely due to growth in between clean shaves ("five o'clock shadow").
name: Stubble

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Native_Americans_in_the_United_States]Native American[/url].

Native Americans in the United States are the indigenous peoples in North America within the boundaries of the present-day continental United States, parts of Alaska, and the island state of Hawaii. They are composed of numerous, distinct Native American tribes and ethnic groups, many of which survive as intact political communities
name: Native American

description: This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kigurumi]kigurumi[/url] or animal costume. They can also represent cartoon characters.
name: Kigurumi

description:
This character is seen carrying a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tray]tray[/url].

A tray is a shallow platform designed for carrying things. It is larger than a salver, a diminutive version commonly used for lighter and smaller servings, and it can be fashioned from numerous materials, including silver, brass, sheet iron, wood, melamine, and papier-mâché. Some examples have raised galleries, handles, and short feet for support.

Trays are flat, but with raised edges to stop things from sliding off of them. They are made in a range of shapes but are commonly found in oval or rectangular forms, sometimes with cutout or attached handles with which to carry them.
name: Tray

description:
This character is partially or completely [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deafness]deaf[/url].

Deafness, or hearing impairment, is a partial or total inability to hear.
name: Deafness

description: This character has garnet eye color.
name: Garnet

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diaper]diaper[/url].

A diaper is a kind of underwear that allows one to defecate or urinate on oneself discreetly. When diapers become soiled, they require changing; this process is often performed by a second person such as a parent or caregiver. Failure to change a diaper on a regular enough basis can result in diaper rash.
name: Diaper

description:
This character is grumbler.

The position of such characters is to go against the opinion of others and to complain about any events that occur around them. Such people are quite difficult to please.
name: Grumbler

description:
This character is seen carrying a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stun_grenade]stun grenade[/url].

These grenades are used to temporally neutralize the combat effectiveness of enemies by disorienting their senses. The flash of light momentarily activates all light sensitive cells in the eye, making vision impossible for approximately five seconds until the eye restores itself to its normal, unstimulated state. The loud blast produced by the grenade adds to its incapacitating properties by disturbing the fluid in the ear.
name: Stun Grenade

description:
This character is seen carrying a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ninjato]ninjato[/url] or other kinds of short japanese swords like [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wakizashi]Wakizashi[/url] or [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kodachi]Kodachi[/url].

The ninjatō is typically depicted as being a short sword, often portrayed as having a straight blade (similar to that of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shikomizue#Shikomizue]shikomizue[/url]) with a square guard. Usually of a length "less than 60 cm", the rest of the sword is comparatively "thick, heavy and straight".
name: Ninjato

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/docile]docile[/url].

Different from being [url=http://vndb.org/i250]shy[/url] or [url=http://vndb.org/i452]timid[/url], docile people are not [url=http://vndb.org/i248]outgoing[/url] and are typically very compliant.
name: Docile

description:
This character was put into [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suspended_animation]artificial sleep[/url] or hibernation.

Suspended animation is the slowing of life processes by external means without termination. Breathing, heartbeat, and other involuntary functions may still occur, but they can only be detected by artificial means. Extreme cold can be used to precipitate the slowing of an individual's functions; use of this process has led to the developing science of cryonics. Cryonics is another method of life preservation but it cryopreserves organisms using liquid nitrogen that will preserve the organism until reanimation.
name: Suspended Animation

description:
This character wears a [url=http://romenov.com/daniel/?p=614]ninja suit[/url].

Usually the ninja wore more appropriate clothes to disguise the day-to-day activity or to mingle with the population, without attracting attention. One characteristic of the shinobi shozoku are the various compartments used to conceal weapons and other tools.

Each family had its own shinobi shozoku, with individual modifications appropriate to what they thought best for the moment, type of mission or for the season.
name: Ninja Suit

description:
This character has some [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grenade]grenades[/url].

The term grenade refers to any explosive device designed to be thrown by hand. Most grenades explode, projecting fragments, i.e., pieces of the casing, serrated wire, or an incendiary material.
name: Grenade

description:
This character has some [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Smoke_bomb]smoke bombs[/url].

Smoke bombs can be used to create a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Smoke_screen]smoke screen[/url], as a ground-to-ground or ground-to-air signaling devices, fireworks, etc. Smoke bombs are normally considered non-lethal, although incorrect use may cause death.
name: Smoke Grenade

description:
This character participates in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Intercrural_sex]intercrural sex[/url]. Apply this trait to the character whose penis is being stimulated. Apply [url=/i1631]i1631[/url] to their partner.

Intercrural sex is a type of non-penetrative sex, in which a male places his penis between his partner's thighs and thrusts to create friction.

A version of this is sumata, where a character rubs their penis against the partner's vagina without penetration.
name: Intercrural Sex

description:
This character's eyes are drawn with the top eyelid slanted outwards. This usually produces a weak, gentle look.

Due to it's common usage in anime and games it's often noticeable only in series when other characters don't share the trait or as a contrast to characters with [url=/i918]Tsurime[/url].
name: Tareme

description:
This character's eyes are drawn with the top eyelid slanted inwards. This usually produces a strong, piercing look.

It is the opposite of [url=/i917]Tareme[/url].
name: Tsurime

description:
This character has cyan hair.

Please see the [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/33/126533.jpg]VNDB Hair Color Chart[/url] for examples when in doubt.
name: Cyan

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pendant]pendant[/url].

A pendant is a loose-hanging piece of jewellery, generally attached by a small loop to a necklace, when the ensemble may be known as a "pendant necklace". A pendant earring is an earring with a piece hanging down.
name: Pendant Necklace

description:
This character has [url=http://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyan]cyan[/url] eyes.

It is a light blue color with a subtle hint of green.
name: Cyan

description: This character's eye shape resembles that of normal people from the "real world". However, in the world of anime such cut of eyes is most common among the adults and villains; with normal characters having big, round eyes.
name: Hosome

description:
The eyes of this character are always [url=http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/EyesAlwaysShut]closed[/url].

By the laws of the anime genre, this sort of eyes can occur among the wise or sly people as well as among the dangerous folks who can explode with incredible rage, when they get angry.
name: Itome

description:
This character's pupils are slits, as opposed to dilated pupils.

In real life these can be found on cats and several species of reptiles.

In fiction, supernatural beings like demons, monsters, vampires etc. would have such a trait. 
Normal human characters rarely have this.

Example: [url=https://vndb.org/c9433]Foxy[/url]
name: Slit Pupils

description:
This character is the receiving participant in a bukkake scene.

Bukkake refers to scenes featuring a person being ejaculated on by several men, or in some cases a single man over and over. The main point is for the recipient's body to be covered with semen.
name: Bukkake

description:
This character has teal hair.

Please see the [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/33/126533.jpg]VNDB Hair Color Chart[/url] for examples when in doubt.
name: Teal

description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Teal]teal[/url] eyes.

Teal is a low-saturation color, a bluish-green to dark medium, similar to medium blue-green and dark cyan. It can be created by mixing green with blue into a white base, or deepened as needed with a little bit of black or gray color.
name: Teal

description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Half-orphan]half-orphan[/url].

An half-orphan is a child bereaved one of his or her parents. In common usage, only a child who has lost one of parents is called an half-orphan. However, adults can also be referred to as half-orphans, or "adult half-orphans".
name: Half-orphan

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Absentminded]absentminded[/url]. 

Absent-mindedness is a mental condition in which the subject experiences low levels of attention and frequent distraction. Absent-mindedness is not a diagnosed condition but rather a symptom of boredom and sleepiness which people experience in their daily lives. When suffering from absent-mindedness, people tend to show signs of memory lapse and weak recollection of recently occurring events. This can usually be a result of a variety of other conditions often diagnosed by clinicians such as ADD and depression. In addition to absent-mindedness leading to an array of consequences affecting daily life, it can have as more severe, long-term problems.
name: Absentminded

description:
This character is often shown wearing [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Panties]panties[/url].

Panties are a form of underwear designed to be worn by women and children in the crotch area below the waist. Typical components include an elastic waistband, a crotch panel to cover the genital area (usually lined with absorbent material such as cotton), a pair of leg openings which, like the waistband, are often made of elastic, and constructed with material that is breathable. Whilst panties were originally designed to cover the entire lower half of the female form, the modern version (since the 1970s) has either no legs or, in some cases, very short ones, and has become progressively more revealing over time.

Do not use this trait related to sex scenes where a character's undergarment is briefly shown. Use it on occasions where characters are displaying their undergarments occasionally either because their other clothing are designed in a way that it reveals them or when they don't wear anything else to cover their undergarments.
name: Panties

description:
This character is often shown wearing a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brassiere]bra[/url].

A brassiere is a woman's undergarment that supports her breasts. Bras are typically form-fitting and perform a variety of functions and have also evolved into a fashion item. The primary purpose of a bra is to enhance the wearer's comfort by supporting her breasts.

Do not use this trait related to sex scenes where a character's undergarment is briefly shown. Use it on occasions where characters are displaying their undergarments occasionally either because their other clothing are designed in a way that it reveals them or when they don't wear anything else to cover their undergarments.
name: Bra

description:
This character wears no panties or any other form of lower body undergarments even though they are otherwise clothed. In Japan it's shortened to 'Nopan' when a girl wears a skirt with no panties. Sometimes called 'Commando' or '[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Going_Commando]Going Commando[/url]' in the west.

Do not use this trait related to sex scenes where a character's lack of undergarments are briefly shown. Use it on occasions where a character's lack of panties is revealed as part of the story or character design.
name: No Panties

description:
This character wears a sports [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uniform]uniform[/url].

A sports suit consists of pants or shorts, jacket (blazer) and sometimes t-shirt.
name: Sports Uniform

description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heterochromia#Central_heterochromia]central heterochromia[/url].

Central heterochromia is an eye condition where there are two colors in the same iris; the central (pupillary) zone of the iris is a different color than the mid-peripheral (ciliary) zone, with the true iris color being the outer color.
name: Central Heterochromia

description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shield]shield[/url].

A shield is a type of personal armor, meant to intercept attacks, either by stopping projectiles such as arrows or redirecting a hit from a sword, mace or battle axe to the side of the shield-bearer.

Shields vary greatly in size, ranging from large panels that protect the user's entire body to small models (such as the buckler) that were intended for hand-to-hand-combat use.
name: Shield

description:
This character has sex in the [url=http://www.sofeminine.co.uk/relationships/album856252/sex-positions-kamasutra-sex-positions-21211764.html]tominagi[/url] position. Apply this trait to the penetrated partner and apply [url=/i1702]i1702[/url] to the penetrating partner.

In this position, the penetrating partner kneels in front of the receiving partner, with their torso mostly upright, while the receiving partner lies on their back, with their legs folded. They may rest their feet against the penetrating partner's torso.

This is similar to other butterfly positions, but the receiving partner is in a noticeably "curled up" position.

If the penetrating partner's torso is mostly horizontal and on top of the receiving partner, consider using the [url=/i93]missionary[/url] trait instead.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/13/84313.jpg]Example 1a[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/14/84314.jpg]Example 1b[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/71/84171.jpg]Counter-example 1[/url] - Use [url=/i93]missionary[/url] instead since the penetrating partner is on top of, instead of in front of, the receiving partner.
name: Tominagi

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Housewife]housewife[/url].

Housewife is a term used to describe a married woman whose main occupation is running or operating the family's home—caring for and educating her children, cooking and storing food, buying goods the family needs in day to day life, cleaning or maintaining parts of the home, making clothes for the family, etc.—and who does not generally maintain employment outside the home.
name: Housewife

description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ballet]ballet[/url].

Ballet is a type of performance dance, that originated in the Italian Renaissance courts of the 15th century. It's a form of classical dance that's seemingly gymnastic and acrobatic often preformed to formal classical music.
name: Ballet

description:
This character is seen carrying a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pipe_%28fluid_conveyance%29]pipe[/url].

A hollow cylinder usually made of metall, normally used for the conveyance of water, gas, steam, petroleum, etc. As a weapon it's hollowness makes it lighter and faster than a solid rod while still retaining a strong durability.
name: Pipe

description:
This character gets shocked by electricity in a sexual context. Apply [url=/i3590]Engages in > Electric Shock Torture[/url] to the one doing the shocking.

In case this happens in a non-sexual context, consider simply applying [url=/i401]Subject of > Torture[/url] or [url=/i90]Subject of > Assault[/url] as needed.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Electric_shock]Electric shock[/url] occurs upon contact of a (human) body with any source of electricity that causes a sufficient current through the skin, muscles, or hair. Typically, the expression is used to describe an injurious exposure to electricity. When exposed to a lethal electrical shock one is electrocuted.
name: Electric Shock (BDSM)

description:
This character suffers from a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Neuromuscular_disease]neuromuscular disease[/url].

Neuromuscular disease is a very broad term that encompasses many diseases and ailments that either directly, via intrinsic muscle pathology, or indirectly, via nerve pathology, impair the functioning of the muscles.
name: Muscle Disease

description:
The character has sex with a creature that could be considered a monster.

Furries or characters with only a few monstrous features like a tail, animal ears, or horns should usually not be considered monsters. Examples of monsters include orcs, goblins, minotaurs, or other unnatural creatures.

In case of sexual acts with overgrown insects or insectoid-like monsters, use [url=/i2866]Sex with Insects[/url] instead.
name: Sex with Monsters

description:
This character has sex with animals. Part-human, part-animal characters like [url=https://vndb.org/c4645]Mikan[/url] or [url=https://vndb.org/c5266]Tamamo[/url] don't count as "animals" for this trait. Neither do monsters and monster-like beings, in which case use [url=/i943]Sex with Monsters[/url] instead.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zoophilia]Bestiality[/url] is the practice of sexual activity between humans and non-human animals (bestiality), or a preference for or fixation on such practice.

Apply this trait to the human participant. Don't apply it to the animal participant.
name: Bestiality

description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Wiki-dthroat.png]deep-throating[/url]. Apply this trait to the character taking their partner's penis into their mouth, and apply [url=/i1641]Subject of (Sexual) >> Deepthroat[/url] to the character whose penis is being stimulated.

Deep-throating is a sexual act in which a character takes their partner's entire erect penis deep into their mouth, past the epiglottis and into the throat. The practice is a type of fellatio, a form of oral sex.
name: Deepthroat

description:
This character is depicted with the facial expression called [url=http://knowyourmeme.com/memes/ahegaokin-%E3%82%A2%E3%83%98%E9%A1%94%E8%8F%8C]ahegao[/url].

The ahegao is an overly exaggerated orgasmic expression, the eyes usually rolled up with teardrops/sweat at times, the mouth wide open with the tongue sticking out and blushing cheeks.
name: Ahegao

description:
A character from [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Singapore]Singapore[/url].

Singapore, officially the Republic of Singapore, is a southeast asian city-state off the southern tip of the Malay Peninsula, 137 kilometers north of the equator. An island country made up of 63 islands, it is separated from Malaysia by the Straits of Johor to its north and from Indonesia's Riau Islands by the Singapore Strait to its south. The country is highly urbanised with very little primary rainforest remaining, although more land is being created for development through land reclamation.
name: Singaporean

description:
The character is a subject of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stalking]stalking[/url].

Stalking is a term commonly used to refer to unwanted, obsessive attention by individuals (and sometimes groups of people) to others.
Stalking can be defined as the willful and repeated following, watching, and / or harassing of another person. Most of the time, the purpose of stalking is to attempt to force a relationship with someone who is unwilling or otherwise unavailable. Unlike other crimes, which usually involve one act, stalking is a series of actions that occur over a period of time. Although stalking is illegal, the actions that contribute to stalking are legal, such as gathering information, calling someone on the phone, sending gifts, emailing or instant messaging. Such actions by themselves are not usually abusive, but can become abusive when frequently repeated over time.
name: Stalking

description:
This character is left handed.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Handedness]Left-handedness[/url] is the preference for the left hand over the right for everyday activities such as writing. In ancient times it was seen as a sign of the devil, and was abhorred in many cultures. A variety of studies suggest that 13% of the world population is left-handed.
name: Left Handed

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blouse]blouse[/url].

A blouse is a loose-fitting upper garment that was formerly worn by workmen, peasants, artists, women and children. It is typically gathered at the waist (by a waistband or belt) so that it hangs loosely over the wearer's body. Today, the word most commonly refers to a woman's shirt.
name: Blouse

description:
This character is a teacher responsible for physical education of students.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Physical_education]Physical education[/url] or gymnastics is a course taken during primary and secondary education that encourages psychomotor learning in a play or movement exploration setting.
name: PE Teacher

description:
This character has a short [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hime_cut]hime cut[/url] hairstyle.

A short Hime cut is a hairstyle consisting of straight, cheek to chin length sidelocks and blunt bangs. With the rest of the hair shorter than the shoulders and straightened.
name: Short Hime Cut

description:
This character works at a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Host_club]hostess club[/url].

A host / hostess light cigarettes, pour drinks, offer flirtatious conversation and perform to entertain the customers.
name: Host(ess)

description:
This character wears a yukata.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yukata]yukata[/url] is a casual summer kimono. Yukata are worn at Japanese inns after bathing and outdoor summer events such as fireworks displays and bon-odori festivals.
name: Yukata

description:
This character comes from a Thai origin.

The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thai_people]Thai people[/url] are the main ethnic group of Thailand and are part of the larger Tai ethnolinguistic peoples found in Thailand and adjacent countries in Southeast Asia as well as southern China.
name: Thai

description:
This character has grey hair color.

Please see the [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/33/126533.jpg]VNDB Hair Color Chart[/url] for examples when in doubt.
name: Grey

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goat]goat[/url].

The domestic goat is a subspecies of goat domesticated from the wild goat of southwest Asia and Eastern Europe. The goat is a member of the family Bovidae and is closely related to the sheep as both are in the goat-antelope subfamily Caprinae. There are over 300 distinct breeds of goat. Goats are one of the oldest domesticated species, and have been used for their milk, meat, hair, and skins over much of the world.
name: Goat

description:
This character is a younger sister.

A younger sister is a female sibling who is younger than at least one of the other siblings.
name: Younger Sister

description:
This character is an older sister.

An older sister is a female sibling who is older than at least one of the other siblings.
name: Older Sister

description:
This character is a younger brother.

A younger brother is a male sibling who is younger than at least one of the other siblings.
name: Younger Brother

description:
This character is an older brother.

An older brother is a male sibling who is older than at least one of the other siblings.
name: Older Brother

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cravat]cravat[/url].

A cravat is a neckband, this term applied to any long-strip neckcloth that was not a ruff. The ruff, a starched, pleated white linen strip, can also be a bib, or a napkin. A band can be either a plain, attached shirt collar or a detachable "falling band" that draped over the doublet collar.
name: Cravat

description:
This character is often portrayed carrying a doll or a puppet.

A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doll]doll[/url] is typically a representational figure of a human or humanoid character, often used as a toy for children, especially little girls. Dolls have also been used in traditional religious rituals throughout the world.

A representational figure manipulated by an entertainer (puppeteer) is typically called a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Puppet]puppet[/url].
name: Doll

description: This character has fangs, or only one fang for cuteness.
name: Fang

description: This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yuki-onna]yuki-onna[/url], the semi-spirit entity which controls ice, cold weather or just can freeze everything.
name: Yuki-onna

description:
The character with this trait is a participant in genetic research. This character participated in the research as a scientist/researcher.

Genetics deals with the molecular structure and function of genes, with gene behavior in the context of a cell or organism (e.g. dominance and epigenetics), with patterns of inheritance from parent to offspring, and with gene distribution, variation and change in populations. Given that genes are universal to living organisms, genetics can be applied to the study of all living systems, from viruses and bacteria, through plants (especially crops) and domestic animals, to humans (as in medical genetics).
name: Genetic Research

description:
This character has blunt bangs.

Blunt bangs are straight cut bangs, done with straight or almost straight hair. The edges must be horizontal (not spiky, even if the spikes are in the same length!).
name: Blunt Bangs

description: This character has V-shaped bangs.
name: V Bangs

description:
This character wears an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Armband]armband[/url]
