An armband is a piece of material worn around the arm over the sleeve of other clothing if present. they may be worn for pure ornamentation to mark the wearer as belonging to group, having a certain rank or role, or being in a particular state or condition.
name: Armband

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bracelet]bracelet[/url].

A bracelet is an article of jewelry that is worn around the wrist. Bracelets can be manufactured from metal, leather, cloth, plastic or other materials and sometimes contain jewels, rocks, wood, and/or shells. 

Bracelets are also used for medical and identification purposes, such as allergy bracelets and hospital patient-identification tags.
name: Bracelet

description:
This character wears an ankle [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bracelet]bracelet[/url].

An anklet (or an ankle bracelet) is an article of jewelry that is worn around the the ankle. Bracelets can be manufactured from metal, leather, cloth, plastic or other materials and sometimes contain jewels, rocks, wood, and/or shells.
name: Ankle Bracelet

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suspenders]suspenders[/url].

Suspenders or braces are fabric or leather straps worn over the shoulders to hold up trousers. Straps may be elasticated, either entirely or only at attachment ends and most straps are of woven cloth forming an X or Y shape at the back. Braces are typically attached to trousers with buttons using leather tabs at the ends or with clips.
name: Suspenders

description:
This character is a bad student.

A bad student is a student who doesn't try to learn and doesn't care about studying, is just really careless, lazy, and doesn't try when it comes to learning. Or they just are not good at studying, even if they are not being lazy and are actually doing their best. 

Also, if someone has to go to summer school it would be a bad student. They also get a lot of D's and F's and never get A's or B's.
name: Bad Student

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Honors_student]honor student[/url].

An honors student is a person recognized for achieving high grades or high marks in their course work.
Honor students are recognized for their academic achievement on lists published periodically throughout the school year, known as honor rolls, varying from school to school, and from different levels of education.
name: Honor Student

description: This meta-trait is designed to house student traits that are grade specific.
name: Students by Grade

description: This meta-trait is designed to house student traits by activity.
name: Students by Activity

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Straw_hat]straw hat[/url].

A straw hat is a brimmed hat that is woven out of straw or reeds. The hat is designed to protect the head from the sun and against heatstroke, but straw hats were also used in fashion and as a decorative element of a uniform.
name: Straw Hat

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pessimism]pessimist[/url].

Pessimism is a state of mind in which one anticipates undesirable outcomes or believes that the evil or hardships in life outweighs the good or luxuries.
These characters typically expect everything to go wrong, often depressing others.
name: Pessimist

description:
The character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Model_%28profession%29]model[/url].

A model is a person who is employed to display, advertise and promote commercial products (notably fashion clothing) or to serve as a subject of works of art.
name: Model

description:
This character is overconfident.

Overconfidence is a well-established bias in which someone's subjective confidence in their judgments is reliably greater than their objective accuracy, especially when [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Confidence]confidence[/url] is relatively high.
name: Overconfident

description:
This character is selling goods, food or anything else. However, he may not be the owner of the store.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vendor]vendor[/url] or a supplier, is a supply chain management term that means anyone who provides goods or services to a company or individuals. A vendor often manufactures inventoriable items, and sells those items to a customer.
name: Vendor

description: This character uses his intelligence for selfish purposes. To achieve his goals, he can use deception, blackmail, and other tricks. But having a difficult character, such people are not necessarily bad.
name: Sly

description:
This character tries to seduce another character(s).

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seduction]Seduction[/url], seen negatively, involves temptation and enticement, often sexual in nature, to lead someone astray into a behavioral choice they would not have made if they were not in a state of sexual arousal. Especially, it may be a treason against the wife/husband or girlfriend/boyfriend. Seen positively, seduction is a synonym for the act of charming someone by an appeal to the senses, often with the goal of reducing unfounded fears and leading to their "sexual emancipation".
name: Seduction

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Towel]bath towel[/url].

A towel is a piece of absorbent fabric or paper used for drying or wiping. It draws moisture through direct contact, often using a blotting or a rubbing motion. Common household textile towels are made from cotton, rayon, bamboo, nonwoven fibers or a few other materials.

A bath towel is used for drying the body after bathing, showering or swimming. It is typically rectangular, with a typical size around 30"×60" (75×150 cm). A large bath towel is sometimes called a bath sheet.
name: Towel

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tube_top]tube top[/url].

A tube top is a shoulderless, sleeveless women's garment that wraps around the upper torso. It is generally tight over the breasts, usually by means of elastic bands at its top and bottom.
name: Tube Top

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bolo_tie]bolo tie[/url].

A bolo tie  is a type of necktie consisting of a piece of cord or braided leather with decorative metal tips or aglets (aiguillettes) secured with an ornamental clasp or slide.
name: Bolo Tie

description:
This character wears a strapless dress.

A strapless dress is a shoulderless, sleeveless women's garment that consists of a skirt with an attached bodice (or a matching bodice giving the effect of a one-piece garment).
name: Strapless Dress

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polo_neck]turtleneck sweater[/url].

A polo neck, roll-neck(UK) or turtleneck (US) or skivvy (Australia) sweater is a garment with a close-fitting, round, and high collar that folds over and covers the neck.
name: Turtleneck Sweater

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polo_neck]shirt with a turtleneck[/url].

A polo neck, roll-neck(UK) or turtleneck (US) or skivvy (Australia) shirt is a garment with a close-fitting, round, and high collar that folds over and covers the neck.
name: Turtleneck Shirt

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polo_neck]dress with a turtleneck[/url].

A polo neck, roll-neck(UK) or turtleneck (US) or skivvy (Australia) dress is a garment with a close-fitting, round, and high collar that folds over and covers the neck.
name: Turtleneck Dress

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bonnet_%28headgear%29]bonnet[/url]. 

The most common kind of bonnet worn today is a soft headcovering for babies. They are shaped similarly to the kind of bonnets women used to wear, that is they cover the hair and ears, but not the forehead.

However the term has also been used, for example, for steel helmets. We don't use this meaning in the database.
name: Bonnet

description:
This character carries a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christian_cross]christian cross[/url].

The Christian cross, seen as a representation of the instrument of the crucifixion of Jesus Christ, is the best-known religious symbol of Christianity. It is related to the crucifix (a cross that includes a usually three-dimensional representation of Jesus' body) and to the more general family of cross symbols.

Do not mix with the necklace version, [url=http://vndb.org/i159]Cross Necklace[/url] or other crosses that appear on clothing or as accessories. This trait is for a larger cross that is held on the hand or hung on a wall.
name: Cross

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Part-time]part-time worker[/url].

A part-time job is a form of employment that carries fewer hours per week than a full-time job. Workers are considered to be part-time if they commonly work fewer than 30 or 35 hours per week. There are many reasons for working part-time, including the desire to do so, having one's hours cut back by an employer and being unable to find a full-time job.
name: Part-time Worker

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Retail_clerk]shop clerk[/url].

A retail clerk obtains or receives merchandise, totals bills, accepts payment, and makes change for customers in retail stores such as drug stores, candy stores, or liquor stores (thus, the position may partially overlap with that of cashier). They clean shelves, counters, or tables; stock shelves, counters, or tables with merchandise; set up advertising displays or arrange merchandise on counters or tables to promote sales; stamp, mark, or tag prices on merchandise; and obtain merchandise requested by customers or receive merchandise selected by customers. They are expected to answer customers' questions concerning location, price, and use of merchandise; to total price and tax on merchandise purchased by customers to determine bill; and to accept payment, make change, and wrap or bag the merchandise for customers. They may remove and record the amount of cash in register at end of shift. A retail clerk, particularly in a smaller store, may keep record of sales, prepare inventory of stock, or order merchandise.
name: Shop Clerk

description: This character is the manager of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dormitory]dormitory[/url].
name: Dormitory Manager

description:
This character has a [url=http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/SpikyHair]spiky hairstyle[/url].

Spiky hair is the process of using products to make the hair stand on end like spikes sticking out of the head. It's often associated with the punk rock subculture and, in fiction, it's used to show that a character is wild and cool as well as being badass. While spiky hair is prominent in real life, fictional characters are almost always shown with perfectly spiked hair despite the fact that it would get flattened while they're in bed. While it is a typically male hairstyle, it has become somewhat fashionable for women to have a spiky hairstyle.
name: Spiky

description:
This character wears a ribbon tie.

The ribbon tie is a long piece of thin cloth worn for decorative purposes around the neck or shoulders, resting under the shirt collar and knotted at the throat. It is usually tied in a bow.
name: Ribbon Tie

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ribbon]ribbons[/url].

A ribbon or a thin band of flexible material, typically cloth but also plastic or sometimes metal, used primarily for binding and tying. In this case, a cloth or plastic ribbon is used as a clothing decoration or a fashion item.
name: Ribbon

description: This character wears a ribbon around their arm, leg or any other place of the body, except for the neck and hair.
name: Body Ribbon

description: This character has the Christian Cross as earrings.
name: Cross Earrings

description: This character has a Christian Cross as part of the design element of their clothing.
name: Cross Design

description:
This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lactation]lactates[/url].

Lactation describes the secretion of milk from the mammary glands. Lactation can be induced in humans by a combination of physical and psychological stimulation, by drugs, or by a combination of those methods. It can be stimulated outside of pregnancy for sexual purposes.
name: Lactation

description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christian_cross]christian cross[/url] is a part of this characters clothing and accessories.

The Christian cross, seen as a representation of the instrument of the crucifixion of Jesus Christ, is the best-known religious symbol of Christianity. It is related to the crucifix (a cross that includes a usually three-dimensional representation of Jesus' body) and to the more general family of cross symbols.
name: Cross

description:
Pendant earrings are earrings with a piece hanging down.

Example: https://s.vndb.org/ch/35/29835.jpg
name: Pendant Earrings

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jewellery]Jewellery[/url].

Jewellery is a form of personal adornment, such as brooches, rings, necklaces, earrings, and bracelets.

With some exceptions, such as medical alert bracelets or military dog tags, jewellery normally differs from other items of personal adornment in that it has no other purpose than to look appealing, but humans have been producing and wearing it for a long time – with 100,000-year-old beads made from Nassarius shells thought to be the oldest known jewellery.

Jewellery may be made from a wide range of materials, but gemstones, precious metals, beads and shells have been widely used. Depending on the culture and times jewellery may be appreciated as a status symbol, for its material properties, its patterns, or for meaningful symbols. Jewellery has been made to adorn nearly every body part, from hairpins to toe rings.
name: Jewellery

description:
This character wears bands and or straps.

Bands are long thin pieces of cloth or leather that can be wrapped around various parts of the body as accessories, to hold pants and skirts above ones waist or for other purposes such as medical use of bandages.
name: Bands

description:
This character wears straps.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Straps]strap[/url], sometimes also called strop, is an elongated flap or ribbon, usually of fabric or leather.

Thin straps are used as part of clothing or baggage, or bedding such as a sleeping bag. See for example spaghetti strap, shoulder strap. A strap differs from a belt mainly in that a strap is usually integral to the item of clothing; either can be used in combination with buckles.
name: Straps

description: This character has no scenes of sexual activity in any visual novel.
name: Not Sexually Involved

description:
This character wears clothing decorated with ribbons.

A ribbon or a thin band of flexible material, typically cloth but also plastic or sometimes metal, used primarily for binding and tying. In this case, a cloth or plastic ribbon is used as a clothing decoration or a fashion item.
name: Clothing with Ribbons

description: This character wears a real or fake flower as an accessory on his clothes.
name: Flower

description:
This character has some kind of symbol or picture in his/her eye(s).

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/50/79350.jpg]Example[/url].
name: Symbol

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Veil]veil[/url].

A veil is an article of clothing, worn almost exclusively by women, that is intended to cover some part of the head or face.

One view is that as a religious item, it is intended to show honor to an object or space. The actual sociocultural, psychological, and sociosexual functions of veils have not been studied extensively but most likely include the maintenance of social distance and the communication of social status and cultural identity. In Islamic society, various forms of the veil have been adopted from the Arab culture in which Islam arose.
name: Veil

description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saw]saw[/url].

A saw is a tool that uses a hard blade, wire, or chain with a toothed edge to cut through softer materials. A saw may be worked by hand, or powered by steam, water, electricity or other power. An abrasive saw uses a powered circular blade for cutting metal.
name: Saw

description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hand_saw]hand saw[/url].

Hand saws are used to cut pieces of wood into different shapes. This is usually done in order to join the pieces together and create a wooden object. They usually operate by having a series of sharp points of some substance that is harder than the wood being cut. The hand saw is a bit like a tenon saw, but with one flat, sharp edge.
name: Hand Saw

description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chainsaw]chainsaw[/url].

A chainsaw is a portable mechanical saw, powered by electricity, compressed air, hydraulic power, or most commonly a two-stroke engine. It is used in activities such as tree felling, limbing, bucking, pruning, by tree surgeons to fell trees and remove branches and foliage, to fell snags and assist in cutting firebreaks in wildland fire suppression, and to harvest firewood. Chainsaws with specially designed bar and chain combinations have been developed as tools for use in chainsaw art. Specialist chainsaws are used for cutting concrete.
name: Chainsaw

description:
This character is tiny compared to regular humans, small enough to fit into the hand of a regular human. This is an example though, actual size may vary.

While fairies are usually depicted at this size, the trait is not exclusive to them nor applies to them all. There may be many other fantastical explanations, like the potion Alice drank in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alice_in_Wonderland]Alice's Adventures in Wonderland[/url] that made her tiny enough to fit a very, very small door.
name: Tiny

description:
This character has claret hair.

Please see the [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/33/126533.jpg]VNDB Hair Color Chart[/url] for examples when in doubt.
name: Claret

description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wand]wand[/url].

A wand is a thin, straight, hand-held stick of wood, stone, ivory, or metal. Generally, in modern language, wands are ceremonial and/or have associations with magic but there have been other uses, all stemming from the original meaning as a synonym of rod and virge, both of which had a similar development. A stick giving length and leverage is perhaps the earliest and simplest of tools.
name: Wand

description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sceptre]sceptre[/url].

A sceptre is a symbolic ornamental rod or wand borne in the hand by a ruling monarch as an item of royal or imperial insignia. It is usually much longer than a wand.
name: Sceptre

description: This character has [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/37/79337.jpg]spiky bangs[/url].
name: Spiky Bangs

description:
This is the meta-tag to house all item traits that belong to the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blunt_instrument]blunt instruments[/url] family.

A blunt instrument is any solid object used as a weapon, which damages its target by applying direct mechanical force, and has no penetrating point or edge, or is wielded so that the point or edge is not the part of the weapon that inflicts the injury. Blunt instruments may be contrasted with edged weapons, which inflict injury by cutting or stabbing, or projectile weapons, where the projectiles, such as bullets or shot, are accelerated to a penetrating speed.

Blunt instruments typically inflict blunt force trauma, causing bruising, fractures and other internal bleeding. Depending on the parts of the body attacked, organs may be ruptured or otherwise damaged. Attacks with a blunt instrument may be fatal.
name: Blunt Instruments

description: This is the meta-tag to house all item traits that belong to the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bangs_%28hair%29]bangs[/url] family.
name: Bangs

description: This is the meta-tag to house all item traits that belong to the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eyebrows]eyebrows[/url] family.
name: Eyebrows

description:
This character has no eyebrows.

[url=http://s.vndb.org/ch/21/7321.jpg]Example[/url]
name: No Eyebrows

description:
This character has thick eyebrows.

Example: [url=https://vndb.org/c14849]Captain Doristram[/url]
name: Thick Eyebrows

description: This is the meta-tag to house all item traits that belong to the wooden swords family.
name: Practice Swords

description:
This is the meta-tag to house all item traits that belong to the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blade]bladed instruments[/url] family.

A blade is the flat part of a tool, weapon, or machine (such as a fan) that normally has a cutting edge and/or pointed end typically made of a flaking stone, such as flint, or metal, most recently steel. 

A blade is used to cut, stab, slash, chop, slice, thrust, position and/or place (an example of this is razor wire), or scrape (an example of this is an ink eraser).
name: Bladed Instrument

description:
This is the meta-tag to house all item traits that belong to the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Projectile_weapons#Miscellaneous]projectile weapons[/url] family.

A projectile is any object projected into space (empty or not) by the exertion of a force. Although any object in motion through space (for example a thrown baseball) may be referred to as a projectile, the term more commonly refers to a weapon.
name: Projectile Weapons

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tutor#Private_tutors]private tutor[/url].

A private tutor teaches a specific subject or skill to an individual student or small group of students. Such attention ideally allows the student to improve knowledge or skills more rapidly than in a classroom setting.
name: Tutor

description:
This character is a member of his/her school's discipline committee.

A discipline committee is a student organization present in many colleges, universities or high schools with the main purpose of enforcing school's rules among the students, such as curfew.
name: Discipline Committee Member

description:
This character is the leader of his/her school's discipline committee.

A discipline committee is a student organization present in many colleges, universities or high schools with the main purpose of enforcing school's rules among the students, such as curfew.
name: Discipline Committee Leader

description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Exorcist]exorcist[/url].

In some religions, an exorcist is a person who is believed to be able to cast out the devil or other demons. A priest, a nun, a monk, a healer, a shaman or other specially prepared or instructed person can be an exorcist. An exorcist is a person who performs the ridding of demons or other supernatural beings who are alleged to have possessed a person, or (sometimes) a building or even an object.
name: Exorcist

description:
This character is mysterious.

At the beginning of the game (and sometimes even until its end) the player and/or the cast know almost nothing about this character. 

Sometimes even this character's name is unknown, so he/she is called a "Mysterious woman/man" (and etc.) during the game.
name: Mysterious

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brooch]brooch[/url].

A brooch, also known in ancient times as a fibula, is a decorative jewelry item designed to be attached to garments, often to hold them closed. It is usually made of metal, often silver or gold but sometimes bronze or some other material. Brooches are frequently decorated with enamel or with gemstones and may be solely for ornament (as in the stomacher) or sometimes serve a practical function as a fastening, perhaps for a cloak.
name: Brooch

description:
This character was not born under normal circumstances, even in the fantasy setting it belongs to. It may have been made purposefully or may have come into being by an accident. The point is, it was made, not born.

Golems animated by magic, creatures made in labs, all of them fall under this category. Walking dead do not count.
name: Construct

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Singer]singer[/url].

A singer is a person who uses his or her voice to produce music. Singers are often accompanied by musicians and instruments, while other people sing for pleasure. Vocal skill is usually a combination of innate talent and professional training.

Use this trait ONLY for professional singers or students of a singing class. For other characters who do sing in games, like music club or band members in a regular school, use the [url=http://vndb.org/i346]singing[/url] trait.
name: Singer

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taiwanese_people]Taiwanese[/url].

Taiwanese people are individuals who either claim or are imputed cultural identity focused on Taiwan, or Taiwan Area which has been governed by the Republic of China (ROC) since 1945. 
At least three competing (occasionally overlapping) paradigms are used to identify someone as a Taiwanese person: a nationalist criteria, self-identification (including the concept of "New Taiwanese") criteria, and socio-cultural criteria.
name: Taiwanese

description: This is a meta-trait to gather music related traits under 'engages in' category.
name: Music

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canadian]Canadian[/url].

Canadians are the people who are identified with the country of Canada, residential, legal, historical, cultural or ethnic. For most Canadians, several (frequently all) of those types of connections exist and are the source(s) of them being considered Canadians.
name: Canadian

description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ex-girlfriend]ex-girlfriend[/url].

In social relationships, an ex (plural is exes) is someone with whom a person was once associated. As a prefix, ex- can refer to a variety of different relationships; for example, one might refer to a music group's ex-guitarist, or someone's ex-friend. When used alone, ex as a noun is assumed to refer to a former sexual or romantic partner, especially a former spouse. This often has a derogatory tinge, especially if it refers to unrequited feelings.
name: Ex-girlfriend

description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ex-girlfriend]ex-boyfriend[/url].

In social relationships, an ex (plural is exes) is someone with whom a person was once associated. As a prefix, ex- can refer to a variety of different relationships; for example, one might refer to a music group's ex-guitarist, or someone's ex-friend. When used alone, ex as a noun is assumed to refer to a former sexual or romantic partner, especially a former spouse. This often has a derogatory tinge, especially if it refers to unrequited feelings.
name: Ex-boyfriend

description:
This character is a [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mouse]mouse[/URL].

A mouse (plural: mice) is a small mammal belonging to the order of rodents, characteristically having a pointed snout, small rounded ears, and a long naked or almost hairless tail.
name: Mouse

description:
This character engages in inbreeding.

Inbreeding is when two people who are closely related by blood have a child.
name: Inbreeding

description: This character is a siscon- a person who is always passionate about their sister and would do anything for her. Can serve both as a comedic factor and/or romantic.
name: Sister Complex

description: This character is a brocon- a person who is always passionate about his/her brother and would do anything for him. Can serve both as a comedic factor and/or romantic.
name: Brother Complex

description: This is a meta-trait to house all traits about devices used in sex.
name: Sexual Devices

description:
A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hair_tie]hair tie[/URL] is a gadget used to fasten hair, particularly long hair, into a hairstyle (usually a ponytail). Hair ties are useful in securing one's hair back to keep it away from the face and to give some style to hair. [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Hair_ties.jpg]Typical hair ties[/URL] are round, elastic bands that are used in a very similar fashion as rubber bands. 

Not to be confused with [URL=http://vndb.org/i1061]ribbon hair tie[/URL], which is a ribbon (generally non-elastic) that is used like one would use a standard hair tie.

Also not to be confused with [URL=http://vndb.org/i661]hairpins[/URL] which are clips hat are used to keep hair in place.

[url=http://s.vndb.org/ch/23/123.jpg]Example[/url]
name: Hair Tie

description:
This character's hair is tied with a rubber band which has bead(s) on it as a decoration.

[url=http://s.vndb.org/ch/63/7963.jpg]Example[/url]
name: Rubber Band With Beads

description: In traditional Chinese dress, a changshan  is the male equivalent of the women's [url=/i453]cheongsam (qipao)[/url]. It is also known as a changpao or dagua.
name: Changshan

description:
This character has a sword with blades on each sides of its handle.

[url=http://fc00.deviantart.net/fs15/f/2007/012/d/8/Dual_Bladed_Mithrodin_by_SiberianRaccoon.jpg]example[/url]
name: Twin Blade Sword

description:
This person has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Halo_%28religious_iconography%29]halo[/url]. 

A halo is a ring of light that surrounds a person in art. They have been used in the iconography of many religions to indicate holy or sacred figures, and have at various periods also been used in images of rulers or heroes.

When perspective came to be considered essential, painters also changed the halo from an aura surrounding the head, always depicted as though seen full-on, to a flat golden disk or ring that appeared in perspective, floating above the heads of the saints, or vertically behind, sometimes transparent. This is the version often depicted in modern pop culture and art.
name: Halo

description:
This character is mischievous.

Mischievous characters like to cause trouble in a playful way. Their actions may or may not be an annoyance to people around them.
name: Mischievous

description:
This character has an appearance similar to the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ganguro]ganguro[/url] fashion.

Ganguro is an alternative fashion trend of blonde, pink or silver hair and tanned skin among young Japanese women that peaked in popularity around the year 2000. The Shibuya and Ikebukuro districts of Tokyo were the centers of ganguro fashion. In contradiction to the traditional Japanese concept of beauty by having pale skin, dark hair, and neutral makeup tones, rebellious youth tanned their skin, bleached their hair, and used colourful makeup. There is a connection to Japanese folklore of ghosts and demons, who are depicted with a similar appearance and often displayed in kabuki and noh costumes. This connection to folklore is further noted in the ganguro offshoot style called yamanba, named after a famous story about a mountain witch. The term ganguro is a portmanteau of the Japanese word gangan-kuro (ガンガン黒), meaning extremely dark, and guro (グロ), meaning grotesque, and the word ganguro can also be translated as "blackface".
name: Ganguro

description:
This character use "watakushi", one of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronouns[/url] for "I", to address themselves.

Watakushi is the most formal polite form of the Japanese pronouns for "I".
name: Watakushi

description: This character use "ware", one of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronouns[/url] for "I", to address themselves.
name: Ware

description:
This character uses "atashi", one of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronouns for "I"[/url], to address themselves.

The "atashi" pronoun is used mostly by females, rarely males (girlish), and is often considered cute. Rarely used in written language, but common in conversation, especially among younger women.
name: Atashi

description: The character is an antagonist for the main characters. Their intentions may be bad, good, or they may just be doing their job, but the important point is that they oppose the protagonists.
name: Antagonist

description:
This character uses "warawa", one of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronouns[/url] for "I", to address themselves.

Warawa is a female pronoun, with archaic connotations.
name: Warawa

description: This character uses a ribbon as a hair accessory. The ribbon isn't used to tie anything and is typically located above the bangs or on top of the head.
name: Ribbon Hair Accessory

description: This character uses a ribbon as a hair tie. It may be used to tie a ponytail, twintails, or other similar hairstyles.
name: Ribbon Hair Tie

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suit_(clothing)#Suit_etiquette_for_women]skirt suit[/url].

In clothing, a skirt suit is a set of garments made from the same cloth, consisting of at least a jacket and a skirt. 
A blouse, which can be white or colored, takes the place of a shirt. Women's skirt suits can also be worn with colored tops or t-shirts.
name: Skirt Suit

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Garter_(stockings)]garter[/url].

Garters are articles of clothing: narrow bands of fabric fastened about the leg, used to keep up stockings, and sometimes socks. Now obsolete due to garter belts and thigh-high stockings but still used, for tradition, during weddings.
name: Garter

description:
This character is seen [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Urination]peeing[/url] in a sex scene. Use [url=/i2227]Pissing on Others[/url] instead if they're peeing on another character.

Try not to confuse this with [url=/i1113]Female Ejaculation[/url]. Use the text to determine which trait applies.

Urination is the ejection of urine from the urinary bladder through the urethra to the outside of the body. In healthy humans the process of urination is under voluntary control. In infants, some elderly individuals, and those with neurological injury, urination may occur as an involuntary reflex.
name: Pissing

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tracksuit]tracksuit[/url].

A tracksuit is an article of clothing consisting of two parts: trousers and a jacket usually with front zipper. It was originally intended for use in sports, mainly as what athletes wore over competition clothing (such as running shirt and shorts or a swimsuit) and would take off before competition.
name: Tracksuit

description: This character engages in sexual acts in water. For example, in the sea, a pool, a bath, a river or a shower.
name: Sex in Water

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flip-flops]flip-flops[/url].

Flip-flops are a type of open-toed sandal typically worn in casual situations, such as outside or at the beach. They consist of a flat sole held loosely on the foot by a Y-shaped strap that passes between the first and second toes and around either side of the foot.
name: Flip-flops

description:
This character has sex in the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Woman_on_top#Reverse_cowgirl_position]reverse cowgirl[/url] position. Apply this trait to the penetrated partner and apply [url=/i1690]i1690[/url] to the penetrating partner.

Similarly to the [url=/i95]cowgirl[/url] position, the penetrating partner lies on their back, while the receiving partner straddles them with their torso mostly upright. Unlike the cowgirl position, the receiving partner faces away.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/35/84135.jpg]Example 1[/url]
name: Reverse Cowgirl

description: This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Plant]flower or plant[/url] of some sort or a personification/avatar of it.
name: Plant

description: This character wears tight form fitting shorts that cover most of the thigh they are often associated with cycling in the west and known as [[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cycling_shorts]Cycling or Bicycle Shorts[/url]] in English but are primarily known as 'Spats' in Japanese anime and games where they are often seen as common sports wear.
name: Spats

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Koreans]Korean[/url].

The Korean people are an ethnic group originating in the Korean peninsula.
name: Korean

description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gambling#Casino_games]gambling[/url].

Gambling is the wagering of money or something of material value (referred to as "the stakes") on an event with an uncertain outcome with the primary intent of winning additional money and/or material goods. Typically, the outcome of the wager is evident within a short period.
name: Gambling

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colombian_people]Colombian[/url].

Colombian people are from a multiethnic Spanish speaking nation in South America called Colombia. Colombians are predominantly Roman Catholic and are a mixture of Europeans, Africans, and Amerindians.
name: Colombian

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greeks]Greek[/url].

The Greeks, also known as the Hellenes, are an ethnic group native to Greece, Cyprus and other regions. They also form a significant diaspora, with Greek communities established around the world.
Greek colonies and communities have been historically established in most corners of the Mediterranean, but Greeks have always been centered around the Aegean Sea, where the Greek language has been spoken since antiquity. Until the early 20th century, Greeks were uniformly distributed between the Greek peninsula, the western coast of Asia Minor, Pontus, Egypt, Cyprus and Constantinople; many of these regions coincided to a large extent with the borders of the Byzantine Empire of the late 11th century and the Eastern Mediterranean areas of the ancient Greek colonization.
name: Greek

description:
The old vibrator/dildo trait has become a meta-trait vaginal/anal sexual toys. 

Note: Temporary trait but it will take time to sort it out to other traits entries.
name: Vaginal/Anal Sexual Toys

description:
This character is penetrated or teased with [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anal_beads]anal beads[/url].

Anal beads are a sex toy consisting of multiple spheres or balls attached together in series which are continuously inserted through the anus into the rectum and then removed with varying speeds depending on the effect desired (most typically at orgasm to enhance climax). Those who use anal beads enjoy the pleasurable feeling they receive as the ball passes through the narrow sphincter of the anus.
name: Anal Beads

description:
This character's boobs get pressed against a glass surface (usually a window or table) in a sex scene.

Only use this trait if the girl's boobs are exposed, or her clothing is transparent (possibly due to being wet).
name: Boobs on Glass

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gag_(BDSM)]gag[/url].

A gag is sometimes worn during some bondage and BDSM roleplays. Gags are usually associated with roleplays involving bondage, but that is not necessarily the case. The person who wears the gag is regarded as the submissive partner, while the one not wearing one is regarded as the dominant one.
name: Mouth Gag

description:
This character wears a [url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/65/160865.jpg]nose hook[/url].

They are usually used during a bondage scene.
name: Nose Hook

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latex_clothing]latex clothing[/url].

Latex rubber as a clothing material is common in fetish fashion and among BDSM practitioners, and is often seen worn at fetish clubs. Latex is sometimes also used by couturiers for its dramatic appearance. Worn on the body it tends to be skin-tight, producing a "second skin" effect. There are several magazines dedicated to the use and wearing of it. Less commonly, latex clothing can be loose-fitting.
name: Latex

description: This character has a sexual toy or an object (other than a body part) inserted into one of his orifices.
name: Object Insertion

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Babydoll]baby-doll[/url].

A babydoll is a short, sometimes sleeveless, loose fitting nightgown or negligee intended as nightwear for women. It sometimes has formed cups called a bralette for cleavage with an attached loose fitting skirt falling in length usually between the upper thigh and the belly button. The garment is often trimmed with lace, ruffles, appliques, marabou fur, bows and ribbons, optionally with spaghetti straps. Sometimes it is made of sheer or translucent fabric like nylon or chiffon or silk.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/10/98910.jpg]NSFW Comparison[/url] - Left: [url=/i2277]chemise[/url], center: [url=https://vndb.org/i2276]teddy[/url], right: baby-doll. Only the teddy wraps around the crotch, and the baby-doll is much looser around the hips than the chemise.
name: Baby-doll

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fishnet]fishnet stockings[/url].

In the field of textiles, fishnet is hosiery with an open, diamond shaped knit; it is most often used as a material for stockings, tights or bodystockings. Fishnet is available in a multitude of colors, although it is most often sported in traditional matte black.
name: Fishnet Stockings

description:
This character has a primarily [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dominant_(BDSM)]dominant[/url] role in the sex acts between them and another character.

While the term is prevalent in the BDSM community, where a dominant is the partner in a BDSM relationship or in a BDSM scene, who takes the active or controlling role over that of the submissive partner(s), it's not required for the character to belong to the BDSM community, or even to be interested in BDSM.

Don't use the trait, if the character only takes the dominant role for only a scene or two, and the other scenes are mostly vanilla.

Use the [url=/i3328]Switch[/url] trait instead, if a character takes both dominant and submissive roles during different sex scenes.
name: Sexual Dominant

description:
This character has a primarily [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bottom_(BDSM)]submissive[/url] role in the sex acts between them and another character.

While the term is prevalent in the BDSM community, where a submissive takes the passive, receiving, or obedient role in a BDSM relationship or in a BDSM scene, it's not required for the character to belong to the BDSM community, or even to be interested in BDSM.

Don't use the trait, if the character only takes the submissive role for only a scene or two, and the other scenes are mostly vanilla.

Use the [url=/i3328]Switch[/url] trait instead, if a character takes both dominant and submissive roles during different sex scenes.
name: Sexual Submissive

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pareo]pareo[/url].

The pāreu or pareo is the Cook Islands and Tahitian word for a wraparound skirt. Originally it was used only to refer to women's skirts, as men wore a loincloth, called a maro. Nowadays the term is applied to any piece of cloth worn wrapped around the body, worn by males or females.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/06/129606.jpg]Example[/url]
name: Pareo

description:
This character has their body written on in a sex scene.

Body writing is a form of sexual domination (part of BDSM), often associated with sexual humiliation or abuse.
name: Body Writing

description: This character has no bangs. They might be held back by a headband, or they might simply not be a part of the character's hairstyle.
name: No Bangs

description: This character has hair that is parted to the side. The hair is parted off center, creating bangs or a fringe that is uneven. Examples include Fate/Stay Night's [url=/c37]Ilya[/url] and Steins;Gate's [url=/c6496]Moeka[/url]. If the hair is parted on center, use the [url=/i1095]Parted in Middle[/url] trait.
name: Parted to Side

description: This character has short bangs. The bangs are located above the eyebrows and only a little lower than the hairline.
name: Short Bangs

description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Optimism]optimist[/url].

Optimism is a mental attitude or world view that interprets situations and events as being best (optimized), meaning that in some way for factors that may not be fully comprehended, the present moment is in an optimum state. The concept is typically extended to include the attitude of hope for future conditions unfolding as optimal as well.
name: Optimist

description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Archaeology]archeologist[/url].

An archeologist is someone dealing in the study of  archeology. 
Archeology is the study of human activity in the past, primarily through the recovery and analysis of the material culture and environmental data that they have left behind, which includes artifacts, architecture, biofacts and cultural landscapes.
name: Archeologist

description: This character has hair that is parted in the middle. The hair is parted on center, creating bangs or a fringe that is even on both sides. Examples include Da Capo's [url=/c4017]Miharu[/url] and Fate/Stay Night's [url=/c34]Rin[/url]. If the hair is parted off center, use the [url=/i1091]Parted to Side[/url] trait.
name: Parted in Middle

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leg_warmer]leg warmers[/url].

Leg warmers are coverings for the lower legs, similar to socks but thicker and generally footless. They were originally used as dancewear by ballet and other classic dancers in order to keep the leg muscles warm and to prevent cramping or other muscle injuries. No scientific data has been yet collected to substantiate the claim that leg warmers prevent injury.

Traditionally knitted from pure sheep wool, modern variants are more typically made of cotton, synthetic fibers, or both. Some are made of other materials, such as chenille.

Leg warmers can vary in length, and in width, due to the material's stretchiness. They are commonly worn between the ankle to just below the knee, though many dancers prefer it to extend to cover the lower parts of the thigh. 
Some leg warmers are particularly short and made of thinner material; these are also known as 'ankle warmers'.
name: Leg Warmers

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bodystocking]bodystocking[/url].

A bodystocking is a one-piece article of lingerie that covers the torso, and sometimes legs and arms of the wearer. It is similar to a leotard or a catsuit. The key difference is that it is usually made from partially transparent materials. Despite being quite erotic there are visual novels where heroines wear it as their main clothes.

[url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/22/3622.jpg]Example[/url]
name: Bodystocking

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Succubus]succubus[/url].

Succubus is a female demon or supernatural being, who takes the form of a human woman in order to seduce men, usually through sexual intercourse. In modern fictional representations, a succubus may or may not appear in dreams and is often depicted as a highly attractive seductress or enchantress.
name: Succubus

description:
This character wears a strapless swimsuit. 

A strapless swimsuit has no shoulders or shoulder straps. Note that a strapless swimsuit can be a one piece or a bikini.
name: Strapless Swimsuit

description:
This character wears a swimsuit with a turtleneck.

A polo neck, roll-neck(UK) or turtleneck (US) or skivvy (Australia) swimsuit is a garment with a close-fitting, round, and high collar that folds over and covers the neck. other than that, this is a regular swimsuit. Note that a turtleneck swimsuit can be a one piece or a bikini.
name: Turtleneck Swimsuit

description:
This character wears a strapless [url=/i666]leotard[/url].

A strapless leotard has no shoulder straps or sleeves.
name: Strapless Leotard

description:
This character wears a [url=/i666]leotard[/url] with a turtleneck.

A polo neck, roll-neck(UK) or turtleneck (US) or skivvy (Australia) leotard is a garment with a close-fitting, round, and high collar that folds over and covers the neck. Other than that, this is a regular leotard.
name: Turtleneck Leotard

description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bead]beads[/url] interwoven in his/her hair.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/43/79343.jpg]Example 1[/url], [url=http://s.vndb.org/ch/44/11144.jpg]Example 2[/url]
name: Hair Beads

description:
This character engages in sexual acts in an outdoor area. That is, any area not enclosed by walls, a roof and a floor.

Do not confuse this with the [url=/i879]Sex in Public[/url] trait. These traits often overlap, but they refer to different things.
name: Outdoor Sex

description: A superficial person is one who lacks substance, and tends to be materialistic. They judge others based on appearances, wealth, social standing or otherwise, purely surface values. In romantic situations, a superficial person (usually) only takes interest in those who are good-looking, rich and/or high in social value.
name: Superficial

description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reincarnation]Reincarnation[/url] is the religious or philosophical concept that the soul or spirit, after biological death, begins a new life in a new body that may be human, animal or spiritual depending on the moral quality of the previous life's actions.
name: Reincarnation

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wolf]wolf[/url] or has wolf-like physical features.

The gray/grey wolf is a species of canid native mostly found in the remote wilderness. They have sharp claws and long and bushy fur and tail.

Not to be confused with [url=http://vndb.org/i735]dogs[/url], as wolves are not domesticated and classed as different species.

Also not to be confused with [url=http://vndb.org/i706]werewolves[/url], as these characters are not humans that are affected by curses or moonlight.
name: Wolf

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tie_pin]tie pin[/url].

A tie pin is a neckwear-controlling device, typically worn to secure the folds of cravats or neckties, and/or simply as an ornamental fashion statement.
name: Tie Pin

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Terrorism]terrorist[/url].

Terrorism is the systematic use of terror, often violent, especially as a means of coercion.
name: Terrorist

description:
This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Broom]broom[/url].

A broom is a cleaning tool consisting of stiff fibers attached to, and roughly parallel to, a cylindrical handle, the broomstick. It is thus a variety of brush with a long handle. It is commonly used in combination with a dustpan.
name: Broom

description:
This character is an advisor of a student's club.

Club advisors play a vital role in ensuring that student involvement within the club is meaningful and productive. The most successful clubs are those in which the advisor takes an active interest in the group. The role of the advisor is to support and help guide the club, not to make decisions for the club. The club advisor serves a dual role in serving both the interests of the club and the school. It is essential that advisors are fully aware of their responsibilities.

The role of the advisor is to provide guidance and oversight of elections and by-laws. Although the advisor does not need to attend all club meetings and events, he or she must sanction all of the club’s activities. In addition, the advisor reserves rooms for club meetings and events and posts these onto the Student Events Calendar.
name: Student Club Advisor

description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Disappointment]Disappointment[/url] is the feeling of dissatisfaction that follows the failure of expectations or hopes to manifest. Similar to regret, it differs in that a person feeling regret focuses primarily on the personal choices that contributed to a poor outcome, while a person feeling disappointment focuses on the outcome itself.
name: Disappointment

description:
This character engages in the act of female ejaculation during the game.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Female_ejaculation]Female ejaculation[/url] refers to the expulsion of fluid by females from the paraurethral ducts through and around the urethra during or before an orgasm.
name: Female Ejaculation

description:
This character is a councillor of a local government.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Councillor]councillor[/url] (Cllr, Coun, Clr or Cr for short) is a member of a local government council, such as a city council.
Often in the United States, the title is councilman or councilwoman.
name: Councillor

description:
The character has sex with an exquisite, high-tech and/or magi-tech machine.

Do NOT use this trait for:
 - regular sexual devices
 - real life sex machines like sybians, [url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/74/159374.jpg]dildo thrusting machines[/url] or [url=/i2986]Drill Dildo[/url]
 - to describe sex with a [url=https://vndb.org/i458]Robot[/url], [url=https://vndb.org/i459]Cyborg[/url] or characters of similar nature
name: High-Tech Sex Engine

description:
This character is violent.

Violent characters prefer the usage physical force or power against others that can result in injuries, death, physiological scars or other forms of serious harm.
name: Violent

description:
The character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mass_murder]mass murder.[/url]

Mass murder is the act of murdering a large number of people (four or more), typically at the same time or over a relatively short period of time.
name: Mass Murder

description:
This character commits an act of betrayal.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Betrayal]Betrayal [/url] (or backstabbing) is the breaking or violation of a presumptive contract, trust, or confidence that produces moral and psychological conflict within a relationship amongst individuals, between organizations or between individuals and organizations. Often betrayal is the act of supporting a rival group, or it is a complete break from previously decided upon or presumed norms by one party from the others. Betrayal is also a commonly used literary element and is often associated with or used as a plot twist.

When a person betrays their country use the [url=/i691]treason[/url] trait.
name: Betrayal

description:
The character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Childbirth]childbirth[/url] during the story. Only use this if the act of childbirth actually happens in-game. If the character has a child after a time-skip, this tag does not apply.

Note that the VN doesn't have to feature the childbirth graphically. If, say, the protagonist stands outside the room the heroine is giving birth to their child in, it counts, as long as the process of birthing is featured in the novel and not skipped over.
name: Childbirth

description: This character wears transparent clothing.
name: Transparent

description:
This character is a subject of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coercion]coercion[/url].

Coercion is the practice of forcing another party to act in an involuntary manner (whether through action or inaction) by use of threats or intimidation or some other form of pressure or force.
name: Coercion

description:
During the story of the game this character is seen carrying [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tarot]tarot cards[/url].

The tarot is a pack of playing cards (most commonly numbering 78), used from the mid-15th century in various parts of Europe to play a group of card games such as Italian tarocchini and French tarot. From the late 18th century until the present time the tarot has also found use by mystics and occultists in efforts at divination or as a map of mental and spiritual pathways.
name: Tarot Cards

description:
This character engages in the sexual act of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tribadism]tribadism[/url] during the story.

Tribadism is a form of non-penetrative sex in which a woman rubs her vulva against her partner's body for sexual stimulation, especially for ample stimulation of the clitoris. This may involve female-to-female genital contact or a female rubbing her vulva against her partner's thigh, stomach, buttocks, arm, or other body part (excluding the mouth). A variety of sex positions are recorded, including the missionary position.

The term is usually used in the context of lesbian sex, and originally encompassed societal beliefs about women's capability of being penetrative sexual partners.
name: Tribadism

description:
This character gives birth, through a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Viviparity]viviparous[/url] birth, to any kind of non-human creatures or monsters during the course of the story. 
[b]In case of vaginal eggs laying just use [url=/i3967]Engages in > Vaginal Egg Laying[/url][/b].

Important note: Only use this trait if the birth of the baby monsters are part of the story. If it's just implied or covered by a time-jump and only the result (e.g. monsters are running rampart where there were none before) is shown, then do NOT use this trait!
name: Monster Birth

description:
This character wears hair ornaments that do not fit other hair ornament traits such as [url=https://vndb.org/i151]ribbons[/url], [url=https://vndb.org/i1103]beads[/url], [url=https://vndb.org/i726]flowers[/url], or [url=https://vndb.org/i152]bands[/url].

Instead they wear something unusual such as [url=https://s2.vndb.org/ch/85/21785.jpg]stars[/url], [url=https://s2.vndb.org/ch/13/38413.jpg]food[/url], [url=https://s2.vndb.org/ch/15/6515.jpg]wings[/url], or even [url=https://s2.vndb.org/ch/11/12011.jpg]ducks[/url].
name: Unusual Hair Ornaments

description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bondage_%28BDSM%29]bondage[/url]

Bondage is the tying, binding, or restraining of a person for the sexual, aesthetic, and/or psychological pleasure of the parties involved. Rope, cuffs, bondage tape, self-adhesive bandages, or other restraints may be used for this purpose.

Bondage may be used as an end into itself, as in the case of rope bondage and breast bondage

If the characters are using bondage only during sex please use the [url=http://vndb.org/i680]bondage sex[/url] trait.
name: Bondage

description:
This character has a regenerative hymen making it possible to lose virginity multiple times throughout a single story.
Hymen regeneration can be a natural or magical feature of the body of this character.

In case of characters undergoing hymen reconstruction just use: [url=/i3578]Hymen Reconstruction[/url].
name: Regenerative Hymen

description:
This character is a healer. The known types of healers are:

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Faith_healer]Faith Healers[/url]
Faith healing is healing through spiritual means. Believers assert that the healing of a person can be brought about by religious faith through prayer and/or rituals that, according to adherents, stimulate a divine presence and power toward correcting disease and disability. Belief in divine intervention in illness or healing is related to religious belief. In common usage, faith healing refers to notably overt and ritualistic practices of communal prayer and gestures (such as laying on of hands) that are claimed to solicit divine intervention in initiating spiritual and literal healing.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Traditional_healer]Traditional Healer[/url]
Traditional healing covers the health practices, approaches, knowledge and beliefs incorporating plant, animal and mineral-based medicines, spiritual therapies, manual techniques and exercises, applied singularly or in combination to treat, diagnose and prevent illnesses or maintain well-being. And should not be mixed with modern, government regulated, medicine and medical practices.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Healer_%28alternative_medicine%29]Alternative Medicine Healer[/url]
Alternative medicine is any practice that is put forward as having the healing effects of medicine, but is not based on evidence gathered with the scientific method. Often not part of conventional treatment, alternative medicine is usually based on tradition, belief in supernatural energies, pseudoscience, errors in reasoning, propaganda, or fraud. Alternative therapies lack scientific validation, and their effectiveness is either unproved or disproved. They have also been defined more broadly as the treatments that are not part of the conventional healthcare system.
name: Healer

description:
This character has sex in the [url=http://danbooru.donmai.us/wiki_pages/16203]reverse spitroast[/url] position. Apply this trait to the partner in the middle, and apply [url=/i1704]i1704[/url] to the partners on the "ends".

For this position, one partner (typically male) has sex with another partner (typically female) in the cowgirl position while performing oral sex on a third partner (typically female) who is sitting on their face. The two participants on top typically (but don't always) face each other.

Do not confuse this with the [url=/i1499]spitroast[/url] position. For the spitroast, the partner in the middle is penetrated, while for the reverse spitroast, the partner in the middle is penetrating one of the other partners.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/21/85321.jpg]Example[/url]
name: Reverse Spitroast

description:
This is a sexual act involving one man and two women. The women rub their vulvas together with the man's penis between them. The man may also take a more active role by thrusting his penis between their vulvas or by penetrating either of the women (or both of them alternately).

Apply this trait to the characters rubbing their vulvas on another character's penis. Apply [url=/i1705]i1705[/url] to the character having their penis rubbed.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/73/85273.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/99/70699.jpg]Example 2[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/74/85274.jpg]Example 3[/url] - Different position.
name: Tribadism on Penis

description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drawing]drawing[/url].

Drawing is a form of visual expression and is one of the major forms within the visual arts. There are several categories of drawing, including figure drawing, cartooning and doodling. There are also many drawing methods, such as line drawing, stippling, shading, the surrealist method of entopic graphomania, and tracing.
name: Drawing

description:
This character is a half-sister.

A half-sister is a female sibling who shares one biological parent with the other siblings.  Do not confuse with Step-sister.  Half-sisters share blood relations, while step-sisters do not.
name: Half-sister

description:
Another character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fisting]inserts their fist[/url] into this character's vagina in a sex scene. Apply [url=/i1653]Engages in (Sexual) > Fisting[/url] to the character inserting their fist.

Don't use this trait for cases where a character fists themselves. Use [url=/i3135]Engages in (Sexual) > Vaginal Masturbation[/url] instead.
name: Vaginal Fisting

description: This character uses (voluntarily or not) a vibrator in secret during everyday activities. For example, while at work, while at school, or while walking in public.
name: Hidden Vibrator

description:
This character is subject to erotic spanking. Apply [url=/i1688]i1688[/url] to the character spanking this character.

Erotic spanking is the act of spanking another person for the sexual arousal or gratification of either or both parties.
name: Erotic Spanking

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indian_people]Indian[/url] (from India).

Indian people or Indians are people who are citizens of India, which forms a major part of South Asia, containing 17.31% of the world's population. The Indian nationality is in essence made up of many distinct regional ethno-linguistic groups, reflecting the rich and complex history of India. India, in its current boundaries, was formed out of a number of predecessors.

Do not mix with Native Americans who are sometimes also referred as Indians.
name: Indian

description:
This character is considered [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beauty#Ugliness]ugly.[/url]

To be ugly is to be aesthetically unattractive, repulsive, or offensive. Like its opposite, beauty, ugliness involves a subjective judgment and is at least partly in the "eye of the beholder."
name: Ugly

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Happi]happi[/url].

Happi is a traditional Japanese straight-sleeved coat usually made of indigo or brown cotton and imprinted with a distinctive mon (crest). They are usually worn only to festivals. Originally, these represented the crest of a family, as happi were worn by house servants. Later, the coats commonly began to display the crests of shops and organisations. Firefighters in the past also used to wear happi; the symbol on their backs referred to the group with which they were associated. In English, "happi" is most often translated as "happi coat" or "happy coat".
name: Happi

description:
A character with this tag wears or has worn a [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prison_uniform]prison uniform[/URL].

A prison uniform is any uniform worn by individuals incarcerated in a prison, jail or similar facility of detention.
name: Prison Uniform

description:
This character has been seen with a [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cigarette]cigarette[/URL].

A cigarette is a small cylinder of finely cut tobacco leaves rolled in thin paper for smoking. The cigarette is ignited at one end and allowed to smoulder; its smoke is inhaled from the other end, which is held in or to the mouth and in some cases a cigarette holder may be used as well. Most modern manufactured cigarettes are filtered and include reconstituted tobacco and other additives.

A cigarette is distinguished from a [url=/i1145]cigar[/url] by its smaller size, use of processed leaf, and paper wrapping, which is normally white. Cigars are typically much larger than cigarettes, composed entirely of whole-leaf tobacco and not wrapped in paper.
name: Cigarette

description:
This character has been seen with a [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cigar]cigar[/URL].

A cigar is a tightly-rolled bundle of dried and fermented tobacco that is ignited so that its smoke may be drawn into the mouth.

A [url=/i1144]cigarette[/url] is distinguished from a cigar by its smaller size, use of processed leaf, and paper wrapping, which is normally white. Cigars are typically much larger than cigarettes, composed entirely of whole-leaf tobacco and not wrapped in paper.
name: Cigar

description: An emotional person is somebody that is easily affected by [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emotional]feelings[/URL]. Emotional people are prone to making decisions based on feelings and impulses rather than logic, pragmatism or reason.
name: Emotional

description: The character is a participant in [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Necrophilia]necrophilic[/URL] activities. A character with a sexual attraction to corpses (or the dead in general) is a necrophiliac.
name: Necrophilia

description:
This character wears clothing made partly or completely from [url=/http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fishnet]fishnet[/url] material.

In the field of textiles, fishnet is hosiery with an open, diamond shaped knit; it is most often used as a material for stockings, tights or bodystockings. Fishnet is available in a multitude of colors, although it is most often sported in traditional matte black.
name: Fishnet Clothing

description:
This is a meta trait to gather all [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Smoking]smoking[/url] related traits.

Smoking is a practice in which a substance, most commonly tobacco, is burned and the smoke is tasted or inhaled. This is primarily practised as a route of administration for recreational drug use, as combustion releases the active substances in drugs such as nicotine and makes them available for absorption through the lungs. It can also be done as a part of rituals, to induce trances and spiritual enlightenment.
name: Smokes

description:
This character is a half-brother.

A half-brother is a male sibling who shares one biological parent with the other siblings. Do not confuse with Step-brother. Half-brothers share blood relations, while step-brothers do not.
name: Half-brother

description:
In common usage, [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Theft]theft[/URL] is the taking of another person's property without that person's permission or consent with the intent to deprive the rightful owner of it. 

The word is also used as an informal shorthand term for some crimes against property, such as burglary, embezzlement, larceny, looting, robbery, shoplifting and fraud.
name: Theft

description: [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paranoia]Paranoia[/URL] is a thought process believed to be heavily influenced by anxiety or fear, often to the point of irrationality and delusion. Paranoid thinking typically includes persecutory beliefs, or beliefs of conspiracy concerning a perceived threat towards oneself. Making false accusations and the general distrust of others also frequently accompany paranoia. For example, an incident most people would view as an accident or coincidence, a paranoid person might believe was intentional.
name: Paranoia

aliases: Round Drawn Japanese Heian Period Eyebrows
description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hikimayu]Hikimayu[/url]-styled eyebrows, or drawn round eyebrows on the forehead.

In pre-modern Japan, hikimayu was the practice of removing the natural eyebrows and painting smudge-like eyebrows on the forehead.

Aristocratic women used to pluck or shave their eyebrows and paint new ones using a powdered ink called haizumi, which was made of soot from sesame or rape-seed oils.
name: Hikimayu

description:
This character suffers from [url=http://en.dic.pixiv.net/a/Chuunibyou]Chuunibyou[/url].

Chuunibyou or "Middle-school 2nd Year Syndrome", is a colloquial and rather derisive term in Japan which describes a person at the age of fourteen would either act like a know-it-all adult, or thinks they have special powers no one else has. Some would even go as far as being obnoxious, arrogant, and often look down on adults or older people. This way of thinking or acting is mostly seen in teenagers during adolescence, however there are people who still act like this even after reaching adulthood.

Do not use this tag for cases where this way of thinking or acting is natural for the setting (e.g. for a mahou shoujo heroine in a fantasy world with actual magic powers) or when the character REALLY wields supernatural powers. Only use it where this behaviour is out of place.
name: Chuunibyou

description:
A cowardly character is someone who is lacking in courage in battles or fights.

This character will runaway most of the time without thinking much about it. Popular examples would be Matou Shinji and Zenitsu from Kimetsu no Yaiba.

Do not confuse this trait with [url=/i216]Hetare[/url]. Hetare is associated with an inability in making decision, while Coward is associated in facing danger and challange.
name: Coward

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Curiosity]curious[/url] (as in eager to learn something).

A curious person often wants to know more just about anything that (s)he encounters. A curious person is willing to learn new things, and likes to question the people around them.
name: Curious

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Misogyny]misogynist[/url], a person who hates, dislikes, mistrusts, or mistreats women.

Misogyny is the hatred or dislike of women or girls. Misogyny can be manifested in numerous ways, including sexual discrimination, denigration of women, violence against women, and sexual objectification of women. Misogyny has been characterised as a prominent feature of the mythologies of the ancient world as well as various religions. In addition, many influential Western philosophers have been described as misogynistic. The male counterpart of misogyny is misandry, the hatred or dislike of men; the antonym of misogyny is philogyny, the love or fondness of women.
name: Misogynist

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gynophobia]gynophobic[/url] (afraid of women).

Gynophobia is an abnormal fear of women. In the past, the Latin term was used, horror feminae, meaning "fear of women". In many cases, it may also be rooted in social phobia or social anxiety disorder.
name: Gynophobia

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Misandry]misandrist[/url] (one who hates men).

Misandry is the hatred or dislike of men or boys. Misandry is the antonym of philandry, the fondness, love, or admiration of men. Misandry is a back-formation from misogyny, the hatred or dislike of women.
name: Misandrist

description:
This character is [url=http://www.fearof.net/fear-of-men-phobia-androphobia/]androphobic[/url].

Androphobia is an abnormal and irrational fear of men. Androphobia may be related to traumatic events in the sufferer's past (for example rape/sexual assault, witnessing physical and verbal abuse). It may also be due to social phobia or social anxiety disorder.
name: Androphobia

description: This is the meta-trait to group relationship traits about sisters.
name: Sister

description: This is the meta-trait to group relationship traits about brothers.
name: Brother

description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pickaxe]pickaxe[/url].

A pickaxe or pick is a hand tool with a hard head attached perpendicular to the handle.
name: Pickaxe

description:
This character has a generally [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Weakness]weak body[/url]. This character may be also sickly. (optional)

Weakness is a symptom represented, medically, by a number of different conditions, including: lack of muscle strength, malaise, dizziness, or fatigue. The causes are many and can be divided into conditions that have true or perceived muscle weakness. True muscle weakness is a primary symptom of a variety of skeletal muscle diseases, including muscular dystrophy and inflammatory myopathy. It occurs in neuromuscular junction disorders, such as myasthenia gravis.
name: Weakness

description:
This character receives an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Enema]enema[/url].

An enema is the procedure of introducing liquids into the rectum and colon via the anus.
name: Enema

description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coprophilia]Scat[/url] is a fetish involving the act of defecation or the feces itself in a sexual context.

Use the trait on the character involved in the act of defecation.
name: Scat

description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wooden_horse_%28device%29]wooden horse[/url] is used on this character.

These devices can be used either for torturing a victim or as part of a BDSM scene.
name: Wooden Horse

description:
This character has round, cartoonish eyes. They may or may not have irises. Do not mix this trait with [url=/i917]Tareme[/url], chibi eyes or any other common anime eyes.

[url=http://s.vndb.org/ch/81/12781.jpg]Example 1[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/46/79346.jpg]Example 2[/url]
name: Round

description: This character gets her breast size increased in a very short period of time. This can be the result of a realistic medical procedure like breast implants, or of fantasy origin like some super drugs or magic.
name: Breast Expansion

description:
Hot wax is dripped onto this character in a sex scene. Apply [url=/i1892]Engages in (Sexual) >> Wax Play[/url] to the character(s) dripping the wax.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wax_play]Wax play[/url] is a form of sensual play involving warm or hot wax usually dripped from candles or ladled onto a person's naked skin.
name: Wax Play

description:
This character has something inserted into their nipples in a sex scene, it could be a penis, an object or a tentacle.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/28/158028.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Nipple Insertion

description:
This character is seen wearing a bunny costume/dress.

The two essential part of the dress are the bunny ears (usually in the form of a headband) and the bunny tail tailored to the lower back of the dress.

The form of the costume itself can vary, depending on its nature. In case of a sexy dress, it can be a leotard, or just underwear. In case a dress aimed for children (like for a masquerade) can be pyjama-like in design, covering the entire body.
name: Bunny Dress

description:
A disc jockey, also known as [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DJ]DJ[/url], is a person who plays recorded music for an audience.

There are several types of disc jockeys. Radio DJs or radio personalities introduce and play music that is broadcast on AM, FM, shortwave, digital, or internet radio stations. Club DJs select and play music in bars, nightclubs, or discothèques, or at parties or raves, or even in stadiums. Hip hop DJs select and play music using multiple turntables to back up one or more MCs/rappers, perform turntable scratching to create percussive sounds, and are also often music producers who use turntablism and sampling to create backing instrumentals for new tracks. In reggae, the DJ is a vocalist who raps, "toasts", or chats over pre-recorded rhythm tracks while the individual choosing and playing them is referred to as a selector. Mobile DJs travel with portable sound systems and play recorded music at a variety of events.
name: DJ

description:
This character competes in or engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Surfing]Surfing[/url]

Surfing is a surface water sport in which the wave rider, referred to as a "surfer," rides on the forward face of a wave, which is most often carrying the surfer towards shore. Waves suitable for surfing are found primarily in the ocean, but can be found in some lakes, in rivers in the form of a standing wave or tidal bore. Surfing can also be done in manmade sources such as wave pools and boat wakes. The term "surfing" refers to the act of riding a wave and not the form (with or without a board) in which the wave is ridden. For instance, the native peoples of the Pacific surfed waves on alaia, paipo, and other such crafts on their belly, knees, and feet. Not to mention, Bodysurfing, the act of surfing a wave without a board, is considered by some to be the purest form of surfing. That much said, the more modern day definition of surfing tends to refer to when a surfer rides a wave standing up on a surfboard, which is referred to as stand-up surfing or paddleboarding. Although, another prominent form of surfing in the ocean today includes bodyboarding, which refers to when a surfer rides a wave either on the belly, dropknee, or stand-up on a bodyboard. Not to mention, knee boarding, surfmatting (riding inflatable mats), foils, bodysurfing, and so forth.
name: Surfing

description:
This character is one of the performers of a triple blowjob. Apply [url=/i1639]i1639[/url] to the receiving character.

A triple blowjob is a blowjob performed by three people at the same time on a single person.
name: Triple Blowjob

description:
This character is seen wearing a wedding ring.
