A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wedding_ring]wedding ring[/url] or wedding band is a metal ring indicating the wearer is married. Depending on the local culture, it is worn on the base of the right or the left ring finger.
name: Wedding Ring

description:
This character is seen wearing an engagement ring.

An [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engagement_ring]engagement ring[/url] is a ring indicating that the person wearing it is engaged to be married, especially in Western cultures. Engagement rings are traditionally worn only by women, and rings can feature diamonds or other gemstones. In some cultures, engagement rings are also used as [url=http://vndb.org/i1186]wedding rings[/url].
name: Engagement Ring

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fisherman]fisherman[/url].

A fisherman or fisher is someone who captures fish and other animals from a body of water, or gathers shellfish.
name: Fisherman

description:
This character uses "washi", one of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronouns[/url] for "I", to address themselves.

Colloquial. Mainly used by males. Often used in western dialects and fictional settings to stereotypically represent old characters.
name: Washi

description: This character performs a sexual act on a sleeping character, waking them up in the middle of doing so, either intentionally or not. Apply [url=/i1651]i1651[/url] to the character who was asleep.
name: Wake-up Sex

description: This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Assertiveness]assertive[/url] and takes the initiative in romantic and/or sexual pursuits.
name: Assertive

description:
This character engages in a sexual act whilst somebody else is watching them. The sexual act is not hidden from the onlooker(s), they are aware of it.

Note 1: This trait differs from [url=https://vndb.org/i879]Sex in Public Places[/url] in that the place can be private or public, only the presence of an audience counts.

Note 2: See [url=https://vndb.org/i1827]Discreet Sex[/url] for when the audience is not aware of the act (or at least not shown to be).
name: Sex in Front of an Audience

description: This character is involved in sexual activities while they are handcuffed, willingly or unwillingly.
name: Handcuffed Sex

description:
This character participates in sexual acts where food or drinks play a significant role.

Possible examples include a masturbation scene using a cucumber, or a person putting food on themselves and having their partner eat or lick it off them.
name: Food Play

description:
This person is the head (or leader) of some [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sect]sect[/url].

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sect]sect[/url] is a subgroup of a religious, political or philosophical belief system, usually an offshoot of a larger religious group. Although in past it was mostly used to refer to religious groups, it has since expanded and in modern culture can refer to any organization that breaks away from a larger one to follow a different set of rules and principles.
name: Head of a Sect

description: This character wears a [url=http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/SchoolSwimsuit]school swimsuit[/url].
name: School Swimsuit

description: This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Long_hair#Hair_lengths]hair length[/url] which is ankle length or longer.
name: Ankle Length

description: A skeleton is a type of physically manifested undead often found in fantasy, and horror fiction, and mythical art. Most are human skeletons, but they can also be from any creature or race found on Earth or in the fantasy world.
name: Skeleton

description: This character is one of the performers of a group blowjob (by at least 4 characters). Apply [url=/i1640]i1640[/url] to the receiving character.
name: Group (4+) Blowjob

description: This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Santa_suit]Santa suit[/url], usually consisting of red jacket with white fur trim, stocking cap, a wide buckled belt, and black boots. A women's costume may differ slightly.
name: Santa Suit

description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rocket_launcher]rocket launcher[/url] is any device that launches a rocket-propelled projectile, although the term is often used in reference to mechanisms that are portable and capable of being operated by an individual.

The rocket launchers category includes shoulder-fired missile weapons, any weapon that fires a rocket-propelled projectile at a target yet is small enough to be carried by a single person and fired while held on one's shoulder.
name: Rocket Launcher

description: This character has an irrational fear of dead things or things associated with death.
name: Necrophobia

description:
This character is one of identical twins, that in the course of the story pretends to be other twin.

Add for both, if exchange is on both sides.
name: Twin Switch

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pony]pony[/url].

A pony is a small horse. Depending on context, a pony may be a horse that is under an approximate or exact height at the withers, or a small horse with a specific conformation and temperament.
name: Pony

description:
This character is seen carrying a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tant%C5%8D]tantou[/url].

The tantou is commonly referred to as a knife or dagger. The blade is single or double edged with a length between 15 and 30 cm. It is shorter than it's successor - wakizashi, it's sides also generally have no ridge line and are nearly flat.
name: Tantou

description: This character frequently puffs out their cheeks like a child when they feel insulted or upset. It may look funny and cute.
name: Puffy

description:
[URL=https://en.oxforddictionaries.com/definition/effeminate]Effeminate characters are lacking in "manliness"[/URL]. He is unsure of himself and may act girlish. Not being able to fight back, he may become the subject of bullying by classmates. He blushes and loses the power of speech in the girl's company.

Also refers to male characters [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sissy#Pejorative_sense]who engage in activities[/URL] considered typical of the gender role of a girl- e.g. wearing feminine clothing or makeup.

Only use this for characters who are (or seem to be) male.
name: Effeminate

description: Devices are attached to this character's nipples which use vibration, electrical current, vacuum or other methods to stimulate this erogenous zone.
name: Nipple Teasers

description:
This character refers to themself by their own name. In other words, this character refers to themself in the third person. This is also called "[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Illeism]Illeism[/url]".

This talking pattern may be used by small children and young women, and is considered to be cute and childish.
name: Third Person

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kimono#Mofuku]Mofuku[/url]. 

Mofuku is formal mourning dress for men or women. Both men and women wear kimono of plain black silk with five kamon over white undergarments and white tabi. For women, the obi and all accessories are also black. Men wear a subdued obi and black and white or black and gray striped hakama with black or white zori. The completely black mourning ensemble is usually reserved for family and others who are close to the deceased.
name: Mofuku

description: This character is seen with or using a weaponised [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drill]drill[/url].
name: Drill [Weapon]

description:
This character is see in or described as being part of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gyaru]Gyaru[/url] fashion.

Gyaru fashion is a type of Japanese street fashion that originated in the 1970s. In English speaking countries Gyaru is commonly mistaken for ganguro, but that is actually a subculture of gyaru. Gyaru is a girly-glam style, breaking away from traditional standards of beauty by dwelling on the man-made (wigs, fake eyelashes, fake nails, etc).

Gyaru fashion is typically characterized by having heavily bleached or dyed hair (mostly shades from dark brown to blonde), excessively decorated nails, and dramatic makeup.

The makeup typically consists of dark eyeliner and fake eyelashes used in ways intended to make the eyes appear larger. Clothing pieces for gyaru fashion differ depending on which gyaru style the individual chooses.
name: Gyaru

description:
This character uses [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tonfa]Tonfas[/url].

The tonfa, also known as tong fa or tuifa, is an Okinawan weapon. It is a stick with a handle, and is about 15-20 inches long. It was traditionally made from red oak and wielded in pairs.
name: Tonfa

description: This character is a teacher in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kindergarten]kindergarten[/url] or in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nursery_school]nursery school[/url].
name: Kindergarten Teacher

description: The character wears striped panties.
name: Shimapan

description: This character is seen carrying a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Notebook]notebook[/url]
name: Notebook

description: This person exchanges their mind or soul with that of another's either through supernatural or technological means and they end up in each other's bodies. Alternatively, their minds may stay where they are as their bodies adjust.
name: Body Swap

description: This character is a fan of discipline. They frequently lecture those who behave inappropriately. In the school such a person can easily become the class president or even the student council president.
name: Disciplinarian

description:
This character, while playing with another character's penis, calls particular attention to the foreskin. Apply [url=/i1654]i1654[/url] to the character having their foreskin played with.

During the act of foreskin play they may mention the presence or possibility of phimosis (where the foreskin cannot be readily retracted from the glans of the penis). Typically, special focus is given to fully retracting said foreskin prior to or during fellatio, thus enhancing sexual pleasure of the male partner.
name: Foreskin Play

description: This character has only one eye. This may be due to the physiological features (he has one eye because of mutations or due to non-human nature of himself) or wounds received in a fight or accident.
name: One-eyed

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Headband]headband[/url] or hairpin with [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Horn_%28anatomy%29]horns[/url] attached to it. He or she may wear it as an accessory in order to dress or look like a demon or a cow, for example.

This trait is different from Body > [url=https://vndb.org/i828]Horns[/url] by being a piece of clothing, instead of a part of a body.
And it is different from [url=https://vndb.org/i17]Odango[/url] by not being made of hair.
name: Horns

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gloves]fingerless gloves[/url].

A glove is a garment covering the whole hand. Gloves have separate sheaths or openings for each finger and the thumb; if there is an opening but no covering sheath for each finger they are called "fingerless gloves".
name: Fingerless Gloves

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gloves#Mittens]Mittens[/url]. 

Mittens are gloves which cover the entire hand or fist but do not have separate finger openings or sheaths. Mittens are warmer than gloves made of the same material because fingers maintain their warmth better when they are in contact with each other. Reduced surface area reduces heat loss.
name: Mittens

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Capri_pants]Capri pants[/url].

Capri pants are mid-calf pants worn in warm weather. Variants end below the knee and calf. Though widely popular with women they are also worn by men in many countries, especially in Europe, Latin America and Asia.
name: Capri Pants

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pantalettes]Pantalettes[/url].

Pantalettes are undergarments covering the legs worn by women, girls, and very young boys (before they were breeched) in the early- to mid-19th century.

Pantalettes originated in France in the early 19th century, and quickly spread to Britain and America. Pantalettes were a form of leggings or long drawers. They could be one-piece or two separate garments, one for each leg, attached at the waist with buttons or laces. The crotch was left open for hygiene reasons. They were most often of white linen fabric and could be decorated with tucks, lace, cutwork or broderie anglaise.
name: Pantalettes

description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leggings]Leggings[/url] are a type of skin-tight clothing covering the legs, which can be worn by both men and women. Modern leggings are typically made from a blend of lycra (aka spandex), nylon, cotton, or polyester blend, but they can also be made from wool, silk and other materials. Leggings are sometimes worn fully exposed, and are more traditionally worn partially covered by a garment such as a skirt, a large t-shirt or shorts, or fully covered by an outer garment, such as a full length skirt.

Leggings are typically ankle-length, and some are stirrupped or encase the feet. Some are shorter. Leggings are worn to keep a person's legs warm, as protection from chafing during an activity such as exercise or as a decorative or fashion garment. Leggings are worn by both men and women during exercise but usually only by women at other times. In contemporary usage, leggings refers to tight, form-fitting trousers that extend from the waist to the ankles.
name: Leggings

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sokutai]sokutai[/url].

The sokutai (束帯) is complex attire only worn by courtiers, aristocrats and the emperor at the court in Japan. Part of a sokutai are the shaku (笏), a flat ritual baton or sceptre, and a hat called kanmuri (冠) .

No longer in normal use, the sokutai is however still worn by imperial court members and government officials (including the Prime Minister) on rare occasions such as weddings and enthronement ceremonies.
name: Sokutai

description:
A furisode (振袖, lit. swinging sleeves) is a style of kimono distinguishable by its long sleeves, which range in length from 85 centimeters for a kofurisode (小振袖) to 114 centimeters for an ōfurisode (大振袖).

Furisode are the most formal style of kimono worn by unmarried women in Japan. The furisode is made of very fine, brightly colored silk, and is commonly rented or bought by parents for their daughters to wear when celebrating Coming of Age Day the year they turn 20. By wearing a furisode, a young woman signifies that she is both single and a legal adult, and thus available for marriage. In this sense, a furisode might be likened to the formal gowns worn by debutantes in the West.

The furisode is generally worn for formal social functions such as the tea ceremony or wedding ceremonies of relatives. Since furisodes can be quite expensive, many women rent them as needed rather than purchasing them.
name: Furisode

description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kimono#Tomesode]Tomesode[/url] (留袖) is a type of kimono. It is an expensive formal dress worn by married women.
Originally, there was a custom that the long sleeves of the furisode were shortened after marriage, thereby creating a tomesode. This was because the long swinging sleeves would be impractical when the married woman worked in the kitchen. 

The tomesode distinguishes itself from other kimono by only having patterns under the waistline. It has five or sometimes three family crests, or kamon, which indicates the formality of the kimono.

Kuro-tomesode (black tomesode) are often worn for wedding ceremonies by married female relatives of the bride or groom. The eri, obijime and obiage are always white, and the obi matches the colourful pattern of the kimono to signify a happy occasion. It is believed that the black colour is to match the clean white colour of the bride, as this kimono is rarely used at other occasions than weddings of near family members (sisters or daughters). A friend of the bride or groom would not wear kurotomesode, but homongi or iro-tomesode.
name: Tomesode

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyclops]cyclops[/url], i.e. has only one eye in the middle of his face or forehead.

This trait doesn't refer to those who lost an eye in any existing way. For those who weren't born/created with only one eye socket, please use i1229.
name: Cyclops

description:
This character uses a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monomolecular_wire]monomolecular wire[/url].

Monomolecular wire is a fictional wire, often used as a weapon, consisting of single strand of strongly-bonded molecules, like carbon nanotubes. It has applications in cutting objects and severing adjacent molecules. A similar or identical concept may be called a microfilament wire or, as a weapon, a microfilament whip.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/31/79431.jpg]Example image[/url]

Monomolecular wires are seen in the Star Wars Expanded Universe, Cyber City Oedo 808, Hyperion Cantos, Robert J. Sawyer's Illegal Alien, the manga Battle Angel Alita, Naruto, Hellsing, My-Hime, Simon R. Green's Deathstalker series, as well as the roleplaying games Shadowrun, and Cyberpunk 2020.
name: Wire Weapon

description:
This character is seen wearing a type of bridal gauntlet. A bridal gauntlet or wedding gauntlet is a type of fingerless glove that covers part of the hand and includes a ring around the middle finger not necessarily worn by brides.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/18/79418.jpg]Example[/url].
name: Bridal Gauntlet

description:
This character use "waga", one of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronouns[/url] for "I", to address themselves.

Waga is a very formal pronoun, it means "my" or "our". Used in speeches and formalities; 我が社 waga-sha (our company) or 我が国 waga-kuni (our country).
name: Waga

description: This character has a magical, holy or cursed mark somewhere on their body. It may share a mystic power or a curse with the owner, or may be used in some kind of ritual.
name: Magic Tattoo

description:
This character becomes a target of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flirting]flirting[/url].

Flirting is a playful, romantic or sexual overture by one person to another subtly indicating an interest in a deeper relationship with the other person, and can involve verbal communication as well as body language. Body language can include flicking the hair, eye contact, brief touching, open stances, proximity etc. Verbal communication of interest can include the vocal tone, such as pace, volume, intonation. Challenges (teasing, questions, qualifying, feigned disinterest) serve to increase tension, test intention and congruity.

Almost every VN has some romance and relationships, but rarely they do have actual flirting. Use this trait sparingly for only the ones that actually do.
name: Flirting

description: This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Microphone]microphone[/url]. This can be either a microphone held in their hand or one tied to their ear.
name: Microphone

description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soul_patch]soul patch[/url].

A soul patch is a small patch of facial hair just below the lower lip and above the chin.
name: Soul Patch

description:
This character tries to put a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Curse]curse[/url] on someone, using his religious, magical or any other mystical powers.

Not to be mixed with the speech pattern of using vulgar language.
name: Cursing

description: A maid's headdress is a type of frilly hairband usually found in maid cosplay or as part of a standard [url=http://vndb.org/i433]maid's dress[/url].
name: Maid's Headdress

description: This character loves to talk. However, the topic he started is not always meaningful, which often annoys his companions, especially when they want to enjoy the silence.
name: Talkative

aliases: Sex in Front of a Mirror
Sex in Front of a Reflective Surface
description:
This character engages in sexual activities in front of a mirror, or any other reflective surface.

This trait should be used when there is a significant focus on the reflections of the character(s) involved. Do not use this trait if the reflection is just coincidentally present.
name: Mirror Sex

description:
A character with this tag has a haraguro personality.

A haraguro character is one who has an outward appearance of being amicable, friendly, innocent, kind and/or refreshing, but uses any combination of the aforementioned traits to hide their real cruel, cunning, evil, manipulative, mean and/or sadistic side. 

Despite the negative connotation, not all haraguro are villainous or are sociopaths. Their motives vary very widely depending upon the character her/himself and the "seriousness" of the story. 

The term comes from the Japanese word, "Haraguroi (腹黒い)", which means "black-hearted; mean; scheming".
name: Haraguro

description: This character is not afraid to face the danger head-on. They're always ready to defend their country or close people, and fulfill their duty, even if it means death.
name: Brave

description:
This character is attempting to perform a [url=https://vndb.org/i495]Boobjob[/url], but their breasts are too small to do it properly. Apply [url=/i1628]i1628[/url] to the receiving character.

Naizuri literally means "rubbing against nothing".

Note: It's possible that the character realises the futility of their attempt and and helps our with their hands for example by rubbing the penis between their chest and the palms of their hands. The trait still applies in such cases.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/93/119093.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/94/119094.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]
name: Naizuri

description:
This person engages in sexual intercourse with themselves either through time travel, alternate dimensions, or the use of high technology or magic.

Do not confuse this trait with [url=http://vndb.org/i592]masturbation[/url] where a person can stimulate their own genitals without the use of a partner.
name: Selfcest

description:
This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hair_coloring]dyes his/her hair[/url].

Hair coloring is the practice of changing the color of hair. Hair dyeing, which is an ancient art, involves treatment of the hair with various chemical compounds.

Note: Please do not use this trait just because the character has an unnatural hair color. Purple, blue, pink, green and other colors that are impossible without hair coloring in the real world, are used abundantly in visual novels. Thus only use this tag, if the VN explicitly states that this character colors his/her hair.
name: Dyed

description:
This character is often [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barefoot]barefoot[/url]; doesn't wear any shoes.

Barefoot is the state of not wearing any footwear. 

Note: Do not use this trait if the character is barefoot just in the sex scenes, or once or twice takes off his/her shoes in the novel.
name: Barefoot

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adhesive_bandage]band-aid[/url].

Band-aid is a small dressing used for injuries not serious enough to require a full-size bandage.

It also can be used as an accessory in order to look sloppy, tough or dangerous.

Note: Only used this tag if the character actually has a band-aid on for a length of time or shown wearing it.
For example, do NOT use this tag, if a character accidentally cuts his/her finger, puts a band-aid on the wound and then the visual novel immediately cuts to the next scene, never mentioning or showing the band-aid again.
name: Band-aid

description:
This character wears or uses [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cosmetics]makeup[/url].

Cosmetics (colloquially known as makeup or make-up) are care substances used to enhance the appearance or odor of the human body. They are generally mixtures of chemical compounds, some being derived from natural sources, many being synthetic.
name: Makeup

description: This character wears torn or damaged clothing.
name: Torn Clothing

description:
A Lolita Hairband is a type of frilly wide headband similar to but much smaller than a [url=http://vndb.org/i992]bonnet[/url] that is sometimes covered in ribbons and bows.

Originally seen in Victorian fashion they have returned as a type of headwear for many types of [url=http://vndb.org/i820]lolita[/url] fashion.
name: Lolita Hairband

description:
This character wears old-style [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bloomers_(clothing)]bloomers[/url].

Please do NOT use this trait for typical Japanese girl's  gym shorts. Use the [url=http://vndb.org/i178]Sport Bloomers[/url] trait instead.
name: Traditional Bloomers

description:
This character is subject of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Infidelity]infidelity[/url]. In other words, their significant other has sexual contact with someone other, without their knowledge or permission.

Infidelity is a violation of a couple's assumed or stated contract regarding emotional and/or sexual exclusivity. This violation results in feelings of anger, jealousy, sexual jealousy, and rivalry. What constitutes an act of infidelity depends upon the exclusivity expectations within the relationship.
name: Infidelity

description:
This character is one of the performers of a twin boobjob. Apply [url=/i1629]i1629[/url] to the receiving character.

This is a sexual act in which two women rub their breasts against each other with a man's penis between them.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/96/119096.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Twin Boobjob

description:
This character confessed their feelings to beloved person, but was rejected, with all the psychological and other consequences.

Note: Please ONLY use this trait when there is a clear confession of love and a clear rejection follows it up.
name: Turndown

description:
This character is often forgets to do something or cannot remember what people had told him. This can be caused by several health problems, magic or anything else.

Note: If it's a one-time only loss of memory, use [url=http://vndb.org/i91]Amnesia[/url] instead. If the character is a careless scatterbrain, who generally doesn't pay attention to things, and not an actual health problem, then use [url=http://vndb.org/i929]Absentminded[/url] trait instead.
name: Weak Memory

description:
This person (or persons, rather) consists of multiple entities residing within the same vessel.

Note: Do not confuse this with the [url=http://vndb.org/i275]Split Personality[/url], which is exclusively a mental issue.
name: Shared Body

description:
A character with this trait enjoys [URL=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/read]reading[/URL].

As in 'frequently seen in this VN while reading a book or magazine', but not exclusively.
name: Reading

description: This character is seen carrying a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ball]ball[/url]. These generally are used in various kind of sports and exist in various sizes.
name: Ball

description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Knee_pad]Knee pads[/url] are worn over the knees for protection. They can be used in various sports like volleybal, cycling and skateboarding.

They are also used in the military for protection while kneeling.
name: Knee Pad

description:
Ankle socks do not raise higher than to a person's ankles.

Note: Do NOT use this trait for socks that stop at the heel.
name: Ankle Socks

description:
This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rape]rapes[/url] another character, but this event can be avoided by making different choices or succeeding better in earlier segments of the story.

In criminal law, rape is a type of sexual assault usually involving sexual intercourse, which is initiated by one or more persons against another person without that person's consent.

This trait itself is intended to be used in situations where the player can avoid the rape scene altogether. For situations that fit the child traits better, like the ability to interrupt a rape scene in progress, use the child trait, [url=/i543]Rape Attempt[/url] in this example, instead.

[b]The trait has been made obsolete in favour of the newly clarified traits [url=/i631]Engages in (Sexual) > Unavoidable Rape[/url] and [url=/i3941]Engages in (Sexual) > Completely Avoidable Rape[/url] and their child traits. Please use the new traits, and in the situations where you are not sure which trait to use (for example, because you haven't finished the game), use the generic [url=/i260]Engages in (Sexual) > Rape[/url] trait instead.[/b]
name: Avoidable Rape (obsolete)

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loneliness]lonely[/url]. A lonely person is one who has no companions or friends; is lack of sympathetic or friendly companionship, intercourse and support. This person may or may not feel depressed because of their situation, it usually depends on whether they are aware of it or not. 

Loneliness is a complex and usually unpleasant emotional response to isolation or lack of companionship. Loneliness typically includes anxious feelings about a lack of connectedness or communality with other beings, both in the present and extending into the future. As such, loneliness can be felt even when surrounded by other people. The causes of loneliness are varied and include social, mental, emotional, and spiritual factors.
name: Lonely

description: This character has multiple ponytails.
name: Multiple Tails

description: This character engages in music learning: this can mean learning how to play an instrument, to sing or another music related ability, without necessarily being a pro musician or having a music related role.
name: Music Learning

description:
This character uses "uchi", one of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronouns[/url] for "I", to address themselves.

A feminine or girlish pronoun often used in western dialects especially the [url=http://vndb.org/i805]Kansai[/url] dialect. Generally written in kana. Plural form uchi-ra is used by both genders.

Although the singular form is also used by both sexes when talking about the household, e.g., "uchi no neko" ("my/our cat"), "uchi no chichi-oya" ("my father") due to being common do not use such a usage as a trait.
name: Uchi

description: The character is a survivor of a tragedy, murder or serious accident.
name: Survival

description:
A character with this trait wears a name tag, or has worn one for a significant portion of the game.

A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nametag]name tag[/URL] is a badge or sticker worn on the outermost clothing as a means of displaying the wearer's name for others to view.
name: Name Tag

description:
A character with this trait wears a top hat, or has worn one for a significant portion of the game.

A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Top_hat]top hat[/URL] is a tall, flat-crowned, broad-brimmed hat, predominantly worn from the latter part of the 18th to the middle of the 20th century. As of the early 21st century, it is usually worn only with morning dress or white tie, in dressage, as servants' or doormen's livery, or as a fashion statement.
name: Top Hat

description:
A character with this personality trait is frequently envious of others' various physical and non-physical possessions.

[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Envy]Envy[/URL] is a resentment which occurs when someone lacks another's quality, achievement or possession and wishes that the other lacked it.

Though used synonymously with [url=/i1284]Jealousy[/url] in modern English, the two words are different.
name: Envious

description:
A character with this personality trait is often jealous of others.

[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jealousy]Jealousy[/URL] is an emotion, and the word typically refers to the negative thoughts and feelings of insecurity, fear, and anxiety over an anticipated loss of something of great personal value, particularly in reference to an existing connection. Jealousy often consists of a combination of emotions such as anger, resentment, inadequacy, helplessness and disgust.

Though jealous is used synonymously with [url=http://vndb.org/i1283]Envious[/url] in modern English, the two words are different.
name: Jealous

description: The hair of this character is not well-kept and stick out in all directions. Such a "hairstyle" is mostly preferred by people with a cheeky or lazy character.
name: Shaggy

description: The preternatural entity possessing this character is not welcomed and is cohabiting against the host's wishes.
name: Malevolent Possession

description: The preternatural entity possessing this character was either summoned or otherwise invited into the host's body.
name: Benevolent Possession

description: This character is a preternatural entity who takes residence in a person's body or an inanimate object. The degree of control they have may vary, but the possessing entity is both foreign and not a naturally occurring phenomenon.
name: Possession

description:
This character possesses another character with their (the host's) permission.

Note: If this character is possessing an inanimate object, just use [url=http://vndb.org/i1288]Possession[/url].
name: Benevolent Possession

description:
This character possesses another character against their (the host's) wishes.

Note: If this character is possessing an inanimate object, just use [url=http://vndb.org/i1288]Possession[/url].
name: Malevolent Possession

description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scissors]scissors[/url].

Scissors are hand-operated shearing instruments. They consist of a pair of metal blades pivoted so that the sharpened edges slide against each other when the handles (bows) opposite to the pivot are closed. Scissors are used for cutting various thin materials, such as paper, cardboard, metal foil, thin plastic, cloth, rope, and wire. Scissors can also be used to cut hair and food. Scissors and shears are functionally equivalent, but larger implements tend to be called shears.
name: Scissors

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crop_top]crop top[/url].

A crop top is a T-shirt or blouse with the lower part cut off, showing off some of the abdomen. The half shirt (or belly shirt) is a kind of shirt that is cut off from the bottom of the chest.
name: Crop Top

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vegetarian]vegetarian[/url].

Vegetarianism is the practice of abstaining from the consumption of meat – red meat, poultry, seafood and the flesh of any other animal; it may also include abstention from by-products of animal slaughter.
name: Vegetarian

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unicorn]unicorn[/url].

The unicorn is a legendary animal that has been described since antiquity as a beast with a large, pointed, spiraling horn projecting from its forehead.
name: Unicorn

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pegasus]Pegasus[/url].

Pegasus is a winged divine stallion usually depicted as pure white in colour.

In the 20th and 21st century, it appeared in movies, in fantasy, in video games and in role play, where by extension, the term "pegasus" (plural: "pegasi") is often used to refer to any winged horse.
name: Pegasus

description: [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fratricide]Fratricide[/URL] is the act of a person killing his or her brother.
name: Fratricide

description: [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sororicide]Sororicide[/URL] is the act of killing one's own sister.
name: Sororicide

description: This character engages in sexual acts with another character that remains asleep for the duration of the sex scene. Apply [url=/i1650]i1650[/url] to the sleeping character.
name: Sleep Sex

description: The character easily panics and gets flustered easily. Usually when things does not go as planned/expected, the character will lose composure and panic and possibly screw up in some way.
name: Flustered

description:
This character uses [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dual_wield]dual-wield weapons[/url].

Dual wielding is the technique of utilizing two weapons, one in each hand, during combat.
name: Dual-Wield Weapon

description:
This character has a high perception of what other people do and think. They often see through of what other people is hiding, making them a dependable friend or a formidable opponent.

This might be caused by a long term of experience of observing people's act and conduct, or just simply have the talent for it which caused by their very own nature, such as having attentive care for others or merely being sly and deceitful.

Note: Don't apply this trait to those who use telepathy.
name: Insightful

description: A [URL=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/pragmatic?s=t]pragmatic[/URL] person is somebody who makes decisions and takes action based on logical, practical and/or rational considerations and perspectives. It should be noted that pragmatic people aren't necessarily cold or unemotional.
name: Pragmatic

description:
This character is a merperson (a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mermaid]mermaid[/url] or a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Merman]merman[/url]).

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Merfolk]merperson[/url] is a mythological creature with a human upper half (head, arms, and torso) and a fish-like lower half.
name: Merperson

description:
This character has orange hair.

Please see the [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/33/126533.jpg]VNDB Hair Color Chart[/url] for examples when in doubt.
name: Orange

description:
This character is shown to carry a stun gun and possibly use it as well.

A stun gun is a type of [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Electroshock_weapon]electroshock weapon[/URL] that is used for incapacitating a person by administering electric shock aimed at disrupting superficial muscle functions. The shock is delivered by making direct contact with the target using the device.

Unlike a [url=/i2171]taser[/URL], a stun gun cannot launch its electrodes, so it must make direct contact with the target.
name: Stun Gun

description:
A character with this trait is [URL=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/competitive?s=t]competitive[/URL].

Competitive people have a strong desire to compete or to succeed. They typically hate to lose.
name: Competitive

description:
A character with this trait wears a [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beanie_%28seamed_cap%29]beanie[/URL].

In other English-speaking countries, a "beanie" is a knitted cap (often woollen), known in the United States as a "stocking cap" and in Canada as a "tuque".

[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Beanie.svg]Example.[/URL]
name: Beanie

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lion]lion[/url] or a lioness.

The lion (Panthera leo) is a large mammal of the Felidae (cat) family, and is often called the "king of the beasts".
name: Lion

description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Infant]infant[/url] or has the appearance of being an infant.

The term infant is typically applied to young children between the ages of 1 month and 12 months; however, definitions may vary between birth and 2 years of age. A newborn is an infant who is only hours, days, or up to a few weeks old.
name: Infant

description:
A character with this trait wears a police officer's uniform. The character doesn't have to be an actual police officer to have this trait.

Accessories, equipment, colours and styles differ from country-to-country, and even state-to-state. It can also depend on a variety of other factors, such as an officer's rank or job within the force.

In general, both sexes wear:
* A hat with the force's insignia on it (usually as a metallic plate or an embroidery)
* A shirt
* A necktie
* A pair of trousers
* A utility belt that stores equipment (handcuffs, gun, pepper spray, radio, baton, etc.)
* Leather dress shoes, usually black or dark brown
name: Police Officer Uniform

description: A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sports_visor]sports visor[/URL] is a type of crownless hat consisting simply of a visor or brim with a strap encircling the head. The top of the head is not covered and the visor protects only the face, including eyes, nose, and cheeks, from the sun.
name: Sports Visor

description: This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_fetishism]sexual fetishist[/url], a person who receives the sexual arousal from a physical object, or from a specific situation. They can be crazy about the school swimsuits or girls' panties. They can be aroused while beholding the female fights in the mud, or just because of the fact that their sexual partner wears a cross necklace during the sexual intercourse.
name: Sexual Fetishism

description:
This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shovel]shovel[/url].

A shovel is a tool for digging, lifting, and moving bulk materials, such as soil, coal, gravel, snow, sand, or ore. Shovels are common tools that are used extensively in agriculture, construction, and gardening. 
Most shovels are hand tools consisting of a broad blade fixed to a medium-length handle. Shovel blades are usually made of sheet steel or hard plastics and are very strong. Shovel handles are usually made of wood or glass-reinforced plastic (fibreglass).
name: Shovel

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flat_cap]flat cap[/url].

A flat cap is a rounded men's or women's cap with a small stiff brim in front. Cloths used to make the cap include wool, tweed (most common), and cotton. Less common materials may include leather or linen. Cord flat caps are also worn in various colours. The inside of the cap is usually lined with silk for comfort and warmth. The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Newsboy_cap]newsboy cap[/url] is a variation of this kind of cap.

Not to be confused with [url=http://vndb.org/i517]Beret[/url]. Unlike berets, a flat cap has a visor (peak).
name: Flat Cap

description:
A character with this trait is afflicted with or experiences a delusion. It could be a result of a [URL=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/hallucination?&path=/]hallucination[/URL], [URL=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/brainwashing?&path=/]brainwashing[/URL] or drug abuse. It doesn't matter if they have an actual, established mental disorder or not.

A [URL=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/delusion?s=t]delusion[/URL] is a mistaken or misleading opinion, idea or belief, and/or a fixed false belief that is resistant to reason or confrontation with actual fact.
name: Delusion (obsolete)

description:
A character with this trait wears a [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chef%27s_uniform]chef's uniform[/URL]. It doesn't matter if they're an actual chef or not.

The traditional chef's uniform (or chef's whites) includes a toque (traditional hat), white double-breasted jacket, and checkered pants. It is a common uniform in the Western world.
name: Chef's Uniform

description:
At law, an [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Accomplice]accomplice[/URL] is a person who actively participates in the commission of a crime, even though they take no part in the actual criminal offense. For example, in a bank robbery, the person who points the gun at the teller and asks for the money is guilty of armed robbery. However, anyone else directly involved in the commission of the crime, such as the lookout or the getaway car driver, is an accomplice, even though in the absence of an underlying offense keeping a lookout or driving a car would not be an offense.

Not to be confused with an [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Accessory_%28legal_term%29]accessory[/URL] in that an accomplice is present at the actual crime, and could be prosecuted even if the main criminal (the principal) is not charged or convicted. An accessory is generally not present at the actual crime, and may be subject to lesser penalties than an accomplice or principal offender.
name: Criminal Accomplice

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Slipper]slippers[/url].

A slipper is a semi-closed type of indoor/outdoor shoe, consisting of a sole held to the wearer's foot by a strap running over the toes or instep. Slippers are soft and lightweight compared to other types of footwear. They are mostly made of soft or comforting materials that allow a certain level of comfort for the wearer. This can range from faux fur to leather. Most slippers are worn in late autumn and winter and on occasion in other seasons. Slippers are cosy and most popular in cold countries.
name: Slippers

aliases: Fictitious Member of the School Club
description:
This character is a member of a student club. At least on paper, practically however he/she usually ditches club activities altogether and seldom appears in the clubroom.

If a character is not a member of a student club, not even on paper, then please use [url=http://vndb.org/i1381]School "Go Home Club" Member[/url] instead.
name: Ghost Member of School Club

description:
This character wears a [url=http://s2.thisnext.com/media/230x230/Gothic-Lolita-Elegant-Mini-Hat_F628F458.jpg]Mini hat[/url]. 

A mini hat is a tiny top hat which is usually worn on one side of the head, due to its size. It can be attached to a headband, although it's optional. 
More examples: [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/84/79384.jpg]Example 1[/url], [url=http://s.vndb.org/ch/00/9200.jpg]Example 2[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/85/79385.jpg]Example 3[/url].
name: Mini Hat

description: This character loves reading books a lot, and may spend most of their free time on it.
name: Bookworm

description:
This character wears a nurse's cap. 

A Nurse's cap can be:
- A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dutch_cap]long cap[/url], that covers much of the nurse's hair, or
- a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nurse%27s_cap]short cap[/url], that sits atop the nurse's hair.

Note: It may or may not be a part of an actual nurse's uniform.
name: Nurse's Cap

description:
A character with this trait is [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dishonesty]dishonest[/URL]. Perhaps they're not frequently dishonest (e.g., like a con artist or a pathological liar would be), but a dishonest act in the story defines their character and/or is a prominent plot point.

Dishonesty is to act without [URL=http://vndb.org/i822]honesty[/URL]. It is used to describe a lack of probity, cheating, lying or being deliberately deceptive or a lack in integrity, knavishness, perfidiosity, corruption or treacherousness.
name: Dishonest

description:
A character with this trait engages in netori, which is the act of "stealing" somebody else's significant other, a very close friend, or in some cases, a close relative. It doesn't matter how the character achieves this or what his intentions are. Netori could be achieved through seduction, coercion, blackmail, outright rape or other techniques. The trait does not describe "stealing" someone's unrequited crush or a potential hero(ine) on a different route, as the the close ties between the partners and their forcible separation is important to the netori/netorare fetish.

It doesn't necessarily mean that the loved one is literally stolen, but the negative feelings experienced by the one, whom the significant other is stolen from, might make it seem so.

Netori/Netorare is more than a simple act of infidelity, but the fetishization of jealousy and other negative feelings commonly associated with it. The one who loses their loved one almost always finds out about the situation and suffers from jealousy and the feeling of helplessness arisen from an inability to change anything. The one committing netori and/or the stolen loved one might rub it in by humiliating the loser in private or in public.

Please apply the [url=/i1326](Subject of) Netori[/url] trait to the character whose romantic partner was stolen from them by the Netori, and [url=/i3271](Subject of) Netorare[/url] trait for the character being stolen.
name: Netori (steals the SO)

description:
A character with this trait is subject of netori, which is the stealing of their significant other, a very close friend, or in some cases, a close relative. This could happen by someone seducing, coercing, blackmailing, outright raping their partner or through other techniques. The trait does not describe someone "stealing" their unrequited crush or a potential hero(ine) on a different route, as the the close ties between the partners and their forcible separation is important to the netori/netorare fetish.

It doesn't necessarily mean that the loved one is literally stolen, but the negative feelings experienced by the character might make it seem so.

Netori/Netorare is more than a simple act of infidelity, but the fetishization of jealousy and other negative feelings commonly associated with it. The one who loses their loved one almost always finds out about the situation and suffers from jealousy and the feeling of helplessness arisen from an inability to change anything. The one committing netori and/or the stolen loved one might rub it in by humiliating the loser in private or in public.

Please apply the [url=/i1325](Engages in) Netori[/url] trait to the character doing the stealing, and [url=/i3271](Subject of) Netorare[/url] trait for the character being stolen.
name: Netori (their SO is stolen)

description:
This character has sex in the quickie fix position. Apply this trait to the penetrated partner and apply [url=/i1693]i1693[/url] to the penetrating partner.

This is a variant of the [url=/i1692]doggy[/url] position. The receiving partner stands while bending at the waist and leaning on a piece of furniture, a wall, or their knees for support. The penetrating partner stands behind the receiving partner, possibly holding the receiving partner's hips or hands for support while they thrust.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/68/84168.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/70/84170.jpg]Example 2[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/92/90892.jpg]Example 3[/url]
name: Quickie Fix

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bounty_hunter]bounty hunter[/url].

A bounty hunter captures fugitives for a monetary reward.
name: Bounty Hunter

description: A character with this trait is [URL=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/moody?s=t]moody[/URL]. Regardless of whether they have an actual mental condition or not, their moods change at the drop of a hat. Moody characters tend to also be impulsive and whimsical.
name: Moody

description: A character with this trait is [URL=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/whimsical]whimsical[/URL]. These characters act and make decisions on a whim. They change their tune on things at a moment's notice. It's often hard to tell what they're planning next.
name: Whimsical

description:
This character participates in the competitions.

Competition is the official sporting or intellectual confrontation between several people or teams for the right to receive a prize, fame and/or moral satisfaction. This may be the internal contest of several school clubs as well as the big event like Olympic Games.

Please note that the small non-official contests and disputes are not count for this trait.
name: Competition

description:
The character is involved in at least one scene of [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Non-penetrative_sex#Mutual_masturbation]mutual masturbation[/URL].

Mutual masturbation involves the manual stimulation of genitals by two or more people who stimulate themselves or each other. This may involve [URL=http://vndb.org/g917]handjob[/URL], [URL=http://vndb.org/g750]footjob[/URL], [URL=http://vndb.org/g1515]fingering[/URL] and/or other sexual activity.
name: Mutual Masturbation

description:
A character is impregnated without their consent. This usually implies rape and/or sexual slavery, but other methods (through magic or "science") count as well. Whether a baby is born from this pregnancy or not, is irrelevant from the point of view of this traits. The only crucial factor is the clear lack of consensuality.

Please only use this trait when the state of pregnancy is confirmed ingame, either through narration, dialogs or by showing the character pregnant.
name: Forced Pregnancy

description:
This character is stylish.

A stylish person is someone who tries to keep pace with the latest fashion trends to dress elegantly and/or stunningly.
name: Stylish

description: This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Online_chat]chats online[/url] with others.
name: Online Chatting

description:
This character suffers from [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lisp]lisp[/url].

A lisp, also known as sigmatism, is a speech impediment in which a person cannot articulate sibilants ({s}, {z}, {ʒ}, {ʃ}, {tʃ}, {dʒ}). These misarticulations often result in unclear speech. This disease mostly affects children. There are physiological and social factors that may cause a lisp. For example, long chronic diseases, specific mouth anatomy (including the teeth broken in a fight), the unwillingness of parents to correct the pronunciation of a child, as well as heredity and more.
name: Lisping

description:
This character can fly using their own wings, special devices (such as jetpack), magic, or supernatural powers.

Please use the [url=http://vndb.org/i368]Pilot[/url] and [url=http://vndb.org/i255]Piloting[/url] traits instead, when a character is piloting the aircraft.
name: Flying

description: This character sometimes switches to the "biting" manner of speaking, ignoring the etiquette, morality, or purity of their speech. They know the weak points of their conversation partners and exploit them in order to annoy, humiliate, or just to tease someone.
name: Sharp-tongued

description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Raygun]Rayguns[/url] are a type of fictional directed-energy weapon. They are a well-known feature of science fiction. According to the stories, when activated, a raygun emits a ray, typically visible, usually lethal if it hits a human target, often destructive if it hits mechanical objects, with properties and other effects unspecified or varying.
name: Raygun

description: [url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/53/59853.jpg]Jester's costume[/url] usually consist of a multi-colored long-sleeved tunic and puffy pants, a hat with two or more "horns" (pom poms or bells are optional), a star-shaped or ruffle collar, and a jester's shoe covers.
name: Jester Costume

description: This character engages in sexual intercourse in their own dream, fantasy, illusion, etc.
name: Sexual Fantasy

description: This character is the subject of someone's sexual dream, fantasy, illusion, etc. Unlike the dream's host, this character may not be aware of such event. On the other hand, he/she may be the one who instigated this dream in the host's mind using magic, hypnosis, supernatural abilities or other methods.
name: Sexual Fantasy

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pointed_hat]pointed hat[/url].

Pointed hats have been a distinctive item of headgear of a wide range of cultures throughout history. Good examples of modern pointed hat are: Santa hat, party hat, night cap and the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conical_Asian_hat]conical asian hat[/url].
name: Pointed Hat

description: This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bartender]bartender[/url], a person who serves alcoholic beverages at a bar.
name: Bartender

description:
This character can be seen in the "[url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/34/60434.jpg]old type[/url]" school swimsuit.

This type of swimwear began to appear in Japanese schools around the 1970s. Its color is usually dark blue, violet or black. There are also the Moe-versions like translucent or white, which is popular among the perverts, since the drenched white swimsuit becomes almost transparent.
Old type school swimsuit has a distinctive front skirt. Unlike the very first version of the school swimsuit (so-called "old old type"), which consists of two separate pieces (panties and "tunic"), in this type of swimwear the back part of the panties is a continuation of the tunic, while the front part is sewn to the inner part of the tunic along two lines, as it shown in the picture. However, if desired, a small area above the pubis can be exposed. There are also might be the tags with the girl's name or class, which can be sewn to the frontside, backside or bottom of the tunic. Old type school swimsuit is mostly worn by girls of the junior or middle schools, although it can be worn by anyone.

More information can be found [url=http://kgtblog.seesaa.net/archives/201204-1.html]here[/url] and [url=http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/スクール水着]here[/url] (Japanese).
name: Old Type School Swimsuit

description:
This character can be seen in the "[url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/35/60435.jpg]new type[/url]" school swimsuit.

This type of swimwear began to appear in Japanese schools around the 1980s. As well as the old type, this swimsuit can be dark blue, violet, black or white. It's a one-piece swimsuit, which is most common in modern Japanese schools. In contrast to the previous type, it can have both a closed and an open back. It may also contain a tag with the name of the girl. This kind of swimsuit is commonly worn by high school students, but this is not necessarily so.

More information can be found [url=http://kgtblog.seesaa.net/archives/201204-1.html]here[/url] and [url=http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/スクール水着]here[/url] (Japanese).
name: New Type School Swimsuit

description:
This character can be seen in the [url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/36/60436.jpg]sports swimsuit[/url].

This type of swimwear is available in various (and multiple) colors and designs. It is made of the new generation materials to be highly comfortable for professional swimming. In Japan, it's mostly worn by participants of the school competitions and the sportsmen, as well as by all who have the desire and the money to buy such a swimsuit.
name: Sports Swimsuit

description:
This character engages in sexual activities that are discussed or explained but never shown.

As a rule of thumb, if you can't pin down the time and place of the implied sex scene, don't use this trait. For example don't use this tag for long time jumps, after which the couple in question is shown to have kids, even though they didn't have a single H-scene.

[b]The trait has been made unapplicable in favour of [url=/i3787]Engages in (Sexual) > Off Screen Sex Only[/url]. Use that trait only in cases where all the character's sex scenes happen Off-Screen.[/b]
name: Off Screen Sex (obsolete)

description:
This character can be seen in the [url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/37/60437.jpg]swimming spats[/url].

It's a variation of sports swimsuit that cover not only the torso, but also the foots of woman (partially or completely). Men's version may be similar to the woman's, or it may be just the tight-fitting shorts/leggings. This type of swimwear appeared in the world around the 2000s.
name: Swimming Spats

description:
This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pen]pen[/url].

A pen is a writing implement used to apply ink to a surface, usually paper, for writing or drawing.
name: Pen

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chastity_belt]Chastity Belt[/url].

A chastity belt is a locking item of clothing designed to prevent sexual intercourse. They may be used to protect the wearer from rape or temptation. Some devices have been designed with additional features to prevent masturbation.

Modern Chastity Belts are most often used in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chastity_belt_%28BDSM%29]BDSM play[/url]. Chastity belts in BDSM are a way for the wearer to surrender control over their sexual behavior by providing a physical barrier that deters sexual intercourse and possibly masturbation. The device is usually worn by the submissive in the relationship, as a way of providing control to the dominant (often referred to as the "keyholder" in this context). This is a part of the wider practice of orgasm denial.
name: Chastity Belt

description:
This character is a member of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swimming_%28sport%29]swimming[/url] club associated with a school.

A school sports club is a administration-approved student-based school organization focusing on a selected sport. Swimming is the self propulsion of a person through water or other liquid, for survival, recreation, sport, exercise or other reason.
name: School Swimming Club Member

description:
This character is forced or tricked into being nude in public areas (school, shopping malls, etc.) or in front of a group of people through blackmailing or the society's rules. This is different from exhibitionism in that the character is not doing this voluntarily.

This trait only covers nudity itself. If this character also has sex in a public area while being naked, then use [url=http://vndb.org/i879]Sex in Public[/url] as well.
name: Forced Public Nudity

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hospital_gown]hospital gown[/url].

A hospital gown is a long loose piece of clothing worn in a hospital by someone doing or having an operation. It can also be used as clothing for bedridden patients.
name: Hospital Gown

description: This character participates in a pornographic production as an actor in front of the camera, where they are a non-consenting party. They might be raped, be under the influence of drugs, mind control, magic, or another means that prevent them giving a valid consent, or the "actor" is unaware they are being filmed. Use [url=/i2464]Non-consensual Porn Production[/url] for the members of the staff.
name: Non-consensual Porn Acting

description:
This character engages in a consensual pornographic production as an actor in front of the camera. Use [url=/i3502]Consensual Porn Production[/url] for the members of the staff.

If the character is both an actor and the one producing the shoot, as might happen in ultra low budget amateur productions, usually involving smart phones, use this trait in addition to [url=/i3502]Consensual Porn Production[/url].

Only use the trait if all the actors involved are consenting to the activity.
name: Consensual Porn Acting

description: A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shrug_%28clothing%29]shrug[/URL] is a cropped, cardigan-like garment with short or long sleeves, typically knitted. Generally, a shrug covers less of the body than a vest would, but it is more tailored than a shawl. Shrugs are typically worn as the outermost layer of an outfit, with a full shirt, tank top, or dress beneath. A shrug covers a small portion of the upper body. Some shrugs are tied together just below the bustline.
name: Shrug

description:
This character participates in their own marriage ceremony during the story (mostly at the end).

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wedding]wedding[/url] is the ceremony where people are united in marriage. Wedding traditions and customs vary greatly between cultures, ethnic groups, religions, countries, and social classes. Most wedding ceremonies involve an exchange of wedding vows by the couple, presentation of a gift (offering, ring(s), symbolic item, flowers, money), and a public proclamation of marriage by an authority figure or leader.

Please don't apply this trait to those who were married before the story began.
name: Wedding

description: Frottage is the general term for the act of rubbing any part of the body, including the buttocks, the breasts, abdomen, thighs, feet, hands, legs and sexual organs against the sexual organ of another person, whether naked or clothed. Couples may engage in frottage as a form of foreplay or simply as a method to achieve sexual gratification without the penetrative aspects of vaginal, anal or oral sexual intercourse, which may be a way of preserving virginity or a way of practicing safe sex.
name: Non-penetrative Sex

description:
This character is a beautician. He or she might work at a beauty salon.

This can include hair stylists, cosmeticians, and manicurists.
name: Beautician

description:
This character is a member of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tea_ceremony]tea ceremony[/url] club associated with a school.

Students involved in such a club may learn and practice how to prepare and drink tea in a traditional way.
name: School Tea Ceremony Club Member

description: This character is involved in sexual activities while they are drunk.
name: Drunk Sex

description:
The person in receipt of mentorship may be referred to as a protégé (male), a protégée (female), an apprentice or, in recent years, a mentee.

[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mentorship]Mentorship[/URL] is a personal developmental relationship in which a more experienced or more knowledgeable person helps to guide a less experienced or less knowledgeable person. However, true mentoring is more than just answering occasional questions or providing ad hoc help. It is about an ongoing relationship of learning, dialogue, and challenge.
name: Apprentice

description:
This character is a victim of the acts of domestic violence.

Domestic violence can be broadly defined as a pattern of abusive behaviors by one or both partners in an intimate relationship such as marriage, dating, family, friends or cohabitation. Domestic violence has many forms including physical aggression (hitting, kicking, biting, shoving, restraining, slapping, throwing objects), or threats thereof; sexual abuse; emotional abuse; controlling or domineering; intimidation; stalking; passive/covert abuse (e.g., neglect); and economic deprivation.

In games and anime Domestic Violence may appear as a comedy routine.
name: Domestic Violence

description: This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pet]pet[/url]. They may or may not actually be an animal.
name: Pet

description:
This character engages in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Animal_roleplay]petplay[/url] or animal roleplay or they are treated as a pet against their will by another character.

If they actually are a pet and not a person simply being treated as one please use the [url=https://vndb.org/i1369]Pet[/url] trait.
name: Petplay

aliases: School Track and Field Club Member
description:
This character is a member of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Track_and_field]track & field[/url] club associated with a school.

A school sports club is a administration-approved student-based school organization focusing on a selected sport. Track and field is a group of athletic sports, consisting mainly of various kinds of running, jumping and throwing, that take place on a track and the enclosed field.
name: School Athletic Club Member

aliases: School Track and Field Club Chairman
School Track and Field Club Captain
Leader of Track and Field Club
description: This character is the leader of a school athletic club.
name: School Athletic Club President

description:
This character wears a [url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/53/64153.jpg]decorative belt[/url].

It rarely fulfil belt's primary function of supporting the clothes or carrying the ammunition, so it's mostly a tribute to fashion. It often has a broad base and decorated with various patterns, frippery, etc. Such belts are often worn asymmetrically on the hips.
name: Decorative Belt

description:
This character is a member of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Culture_of_Japan]cultural[/url] club associated with a school.

A school cultural club is a administration-approved student-based school organization focusing on a selected discipline, that is somehow related to the culture, arts, science, IT and other non-sports subjects.
name: School Cultural Club Member

description: This character is a native of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indonesia]Indonesia[/url], or a person of Indonesian descent.
name: Indonesian

description: This character celebrates a birthday during the course of the story.
name: Birthday Celebration

description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frot]frot[/url].

Frot is a non-penetrative sexual activity involving direct penis-to-penis contact.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/09/119109.jpg]NSFW Example 1 (Bara)[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/08/119108.jpg]NSFW Example 2 (Futanari)[/url]
name: Frot

description: This character is a member of a club that is not common in terms of the real Japanese schools. For example, a club of occultism, a club of sexual humiliation, a club of gambling games, etc. These clubs might be official or not.
name: School Extraordinary Club Member

description:
This character is taciturn.

This character is physically able to speak, but prefers to remain silent because of their serious/sullen personality or mental affliction. Apply this trait only to those who spoke at least once in the story or when there was other proof of their ability to speak.
name: Taciturn

description: This character is a member of the school club, the existence of which wasn't approved by the school administration, and thus, this club is considered to be underground. A members of such club are trying to conceal the place and time of club meetings, and they may even be in a state of war with the Student Council and/or Discipline Committee.
name: Unofficial School Club Member

aliases: Not a Member of the School Club
description:
This character is actually not a member of any club. 

Please use this trait only in the cases when it is an important part of the plot (eg, a character is trained as a magician in his spare time after school), or when it somehow reveals the traits of the character's personality (eg, a character is too lazy to participate in club activities, and even being criticized by people around because of this).

Also, the name of this trait implies that a character should at least attend school, rather than completely ignore the classes together with clubs.

If a character is a member of a club, just refuses to actually show up for the activities of his/her club, then use [url=http://vndb.org/i1320]Ghost Member of the School Club[/url] instead.
name: School "Go Home Club" Member

description:
This character is a member of a music club associated with a school.

The main goal of the music club members is to gather together to learn and play music, sing the songs, and perfecting their skills day by day.
The club has the opportunity to hold a performance at the school's festival, which is usually a concert at the auditorium.
name: School Music Club Member

description:
This character plays [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Badminton]badminton[/url]. 

Badminton is a racquet sport played by either two opposing players (singles) or two opposing pairs (doubles), who take positions on opposite halves of a rectangular court divided by a net. Players score points by striking a shuttlecock with their racquet so that it passes over the net and lands in their opponents' half of the court.
name: Badminton

description:
This character is a subject of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Voyeurism]voyeurism[/url].

Usually it means that this character is secretly observed by another character (a voyeurist) particularly in intimate situations, during changing clothes, sexual intercourse, etc. The victim may or may not know about this.
name: Voyeurism

description:
This character carries a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Glaive]glaive[/url].

A glaive is a European polearm weapon, consisting of a single-edged blade on the end of a pole.
name: Glaive

description:
This character is a member of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drama]drama[/url] club associated with a school.

Drama club exists to provide an opportunity for students interested in theater to learn the art of acting and be able to create a performance, starting with the script and ending with decorations. Students create requisite and clothes for the show on their own. However, the purchase of necessary materials is provided at the expense of a school. Club can give performances in school during festivals and holidays.
name: School Drama Club Member

description:
This character may seem cool and brutal for the audience until the moment his wife/girlfriend will come and say her word. In her presence he immediately becomes compliant and obedient. In other words, this kind of people humbly recognizes the leadership and authority of their woman. In some comedic stories women can even use a frying pan or other painful tool as an argument.

Note that this trait has nothing to do with sexual submission. Use [url=http://vndb.org/i1087]Submissive Partner[/url] in this case.
name: Henpecked

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baker]baker[/url].

A baker is someone who makes, bakes and sells breads, rolls, biscuits or cookies, and/or crackers using an oven or other concentrated heat source. Cakes and similar foods may also be produced, as the traditional boundaries between what is produced by a baker as opposed to a pastry chef, have blurred in recent decades.
name: Baker

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Construction_worker]construction worker[/url].

A construction worker is someone who is involved in the physical construction of the built environment and its infrastructure.
name: Construction Worker

description: This character uses "yo" (余), a formal [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronoun[/url], to address themselves.
name: Yo

description:
This character is a member of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miko]miko[/url] club associated with a school.

The miko club may train girls wanting to get acquainted with the life of miko, and even become one of them in the future.
Miko is a Shinto term in Japan, indicating a shrine maiden or a supplementary priestess who was once likely seen as a shaman but in modern Japanese culture is understood to be an institutionalized role in daily shrine life, trained to perform tasks, ranging from sacred cleansing to performing the Kagura, a sacred dance.
name: School Miko Club Member

aliases: Leader of School Shrine Maiden Club
description: This character is the leader of a school [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miko]miko[/url] club.
name: School Miko Club President

description: This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zombie_%28fictional%29]zombie[/url], a type of reanimated corpse.
name: Zombie

description:
This character was involved in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Duel]duel[/url].

Historically, a duel is an arranged engagement in combat between two individuals, with matched weapons in accordance with agreed-upon rules.
The duel was based on a code of honour. Duels were fought not so much to kill the opponent as to gain "satisfaction", that is, to restore one's honour (or compete for a woman) by demonstrating a willingness to risk one's life for it, and as such the tradition of duelling was originally reserved for the male members of nobility.

You can also use this trait for non-armed duels (competitive, for example), as long as this is a question of a honour, with possible significant risk to lose something or someone important for a duelist.
name: Duel

description: Chaps are sturdy coverings for the legs consisting of leggings and a belt. They are buckled on over trousers with the chaps' integrated belt, but unlike trousers they have no seat and are not joined at the crotch. They are designed to provide protection for the legs and are usually made of leather or a leather-like material. They are most commonly associated with the cowboy culture of the American west as a protective garment to be used when riding a horse through brushy terrain.
name: Chaps

description:
This character engages in mercy killing.

A mercy kill is a death blow to end the suffering of a severely wounded person or animal. It may be a mercy killing of civilians or soldiers, friends or enemies, with or without the sufferer's consent.
name: Mercy Killing

description:
This character is endowed with [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wisdom]wisdom[/url].

Wisdom is the ability to think and act using knowledge, experience, common sense, and insight. This quality is usually inherent to middle-aged and old people, who have seen many things in their life, and can give a good advice to those who may need it.
name: Wise

description:
This character is seen with a radio.

A transistor radio is a small portable radio receiver that uses transistor-based circuitry.
name: Radio

description: This character masturbates in a public place. It doesn't matter if this is carried out discreetly or openly.
name: Public Masturbation

description:
This character is subjected to some experimental treatment with or without their consent. The goal of the research can be anything from curing a disease to developing super-soldiers. As long as the experiments are seemingly scientific in nature, and not magical, the trait applies. Whether said research and science would be feasible in real life or not is irrelevant.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Human_subject_research]Wikipedia article[/url]
name: Human Subject Research

description:
This character is a member of a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Science]science[/url] club associated with a school.

A school science club is a administration-approved student-based school organization focusing on scientific research.
name: School Science Club Member

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Procuring_(prostitution)]pimp[/url] or [url=http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=madame]madame[/url].

The PIMP abbreviation stands for "Person Into Marketing Prostitutes", thus, it's an agent for hookers who receives part of the money earned by prostitutes in return for advertising services, physical protection, or for providing, and possibly monopolizing a location where the prostitute may engage clients.
According to different versions, "madame" may be a female version of pimp, as well as the owner and manager of brothel, who hires the pimps and prostitutes.
name: Pimp

description:
This character uses "watashi", one of the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese Pronouns[/url] for "I" to refer to themselves.

In formal or polite contexts, this is gender neutral, but when used in informal or casual contexts, it is usually perceived as feminine.
name: Watashi

description: A dandere character is one who is normally quiet and silent, possibly to the point of coming across as emotionless at times, but will suddenly become talkative, sweet and cute when alone with the right person if they manage to push the right button to get them to pour their heart out, revealing that they're actually just shy.
name: Dandere

description:
This character is penetrated with a anal plug tail.

This is an anal plug with a tail on the end. The tail may resemble that of a real animal, like a fox or dog, or that of a fictional creature, like a succubus. Such a device may be used in sexual petplay.

[url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/29/29029.jpg]Example[/url]
name: Anal Plug Tail

description: This character wears simple clothes made ​​of rags. This is the clothes of slaves and poor people, who are not able to buy civilized clothes.
name: Rags

description: Discrimination is the prejudicial treatment of an individual based on his or her membership - or perceived membership - in a certain group or category.
name: Discrimination

description:
