This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wrinkle]wrinkles[/url] somewhere on their body, especially on the face.

A wrinkle is a fold, ridge or crease in the skin. Skin wrinkles typically appear as a result of aging processes, habitual sleeping positions, loss of body mass, or temporarily, as the result of prolonged immersion in water. Age wrinkling in the skin is promoted by habitual facial expressions, aging, sun damage, smoking, poor hydration, and various other factors.
name: Wrinkles

description:
This character has the cut of eyes, when the top of the eye is drawn with a thick flat line, which used to effect a bored, expressionless, or scornful face for a character.

Note: Please, only apply this trait to the characters who have such facial expression all the time, not just occasionally.

Example: http://s.vndb.org/sf/57/69257.jpg
name: Jitome

description:
The character tagged with this creates one or more identical copies of someone (could be him/herself), through supernatural / sci-fi means.

The trait does not cover the actual biological process of extracting DNA and using it to grow organs.
name: Supernatural Cloning

description:
This character is a member of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Basketball]basketball[/url] club associated with a school.

Basketball is a sport played by two teams of five players on a rectangular court. The objective is to shoot a ball through a hoop 46 cm in diameter and 3 m high mounted to a backboard at each end.
name: School Basketball Club Member

description:
This character is a member of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Association_football]soccer[/url] club associated with a school.

A school sports club is a administration-approved student-based school organization focusing on a selected sport. Soccer is a sport played between two teams of eleven players with a spherical ball.
name: School Soccer Club Member

description: A game developer is a software developer that specializes in video game development – the process and related disciplines of creating video games.
name: Video Game Developer

description:
This character is a member of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Newspaper]newspaper[/url] club associated with a school.

The newspaper may either be published online or on paper. Students involved in such a club often try to get their hands on the latest scoops.
name: School Newspaper Club Member

description:
This character is a member of his/her school's health committee.

Students in the health committee usually help out in the school's infirmary.
name: Health Committee Member

description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prison_officer]prison officer[/url], also known as corrections officer, correctional officer, detention officer or penal officer, is a person responsible for the supervision, safety, and security of prisoners in a prison, jail, or similar form of secure custody. Historically, terms such as jailer, jail guard, prison guard, and turnkey have also been used.

Corrections officers are responsible for the care, custody, and control of individuals who have been arrested and are awaiting trial while on remand or who have been convicted of a crime and sentenced to serve time in a prison or jail. They are also responsible for the safety and security of the facility itself. Most officers are employed by the government of the jurisdiction in which they operate, though some are employed by private companies.
name: Prison Guard

description: String instruments are musical instruments that produce sound from vibrating strings. In most strings instruments, the vibrations are transmitted to the body of the instrument, which also vibrates, along with the air inside it. In the Hornbostel-Sachs scheme of musical instrument classification, used in organology, they are called chordophones. Some common instruments in the string family are violin, guitar, sitar, electric bass, viola, cello, harp, double bass, rabab, banjo, mandolin, ukulele, and bouzouki.
name: String Instrument

description: The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Violin]violin[/url], also known as a fiddle, is a string instrument, usually with four strings tuned in perfect fifths. It is the smallest, highest-pitched member of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Violin_family]violin family[/url] of string instruments, which also includes the viola, the cello and the double bass.
name: Violin

description:
The harp is a multi-string musical instrument which has the plane of its strings positioned perpendicularly to the soundboard. Organologically, it is in the general category of chordophones (stringed instruments) and has its own sub category (the harps). All harps have a neck, resonator and strings. Some, known as frame harps, also have a pillar; those without the pillar are referred to as open harps. 

These instruments also belong into this category: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lyre]Lyre[/url] (a smaller harp-like instrument) , [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Konghou]Konghou[/url] (Chinese harp. In Japanese it is called "Kugo"), [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chang_%28instrument%29]Chang[/url] (Persian).
name: Harp

description: A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wind_instrument]wind instrument[/url] is a musical instrument that contains some type of resonator (usually a tube), in which a column of air is set into vibration by the player blowing into (or over) a mouthpiece set at the end of the resonator. The pitch of the vibration is determined by the length of the tube and by manual modifications of the effective length of the vibrating column of air. In the case of some wind instruments, sound is produced by blowing through a reed; others require buzzing into a metal mouthpiece.
name: Wind Instruments

description: A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brass_instrument]brass instrument[/url] is a musical instrument that produces sound by sympathetic vibration of air in a tubular resonator in sympathy with the vibration of the player's lips. Brass instruments are also called labrosones, literally meaning "lip-vibrated instruments".
name: Brass Instrument

description:
The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flute]flute[/url] is a family of musical instrument of the woodwind group. Unlike woodwind instruments with reeds, a flute is an aerophone or reedless wind instrument that produces its sound from the flow of air across an opening. According to the instrument classification of Hornbostel–Sachs, flutes are categorized as edge-blown aerophones.

A musician who plays the flute can be referred to as a flute player, a flautist, a flutist, or, less commonly, a fluter.

Aside from the voice, flutes are the earliest known musical instruments. A number of flutes dating to about 43,000 to 35,000 years ago have been found in the Swabian Alb region of Germany. These flutes demonstrate that a developed musical tradition existed from the earliest period of modern human presence in Europe.
name: Flute

description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Percussion]percussion instrument[/url] is a musical instrument that is sounded by being struck or scraped by a beater (including attached or enclosed beaters or rattles); struck, scraped or rubbed by hand; or struck against another similar instrument. The percussion family is believed to include the oldest musical instruments, following the human voice.

The percussion section of an orchestra most commonly contains instruments such as timpani, snare drum, bass drum, cymbals, triangle and tambourine. However, the section can also contain non-percussive instruments, such as whistles and sirens, or a blown conch shell. On the other hand, keyboard instruments, such as the celesta, are not normally part of the percussion section, but keyboard percussion instruments such as the glockenspiel and xylophone (which do not have piano keyboards) are included.
name: Percussion Instruments

description:
The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drum]drum[/url] is a member of the percussion group of musical instruments. In the Hornbostel-Sachs classification system, it is a membranophone. Drums consist of at least one membrane, called a drumhead or drum skin, that is stretched over a shell and struck, either directly with the player's hands, or with a drum stick, to produce sound. There is usually a resonance head on the underside of the drum, typically tuned to a slightly lower pitch than the top drumhead. Other techniques have been used to cause drums to make sound, such as the thumb roll. Drums are the world's oldest and most ubiquitous musical instruments, and the basic design has remained virtually unchanged for thousands of years.

Drums may be played individually, with the player using a single drum, and some drums such as the djembe are almost always played in this way. Others are normally played in a set of two or more, all played by the one player, such as bongo drums and timpani. A number of different drums together with cymbals form the basic modern drum kit.
name: Drum

description:
This character identifies as a non-binary gender.

Non-Binary Genders are gender identities that don't fit within the accepted binary of male and female. People can feel they are both, neither, or some mixture thereof.

This is regardless of their physical sex or the way they present.

Please don't use this trait for characters of unconfirmed gender. This trait is only for characters officially confirmed to be of non-binary gender.
name: Non-Binary

description:
Intentional restriction of oxygen to the brain for the purposes of sexual arousal.

Use this trait for the character being strangled, whether it is done by another person or by a person to themselves. Use i1657 for the person performing the strangling.
name: Strangulation Sex

description:
The character is an active member of the library committee.
The library committee is an student organization present in many colleges, universities or high schools with the main purpose of preserving the library and realizing tramits such as books being checked out.
name: Library Committee Member

description: This is used to describe a character with a suntan, either naturally applied by the sun or through artificial means.
name: Tanned

description:
This character has sex in the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Woman_on_top_(sex_position)#Reverse_missionary_position]reverse missionary[/url] position. Apply this trait to the penetrated partner and apply [url=/i1695]i1695[/url] to the penetrating partner.

In this position, the penetrating partner lies on their back, while the receiving partner lies on on top of them, facing down. This is similar to the [url=/i93]missionary[/url] position, except the participants' positions are switched.

Don't apply this trait to lesbians engaging in tribadism, gays engaging in frot, or lesbians using a double-ended didlo. Use [url=/i93]i93[/url] and [url=/i1694]i1694[/url] instead.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/84/4484.jpg]Example 1[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/73/84173.jpg]Example 2[/url]
name: Reverse Missionary

description: This character has more than one braids.
name: Multiple Braids

description: This character has two identical braids, one on each side of their head.
name: Twin Braids

description:
This character is a member of a computer club associated with a school.

A school PC club is a administration-approved student-based school organization focusing on computer usage.
name: School PC Club Member

description: This character is the leader of a school computer club.
name: School PC Club President

description: This character forces other people to perform sexual acts through threats of violence or other means of coercion. However, they are not physically involved in the rape itself.
name: Rape by Proxy

description: This person loves to sleep much more, than their physical condition may require. They fall asleep readily, sometimes during the class lessons, and tends to oversleep in the mornings, being regularly late for school or work.
name: Sleepyhead

description: This character is a member of a musical collective which performs on a stage.
name: Band Member

aliases: Member of the School Musical Group
description: This character is a member of school musical collective, which arranges unprofessional performances at school events. School band members may or may not belong to the school music club.
name: School Band Member

description: This character is the leader of a professional music group.
name: Band Leader

description: This character is the leader of a school music band.
name: School Band Leader

description: The Japanese calligraphy (Shodo) is one of the most popular fine arts of Japan. Calligraphical works are appreciated not less than products of painting. But this kind of the fine arts possesses also philosophical sense. In the simplest understanding the calligraphy is an art to write beautifully.
name: Calligraphy

description:
A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prisoner]prisoner[/URL], also known as an inmate or detainee, is a person who is deprived of liberty against their will. 

This can be by confinement, captivity, or by forcible restraint. 

The term applies particularly to those on trial or serving a prison sentence in a prison.
name: Prisoner

description:
This character is subject to urethral sounding.

Urethral play can involve the introduction of either soft or rigid items into the meatus of the penis (as well as farther in). This action in the male may be directly or indirectly associated with stimulation of the prostate gland and some types of bladder control.
name: Urethral Sounding

description: This character's sclera (the white of the eye) is a color that is not found on humans normally.
name: Unnatural Sclera

description: This character is fluent in more than one language.
name: Multilingual

description: This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Virginity]virgin[/url] at the time she is married.
name: Virgin Bride

description: This character sets fire to a property.
name: Arson

description: This character's power or powers include setting things on fire with their mind.
name: Pyrokinetic

description: A pleated skirt is a skirt with folds/pleats in them. Common in most school uniforms.
name: Pleated Skirt

description: A pinafore is a sleeveless dress intended to be worn over a top or blouse. Unlike an apron, it is a full sleeveless dress with two holes cut out for arms, and unlike other sleeveless dresses should be worn over a blouse or an underdress.
name: Pinafore Dress

description: This character wears a shirt or a dress with puffy sleeves.
name: Puffy Sleeves

description: This character wears a very thin, almost string-like ribbon tie.
name: String Ribbon Tie

description: This person have voluntary sexual relationships with other people, without being emotionally involved. Typically two good friends who have casual sex without a monogamous relationship or any kind of commitment. Or a random people from some Internet club having fun more than once. At the same time, both sex friends may be married to other people and, in fact, engage in sexual infidelity (with their spouse aware of it or not). Still, don't confuse them with lovers, who are involved romantically as well.
name: Sex Friend

description:
This character has no eyes. They may have lost them, or their species may naturally have no eyes.

If a character is simply blind, use the [url=http://vndb.org/i439]Blindness[/url] trait instead. Note that having no eyes does not imply blindness (and vice versa). For example, the character can be an alien who sees through psychic methods.

If a character's eyes are just not drawn (possibly due to being covered by bangs or as part of the art style (common for protagonists)), and it's never stated or implied that the character has no eyes, use [url=/i116]Hidden[/url] instead.
name: No Eyes

description: Hispanics and Latinos are an ethnolinguistic group of Americans with genealogical origins in the countries of Latin America and Spain. More generally it includes all persons in the United States who self-identify as Hispanic or Latino. Hispanic and Latinos are racially diverse, although predominately White or Mestizo. As a result of their racial diversity, Hispanics form an ethnicity sharing a language (Spanish) and cultural heritage, rather than a race.
name: Hispanic

description:
This charater carries a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kukri]kukri[/url].

The kukri or khukuri (Nepali: खुकुरी) is a Nepalese knife with an inwardly curved edge, similar to a machete, used as both a tool and as a weapon in Nepal and neighbouring countries of South Asia.
name: Kukri

description: Attempted murder is the intent to murder, meaning that the perpetrator either tried to murder and failed (example: attempted to shoot the victim and missed or stabbing with a knife and failing to kill) or planning to commit a murder (example: purchasing a gun or other deadly weapon with intent to use it on someone and writing about their intent to kill).
name: Attempted Murder

description: This person sometimes lose connection with real world in order to devote their-self to idle dreams and illusions. At the same time, they cease to notice everything that is happening around. Their companions have to scream or use a brute force to make them come down to earth.
name: Daydreamer

description: A nightgown, nightie or nightdress is a loosely hanging item of nightwear, today almost exclusively worn by women. A nightgown is made from cotton, silk, satin, or nylon and may be decorated with lace appliqués or embroidery at the bust and hem.
name: Nightgown

description: This character is a father-con - a person who is overly attached to their father and would do anything for him. Can serve both as a comedic factor and/or romantic.
name: Father Complex

description:
This character is a member of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baseball]baseball[/url]  or [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Softball]softball[/url] club associated with a school.

Baseball is a bat-and-ball game played between two teams of nine players each who take turns batting and fielding. Softball is a variant of baseball played with a larger ball on a smaller field, with relaxed rules, what made it popular among amateurs and females.
name: School Baseball Club Member

description:
This person occasionally or regularly participates in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Street_racing]street races[/url].

Street racing is an unsanctioned and illegal form of motor racing that occurs on a public road.
name: Street Racing

description:
This character is drugged by one or several characters. He/she usually, but not always, has no knowledge of the act and those responsible.

It's not limited to just narcotic or aphrodisiac, but rather indicates any substance, chemical, pill, drug, potion, etc. with effect ranging from heightening/lowering sexual desire to affecting or interfering with the brain/body functions.

This tag is not for medication or prescribed medicine.
name: Being Drugged

description:
This character uses drug, potion, pill, etc. on other(s) to achieve his/her goal, not necessarily related to sexual desire. The receiver usually, but not always, has no knowledge of the act.

This tag isn't for giving medication or prescribed drug to other(s).
name: Drugging

description: This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cupid]cupid[/url], god of love. The character may have the iconic bow and arrow to create love between people.
name: Cupid

description:
This character wears a [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flight_attendant#Uniforms_and_presentation]flight attendant's uniform[/URL] at some stage. It doesn't matter whether the character is actually a flight attendant or not.

[URL=https://s.vndb.org/sf/81/79381.jpg]Example #1[/URL]
[URL=https://s.vndb.org/sf/82/79382.jpg]Example #2[/URL]
name: Flight Attendant Uniform

description:
This character is a [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flight_attendant]flight attendant[/URL].

Flight attendants are members of an aircrew employed by airlines primarily to ensure the safety and comfort of passengers aboard commercial flights, on select business jet aircraft, and on some military aircraft.
name: Flight Attendant

description:
[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kanzashi]Kanzashi[/URL] are hair ornaments used in traditional Japanese hairstyles. They can act as a pinning device for hairstyles and/or be purely ornamental. Designs vary in complexity, and often have a floral motif.

[URL=https://s.vndb.org/sf/86/79386.jpg]Simple kanzashi example.[/URL]
[URL=https://s.vndb.org/sf/87/79387.jpg]Elaborate kanzashi example.[/URL]
name: Kanzashi

description:
The character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/News_presenter]news presenter[/url].

A news presenter is a person who presents news during a news program on television, on the radio or on the Internet.
name: News Presenter

description: This character becomes the subject of the (sudden/mysterious) disappearance. Temporarily or permanently. According to their will or not. It may also be the complete disappearance of a character out of this world, which cannot be equated to common physical death. For example, the repose of the soul that existed in this world as a ghost, or the disappearance of the physical and mental component of the human, as if he/she never existed, due to interference of someone's special powers.
name: Disappearance

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Research]researcher[/url].

A researcher is someone who conducts research, i.e., an organized and systematic investigation into something.
name: Researcher

description: The character often has nightmares, more than the ordinary person. It might be a single recurring nightmare or a different one each time.
name: Nightmares

description:
This character is the student government vice president.

The vice president of the student government is the second highest ranking officer of a student government or student union association on the high school, college, or university level. The vice president is the right-hand person of the president of the student government, and is usually the second-in-command within the student government.

Should the president be unable to fulfill the role of his/her position due to absence, having resign, or some other reasons, the vice president will be the one to succeed the position, whether temporarily or permanently depending on the nature of the situation. Depending on the school, this decision can also be influenced by the votes of the other members of the student government and/or the student body.

The vice president also have a high authority in the student government, surpassed only by the president. The vice president is also often in charge of making important decisions in the student government and can also act as the representative of the president as the right-hand person of the highest ranking officer of the student government.
name: Student Council Vice President

description: A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Biker]biker[/url] is a person who rides a bicycle, motorcycle, or motorbike, especially in competition or as a hobby.
name: Biker

description: A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Motorcycle]motorcycle[/url] is a two-wheeled vehicle that is powered by a motor and has no pedals.
name: Motorcycle

description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sleepwalking]Sleepwalking[/url], as defined, is the carrying out of various actions while asleep. Example of activities include: sitting up in bed, going to the bathroom, cleaning, cooking, driving, grabbing at objects that are not there, etc. Also sleepwalkers will have little or no memory of the incident. 

The eyes of the sleepwalker can be open as well as long as it is clear they are asleep.
name: Sleepwalking

description:
The act of escaping prison, jail, solitary confinement (or any form of confinement for that matter), or escaping in general. This trait can also be applied to escaping in any form as long as the person is either imprisoned (Example: jail) or confined in a way that it is imprisonment (Example: tied up and locked in a basement)

Successfully or unsuccessfully doesn't matter as long as an attempt to escape was made.
name: Escape From Confinement

description:
The character goes through a temporary loss consciousness for a short time where they are for the most part unresponsive. This loss of consciousness can be from anything such as, for example, low blood count, being unable to handle blood, being embarrassed, exhaustion, and a medical condition.

Only use this trait for if the person passes out for a SHORT period of time. If it is longer than 6 hours it is a Coma.
name: Fainting

description:
This character uses "atakushi", one of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronouns for "I"[/url], to address themselves.

An informal variation of watakushi. In fiction, generally used by upper-class ladies.
name: Atakushi

description:
This character is the concubine of another character.

Concubinage is an interpersonal relationship in which a person (usually a woman) engages in an ongoing sexual relationship with another person (usually a man) to whom they are not or cannot be married.
name: Concubine

description: A closet pervert is someone who, on the surface, seems normal or mainstream, but in reality is morally or sexually perverse. A closet pervert is somebody that hides their perversion, for personal reasons and/or fear of discovery. Including the changes that will happen if others are to learn of their perversion.
name: Closet Pervert

description:
This character is an idealist, someone who is absorbed with living life the way they perceive it should be. They purposely overlook the darkness of human nature in favor of seeing everyone in an unrealistically good light. To an idealist, there are no such things as bad people. There are only bad situations people are in that force them to act a certain way. Finally, an idealist is someone who expects the best from people, not realizing that not everyone is willing to give up their time or money as willing as they are.

The opposite of a cynic, an idealist often has the nature of selflessness and believes in things like honor, justice, honesty, etc.
name: Idealist

description: A revolutionary is a person who either actively participates in, or advocates revolution. To be such the person must advocate the overthrow of a government or the complete change of a society or take an active part in either one of the two. Terrorists can also be revolutionaries depending on their goals.
name: Revolutionary

description:
This character is a non-adult living without his/her parents at home.
This can be because they are dead, on a trip, the character has run from home or simply, his/her parents are never mentioned in the game.
name: Living Alone

description: A character with this trait engages in non-blood-related [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Incest]incestuous[/URL] relations.
name: Non-blood-related Incest

description:
This character has sex in the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sex_position#Threesomes]spit-roast[/url] position. Apply this trait to the partners on the "ends", and apply [url=/i1703]i1703[/url] to the partner in the middle.

For this position, one partner (typically female) performs oral sex on another partner (typically male) while being penetrated in the doggy position by a third partner (typically male).

Do not confuse this with the [url=/i1133]reverse spitroast[/url] position. For the spitroast, the partner in the middle is penetrated, while for the reverse spitroast, the partner in the middle is penetrating one of the other partners.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/26/85126.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/11/43911.jpg]Example 2[/url] - Gender-inverted example.
name: Spit-roast

description: This character mourns someone and is struck by grief.
name: Grief

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eccentricity_(behavior)]eccentric[/url].

Eccentricity (also called quirkiness) refers to unusual or odd behavior on the part of an individual. This behavior would typically be perceived as unusual or unnecessary, without being demonstrably maladaptive.
Eccentricity is often associated with genius, intellectual giftedness, or creativity. People may perceive the individual's eccentric behavior as the outward expression of their unique intelligence or creative impulse.
name: Eccentric

description: This character is a mother-con - a person who is overly attached to their mother and would do anything for her. Can serve both as a comedic factor and/or romantic.
name: Mother Complex

description: An ambitious person is defined as a person with an earnest desire for some type of achievement or distinction, such as power, honor, fame, or wealth, and the willingness to strive for its attainment.
name: Ambitious

description: Pool is the family of cue sports and games played on a pool table having six receptacles called pockets along the rails, into which balls are deposited as the main goal of play. Typically is played at bars. Equipment needed: pool cue, billiard balls, and a pool table.
name: Pool

description:
A character with this trait wears or has worn a tailcoat.

A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tailcoat]tailcoat[/URL] is a coat with the front of the skirt cut away, so as to leave only the rear section of the skirt, known as the tails.
name: Tailcoat

description:
A character with this trait wears or has worn cufflinks.

[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cufflink]Cufflinks[/URL] are used to secure French button cuffs and are also an item of jewellery for men. Cufflinks can be manufactured from a variety of different materials, such as glass, stone, leather, metal, precious metal or combinations of these. Securing of the cufflinks is usually achieved via toggles or reverses based on the design of the front section, which can be folded into position.
name: Cufflink

description:
The blunt person is the realest person you will ever meet, they don't sugarcoat anything and say what the mean: they often come of as rude and even insensitive at times, but they don't have any bad intentions. They aren't afraid of confrontations and will say what they honestly think without beating around the bush. A blunt person can say the truth when others can't or won't point it out.

Not to be confused with sharp-tongued. A sharp-tongued person is simply sarcastic & is often comments to tease or annoy someone using the oppositions weak point. A blunt person however is simply brutally honest & very frank about what they think. Most, if not all of the time, their comments are simply the truth. Though they way they convey it is another matter entirely.

Different from the normal honest person who's honest in a helpful way and try not to offend the opposition while being honest, a blunt person just say the truth and what they honestly feel or think flat out. Honest has a positive connotation, while blunt has a more negative connotation.
name: Blunt

description: The person is the president of a sports club at school.
name: School Sports Club President

description: This character has their [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Penis_removal]penis removed[/url], voluntarily or not.
name: Penis Removal

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bindi_(decoration)/]bindi[/url].

A bindi is a forehead decoration worn in South Asia and Southeast Asia.

Traditionally it is a bright dot of red colour applied in the centre of the forehead close to the eyebrows, but it can also consist of other colours with a sign or piece of jewellery worn at this location.

Note: This trait is for the latter usage. If the bindi appears as a painted mark on the forehead, then use the [url=http://vndb.org/i1514]Bindi (Mark)[/url] trait instead.
name: Bindi (Jewelry)

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bindi_(decoration)]bindi[/url].

A bindi is a forehead decoration worn in South Asia and Southeast Asia.

Traditionally it is a bright dot of red colour applied in the centre of the forehead close to the eyebrows, but it can also consist of other colours with a sign or piece of jewellery worn at this location.

Note: This trait is for the former usage. If the bindi appears as a form of jewelry, please use the [url=http://vndb.org/i1513]Bindi (Jewelry)[/url] trait instead.
name: Bindi (Mark)

description: An [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Assault_rifle]assault rifle[/url] is a selective fire rifle that uses an intermediate cartridge and a detachable magazine.
name: Assault Rifle

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Magatama]magatama[/url] jewellery, keychain etc.

Magatama (勾玉), less frequently (曲玉), are curved, comma-shaped beads that appeared in prehistoric Japan from the Final Jōmon period through the Kofun period.

The beads, also described as jewels, were made of primitive stone and earthen materials in the early period, but by the end of the Kofun period were made almost exclusively of jade. 

Magatama originally served as decorative jewelry, but by the end of the Kofun period functioned as ceremonial and religious objects.
name: Magatama

description:
This character is a psychometrist.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Psychometry_(paranormal)]Psychometry[/url],  also known as token-object reading, or psychoscopy, is a form of extra-sensory perception characterized by the claimed ability to make relevant associations from an object of unknown history by making physical contact with that object. Supporters assert that an object may have an energy field that transfers knowledge regarding that object's history.
name: Psychometrist

description:
This character suffers from [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Obsessive–compulsive_disorder]OCD[/url].

Obsessive–compulsive disorder (OCD) is an anxiety disorder characterized by intrusive thoughts that produce uneasiness, apprehension, fear or worry (obsessions), repetitive behaviors aimed at reducing the associated anxiety (compulsions), or a combination of such obsessions and compulsions. Symptoms of the disorder include excessive washing or cleaning, repeated checking, extreme hoarding, preoccupation with sexual, violent or religious thoughts, relationship-related obsessions, aversion to particular numbers and nervous rituals such as opening and closing a door a certain number of times before entering or leaving a room.
name: Obsessive–Compulsive Disorder

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Androgyny]androgynous[/url].

An androgynous person is a female or male who has a high degree of both feminine and masculine traits.
name: Androgynous

description: A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Halberd]halberd[/url] is a two-handed pole weapon that came to prominent use during the 14th and 15th centuries. The halberd consists of an axe blade topped with a spike mounted on a long shaft.
name: Halberd

description: The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ji_%28halberd%29]ji[/url] (Chinese: 戟), or Chinese halberd, was an ancient pole arm used as a military weapon in one form or another from at least as early as the Shang dynasty until the end of the Qing dynasty. They are still used for training purposes by many Chinese martial arts.
name: Ji

description: A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bicycle]bicycle[/url], often called a bike or cycle, is a human-powered, pedal-driven, single-track vehicle, having two wheels attached to a frame, one behind the other.
name: Bicycle

description: The person is almost murdered by another human (or humans) during the story. i.e. The person is almost strangled to death but is released before death or the person is shot (in the head for example) but manages to survive. The important thing is that they were nearly killed but managed to survive and the person who nearly killed he/she was intending on killing them.
name: Attempted Homicide

description: This character exhibits significant amounts of cruelty, which refers to actions that cause others to suffer. Their feelings should be malicious, indifferent, or otherwise lack remorse for the actions they commit while aware of their consequences.
name: Cruel

description:
This character is penetrated or teased with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Double_penetration_dildo]double-ended dildo[/url].

This is a sex toy that allows for the simultaneous penetration of two people's orifices at the same time. It resembles two dildos on opposite ends of the same shaft.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/99/83499.jpg]Example[/url]
name: Double-ended Dildo

description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Facesitting]facesitting[/url] in a sex scene. Apply [url=/i1652]i1652[/url] to the character being sat on.

Facesitting is a sexual practice in which one partner sits on or over the other's face, typically to allow or force oral-genital or oral-anal contact. Facesitting is common among dominant and submissive individuals, for demonstrating superiority and for sexual gratification.
name: Facesitting

description: The person is willing to obey orders and do anything anyone tells them. Can be out of loyalty, fear or some other reason. The main point is they will do anything you say. Does not apply to robots.
name: Obedient

description:
This character is seen with (an ersatz of) [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pocky]Pocky[/url].

Pocky (ポッキー Pokkī) is a Japanese snack food produced by Ezaki Glico. Pocky was first sold in 1966, and consists of chocolate-coated biscuit sticks. It was named after the Japanese onomatopoetic word pokkin (ポッキン).

The original was followed by almond coatings in 1971, and strawberry coatings in 1977. Today, the product line includes variations as milk, mousse, green tea, honey, banana, cookies and cream, and coconut flavored coatings, and themed products such as "Decorer Pocky", with colorful decorative stripes in the coating, and "Men's Pocky", a dark (bittersweet) chocolate and "mature" version.
name: Pocky

description:
This character is involved in sexual activities while they are blindfolded.

Use of a blindfold is said to enhance the remaining senses of the wearer, focusing attention on sound, smells and physical contact. This increased awareness is said to allow for greater excitement and anticipation by eliminating visual cues.
name: Sexual Blindfold

description: A kind of throwing knife commonly associated with the ninja.
name: Kunai

description: This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lieutenant]Lieutenant[/url].
name: Lieutenant

description: This character's military rank is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Corporal]Corporal[/url].
name: Corporal

description: The character has pronounced shadows/dark lines under or around their eyes, usually to show that the character regularly gets little sleep.
name: Shadowed

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Workaholic]workaholic[/url].

A workaholic is a person who is addicted to work. While the term generally implies that the person enjoys their work, it can also imply that they simply feel compelled to do it. There is no generally accepted medical definition of such a condition, although some forms of stress, impulse control disorder, obsessive-compulsive personality disorder and obsessive-compulsive disorder can be work-related.

Workaholism in Japan is considered a serious social problem leading to early death, often on the job, a phenomenon dubbed karōshi.
name: Workaholic

description: The person engages in sign language which is a form of non-verbal communication with your hands using a dedicated sign language.
name: Sign Language

description:
This character plays [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Netball]netball[/url].

Netball is a ball sport played by two teams of seven players. Its development, derived from early versions of basketball, began in England in the 1890s.

Games are played on a rectangular court with raised goal rings at each end. Each team attempts to score goals by passing a ball down the court and shooting it through its goal ring. Players are assigned specific positions, which define their roles within the team and restrict their movement to certain areas of the court. During general play, a player with the ball can hold onto it for only three seconds before shooting for a goal or passing to another player. The winning team is the one that scores the most goals. Netball games are 60 minutes long. Variations have been developed to increase the game's pace and appeal to a wider audience.
name: Netball

description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Legitimacy_(law)]illegitimate child[/url].

Illegitimacy (or bastardy) is the status of a child born outside marriage.
name: Illegitimate Child

description:
This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coming_out]comes out of the closet[/url].

Coming out of the closet, or simply coming out, is a figure of speech for lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender and asexual (LGBT) people's self-disclosure of their sexual orientation (or lack of) and/or gender identity.
name: Coming Out

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Photographer]professional photographer[/url].

A professional photographer uses photography to make a living, while amateur photographers take photographs for pleasure and to record an event, place or person.
name: Professional Photographer

description: The person has padding in their bra in order to make their breasts seem bigger. The reason for it can vary but it can be to hide the fact the person has little to no breasts or the person is trying to disguise themselves as a woman.
name: Breast-Pads

description:
This character wears a tiara, a diadem or a circlet.

Tiaras and diadems are head ornaments worn by ancient men and women to denote high status.

A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tiara]tiara[/url] is a jeweled, ornamental crown traditionally worn by women.
A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diadem]diadem[/url] is a type of crown, specifically an ornamental headband worn by monarchs and others as a badge of royalty.
A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Circlet]circlet[/url] is a crown with neither arches nor a cap (internal covering).
name: Tiara

description:
Long, elegant gloves that don't cover the users fingers.

Example: https://s.vndb.org/sf/19/79419.jpg
name: Fingerless Evening Gloves

description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spaulders]Spaulders[/url] are pieces of armour in a harness of plate armour. Typically, they are a single plate of steel or iron covering the shoulder with bands (lames) joined by straps of leather or rivets.
name: Spaulders

description:
This character sucks another character's nipples in a sex scene. Apply [url=/i1630]i1630[/url] to the other character.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/02/119102.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turban]turban[/url].

A turban is a kind of headwear based on cloth winding. Featuring many variations, it is worn as customary headwear, usually by men.
name: Turban

description: This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sandal]sandals[/url] with high heels.
name: High Heeled Sandals

description: A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bathrobe]bathrobe[/url] is usually made from towelling or other absorbent textile, and may be donned while the wearer's body is wet, serving both as a towel and an informal garment.
name: Bathrobe

description:
This character ends wearing torn pantyhose because they get damaged during a fight, a sexual scene or anything that is not made on purpose.

In case of torn or ripped pantyhose by design, having usually multiple cuts/rips on the legs made on puropose or fabricated like that for fashion reasons just use: [url=https://vndb.org/i3086]Torn Pantyhose (by design)[/url].
In case of crotchless pantyhose just use: [url=https://vndb.org/i2061]Crotchless Pantyhose[/url].

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/67/129567.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]

The pubic hair near this character's genitals is shaved during the story.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/27/56927.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Pubic Hair Shaving

description:
This character is a [url=http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=Hanyou]hanyou[/url].

Hanyous are mythological creatures with one youkai parent and one human parent.
name: Han'you

description:
A character with this trait wears or has worn a fanny pack.

A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fanny_pack]fanny pack[/URL] is a small fabric pouch usually secured with a zipper and worn by use of a strap around the hips or waist.
name: Fanny Pack

description:
A character with this trait is sensitive.

A [URL=http://www.oxforddictionaries.com/definition/english/sensitive]sensitive[/URL] person is one who has or displays a quick and delicate appreciation of others' feelings. They tend to be easily hurt, offended or upset.
name: Sensitive

description: [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/17/79417.jpg]Christmas cap[/url] is a pointed cap, usually red and white fabric, worn by Santa Claus.
name: Christmas Cap

description: This character is a novelist. Novelists are people who write fiction in a prose format.
name: Novelist

description:
This character is considered to be [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Promiscuity]promiscuous[/url]. They engage in sexual activity frequently and indiscriminately with different partners.

Promiscuous characters sleep around not for money like a prostitute, but for their own satisfaction.

A term frequently applied to an individual who is considered to have loose sexual morals or who is sexually promiscuous is a slut.

The term is generally pejorative and most often used as an insult, sexual slur or offensive term of disparagement (slut shaming). However, in recent times, there have been attempts to "reclaim" the word, while some individuals embrace the title as a source of pride.
name: Promiscuous

description: The character has a unusually pale skin-tone or albinism.
name: Albino

description: This character wears a [url=http://amtwiki.net/amtwiki/index.php/Haori]haori[/url] (Japanese formal coat).
name: Haori

description:
This character is a [url=http://www.oxforddictionaries.com/definition/english/genie]genie[/url].

Genie is a spirit of Arabian folklore, as depicted traditionally imprisoned within a bottle or oil lamp, and capable of granting wishes when summoned.
name: Genie

description:
A character with this trait has Sanpaku eyes.

[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sanpaku]Sanpaku eyes[/URL] refers to eyes in which the white space above or below the iris is visible. 

In Japanese media, this is far more common in male characters than in females. Sanpaku-gan produces a more “piercing and sharp” look that lacks cuteness, so Japanese fiction tends to apply it to aggressive, delinquent, mean and/or rude characters.

Examples: [URL=https://vndb.org/c9786]1[/URL], [URL=https://s.vndb.org/sf/47/79347.jpg]2[/URL], [URL=https://s.vndb.org/sf/48/79348.jpg]3[/URL], [URL=https://s.vndb.org/sf/49/79349.jpg]4[/URL].
name: Sanpaku Eyes

description:
This character is a [url=http://yokai.wikia.com/wiki/Tsukumogami]tsukumogami[/url].

Tsukumogami is a term used to categorize a type of yôkai. The most accepted definition of the term says that tsukumogami are inanimate objects that once they have served their owner/s for 100 years, they receive a soul and therefore become alive and self-aware.

Tsukumogami can range from weapons to clothes to umbrellas. The umbrella version ([url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kasa-obake]karakasa[/url]) is typically depicted with one eye, a mouth, two arms and one leg. Another popular one is [url=http://yokai.wikia.com/wiki/Ittan_Momen]Ittan-momen[/url], a floating strip of cotton cloth with eyes and arms.
name: Tsukumogami

description:
A character with this trait wears or has worn a choker.

A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Choker]choker[/URL] is a close-fitting band encircling the neck. Chokers can be made of a variety of materials, including velvet, plastic, beads, metal such as silver, gold or platinum, leather, etc. They can be adorned in a variety of ways, including with sequins, studs, or a pendant. 

This also includes collar-style chokers (typically leather bands with buckles) which are worn as fashion accessories and [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Detachable_collar]detachable shirt collars[/URL].

[URL=https://s2.vndb.org/ch/49/28549.jpg]Example 1[/URL]
[URL=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/72/137172.jpg]Example 2[/URL]
[URL=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/71/137171.jpg]Example 3[/URL]
[URL=https://s2.vndb.org/ch/50/52250.jpg]Example 4 (Detachable Shirt Collar)[/URL]
name: Choker

description:
A character with this trait is a misanthrope.

[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Misanthropy]Misanthropy[/URL] is the general hatred, distrust or disdain of the human species or human nature. A misanthrope, or misanthropist is someone who holds such views or feelings.
name: Misanthrope

description:
A character with this trait sports a bowl cut hairstyle.

A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bowl_cut]bowl cut[/URL] is a simple and plain short haircut where the hair is cut with a straight fringe on the front and the rest of the hair is the same length all the way around or is cut short on the sides and back. It is so named because it looks as though someone put a bowl on the head and cut off or trimmed short all the visible hair.
name: Bowl Cut

description:
A character with this trait possesses a Shimada hairstyle.

The [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shimada_%28hairstyle%29]Shimada[/URL] is a women's hairstyle in Japan, similar to a [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chignon_%28hairstyle%29]chignon[/URL]. Its modern usage is mainly limited to geisha (wearing it as a wig), but during the Edo period it was also worn by ordinary women, and especially by girls in their late teens. Generally the hair is gathered together at the crown of the head and a small portion of the bun is sectioned off to point outward.
name: Shimada

description:
Hair that is combed back, away from the forehead, then held in place with a hairstyling product. 

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/44/79344.jpg]Example 1[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/ch/71/58071.jpg]Example 2[/url]

Don't use the trait for the characters that wear their hair in a ponytail. In that case, use i18 instead.
Note, that in some rare instances, it IS possible for a character to have both Slicked Back hair and a ponytail. Case in point: c11286.
name: Slicked Back

description:
This character wears ankle boots.

An ankle boot is a type of footwear that only covers the foot and the ankle and does not extend up to the leg. They have high heel variants.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/20/79420.jpg]Example[/url]
name: Ankle Boots

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Psychiatrist]psychiatrist[/url].

A psychiatrist is a physician who specializes in psychiatry. A psychiatrist specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of mental disorders.
name: Psychiatrist

description:
This character performs a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Striptease]striptease[/url].

A striptease is an erotic or exotic dance in which the performer gradually undresses, either partly or completely, in a seductive and sexually suggestive manner.
name: Striptease

description: This character has a significantly larger than [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Human_penis_size]average[/url] penis. This is either obvious in the art (e.g. v13053) or discussed by characters in the game.
name: Large Penis

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sweatpants]sweatpants[/url]. 

Sweatpants are a casual variety of soft trousers intended for comfort or athletic purposes, although they are now worn in many different situations. Because of their comfort and fashionable varieties, they have become one of the most commonly worn items of clothing.
name: Sweatpants

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jersey_%28clothing%29]sports jersey[/url].

A sports jersey is a shirt made of soft material, worn by a member of a sports team. The sports jersey usually displays the athlete's name and team number as well as the logotype of the team or corporate sponsor.
name: Sports Jersey

description:
A character with this trait is a clown, be it a professional or an amateur one.

A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clown]clown[/URL] is a comic performer who employs slapstick or similar types of physical humour, often in a mime style. Clowns have a varied tradition with significant variations in costume and performance. The most recognisable clowns are those that commonly wear outlandish costumes featuring distinctive makeup, colourful wigs, exaggerated footwear, and colourful clothing. Their entertainment style is generally designed to entertain large audiences, especially at a distance.
name: Clown

description: The person is responsible for the murder of a royalty.
name: Regicide

description: This character engages in dancing at some point of the story.
name: Dancing

description:
This character wears a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sundress]sundress[/url].

A sundress is a dress intended to be worn in warm weather. Typically, it is an informal or casual dress in a lightweight fabric, most commonly cotton, and usually loose fitting. The dress is intended to be worn without a layering top. Sundresses can be of any neckline and hemline, including modest styles and a variety of patterns.
name: Sundress

description:
This character is wearing a school backpack intended for transporting educational materials to and from school.

Typical school backpacks generally lack the rigid frame of an outdoor-style backpack and include only a few pockets in addition to the main storage compartment. While traditionally very simple in design, school backpacks are often made with padded shoulder straps and backs as well as additional reinforcement to hold large numbers of heavy textbooks, as well as safety features such as reflective panels to make the wearer of the pack more visible at night.
name: School Backpack

description: Any kind of small electronic device.
name: Electric Appliances

description: Simple household or worktools that has little to no moving mechanical part.
name: Simple Tools

description:
The character is seen with or using a drill.

Note: If the drill is weaponised and not a working tool, then use [url=https://vndb.org/i1217]Drill [Weapon][/url] instead.
name: Drill [Tool]

description: Any item for purpose of facilitating or aiding transportation.
name: Locomotion

description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Food]Food[/url] is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.
name: Food

description: Any sport related items belong here.
name: Sports Equipment

description: Any items with a primary purpose of containing any other items or substances belong here.
name: Containers

description: Any items that are used in modern medicine belong here.
name: Medical Tools

description: Items that do not fit under any other categories.
name: Miscellaneous Items

description:
This character uses their fingers to stimulate another character's [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vagina]vagina[/url] or [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vulva]vulva[/url]. Apply [url=/i1645]i1645[/url] to the receiving character.

[url=/i784]Handjob[/url] may be considered the equivalent trait for a male receiver.

name: Anal Fingering

description:
This character wants to have a baby (either by bearing it or impregnating another character) and will do anything for it. The idea of having children means everything for this character and they are basically obsessed by this.

In extreme cases this character is even capable to rape someone just to have children.

The trait applies both to male and female characters that display such inclinations.
name: Baby Complex

description: This character speaks with a stutter. [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stuttering]Stuttering[/url], also known as stammering, is a speech disorder in which the flow of speech is disrupted by involuntary repetitions and prolongations of sounds, syllables, words or phrases as well as involuntary silent pauses or blocks in which the person who stutters is unable to produce sounds.
name: Stutter

description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Australians]Australian[/url].

Australians are defined as people native to or residents in Australia.
name: Australian

description: A character that primarily used as a victim of physical or mental abuse for laughs. Usually the victim only suffer the damage that will be unexplainably recovered by the next moment.
name: Butt Monkey

description:
This character is a long-lived being, or has lived a long life.

This might be caused by their own nature, or achieved through various means, such as magic. As a standard, the character should or can live longer than an average human age.

Different from Immortal, this character still has a finite lifespan, thus they may die because of old age at some point.
name: Longevity

description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swinging_(sexual_practice)]Swinging[/url] or (rarely) partner swapping is a non-monogamous behavior, in which singles or partners in a committed relationship engage in sexual activities with others as a recreational or social activity.

Swinging can take place in a number of contexts, ranging from spontaneous sexual activity at informal gatherings of friends to planned regular social meetings to hooking up with like-minded people at a swingers' club. It can also involve Internet-based swinger social networking services online.

The older term wife-swapping, once considered to be equivalent to "swinging", is criticized today as being androcentric where it is presumed that the partners are a married heterosexual couple and that it is the male who is in control of the sexual activities and also that it does not accurately describe the full range of sexual activities in which both singles or couples may take part.

Note: Do not confuse swinging with [url=https://vndb.org/i772]Infidelity[/url].
name: Swinging

description:
The character with this trait [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marriage_proposal]proposes[/url] to someone in the story.

A marriage proposal is an event where one person in a relationship asks for the other's hand in marriage.
name: Marriage Proposal

description:
This character is younger than they appear to be.

For example a child that looks like a young adult.
name: Older Appearance

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sun_hat]sun hat[/url].

A sun hat is a broad-brimmed hat that protects the head and shoulders from direct exposure to the sun.
name: Sun Hat

description: The person goes through surgery for some reason. A botched operation counts too.
name: Surgery

description:
The character wears a [url=http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/Sarashi]sarashi[/url].

A sarashi is a long strip of cloth, usually thick cotton, wrapped tightly around the midriff up to the chest. Historically worn under kimono both by samurai (to resist injury) and by women (for more "obvious" reasons, particularly in eras when a slim figure was considered fashionable), its association with warriors has made it a near-universal symbol of toughness in Japan.
name: Sarashi

description:
This character works in an office, but not as an executive or in a managing position.

Salaryman refers to someone whose income is salary based; particularly those working for corporations.
name: Office Worker

description:
This character carries a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Laptop]laptop[/url].

A laptop is a portable personal computer with a clamshell form factor, suitable for mobile use.
name: Laptop

description:
This character tried to commit suicide, but was stopped by people around, changed their mind in the last moment or simply didn't manage to actually kill themselves, even though they've tried.

Suicide is the act of intentionally causing one's own death. Suicide is often committed out of despair, the cause of which can attributed to a mental disorder such as depression, bipolar disorder, schizophrenia, autism spectrum disorders, alcoholism, or drug abuse. Stress factors such as financial difficulties or troubles with interpersonal relationships often play a significant role.
name: Suicide Attempt

description:
This character shows childish violent behavior to others characters whenever he feels frustrated, not caring if they had anything to blame for.
These attacks can get extremely violent but since they are considered a part of the comedy they don't cause any permanent harm.
name: Childishly Violent

description: A merchant is a businessperson who trades in commodities produced by others, in order to earn a profit.
name: Merchant

description:
This character sometimes wear the uniform of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Waiting_staff]waiter or waitress[/url].

For men it most often consist of shirt, trousers, suit coat and bow tie.
For women it may consist of sleeveless dress (many variations), blouse with short puffy sleeves, apron and socks/stockings. Still, there are various designs, that might differ from traditional costumes.

Do not confuse it with [url=https://vndb.org/i433]Maid's Dress[/url], which has more strict design, but can be used as waitstaff uniform as well.
name: Waitstaff Uniform

description:
A character's belly is inflated during sexual play. This could be due to the excessive amounts of foreign material (liquids, gasses, monster eggs etc.) introduced to the body or the insertion of over-sized objects (a huge penis, a mass of tentacles or slimes, etc.) through any orifice. It can be consensual or forced.

Can be used together with [url=/i1850]Huge Insertion[/url] if it results in Stomach Deformation.
name: Inflated Belly

description: This character is responsible for the running of an inn, usually also the proprietor.
name: Inn Manager

description: The character poses as a nude model for advertisement or artistic purpose.

This characters wears a halter-neck type of swimsuit with deep triangle-like cut at front. This cut boldly exposes almost a half of the breasts, which makes a girl in this swimsuit pretty sexy.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/43/81443.jpg]Example[/url]
name: Deep V-Neck Swimsuit

description:
These are the traits related to [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Human_sexual_activity]sexual activities[/url].

These traits are intended to be used on a single character for a sexual act, instead of both characters involved. The aim is to clarify the confusion of which one is being the active and which one is being the passive partner in such acts.

"Subject of" sexual traits should be applied to the character whose genitals are being stimulated by their partner  for non-penetrative and oral sexual acts, and to the penetrated party for penetrative sexual acts.
name: Subject of (Sexual)

description: Frottage is the general term for the act of rubbing any part of the body, including the buttocks, the breasts, abdomen, thighs, feet, hands, legs and sexual organs against the sexual organ of another person, whether naked or clothed. Couples may engage in frottage as a form of foreplay or simply as a method to achieve sexual gratification without the penetrative aspects of vaginal, anal or oral sexual intercourse, which may be a way of preserving virginity or a way of practicing safe sex.

description:
Another character performs [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mammary_intercourse]mammary intercourse[/url] on this character. Apply [url=/i495]i495[/url] to the performing character.

Mammary intercourse is a sexual act in which a woman stimulates a man's penis by rubbing it between her breasts. Alternatively, or additionally, the man may take a more active role by thrusting his penis between her breasts. Mammary intercourse may be combined with fellatio.

Do not confuse this with an alternate meaning of "boob job", referring to augmentive surgery done on the breasts.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/97/119097.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/98/119098.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]

Another character is attempting to perform a [url=/i1627]Boobjob[/url] on this character, but their breasts are too small to do it properly. Apply [url=/i1253]i1253[/url] to the performing character.

Naizuri literally means "rubbing against nothing".

Note: It's possible that the character realises the futility of their attempt and and helps our with their hands for example by rubbing the penis between their chest and the palms of their hands. The trait still applies in such cases.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/96/119096.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Twin Boobjob

description:
This character has their nipples sucked in a sex scene. Apply [url=/i1551]i1551[/url] to the other character.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/02/119102.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Nipple Sucking

description:
This character participates in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Intercrural_sex]intercrural sex[/url]. Apply this trait to the character using their thighs or labia to stimulate their partner's penis. Apply [url=/i916]i916[/url] to their partner.

Intercrural sex is a type of non-penetrative sex, in which a male places his penis between his partner's thighs and thrusts to create friction.

A version of this is sumata, where a character rubs their penis against the partner's vagina without penetration.
name: Intercrural Sex

description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Footjob]footjob[/url] is performed on this character. Apply [url=/i606]Engages in (Sexual) > Footjob[/url] to the performing character.

A footjob is the act of rubbing one's feet on a partner to stimulate or excite them. In most cases, the performer uses their feet to rub a man's penis. Sometimes the recipient is a woman, and the performer uses their feet to rub the recipient's vulva.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/14/19414.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Footjob

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Handjob]handjob[/url] is performed on this character. Apply [url=/i784]i784[/url] to the performing character.

A handjob is the act of using one's hands to stimulate a male partner's penis. [url=/i1645]Vaginal Fingering[/url] may be considered the equivalent trait for a female receiver.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/00/119100.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/99/119099.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]

description:
These are the traits about [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oral_sex]oral sex[/url]. These traits are for the receiving partner(s). Traits for the performing partner(s) are under [url=/i99]i99[/url].

Oral sex may or may not be penetrative, and is the term given to genital stimulation by the mouth. People may engage in oral sex as part of foreplay before intercourse, or as, during or following intercourse. It may also be performed for its own sake, and can be performed simultaneously.
name: Oral Sex

description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anilingus]Anilingus[/url] is performed on this character. Apply [url=/i103]i103[/url] to the performing character.

Anilingus is a form of oral sex involving contact between the anus or perineum of one person and the mouth of another.
name: Anilingus

description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cunnilingus]Cunnilingus[/url] is performed on this character. Apply [url=/i101]Engages in (Sexual) > Cunnilingus[/url] to the performing character.

Cunnilingus is the act of using the mouth, lips and tongue to stimulate the female genitals. [url=/i1637]Subject of (Sexual) > Blowjob[/url] may be considered the equivalent trait for a male receiver.
name: Cunnilingus

description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fellatio]Fellatio[/url] is performed on this character. Apply [url=/i100]i100[/url] to the performing character.

Fellatio is the act of using the mouth, lips, and tongue to stimulate the penis. [url=/i1636]Cunnilingus[/url] may be considered the equivalent trait for a female receiver.
name: Blowjob

description:
A twin blowjob is performed on this character. Apply [url=/i594]i594[/url] to the performing characters.

A twin blowjob is a blowjob performed by two people at the same time on a single person.
name: Twin Blowjob

description:
This character is the recipient of a triple blowjob. Apply [url=/i1181]i1181[/url] to the performing characters.

A triple blowjob is a blowjob performed by three people at the same time on a single person.
name: Triple Blowjob

description: A group blowjob (by at least 4 characters) is performed on this character. Apply [url=/i1203]i1203[/url] to the performing characters.

description:

description:
[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samue]Samue[/URL] is the work clothing of Japanese Zen Buddhist monks, worn when engaged in samu. It is a two-piece set of matching robe-like shirt and pants. 

In modern times they have become popular as general casual or work wear.
name: Samue

description:
[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Z%C5%8Dri]Zouri[/URL] are flat and thonged Japanese sandals made of rice straw or other plant fibers, cloth, lacquered wood, leather, rubber, or synthetic materials. Zouri are quite similar to flip-flops.

The traditional forms of zouri are seen when worn with other traditional clothing; modern forms are fairly common, especially in summer. While [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geta_%28footwear%29]geta[/URL] are nowadays worn with the informal yukata, zouri are associated with the more formal kimono.
High-heeled version of zouri exists (http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-HRyasVz05j4/U19vPek8pQI/AAAAAAAAApA/83Ms_9aAUcI/s1600/images-.,.jpeg) and they are used in conjuction with furisode.
name: Zouri

description:
Over-the-knee socks are hosiery that covers the feet and legs up to above the knee, but lower than the thigh-high socks, that almost reach the hips.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/07/81807.jpg]Example[/url]
name: Over The Knee Socks

description: This character receives a blessing of some kind from either a supernatural entity (god, angel, demon) or a prestigous person (king, priest). Consequently the blessing might be either an actual supernatural boost to his abilities/luck or just a verbal declaration of support.
name: Blessing

description: This character gives his/her blessing to another person. Said blessing might be an actual power-up or just a verbal declaration of his/her support.
name: Blessing

description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flagellation]Flagellation[/url] (Latin flagellum, "whip"), flogging, whipping or lashing is the act of methodically beating the human body with special implements such as whips, lashes, rods, switches, the cat o' nine tails, the sjambok, etc. 

Typically, flogging is imposed on an unwilling subject as a punishment; however, it can also be submitted to willingly, or performed on oneself, in religious or sadomasochistic contexts.

Apply this trait on characters being whipped in a sexual context. Apply its [url=https://vndb.org/i2549]counterpart[/url] on the characters whipping them. If the whipping happens in a non-sexual context, consider simply applying [url=/i401]Subject of > Torture[/url] instead.
name: Whipping (BDSM)

description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Human_branding]Human branding[/url] or stigmatizing is the process in which a mark, usually a symbol or ornamental pattern, is burned into the skin of a living person, with the intention that the resulting scar makes it permanent. This is performed using a hot or very cold branding iron. 

It therefore uses the physical techniques of livestock branding on a human, either with consent as a form of body modification; or under coercion, as a punishment or to identify an enslaved or otherwise oppressed person. It may also be practiced as a "rite of passage", e.g. within a tribe, or to signify membership of or acceptance into an organization.
name: Human Branding

description:
This character is subjected to pillory. To pillory means lock to someone in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pillory]pillory[/url]. 

A pillory is a device made of a wooden or metal framework erected on a post, with holes for securing the head and hands, formerly used for punishment by public humiliation and often further physical abuse. The pillory is often related to the stocks.

[URL=https://e-hentai.org/s/561dd7f646/1123215-28]NSFW Example 1[/URL]
[URL=https://e-hentai.org/s/4fac3590ea/561663-159]NSFW Example 2[/URL]

name: Pillory (BDSM)

description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artificial_nails]Artificial nails[/url], also known as fake nails, false nails, fashion nails, nail enhancements, or nail extensions, are coverings placed over fingernails as fashion accessories. Some artificial nails attempt to mimic the appearance of real fingernails as closely as possible, while other designs may deliberately stray in appearance from real fingernails. 
Artificial nails are made from a wide variety of materials and they are not a replacement, but an extension for natural nails.
name: Artificial Nails

description: This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prosthesis]prosthesis[/url], an artificial device that replaces a missing body part, which may be lost through trauma, disease, or congenital conditions.

description:
This character wears an [url=http://www.collinsdictionary.com/dictionary/english/off-the-shoulder]off-the-shoulder shirt[/url].

An off-the-shoulder shirt is a type of shirt that does not cover the shoulders. Garment that uses this style of design are usually blouses or dresses. 

Not to be confused with [url=https://vndb.org/i986]strapless shirt[/url], which is a tank top without straps.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/91/138991.jpg]Example[/url]
name: Off-The-Shoulder Shirt

description: Character makes attempts at indirectly influencing someone else's behavior or actions. The controlling aspects or shrewdness linked to manipulation are sometimes very subtle and may be easily overlooked, buried under feelings of obligation, love, or habit.

description: A tactical suit is a complete line of clothing, footwear, and other safety gear designed for military, law enforcement and firefighting professionals.
name: Tactical Suit

description:
A futuristic suit is a complete line of clothing, footwear, and other safety gear designed for futuristic: military forces, law enforcement, firefighting professionals, mech pilots.
The term futuristic of "futuristic suit" means that the suit is so advanced in design, form, concept, as to seem suited for some future time and ultramodern or future technology. 

The concept of a futuristic suit is entirely based on fantasy but usually is a mixture of: futuristic tactical suit, futuristic space suit and futuristic armor.
The range of the protection on a futuristic suit can vary from a simple [url=http://www.raph.com/3dartists/artgallery/6811.jpg]jumpsuit look[/url], to a  [url=http://2-dpanda.deviantart.com/art/HNA-w-chassis-327897238]light armored suit[/url], ending in a  [url=https://dbystedt.files.wordpress.com/2010/08/mech-suit-three-quarter-view.jpg]heavy amored or mech suit[/url].
name: Futuristic Suit

description: This character has a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crew_cut]crew cut[/url]. A short cropped hairstyle.
name: Crew Cut

Group sex is sexual behavior involving more than two participants. Group sex can occur amongst people of all sexual orientations and genders.

The following traits are for the passive or receiving participant(s). Traits for the active or performing participant(s) are under [url=/i43]Engages in (Sexual)[/url] > [url=/i105]Group Sex[/url]. description:

In a sexual context, "butterfly" may refer to a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Missionary_position#Butterfly_position]specific position[/url] in which the receiving partner lies down, face up, while the penetrating partner stands or kneels on a lower surface. However, this trait (or one of its child traits) should be used for any position in which the receiving partner lies down, face up, while the penetrating partner kneels, squats or stands in front of them with their torso mostly upright. The receiving partner may have their hips raised up or rotated slightly. The penetrating partner may kneel or stand on a lower surface than the receiver so that they are not too high up.

If the penetrating partner is standing and the receiving partner's hips are raised far above their shoulders, consider using the [url=/i1696]piledriver[/url] trait instead.
