description:
This character has sex in the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sex_position#Threesomes]spit-roast[/url] position. Apply this trait to the partner in the middle, and apply [url=/i1499]Engages in (Sexual) > Spit-roast[/url] to the partners on the "ends".

For this position, one partner (typically female) performs oral sex on another partner (typically male) while being penetrated in the doggy position by a third partner (typically male).

Do not confuse this with the [url=/i1704]Subject of (Sexual) > Reverse Spitroast[/url] position. For the spitroast, the partner in the middle is penetrated, while for the reverse spitroast, the partner in the middle is penetrating one of the other partners.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/26/85126.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/11/43911.jpg]Example 2[/url] - Gender-inverted example.
name: Spit-roast

description:
This character has sex in the [url=http://danbooru.donmai.us/wiki_pages/16203]reverse spitroast[/url] position. Apply this trait to the partners on the "ends" and apply [url=/i1133]Engages in (Sexual) > Reverse Spitroast[/url] to the partner in the middle.

For this position, one partner (typically male) has sex with another partner (typically female) in the cowgirl position while performing oral sex on a third partner (typically female) who is sitting on their face. The two participants on top typically (but don't always) face each other.

Do not confuse this with the [url=/i1703]Subject of (Sexual) > Spit-roast[/url] position. For the spitroast, the partner in the middle is penetrated, while for the reverse spitroast, the partner in the middle is penetrating one of the other partners.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/21/85321.jpg]Example[/url]
name: Reverse Spitroast

description:
This is a sexual act involving one man and two women. The women rub their vulvas together with the man's penis between them. The man may also take a more active role by thrusting his penis between their vulvas or by penetrating either of the women (or both of them alternately).

Apply this trait to the character having their penis rubbed. Apply [url=/i1134]i1134[/url] to the characters rubbing their vulvas on this character's penis.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/73/85273.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/99/70699.jpg]Example 2[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/74/85274.jpg]Example 3[/url] - Different position.
name: Tribadism on Penis

description:
This character takes part in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anal_sex]anal sex[/url] during a sexual scene. Use this trait on the receiving partner and i568 on the penetrating partner.

Anal sex commonly refers to the sex act involving insertion of the penis into the anus of a sexual partner.

The term can also include other sexual acts involving the anus, including pegging, anal–oral sex, fingering, and object insertion.
name: Anal Sex

description:
A character with this trait uses one of the masculine [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronouns[/URL], "ore-sama". Ore-sama comes from the Japanese masculine pronoun for “I; me (俺 or オレ)” and the very respectful honorific suffix, “-sama (様)”.

Since this is the most arrogant masculine reference of oneself, characters who use "ore-sama" tend to be aggressively overconfident and pompous males. Characters who utilise "ore-sama" are also known to be boastful, forward, hasty and having a “my way or the highway” attitude.

"Ore-sama" is also sometimes used as a personality trait term to describe such characters.
name: Ore-sama

description:
This character wears a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_school_uniform]Sailor School Uniform[/url].

This kind of japanese school uniform is modeled in appearance similar to that of the European-style naval uniforms and was first used in Japan in the late 19th century, replacing the traditional kimono.

[url=https://vndb.org/c43918]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://vndb.org/c14970]Example 2[/url]
[url=https://vndb.org/c40157]Example 3[/url]
name: Sailor School Uniform

description:
This character wears a thigh band.

An thigh band is a piece of material worn around the thigh usually on a naked leg.
name: Thigh Band

description:
This character is a mistress of another character.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mistress_%28lover%29]mistress[/url] is a relatively long-term female lover and companion who is not married to her partner, especially when her partner is married. Generally, the relationship is stable and at least semi-permanent, but the couple does not live together openly and the relationship is usually, but not always, secret. There is often also the implication (if not the fact) that the mistress is "kept" – i.e. that her lover is paying for some (and sometimes all) of her living expenses. 

This role does not preclude a character from also being a i371, i1493 or a courtesan.
name: Mistress

description:
This character's nipples are visible through her clothing.

Use this trait for characters with sprites whose nipples are easily visible and drawn in. Do not use it for [url=https://vndb.org/g1446]Naked Sprites[/url].
name: Visible Nipples

description:
This character is a daughter of an upper class family.

The upper class is the social class composed of the wealthiest members of society, who also wield the greatest political power. The upper class is generally contained within the wealthiest 1-2% of the population, and is distinguished by immense wealth (in the form of estates) which is passed from generation to generation.

This trait is about the social status of the character and does not refer to her behavior*.

*Having grown up accustomed to wealth and privilege, they have a tendency to flaunt their family wealth and status. As they are used to being waited upon by servants, they are more likely than not to order others not of the same social status as them around, even unintentionally.
name: Ojousama

description: A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greave]greave[/url] is a piece of armour that protects the leg. Greaves usually consisted of a metal exterior with an inner padding of felt.
name: Greave

description:
The character is subjected to torture using needles, nails, or other pointy objects in a sexual context. Use [url=/i3560]Engages in > Piercing Torture[/url] for the one performing the torture.

In case this happens in a non-sexual context, consider simply using [url=/i401]Subject of > Torture[/url] instead. This trait should not be used for unintentional perforation.
name: Piercing Torture (BDSM)

description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asphyxia]Asphyxia[/url] or asphyxiation is a condition of severely deficient supply of oxygen to the body. In order to be considered torture asphyxia should not be caused by natural causes or by any incidental means.

Causes of forced oxygen deficiency considered torture usually are:
Strangling - using hands, rope, ecc... to suffocate someone for a period of time 
Drowning - forcing someone to keep head underwater for a period of time
Hanging - forcing someone to hang for a period of time
Gas intoxication - forcing someone to inhale gas for a period of time

Extended asphyxia can lead to death.
name: Asphyxia

description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ribbon_(rhythmic_gymnastics)]Ribbon[/url] is a component of rhythmic gymnastics composed of a handle (called "stick"), a ribbon, and attachment.
name: Rhythmic Gymnastic Ribbon

description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ballet_flat]Ballet flats or Dolly shoes[/url] are derived from a woman's soft ballet shoe, with a very thin heel or the appearance of no heel at all. 

The style sometimes features a ribbon-like binding around the low tops of the slipper and may have a slight gathering at the top-front of the vamp (toe box) and a tiny, decorative string tie. Ballet slippers can be adjusted and tightened to the wearer's foot by means of this string tie and done.
name: Ballerina Shoes

description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Microskirt]microskirt or micro-miniskirt[/url] is a very short skirt, being shorter than a miniskirt, being less than 8 inches (20 cm) in length. The microskirt is sometimes humorously referred to as a beltskirt and is described as more an evocation of the idea of a skirt than something that covers anything substantial.

At that length, if the wearer has bare legs, the microskirt exposes the thighs and the lower portion of the buttocks, as well as part of the undergarment(s), with even more being exposed if the wearer bends down. To avoid exposure of buttocks and undergarment(s), a microskirt may be worn with tights, leggings, shorts or bloomers. Stretch microskirts may be made using spandex material which may be worn in conjunction with hold-ups and a pair of stiletto heel pumps, and sometimes with G-string underwear.
name: Microskirt

description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mule_%28shoe%29]Mule[/url], a French word, is a style of shoe that is backless and closed-toed. Mules can be any heel height - from flat to high. It differs from sandals because they are backless without straps or thongs passing around the ankle or heel. 
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Slide_%28footwear%29]slide[/url] is a shoe that is backless and open-toed, essentially an open-toed mule.

The sexy version of slides and mules is usually open-toed, with heels. 

Example: [url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/79/177879.jpg]character wearing sexy mules[/url]
name: Mules

description:
This character has claws, or long and sharp nails.
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Claw]claw[/url] is a curved, pointed appendage, found at the end of a toe or finger.
name: Claw

description:
This character wears a [url=http://www.sorayabyrozi.com/productphotos/486-884-1-og.jpg]arm cuffs[/url].

An arm cuffs is an article of jewelry that is worn around the upper arm between the shoulder and the elbow. Usually arm cuffs are manufactured from metal, leather, plastic or other materials and sometimes contain jewels, rocks, wood, and/or shells.
 
Arm cuffs can have various style too. Gold spiral arm cuffs are in [url=http://imbbpullzone.laedukreationpvt.netdna-cdn.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/Upper-Arm-Bracelet-1.jpg]Egyptian style[/url] while gold band with decorative golden swirls are in [url=http://images.costumeexpress.com/mgen/31289.jpg?zm=1600,1600,1,0,0]Spartan style[/url].
name: Arm Cuffs

description: This character uses a text or video chat to communicate with the sexual partner through the Internet. This kind of sexual activity is intended to bring sexual pleasure to one or all chat participants via dirty sexual fantasies, online striptease, simultaneous masturbation in front of webcam, etc.
name: Live Sex Chat

description: This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Casual_sex]casual sex[/url], sexual activity outside the context of a romantic relationship. This may include extramarital sex, sex in casual dating, one-time encounters, promiscuous sex, or sex in the absence of any emotional attachment, which can include swinging.
name: Casual Sex

description:
This character has sex while being suspended above the floor. Apply this trait on the bound partner.
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suspension_bondage]Suspension bondage[/url] is a form of sexual bondage where a bound person is hung from one or more overhead suspension points.
name: Suspension Bondage

description:
A character with this trait is involved with at least one scene in which sexual activity/activities takes place while his body is either separated by a wall or stuck in a wall (technically called reverse glory hole position).

In the [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/04/83504.jpg]common version[/url] of this sexual act the wall separates the body of the person being stuck in two around the waist zone, because the body is usually bended like in the doggy style sex position, leaving the [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/02/83502.jpg]face and chest[/url] on one side and the [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/03/83503.jpg]buttocks and legs[/url] on the other. A person stuck in this way can than be sexually assaulted from one or both sides. For that reason this trait often gets coupled with [url=/i2305]Public Use[/url].
Some extreme version of this tag consider being completely [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/05/83505.jpg]stuck on concrete block[/url] leaving out from the block just face, anus and pussy.
name: Sex Through Wall

description:
[url=http://www.swordsswords.com/images/products/detail/Skull_Bones_Gauntlet_Style_Hand_Claws.jpg]Fist claws[/url] is a claw-like weapon designed to fit over the knuckles or be concealed under and against the palm. It consists of two or more curved blades affixed to a crossbar or glove, and is designed to slash through skin and muscle. 

Fist claws is categorized under the fist weapon class.
name: Fist Claws

description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shikigami]shikigami[/url] (spirit servant) is a spirit that can be summoned and controlled by a [url=https://vndb.org/i388]onmyouji[/url], like familiar are summoned by warlocks in occidental witchcraft. 
Shikigami's are invisible to the majority of people but they can assume physical human or animal form if ordered by the onmyouji.

Shikigami must be conjured during a complex ceremony and their power is connected to the spiritual force of their master. If the evoker is well introduced and has lots of experience, his Shikigami can possess animals and even people and manipulate them. But if the evoker is careless, his shikigami may get out of control in time, gaining its own will and consciousness. In this case the shikigami will raid its own master and kill him in revenge. Normally shikigami are conjured to exercise risky orders for their masters, such as spying around, stealing and enemy tracking.
name: Shikigami

description: This character lacks of elegance, neatness and order. They're rarely watching their appearance, being unfamiliar with the mirror, and their apartment is in a mess most of the time.
name: Sloppy

description:
This character is caressed with small egg-shaped vibrator, which is traditionally called "pink rotor" in Japan. They can be either hard-wired or remote-controlled. Vibro egg is designed to stimulate the nipples, clitoris and other erogenous zones. Although this type of vibrators is not intended to be inserted into vagina or anus due to lack of water resistance, sometimes they're used that way.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/72/82772.jpg]NSFW example[/url]
name: Pink Rotor

description:
[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Jane_%28shoe%29]Mary Jane[/URL] is an American term for a closed, low-cut shoe with one or more straps across the instep.

Classic Mary Janes are typically made of black leather or patent leather, have one thin strap fastened with a buckle or button, a broad and rounded toebox, low heels, and thin outsoles.
name: Mary Jane

description: This character has a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loner]lone wolf[/url] type personality.
name: Loner

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Underweight]underweight[/url].

Underweight is a term describing a human whose body weight is considered too low to be healthy. A person may be underweight due to genetics, metabolism, lack of food (frequently due to poverty), or illness.
name: Underweight

description:
A character with this trait wear loafers.

[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Slip-on_shoe]Loafers[/URL] are typically low, lace-less shoes. The style most commonly seen, known as a loafer or slippers in American culture, has a moccasin construction. A less casual, earlier type of loafer is made with side gussets. These shoes have elasticated inserts on the side which allow the shoe to be easily removed but remain snug when worn.
name: Loafers

description: This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kilt]kilt[/url], a knee-length non-bifurcated skirt-type garment with pleats at the rear, originating in the traditional dress of men and boys in the Scottish Highlands of the 16th century. Since the 19th century it has become associated with the wider culture of Scotland in general, or with Celtic (and more specifically Gaelic) heritage even more broadly. It is most often made of woollen cloth in a tartan pattern.
name: Kilt

description:
This character [url=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/confine]confines[/url] someone.

Confinement is to shut or keep a person in a small closed space and prevent that person from leaving this place because of imprisonment, illness, discipline, etc.
name: Confinement

description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oni]oni[/url].

Oni are creatures from Japanese folklore, variously translated as demons, devils, ogres or trolls. They are popular characters in Japanese art, literature and theatre.

Not to be confused with a western style [url=https://vndb.org/i498]Demon[/url].
name: Oni

description:
The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nunchaku]nunchaku[/url] is a traditional Okinawan martial arts weapon consisting of two sticks connected at one end by a short chain or rope. The two sections of the weapon are commonly made out of wood, while the link is a cord or a metal chain. 

Modern-day nunchaku can be made from metal, wood, plastic or fibreglass.The nunchaku is most widely used in martial arts such as Okinawan kobudō and karate. Many varieties of nunchaku are available.
name: Nunchaku

description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Butt_plug]butt plug[/url] is a sex toy that is designed to be inserted into the rectum for sexual pleasure. In some ways, they are similar to a dildo, but they tend to be shorter, and must have a flanged end to prevent the device from being lost inside the rectum.

Butt plugs come in a variety of colors, shapes, sizes, and textures. Some are designed to look like penises, while some are ribbed or wavy. The majority, however, are shaped, having a thin tip which is wider in the middle, a notch to hold it in place once it is inserted, and a flared base to prevent complete insertion into the rectum. Some plugs are designed (long, flexible and curved) to penetrate the sigmoid colon.

Butt plugs are made of a variety of materials, the most common being latex. Other materials used include silicone, neoprene, wood, metal, glass, stone, and many other materials.
name: Butt Plug

description:
The character is forced into a marriage that is not by his or her choice, is something they are opposed to actually doing, and would not consent to under normal circumstances. Reasons can vary between being sold into marriage against their will, parents forcing them to get married to someone (possibly under threat), or for some other reason.

This trait also counts if it was attempted but not successfully completed (such as the ceremony being interrupted for some reason). What matters is opposition to the marriage and being forced to go along with it.
name: Forced Marriage

description:
A character with this trait is a charismatic person.

[URL=http://www.oxforddictionaries.com/definition/english/charisma]Charisma[/URL] is defined as the "compelling attractiveness or charm that can inspire devotion in others".

Charismatic people are charming, friendly and extroverted people with great social skills. They tend to be good public speakers and street smart.
name: Charismatic

description: This character is the mother of another character's spouse.
name: Mother-in-law

description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Witch_hat]witch hat[/url], in popular culture, is the style of hat characterized by a conical crown and a wide brim (like akubras and gats), usually worn by fictional characters like witches or sorcerers.

Depending upon the material in which the hat is made, the crown may regularly be observed in a flexed, bent or crumpled condition.
name: Witch Hat

description:
A [url=https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/SnakePeople]snake person[/url] is a half-human, half-serpent monster most often depicted with the upper torso of a human and the lower half that of a snake. Common snake people subtypes are [url=https://non-aliencreatures.fandom.com/wiki/Lamia_(Monster_Musume)]Lamias[/url] and [url=https://non-aliencreatures.fandom.com/wiki/N%C4%81ga]Nagas[/url].

Lamia origins are rooted in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lamia]Greek mythology[/url], where she is a mistress of the god Zeus, causing Zeus' jealous wife, Hera, to kill all of Lamia's children and transform her into a monster that hunts and devours the children of others.

Nagas come from [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/N%C4%81ga]Hinduism[/url] and are a very diverse group of snake-related entities, ranging from nature spirits to gods, that reside in the netherworld and can occasionally take human or part-human form.
name: Snake Person

description:
A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Werecat]werecat[/url] is a monster similar to a [url=https://vndb.org/i706]werewolf[/url] but with the characteristics of a cat instead of a wolf. They are sneaky, athletic and friendly creatures.

They’re generally harmless monsters most of the time, but they will be in heat every few months, when they will become incredibly violent and force human males they like into having sex with them.
name: Werecat

description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Estrous_cycle]Estrus cycle[/url] is the period of maximum sexual receptivity that the female of most mammals, excluding humans, experience just prior to ovulation.

In species/monsters with estrous cycles, females are generally only sexually active during the estrus phase of their cycle. This is also referred to as being "in heat".
name: Being in Heat

description:
A mandragora is [url=http://monstergirlencyclopedia.wikia.com/wiki/Mandragora]plant monster[/url] in the form of a woman with roots and a [url=http://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mandragora]mandragora[/url] on top of the head. 

The parts corresponding to the roots are buried deep within the earth. They only push out the flower on their head to the surface of the ground. They wait for their prey, which is lured by the sweet fragrance released from the flower petals, to come and pull them up.
name: Mandragora

description:
A [url=https://monstergirlencyclopedia.miraheze.org/wiki/Slime]slime[/url] is semi-liquid monster, with a flexible half-transparent body that can change into various forms. They are intelligent enough to speak, but their thoughts are simple, and they instinctively wander around in search of human men who will end up as their prey.

A slime monster can grow upon feeding and duplicate himself originating a smaller copy. Various kind/color of slime monster exists every one with his own characteristics: bubble slime, red slime, dark slime, queen slime, sea slime, ecc...
name: Slime

description:
An [url=https://monstergirlencyclopedia.miraheze.org/wiki/Arachne]arachne[/url] is a bug type monster, with the lower body of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spider]spider[/url] and the upper body of a human, that dwells in dark places such as caves and deep within forests. They have high intelligence, but most of them are lustful and belligerent. Since they have high physical abilities, they are very dangerous creatures.

They make sticky thread inside their body and use it to make a net-like web, and surprisingly, they're proficient in sewing.
Their main body and threads are weak to fire.

Has its origin in the story of Arachne from [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arachne]Greek mythology[/url].
name: Arachne

description:
A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mimic_(Dungeons_%26_Dragons)]mimic[/url] is a monsters that disguise himselves as treasure chests, waiting to leap out and attack unsuspecting adventurers. Since they set a trap by mimicking treasure chests, they usually live in places such as towers and caves, or other places where someone would likely find a treasure.

Even though mimics seems affected by substantial practical problems about ergonomics and locomotion, they have powerful illusion, teleportation, and pocket-dimension-hopping abilities.
name: Mimic

description:
This character's skin is covered or partially covered by [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scale_(anatomy)]scales[/url].

A scale is a small rigid plate that grows out of an animal's skin to provide protection and coloration. Scales are common amongst reptiles (snakes, dragons), fish and insects. Various types of scales exists according to shape and to class of animal.
name: Scales

description:
This character is penetrated or otherwise sexually teased by a magic wand. 

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hitachi_Magic_Wand]Magic Wand[/url] is an electrical, mains-powered vibrating massager, manufactured for relieving tension and relaxing sore muscles. The device is well known for its use as a vibrator, and as a masturbation aid for women, because it functions effectively as a clitoral vibrator and is able to bring women to clitoral orgasm.

Because of the Magic Wand's popularity, various aftermarket attachments with differences in colour, pattern of studs, and material, became available to purchase.
name: Magic Wand

description:
A triple boobjob is performed on this character. Apply [url=/i1664]Engages in (Sexual) > Triple Boobjob[/url] to the performing characters.

This is a sexual act in which three women rub their breasts against each other with a man's penis in the middle of them.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/95/119095.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Triple Boobjob

description:
Enchainment is the process in which a person is usually binded in chain with the usual intention of torture and confine. The trait can also be used if chains are connected to handcuffs, shackles and other similarly conceived restraint devices that function in a similar manner.

This trait should not be used in place of i1194 because this trait does not involve sex; it could be used in conjuction though if needed. 
In case of pillory or stocks use the specific trait (i1678).
name: Enchainment

description: The character is male and is married to someone else's child becoming that person's son-in-law.
name: Son-in-law

description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blanket]blanket[/url] is a type of bedding, generally speaking, a large piece of cloth, intended to keep the user warm, especially while sleeping or laying down. 

Blankets are generally used for warmth and comfort and usually they are made of wool.
name: Blanket

description:
The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saint_Andrew%27s_Cross_%28BDSM%29]X-cross[/url], St. Andrew's Cross, Crux decussata, X-frame or saltire cross is a common piece of equipment in BDSM dungeons. It typically provides restraining points for ankles, wrists, and waist. When secured to a saltire, the subject is restrained in a spreadeagle position.

The submissive may be attached to the cross with either the back or front facing the cross. Being restrained facing the cross is the position often used for whipping. Being attached with one's back to the cross is usually more of a sexual bondage position or used for sexual teasing.
name: X-Cross

description:
This character performs a buttjob. Apply i1775 to the receiving character.

A buttjob is a sexual act where a woman or man uses their buttocks to stimulate the penis. It is similar to boobjob and does not include any anal or vaginal penetration by itself.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/01/119101.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Buttjob

description:
A buttjob is performed on this character. Apply i1774 to the performing character.

A buttjob is a sexual act where a woman or man uses their buttocks to stimulate the penis. It is similar to boobjob and does not include any anal or vaginal penetration by itself.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/01/119101.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Buttjob

description: The [url=http://goo.gl/je3GqL]mitre[/url] is a type of headgear now known as the traditional, ceremonial head-dress of bishops and certain abbots in the Roman Catholic Church, as well as in the Anglican Communion, some Lutheran churches, and also bishops and certain other clergy in the Eastern Orthodox churches, Eastern Catholic Churches and the Oriental Orthodox Churches. The Metropolitan of the Malankara Mar Thoma Syrian Church also wears a mitre during important ceremonies such as the Episcopal Consecration.
name: Mitre

description:
This characters wears wedge sandals.

[url=https://www.korkys.ie/wedges]Wedge sandals[/url] are high heeled [url=https://vndb.org/i456]sandals[/url] with the sole in the form of a wedge so that one piece of material, normally cork or rubber, serves as both the sole and the heel.
name: Wedge Sandals

description:
Armpit sex is performed on this character, i.e. they have their sexual organ(s) stimulated by another character's armpit(s). Apply [url=/i1779]Armpit Sex[/url] to the performing character.

Armpit sex is a non-penetrative sexual act where the penis is thrust inside a woman's armpit.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/03/119103.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Armpit Sex

description:
This character performs armpit sex, i.e they use their armpit(s) to stimulate another character's sexual organ(s). Apply [url=/i1778]Armpit Sex[/url] to the receiving character.

Armpit sex is a non-penetrative sexual act where the penis is thrust inside a woman's armpit.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/03/119103.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Armpit Sex

description:
This character wears [url=http://www.animena.com/images/201005/goods_img/2333_P_12740177565685.jpg]paw gloves[/url].

A paw glove is a garment covering the hand in the shape of an animal paw. Paw gloves are usually weared during kemonomimi cosplay.
name: Paw Gloves

description: An [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harpy]harpy[/url] is a bird type monster, with the body of a girl and the legs of a bird, with big bird-like wings. Harpies can fly and for this reason, their bodies are usually light and small
name: Harpy

description:
This character skin is covered or partially covered by [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Feather]feathers[/url].

Feathers are epidermal growths that form the distinctive outer covering, or plumage, on birds. They aid in flight, thermal insulation, waterproofing, and coloration that helps in communication and protection.
name: Feathers

description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hellhound]hellhound[/url] is a supernatural dog. Hellhounds have mangled black fur, glowing red eyes, super strength or speed, ghostly or phantom characteristics, and a foul odor. In cultures that associate the afterlife with fire, hellhounds may have fire-based abilities and appearance. 

They are often assigned to guard the entrances to the world of the dead, such as graveyards and burial grounds, or undertake other duties related to the afterlife or the supernatural, such as hunting lost souls or guarding a supernatural treasure. In European legends, seeing a hellhound or hearing it howl may be an omen or even a cause of death.

[url=https://monstergirlencyclopedia.miraheze.org/wiki/Hellhound]Hellhound monster girls[/url] exhist too and they are ferocious, bold, selfish and untamable by man.
name: Hellhound

description: A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shin_guard]shin guard[/url] or shin pad is a piece of equipment worn on the front of a player’s shin to protect them from injury. These are commonly used in sports for protective protection measures.
name: Shin Guard

description:
In Greek mythology [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Medusa]Medusa[/url] was a monster, a Gorgon, generally described as having the face of a hideous human female with living venomous snakes in place of hair. Gazing directly into her eyes would turn onlookers to stone. 

Famous is the story about Medusa beheaded by the hero Perseus, who thereafter used her head, which retained its ability to turn onlookers to stone, as a weapon until he gave it to the goddess Athena to place on her shield.

[url=https://monstergirlencyclopedia.miraheze.org/wiki/Medusa]Monster girl Medusas[/url] exist too as a type of [url=/i1759]Role > Snake Person[/url], having in common the same appearance: upper body of a human woman and the lower body of a snake. They differ from other snake people in that they possess the ability to cause the body of whomever they make eye contact with to harden like stone.
name: Medusa

description:
[url=http://knowyourmeme.com/memes/subcultures/monster-girls]Monster Girls[/url] are a special type of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mythic_humanoids]humanoid[/url] where the anthropomorphic character is a mix between a creature (both real and fictional) and a human. Which means some body parts/limbs of a creature has generally been added or switched on a human body. Most of them are an human torso on the top of a monster bottom body. One of the general rule is to keep the face and torso area human. The human is usually a female, though some rare male examples exist.

Fetishism involving around monster girls is referred to as [url=https://vndb.org/g2205]teraphilia[/url].

The trait should NOT be applied for:
* Species prevalent in various fantasy works, like elves, orcs, fairies and others.
* Entities and species prevalent in sci-fi works, like robots, androids or various aliens.
* Girl monsters who do not have visible external monster features
* Cosplayers dressing as monster girls.
name: Monster Girl

description:
A [url=https://monstergirlencyclopedia.miraheze.org/wiki/Beelzebub]beelzebub[/url] is a bug type monster, with the body of a girl and the legs of a fly, with big fly-like wings. Beelzebubs can fly and for this reason bodies are usually light and small.

Beelzebubs are referred to as "Lord of the flies" and "Lord of gluttony" since their lust and appetite are extremely ravenous.
name: Beelzebub

description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stinger]stinger[/url].

A stinger, or sting, is a sharp organ found in various animals capable of injecting venom, usually by piercing the skin of the victim. Technically, a stinger is the part of an insect or animal that holds a sting, where a sting is the pointed organ, but in common language those terms are used interchangeably.

Well-known animals with sitngers are: hornets, some ants, centipedes, and scorpions.
name: Stinger

description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jiangshi]jiangshi[/url] is a chinese [url=https://vndb.org/i487]vampire[/url]/[url=https://vndb.org/i1393]zombie[/url]. Jiangshi literally translates to 'stiff corpse'. It is a horrific creature that usually hops along, and when it comes across a victim it will suck the life force (in Chinese, "qi") out of them.

The jiangshi is said to be raised by a necromancer, or when the soul of a dead man cannot leave his body due to reasons in life, such as they were a horrible troublemaker, or if they commit suicide. The body looks different due to when they were raised. If they are raised soon after death, their appearance looks almost like a normal human, however if they have decomposed some time before they come to life, they can look horrific and ghastly.

Usually they are described as a pale white colour with furry green hair, moss, or mold growing on their flesh. The Jiang Shi also has pale, long white, messy hair atop their heads. They are said to have extremely long tongues and black, sharp fingernails, and they walk along with their arms outstretched.
name: Jiangshi

description:
A [url=https://monstergirlencyclopedia.miraheze.org/wiki/Cancer]cancer[/url] is a crustacean type monster, with the upper body of a woman, a lower body covered in a hard shell, and one of their five pairs of crab legs have become giant pincers.

Cancers usually live near water, such as oceans, seashores, and rivers as normal crabs do.
name: Cancer

description: This character has more than two eyes. This may be due to their non-human nature (extraterrestrial, monster, monster girl, android) or due to a mutation (genetic experiment, mutant).

"Oira" is similar to "ore", but more casual. May give off sense of more country bumpkin.

Double Peace Sign Ahegao (also known as W Sign Ahegao) it's also abbreviated in [url=http://g.e-hentai.org/g/581355/1d1c939056/?p=1]AWP[/url]: (A) Ahegao - (W) Double V - (P) Sign Peace

description: A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canteen_(bottle)]canteen[/url] is a drinking water bottle designed to be used by hikers, campers, soldiers and workers in the field. It is usually fitted with a shoulder strap or means for fastening it to a belt, and may be covered with a cloth bag and padding to protect the bottle and insulate the contents.
name: Canteen

description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Premier]Premier[/url] is a title for the head of government in some countries, states and sub-national governments. A second in command to a premier is designated as a vice-premier or deputy premier.
name: Premier

description:
This character wears an animal pelt as clothing.

An animal pelt is obtained by skinning an animal.
People wearing animal pelts, not for cosplay, but as an everyday outfit are considered indigenous, barbaric and uncivilized.
name: Animal Pelt

description:
A character with this trait wears or has worn a blazer.

A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blazer]blazer[/URL] is a type of jacket resembling a suit coat, but cut more casually. Blazers often have naval-style metal buttons to reflect their historic association as jackets worn by boating club members.

Blazers are often part of a uniform that denotes, for example, an airline's employees, students of a particular school, members of yachting and rowing clubs, and athletes on a particular team.
name: Blazer

description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nurarihyon]Nurarihyon[/url] is a Japanese youkai, considered to be the leader of all youkai. He is usually depicted as an old man with a gourd-shaped head and wearing a kesa. 

The Nurarihyon will sneak into someone's house while they are away, drink their tea, and act as if it is their own house. Because it looks human, anyone who sees him will mistake him for the owner of the house, making it very hard to expel him.
name: Nurarihyon

description:
The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nurikabe]nurikabe[/url] is a [url=https://vndb.org/i622]youkai[/url], or spirit, from Japanese folklore. It manifests as a wall that impedes or misdirects walking travelers at night. Nurikabe's main ability is that it can change its form and expand itself.

Trying to go around is futile as it extends itself forever, but knocking on the lower left part of the wall makes it disappear. It has been suggested that the legend was created to explain travellers losing their bearings on long journeys.
name: Nurikabe

description:
[url=http://yokai.wikia.com/wiki/Daidarabotchi]Daidarabotchi[/url] is a gigantic youkai from Japanese mythology, sometime said to pose as a mountain range when sleeping. 

His size was so great his footprints were said to have created in numerable lakes and ponds. He is the responsible for the Japanese geography, since he is able to move mountains and leave them wherever he wants.
name: Daidarabotchi

description: A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Water_gun]water gun[/url] is a type of toy gun designed to shoot water or liquid in science terms. Similar to water balloons, the primary purpose of the toy is to soak another person in a game such as water warfare.
name: Water Gun

description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yamata_no_Orochi]Yamata no Orochi[/url] is a gigantic dragon/serpent with eight heads and eight tails and red eyes. Its body is long enough to cover eight peaks and valleys, and it's covered with moss and trees. Its belly is inflamed and smeared with blood.
name: Yamata no Orochi

description: The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kama_(weapon)]kama[/url] is a traditional Filipino and Japanese farming implement similar to a sickle used for reaping crops and also employed as a weapon. The kama is often included in weapon training segments of karate, silat and in some Chinese martial arts and can be used singly or in pairs.
name: Kama

description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massage]Massage[/url] involves working and acting on the body with pressure – structured, unstructured, stationary, or moving – tension, motion, or vibration, done manually or with mechanical aids. Massage can be applied with the hands, fingers, elbows, knees, forearm, feet, or a massage device. Massage can promote relaxation and well-being, can be a recreational activity, and can be sexual in nature.

This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Medical_glove]medical[/url] and/or [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rubber_glove]rubber gloves[/url].

Medical gloves are disposable gloves used during medical examinations and procedures that help prevent contamination between caregivers and patients. Medical gloves are made of different polymers including latex, nitrile rubber, vinyl and neoprene.

Rubber glove's primary purpose is protection of the hands while performing tasks involving chemicals. Rubber gloves can be worn during dishwashing to protect the hands from detergent and allow the use of hotter water.

description: A megaphone is a portable, usually hand-held, cone-shaped acoustic horn used to amplify a person’s voice or other sounds and direct it in a given direction. The sound is introduced into the narrow end of the megaphone, by holding it up to the face and speaking into it, and the sound waves radiate out the wide end. The megaphone increases the volume of sound by increasing the acoustic impedance seen by the vocal cords, matching the impedance of the vocal cords to the air, so that more sound power is radiated. It also serves to direct the sound waves in the direction the horn is pointing.
name: Megaphone

description:
Sexual slavery is a process wherein someone 'forces' by varied means someone else to engage into sexual activity of some sort.

The mentioned 'force' could be outright force/coercion or be part of an agreement between a dominant and a submissive.
The means are varied and numerous, some not exhaustive means are blackmailing, hypnotism, mind breaking and sexual violence or some form of consensual slave contract.

There are two distinct forms of sexual slavery:
1. A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_slavery]non-consensual one[/url], an act of performing non-voluntary sexual activity due to coercion.
2. A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_slavery_%28BDSM%29]consensual one[/url], usually in some form of a dominant person owning a submissive person as property.

In the environment of visual novels, mainly nukige there has to be postulated a third form of sexual slavery:
3. A semi-(non-)consensual one, wherein the 'submissive' has first to be persuaded by the dominant person by means usually regarded as a criminal act in real life. The Japanese subculture has defined the word 調教 [choukyou] for this, which literally means ‘to teach an animal to do something or to behave correctly’.
name: Sexual Slavery

description:

This form of sexual slavery is the slavery of unwilling people for sexual exploitation.
Forced prostitution, also known as involuntary prostitution is a classical form of this form of sexual slavery, wherein sex traffickers force victims to become prostitutes or work in the sex industry.

IMPORTANT NOTE: Non-consensual sexual slavery starts out as non-consensual and stays that way. The victim doesn't go through mindbreak and doesn't become a willing slave at any point in the story.
name: Sexual Slavery (Non-consensual)

description:
Mahjong is a game that originated in China. It is commonly played by four players (with some three-player variations found in South Korea and Japan). Similar to the Western card game rummy, mahjong is a game of skill, strategy, and calculation and involves a degree of chance.

The game is played with a set of 144 tiles based on Chinese characters and symbols, although some regional variations use a different number of tiles. In most variations, each player begins by receiving 13 tiles. In turn players draw and discard tiles until they complete a legal hand using the 14th drawn tile to form four groups (melds) and a pair (head).
name: Mahjong

description: A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Security_guard]security guard[/url], or security officer, is a person who is paid to protect property, assets, or people. They are usually privately and formally employed civilian personnel. Security officers are generally uniformed and act to protect property by maintaining a high-visibility presence to deter illegal and inappropriate actions, observing for signs of crime, fire or disorder; then taking action and reporting any incidents to their client and emergency services as appropriate.

description:
This character is subject of a debt.

A debt generally refers to money owed by one party, the borrower or debtor, to a second party, the lender or creditor. Debt is generally subject to contractual terms regarding the amount and timing of repayments of principal and interest.

Common types of debt owed by individuals and households include mortgage loans, car loans, and credit card debt. Besides these more formal debts, private individuals also lend informally to other people, mostly relatives or friends. One reason for such informal debts is that many people, in particular those who are poor, have no access to affordable credit. Such debts can cause problems when they are not paid back according to expectations of the lending household.
name: Debt

They are a kind of sandal with an elevated wooden base held onto the foot with a fabric thong to keep the foot well above the ground. Slaves can be held against their will from the time of their capture, purchase or birth, and deprived of the right to leave, to refuse to work, or to demand compensation. Slingback's straps is usually adjustable through a buckle or an elastic allowing the wearer to slip their foot into the sandal easily without the need to make further (or any) manual adjustment to the strap or buckle, while still holding the foot in the sandal relatively securely. The buckle can be made of metal, plastic, or even sometimes stone.

As they are not generally worn outside, the soles are kept clean, and thus cleaning and maintenance of the building's floors are kept to a minimum.

name: Detachable

description:
This character has actual [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antenna_%28biology%29]antennae[/url].
Antennae are appendages used for sensing in arthropods.

This trait is intended for characters that really have antennas and should not be mixed with the hair trait antennas i14 which refers to a particular kind of ahoge.
name: Antennae

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/quadruped]quadruped[/url], has four legs, and walks and stands on four feet.

This trait can be used for quadruped animals but also for hybrid mythological monsters and monster girls having the lower body of a quadruped and the upper body of an humanoid, like for example, a centaur.
name: Four-Legged

description:
This character engages in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Astral_projection]astral projection[/url].

Astral projection or travel denotes the astral body (spirit, soul, etc.) leaving the physical body to travel in an astral plane, or wandering around the mortal plane. In some variants the spirit may only watch, others can communicate or even interact with their environment, up to fully looking like any physical body, except for the usual limitations of ghosts (can't go into water, may interfere with electric waves, etc.).
name: Astral Projection

description:
This characters carries the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Double_bass]double bass[/url], a largest and lowest-pitched bowed string instrument in the modern symphony orchestra.
The double bass is a standard member of the orchestra's string section as well as the concert band, and is featured in concertos, solo and chamber music in Western classical music. The bass is used in a range of other genres, such as jazz, 1950s-style blues and rock and roll, rockabilly/psychobilly, traditional country music, bluegrass, tango and many types of folk music.
name: Double Bass

description:
This character overuses or overemphasizes the word ~desu at the end of their sentences.

Desu is a Japanese copula often given the translation of 'to be' or 'it is'.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Copula_(linguistics)#Japanese

Note: [url=https://vndb.org/i3066]-ssu[/url] used to be an alias of this trait instead of a separate trait. If you see a character tagged with this thread instead of [url=https://vndb.org/i3066]-ssu[/url] when the latter would be more appropriate, please edit the character page accordingly.
name: Desu

description:
This character overuses or overemphasizes the word ~desu wa at the end of their sentences.

Desu wa is a Japanese copula often given the translation of 'to be' or 'it is' and is similar to the word ~desu but more polite.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Copula_(linguistics)#Japanese
name: Desu wa

name: Baby Bottle

description:

Ventriloquism is an act of stagecraft in which a person (a ventriloquist) changes his or her voice so that it appears that the voice is coming from elsewhere, usually a puppeteered "dummy".

description:
This character plays [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shogi]shogi[/url] at some point in the story.

Shogi is a two-player strategy board game in the same family as Western (international) chess, chaturanga, makruk, shatranj and xiangqi, and is the most popular of a family of chess variants native to Japan.

Two players, Sente 先手 (Black; more literally, person with the first move) and Gote 後手 (White; person with the second move), play on a board composed of rectangles in a grid of 9 ranks (rows) by 9 files (columns). The board is nearly always rectangular. Each player has a set of 20 wedge-shaped pieces of slightly different sizes. Except for the kings, opposing pieces are undifferentiated by marking or color.
name: Shogi

description:

Abortion is the ending of pregnancy by removing a fetus or embryo from the womb before it can survive on its own. Modern methods use medication or surgery for abortions.

This character is [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prussia]Prussian[/url].

Prussia was a historic state originating out of the Duchy of Prussia and the Margraviate of Brandenburg, and centered on the region of Prussia. Prussia, with its capital in Königsberg and from 1701 moved to Berlin, shaped the history of Germany. Prussia existed until its formal liquidation by the Allied Control Council Enactment No. 46 of 25 February 1947.

Games and series with Prussian characters are almost always set in the history, or deal with historical themes.
name: Prussian

A pin-back button is a is a button or badge that can be temporarily fastened to the surface of a garment using a safety pin, or a pin formed from wire, a clutch or other mechanism. This fastening mechanism is anchored to the back side of a button-shaped metal disk, either flat or concave, which leaves an area on the front of the button to carry an image or printed message.
name: Pin-Back Button

The pun, also called paronomasia, is a form of word play that suggests two or more meanings, by exploiting multiple meanings of words, or of similar-sounding words, for an intended humorous or rhetorical effect.
name: Puns

description: [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Relocation_(personal)]Relocation[/url], also known as moving, is the process of vacating a fixed location (such as a residence or business) and settling in a different one. A move can be to a nearby location within the same neighborhood, a much farther location in a different city, or sometimes a different country. It usually includes packing up all belongings, transferring to the new home, and unpacking, as well as administrative or bureaucratic tasks, such as changing registration data, change of insurance, services etc.
name: Moving

description:

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crystal_ball]A crystal ball[/url], also known as an orbuculum, is a crystal or glass ball believed by some people to aid in the performance of clairvoyance.

description:
This character suffers a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miscarriage]miscarriage[/url] or [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stillbirth]stillbirth[/url].

Miscarriage, also known as spontaneous abortion and pregnancy loss, is the natural death of an embryo or fetus before it is able to survive independently. Some use the cutoff of 20 weeks of gestation after which fetal death is known as a stillbirth.
name: Pregnancy Loss

description:
This character wears [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swim_briefs]swim briefs[/url].

A swim brief or racing brief is any briefs-style male swimsuit such as those worn in competitive swimming and diving. The popularity of the Australian Speedo brand racing brief has led to the use of its name in many countries around the world (e.g. the United States, New Zealand, UK and Europe) to refer to any racing brief, regardless of the maker.
name: Swim Brief

description:
A guimpe is a linen cloth, often starched, which covers the neck and shoulders of the wearer, sometimes the entire chest as well. It had been in common use among women of means throughout most of the Middle Ages but gradually fell out of fashion by the Renaissance. Its use persists to the present day among certain orders of nuns, who use it as part of their religious habit.

description:
This character plays [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/American_football]American football[/url].

American football is a sport played by two teams of eleven players on a rectangular field with goalposts at each end. The offense, the team with control of the oval-shaped football, attempts to advance down the field by running with or passing the ball, while the team without control of the ball, the defense, aims to stop their advance and take control of the ball for themselves. The offense must advance at least ten yards in four downs, or plays, or else they turn over the football to the opposing team; if they succeed, they are given a new set of four downs. Points are primarily scored by advancing the ball into the opposing team's end zone for a touchdown or kicking the ball through the opponent's goalposts for a field goal. The team with the most points at the end of a game wins.
name: American Football

description:
This character is a member of some [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sect]sect[/url].

A sect is a subgroup of a religious, political or philosophical belief system, usually an offshoot of a larger religious group. Although in past it was mostly used to refer to religious groups, it has since expanded and in modern culture can refer to any organization that breaks away from a larger one to follow a different set of rules and principles.
name: Member of a Sect

description: [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rein]Reins[/url], [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bridle]bridle[/url] and [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bit_%28horse%29]bit (horse)[/url] are different horse tacks used to direct a horse or other animal used for riding or driving.
name: Reins

description: A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dwarf_(mythology)]dwarf[/url] is a being that dwells in mountains and in the earth, and is variously associated with wisdom, smithing, mining, and crafting. Dwarfs are often also described as short and ugly, although some scholars have questioned whether this is a later development stemming from comical portrayals of the beings.
name: Dwarf

description: This character wears clothes that are too large for their body.
name: Oversized Clothing

description:
This character wears a gas mask.

The [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gas_mask]gas mask[/url] is a mask used to protect the user from inhaling airborne pollutants and toxic gases. The mask forms a sealed cover over the nose and mouth, but may also cover the eyes and other vulnerable soft tissues of the face.
name: Gas Mask

description:
This character's memory gets altered.

Memory alteration is the modification, loss, and gaining of memories by a character through means that are not natural. For example: falling down stairs and receiving brain trauma could be considered natural in this context, whereas falling down stairs into another dimension and passing/gaining inter-dimensional memories would not.

Memories do not necessarily need to be genuine, the only requirement apart from the natural cause is that after the memory modification event (be it via reality warps, a machine, magic powers or otherwise) the "new" set of memories are different from the "old" set of memories, even if only slight.

May sometimes overlap with amnesia depending on the circumstances.
name: Memory Alteration

description:
This character wears an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aloha_shirt]Aloha shirt[/url].

The Aloha shirt, commonly referred to as a Hawaiian shirt, is a style of dress shirt originating in Hawaii.
The dress shirts are short-sleeved, collared, button up shirts that are printed with colorful patterns, usually of flowers or other plant life. Aloha dress shirts usually have a left chest pocket sewn in, often with attention to ensure the printed pattern remains continuous. The lower hem is straight, as the shirts are not meant to be tucked in.
name: Aloha Shirt

description:
This character engages in a sexual act where "living clothes" play a significant role.

The term "Living clothes" means clothings that moves on its own volition. This trait branches in two main area of application:
1) Clothes awakening - clothes usually become alive by magic or by any other supernatural way, they are usually depicted as clothings that have small tentacles under their surface.
2) Monster used as clothes - particular monsters are attached to the body and used as clothing. In these cases usually monsters resemble the shape of a particular piece of clothing, like for example a bra or panties.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/61/91661.jpg]NSFW Example Clothes Awakening 1[/url]

description:
This character is a [url=https://vndb.org/i1219]gyaru[/url] with tanned skin while not being [url=https://vndb.org/i1054]ganguro[/url]. Kuro-Gyaru literally means Black Skin Gal (Kuro=Black, Gyaru=Gal).
This trait is used to differentiate tanned skin gyaru from ganguro.

Ganguro examples: https://s.vndb.org/sf/98/91698.jpg, https://s.vndb.org/sf/96/91696.jpg, https://s.vndb.org/sf/97/91697.jpg
With some exceptions a gallery of correctly identified [url=http://g.e-hentai.org/g/651734/b13400cde8/]Ganguros[/url].

Kuro-Gyaru examples: https://s.vndb.org/sf/99/91699.jpg, https://s.vndb.org/sf/00/91700.jpg
name: Kuro-Gyaru

description:
This character wears a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tutu_%28clothing%29]tutu[/url].

A tutu is a female ballet dancer’s costume consisting of a bodice and an attached skirt incorporating numerous layers of fabric, this being either short and stiff and projecting horizontally from the waist (the classical tutu) or long, soft, and bell-shaped (the romantic tutu).
name: Tutu

description:
This character wears a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polo_shirt]polo shirt[/url].

A polo shirt is a form of shirt with a collar, a placket with typically two or three buttons, and an optional pocket.
name: Polo Shirt

description:
This character is a [url=/https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Danes]Dane[/url].

Danes are the citizens of Denmark, most of whom speak Danish and consider themselves to be of Danish ethnicity. However, people with a Danish ancestral or ethnic identity; people living outside Denmark such as emigrants; and descendants of emigrants are also considered to be Danes.
name: Dane

description:
Those characters have sex while being underwater either by diving or simply holding their breath while being underwater.

Only add this trait if the character's whole body is under water. If is just partially then use [url=/i1067]Sex in Water[/url] trait instead.
name: Sex Under Water

description:
This character's hair is tied to form a loop.

Twin loopies:
[url=https://s.vndb.org/ch/94/23194.jpg]Example 1[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/ch/86/7886.jpg]Example 2[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/ch/13/7613.jpg]Example 3[/url]
name: Hair Loopies

description:
This character uses "soregashi", one of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronouns[/url] for "I", to address themselves.
Literally "so-and-so", a nameless expression. Similar to [url=/i2136]sessha[/url].
name: Soregashi

description:
This character uses "atashi-sama" to address themselves. Atashi-sama is a very arrogant form to refer oneself and very similar to "ore-sama". 
Atashi-sama comes from the girly "atashi" and the very respectful honorific suffix, “-sama (様)”.
name: Atashi-sama

description:
This character wears a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tricorne]tricorn[/url] hat

Typically made from animal fiber, tricorns had a rather broad brim, pinned up on either side of the head and at the back, producing a triangular shape. The hat was typically worn with the point facing forward.
name: Tricorn Hat

description:
Very short shorts terminating at the upper thigh. The term 'Hotpants' may be used interchangeably, though the term originally applied to shorts made in luxury fabrics such as velvet and silk. Daisy Dukes are an extremely short version of denim cut-offs, popularized by the American television show 'The Dukes of Hazzard'.
[url=https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/c/ce/Model_ready_to_hit_the_runway_%28IMG_7651a%29_%285459400817%29.jpg]Example of Short Shorts[/url].
[url=https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/2/2b/Bebe_Hot_Pants_01_2008.jpg]Example of Hot Pants[/url].
[url=https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/0/0f/Daisy_Dukes.jpg]Example of Daisy Dukes[/url].
name: Short Shorts

description: Awahime is a female worker in a Japanese [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soapland]Soapland[/url].
name: Awahime

description:
The character wears their over body clothing attire as a cape.

If the character wears a type of over-body clothing, such as a [url=https://vndb.org/i134]coat[/url] or [url=https://vndb.org/i539]military blazer[/url], but only wears it open and around their shoulders, use this trait instead of the latter.

For more information, see [url=http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/CoatCape]this TVTropes article[/url].
name: Coat Cape

description:
This character is a sheep or a humanoid possessing sheep-like traits.

A sheep is a type of farm mammal known for their distinguishable woolly fur. Male sheeps are called "rams" and are known to possess horns.
name: Sheep

description:
This character uses "sessha" (拙者), one of the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronouns[/url] for "I", to address themselves.

Sessha is a very humble and archaic form of addressing oneself used mostly by males.
name: Sessha

description:
This character is a sculptor.

A sculptor is an artist who specializes in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sculpture]sculpture[/url].
name: Sculptor

description:
This character is an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Architect]architect[/url].

An architect is a person who plans, designs, and oversees the construction of buildings.
name: Architect

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Receptionist]receptionist[/url].

A receptionist is an employee taking an office/administrative support position. The work is usually performed in a waiting area such as a lobby or front office desk of an organization or business. The title "receptionist" is attributed to the person who is employed by an organization to receive or greet any visitors, patients, or clients and answer telephone calls. The term Front Desk is used in many hotels for an administrative department where a receptionist's duties also may include room reservations and assignment, guest registration, cashier work, credit checks, key control as well as mail and message service. Such receptionists are often called front desk clerks.
name: Receptionist

description:
This character overuses or overemphasizes the word "desu no" at the end of their sentences.

Like ~desu wa, ~desu no is a more refined and polite way of using ~desu.
name: Desu no

description: This character has sex in the infirmary of the school.
name: Sex in School Infirmary

description:
This character carries and/or uses paper talismans. They consists of a small rectangular paper with the kanji of a representative Shinto kami inscribed.

Paper talisman often originate from Shinto religion. They are often used in exorcism, wards, and purification. They may be hanged around a house or placed on things in hopes

In fictional use of paper talismans, they may contain mystical magic powers. Generally these are used as a tool for fighting spirits and monsters. Intuitively, paper talismans may function as something else, such as being made as an explosive item.
name: Paper Talismans

description:
This character is a son of an upper class family. The male equivalent of an [url=/i1727]Ojou-sama[/url].

The upper class is the social class composed of the wealthiest members of society, who also wield the greatest political power. The upper class is generally contained within the wealthiest 1-2% of the population, and is distinguished by immense wealth (in the form of estates) which is passed from generation to generation.

This tag is about the social status of the character and does not refer to his behavior.
name: Onzoushi

description:
This character is framed for a crime.

Frame-up is a plan to make an innocent person appear to be guilty of a crime.
name: Frameup

description:
This character wears a kindergarten uniform or kindergarten smock either because they are a kindergarten student or as a form of cosplay.

Example: http://media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/a3/a5/e2/a3a5e227b460022a612fb0ca13a02686.jpg
name: Kindergarten Uniform

description:
This characters has eyebrows that have an unusual or unnatural shape.

Example: [url=https://vndb.org/c37794]Ukon[/url]

Do not add this trait if the characters eyebrows are only shaped this way in certain expressions. It needs to be part of their normal appearance.
name: Unusual Eyebrows

description:
This character has a rather large, shapely, ample posterior, usually accompanied by curvacious and enticing hips and thighs.
This is either obvious in the art by the ass sticking out (e.g. v18755) or discussed by characters in the game.
name: Big Ass

description:
This character is a dropout from school.

Dropping out means leaving a school, college, university or group for practical reasons, necessities, or disillusionment with the system from which the individual in question leaves. It is a more common term in the US and Canada, but also applies worldwide.
name: Dropout

description:
A character with this trait elopes with another character of the VN.

[URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elopement_%28marriage%29]Elopement[/URL] is often used to refer to a marriage conducted in sudden and secretive fashion, usually involving a hurried flight away from one's place of residence together with one's beloved with the intention of getting married. It is colloquially used for any marriage performed in haste, with a limited public engagement period or without a public engagement period. Some couples elope because they wish to avoid objections from parents, or religious obligations.
name: Elopement

description:
This character carries somebody the bridal style.

A man or possibly a woman carries a woman/man in his arms — one arm under their legs and the other supporting their back like a groom carrying his bride.
name: Bridal Carry

description:
This character is seen with a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wrench]wrench[/url].

A wrench is a tool used to provide grip and mechanical advantage in applying torque to turn objects—usually rotary fasteners, such as nuts and bolts—or keep them from turning.
name: Wrench

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wild_boar]boar[/url].

Boars are a suid native to much of Eurasia, North Africa, and the Greater Sunda Islands. Boars are a bulky, massively built suid with short and relatively thin legs. The trunk is short and massive, while the hindquarters are comparatively underdeveloped. The animal's head is very large, taking up to one third of the body's entire length.
name: Boar

description: This character has [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fish_fin]fish fins[/url] on their body.
name: Fish Fins

description: This character is a [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nun#Christianity]Christian nun[/URL].
name: Christian Nun

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kannushi]Shinto shrine priest[/url].

They take care of Shinto shrines and may perform various religious ceremonies.
name: Shinto Priest

description: Meta trait for full body suits. Unlike [url=https://vndb.org/i143]business suits[/url], full body suits are usually designed for a specific purpose, usually to protect the wearer from harsh conditions. A few examples: space suits, diving suits, tactical suits, etc.

description:

Taser is a type of electroshock weapon used by firing two small dart-like electrodes, which stay connected to the main unit by conductors, to deliver electric current to disrupt voluntary control of muscles causing "neuromuscular incapacitation". The electrodes are pointed to penetrate clothing and barbed to prevent removal once in place.

Unlike a [url=/i1306]stun gun[/url], a taser can launch its electrodes, allowing the user to maintain some distance between themselves and the target.
name: Taser

description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polyamory]polyamory[/url].

Polyamory is the practice of having more than one intimate relationship at the same time, with the full knowledge and consent of all partners involved.

Use [url=/i862]polygamy[/url] instead if the character is married to more then one spouse.
name: Polyamory

description:
In Japan, a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/R%C5%8Dnin_(student)]kanendosei[/url] (colloquially, a "ronin") is a student who has graduated from middle school or high school but has failed to enter a school at the next level, and consequently is studying outside of the school system for entrance in a future year. They may study at a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yobik%C5%8D]yobiko[/url].

A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/R%C5%8Dnin]ronin[/url] was a samurai with no lord or master during the feudal period (1185–1868) of Japan. In modern Japanese usage, the term also describes a salaryman who is "between employers" or a secondary school graduate who has not yet been admitted to university.
name: Kanendosei

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Janitor]janitor[/url].

A janitor (American English, Scottish English), custodian (British English), janitress (female), cleaner or caretaker is a person who cleans and maintains buildings such as hospitals, schools and residential accommodation. A janitors' primary responsibility is as a cleaner, but in some cases, they will also carry out maintenance and security duties.
name: Janitor

description:
This character is infamous, someone who is known for a reputation that's not exactly regarded positively in public eyes.

The counterpart of being famous, this character is well known for some bad quality or deed. Note that being infamous does not mean one is automatically a criminal or villain or evil, many infamy can be created due to the character's reputation, wide spread rumors, and/or the person being misunderstood, the same as how positive fame is spread, only towards a more negative note.

ex. being a lone wolf that is well known for some reputation yet most people hesitate to interact with him/her due to said reputation and/or maybe along with their intimidating air, but in fact that person may have a heart of gold or is just misunderstood.

On the other hand, it's also possible for one person to be both famous and infamous at the same time, being well known and revered to positively on one hand in one group, while at the same time resented or feared by some other group of people or even seen as an outcast with a formidable and/or notorious reputation.

On another note, many criminals and villains usually have a reputation of infamy. However, it should be noted that although criminals, villains, and generally evil characters are usually infamous, infamy does not automatically mark someone as evil as explained above. Many anti-heroes can have a degree of infamy, the same as how a villain can actually be famous positively but it's actually a mask to hide their true selves and goals as well as using the public to their advantage.
name: Infamous

description:
This character has [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Autism]autism[/url].

Autism is a disorder of neural development characterized by impaired social interaction, by impaired verbal and non-verbal communication, and by restricted, repetitive or stereotyped behavior. The diagnostic criteria require that symptoms become apparent before a child is three years old.

Only use this tag for characters who are explicitly said to be autistic (within the story or by the creators). Do not use it for characters who are simply too shy to properly communicate, for example.
name: Autism

description: A character with this trait is a subject of sacrifice in darker purposes, whether they are willing or unwilling.
name: Evil Sacrifice

description:
This character is the leader of a music club associated with a school.

Typically, the main goal of a music club is to gather together to learn to play music, sing songs, and perfect their skills day by day. A club typically has the opportunity to hold a performance at the school's festival, which is usually a concert in an auditorium.
name: School Music Club President

description: These are traits for sexual content that many people are likely to find uncomfortable.
name: Darker Sexual Content

description: These are traits for sexual content that many people are likely to find uncomfortable.
name: Darker Sexual Content

description:
These are the traits about which personal pronoun(s) a character regularly uses.

Unlike the English language, Japanese has a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]large number of personal pronouns[/url], differing in use by formality, gender, age, and relative social status of speaker and audience.
name: Personal Pronouns

description:
This character is [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arabs]Arab[/url].

Arabs (Arabic: عرب‎‎, ‘arab) are a major panethnicity whose native language is Arabic, comprising the majority of the Arab world. They primarily inhabit Western Asia, North Africa, and parts of the Horn of Africa.
name: Arab

description:
Character takes part in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Physical_exercise]physical exercises[/url].

Don't apply this to characters who are just getting some exercise incidentally while doing something else.
name: Working Out

description: The character is seen with either [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portable_media_player]digital[/url] or [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portable_audio_player]analog[/url] portable media playback device.
name: Media Player

description: This character wears a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hood_%28headgear%29]hood[/url] with animal ears on it.
name: Kemonomimi Hood

description:
This characters wears tassets.

Tassets are a piece of armor designed to protect the upper leg area. These consists of hanging plates hanging down from a belt area.

It can be either metal or leather. Or both (studded).

[url=http://ep.yimg.com/ay/yhst-87491460501412/king-tasset-belt-7.gif]Example 1[/url], [url=http://www.kultofathena.com/images%5CLP200911_l.jpg]Example 2[/url] - Metal

description:
This character's physical body becomes younger through magical or other means.

This may occur gradually, or they may suddenly become several years or decades younger.
name: Physical Age Reversion

description: A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Judge]judge[/url] is a public official who administers the law, presiding over court trials and rendering judgements.
name: Judge

description:
This character has a long tongue.

This means it extends out of the mouth much more than a normal human tongue. A long tongue is common in reptiles, monster girls or monsters.
name: Long Tongue

description:
The [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chimera_(mythology)]Chimera[/url] was, according to Greek mythology, a monstrous fire-breathing hybrid creature, composed of the parts of more than one animal.

It is usually depicted as a lion, with the head of a goat arising from its back, and a tail that might end with a snake's head. However, "chimera" has come to describe any mythical or fictional animal with parts taken from various animals.

Air hockey requires an air-hockey table (a table with large, smooth playing surface), two player-held mallets, and a puck. description:
A vassal is a person regarded as having a mutual obligation to a lord, monarch, shogun or a person with similar authority. The obligations often included military support and mutual protection, in exchange for certain privileges, usually including land held as a tenant or fief.

In Feudal Japan, the relations between the powerful daimyo and shugo and the subordinate ji-samurai bear some obvious resemblance to western vassalage, although there are also some significant differences.

Earmuffs are objects designed to cover a person's ears for protection or for warmth. They consist of a thermoplastic or metal head-band, that fits over the top or back of the head, and a pad at each end, to cover the external ears.

Modern earmuffs come in two basic kinds:

-Thermal earmuffs, worn in cold environments to keep a person's ears warm with pads of cloth or fur.
-Acoustic earmuffs, also known as ear defenders: cups lined with sound-deadening material, like thermal earmuffs and headphones in appearance, which are worn as hearing protection. These may be carried on a head-band or clipped onto the sides of a hard hat, for use on construction sites.
name: Earmuffs

The term ‘[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gorget]gorget[/url]’ was originally used to describe a linen band that women wore around their neck and head or the lower part of a simple chaperon hood during the medieval period. However, it came into later use as a word to describe armor worn around the neck, ranging from materials such as leather, chain mail and plated copper, iron or steel. An antihero is a character lacking conventional heroic attributes. They are contrary to the belief of a typical archetype hero and use questionable methods to achieve their own ideals, all the while staying true as a 'hero'.

Often, they perform less moral actions such as fighting dirty, ambushing their opponents when they least expect, and outright killing their enemies when the chance arrives. Their personality might show attributes usually considered unbecoming of a true hero, like having anger issues, being rude, arrogant, cowardly, drunk or a womanizer, but their heart is in the right place, and they strive towards an admirable and heroic goal.
name: Antihero

description:

A school sports club is a administration-approved student-based school organization focusing on a selected sport. Kendo is a modern Japanese martial art of sword-fighting based on traditional samurai swordsmanship.
