A Khakkhara is a Buddhist staff consisting of a steel ringed head with dangling metal rings intertwined in the loop. They are primarily used in prayers, or sometimes used as a weapon.

They may be kept in pens, on farms, in barns or allowed to roam free but treated as livestock nonetheless. They also tend to be striped of their freedom and human status, being treated and sometimes even sold like animals or possessions without any regards for their individual rights. Costumes of farm animals like pigs and cows, or in more extreme cases body modifications to match said animals may also be featured.

This is usually non-consensual, with the character being turned into livestock against the will or having gone through a process of mindbreak, brainwashing or other methods that compromised their ability to consent. Despite that, consensual variations where the character willingly subjects themselves to this treatment do exist.

description:
This character plays [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Table_tennis]table tennis[/url].

Table tennis is a sport in which two or four players hit a lightweight ball back and forth across a table using a small bat. The game takes place on a hard table divided by a net. Except for the initial serve, the rules are generally as follows: players must allow a ball played toward them to bounce one time on their side of the table, and must return it so that it bounces on the opposite side at least once. A point is scored when a player fails to return the ball within the rules. Play is fast and demands quick reactions. Spinning the ball alters its trajectory and limits an opponent's options, giving the hitter a great advantage.
name: Table tennis

description:
This character wears an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crowns_of_Egypt]egyptian crown[/url].

The Egyptian civilization used a number of different crowns throughout its existence. Some were used to show authority, while others were used for religious ceremonies. Each crown was worn by different pharaohs or deities, and each crown had its own significance and symbolic meaning.

[url=http://www.landofpyramids.org/crown-of-egypt.htm]More examples[/url]
name: Egyptian Crown

Nevertheless, the term may also be used pars pro toto to indicate all body piercings in the area of anus, perineum, genitals and mons pubis, including piercings such as anal, guiche, and pubic that do not involve perforation of genitalia.
Genital jewellery, also known as sex jewellery and adult jewellery, is jewellery which is designed specifically for wear on or to accentuate the genitals.

description:
An [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Orc]orc[/url] is a fictional humanoid creature that is part of a fantasy race akin to goblins.

The exact definition of the orc varies greatly depending on the setting. Orcs typical to western fantasy tend to strongly resemble humans, but are much taller and more muscular, have green or tan-colored skin, and have tusks. Orcs typical to Japanese-style fantasy tend to possess pig-like features such as snouts and pig ears, or are sometimes little more than gigantic, bipedal pigs.

Other varieties exist, and anything that is called an orc in-fiction can be tagged as such.
name: Orc

A ball gown is the most formal female attire for social occasions. It is traditionally a full-skirted gown reaching the floor, made of luxurious fabric, delicately and exotically trimmed. Most versions are cut off the shoulder with decollete necklines. Such gowns are typically worn with a stole (a formal shawl in expensive fabric), cape or cloak in lieu of a coat, "good" (couture or vintage) jewellery and opera-length gloves. Standard accessories are dancing shoes and a clutch style evening bag.
name: Ball Gown

Space pirates operate as pirates in outer space and travel by spacecraft, as opposed to the more traditional pirates on the high seas of Earth, who travel by ship. However, just as traditional seafaring pirates target sailing ships, space pirates serve a similar role in sci-fi media: they capture and plunder spacecraft for cargo, loot and occasionally they steal the entire spacecraft itself, and kill the crewmembers.
name: Space Pirate

description:
This character starts as a male but has his lifestyle modified into that of a trap/crossdresser by his own choice or by sexual training, either consensual or not. All of that usually ends up in cross-dressing, especially in the clothes related to a traditional submissive female role, such as schoolgirl, secretary or a maid. Surgical intervention and/or sex change might eventually occur, but is not a requirement.

Where feminization is forced, it also usually leads to erotic humiliation, corporal punishment and cuckolding.

What NOT to consider feminization:
- VN where a character wakes up in a girl's body or he magically gender bends
- VN where a character disguises as a cross-dresser for various purposes, like infiltrating an all-girl school
- VN where the character is transgender and assumes feminine role as part of their transitioning

An example of a VN about feminization is (NSFW): [url=/v19290]Kanojo o Netotta Yarichin Otoko o Mesu Ochisaseru Made[/url].

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Midwife]midwife[/url].

A midwife is a professional in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Midwifery]midwifery[/url], specializing in pregnancy, childbirth, postpartum, women's sexual and reproductive health (including annual gynecological exams, family planning, menopausal care and others), and newborn care.
name: Midwife

description:
A [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mental_breakdown]mental breakdown[/URL] is an acute, time-limited mental disorder that manifests primarily as severe stress-induced depression, anxiety, or dissociation in a previously functional individual, to the extent that they are no longer able to function on a day-to-day basis until the disorder is resolved.

A nervous breakdown is defined by its temporary nature, and often closely tied to psychological burnout, severe overwork, sleep deprivation, and similar stressors, which may combine to temporarily overwhelm an individual with otherwise sound mental functions.
name: Mental Breakdown

description:
This character has an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eidetic_memory]eidetic memory[/url].

Eidetic memory is an ability to vividly recall images from memory after only a few instances of exposure, with high precision for a brief time after exposure, without using a mnemonic device. Although the terms eidetic memory and photographic memory are popularly used interchangeably, they are also distinguished, with eidetic memory referring to the ability to view memories like photographs for a few minutes, and photographic memory referring to the ability to recall page or text numbers, or similar, in great detail.
name: Eidetic Memory

description:
The player can choose this character's gender and/or the English pronouns they use. This is usually used for a game's protagonist (as in many VNs tagged with [URL=https://vndb.org/g2201]Protagonist Gender Choice[/URL]).

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blacksmith]blacksmith[/url].

A blacksmith is a metalsmith who creates objects from wrought iron or steel by forging the metal, using tools to hammer, bend, and cut. Blacksmiths produce objects such as gates, grilles, railings, light fixtures, furniture, sculpture, tools, agricultural implements, decorative and religious items, cooking utensils and weapons.

Blacksmiths also have a general knowledge of how to make and repair many things, from the most complex of weapons and armor to simple things like nails or lengths of chain.
name: Blacksmith

A quiver is a container for arrows, crossbow bolts or darts, such as those fired from a bow, crossbow or blowgun. It can be carried on an archer's body, the bow, or the ground, depending on the type of shooting and the archer's personal preference. Quivers were traditionally made of leather, wood, furs, and other natural materials, but are now often made of metal or plastic.
name: Quiver

Cross-dressing is the wearing of clothing and other accessories commonly associated with a gender within a particular society that is seen as different than the one usually presented by the dresser. Cross-dressing has been used for disguise, performance art and as a literary trope in modern times and throughout history.

For cross-dressing consented by the character themselves, use [url=/i48]Engages in >> Cross-dressing[/url].

A toga is a robe-like garment made from a semicircular piece of cloth which is draped over the body. Togas are traditionally associated with ancient Rome, where they were a type of (usually men's) formal wear.

Related to the toga is the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stola]stola[/url], a type of long, pleated dress worn by women in ancient Rome which looks similar and is often called a toga in modern English.
name: Toga

The semen may afterwards be returned to the partner's mouth, mixed with saliva; the couple or other partners may then exchange the fluid several times, causing its volume to increase (hence "snowballing").
name: Snowballing

The scope of cosmetic surgery procedures includes:
* Breast Enhancement: Augmentation, Lift, Reduction
* Facial Contouring: Rhinoplasty, Chin, or Cheek Enhancement
* Facial Rejuvenation: Facelift, Eyelid Lift, Neck Lift, Brow Lift
* Body Contouring: Tummy Tuck, Liposuction, Gynecomastia Treatment
* Skin Rejuvenation: Laser Resurfacing, Botox, Filler Treatments

A sports club manager is a person (typically female) who helps a sports team with various menial tasks, such as cleaning and sorting equipment, laundry, recording player and game stats, distributing towels and drinks, and others.

description:
[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Karuta]Karuta[/url] is a Japanese card game originating from Portugal. Most of the karuta games use [url=/https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/E-awase]e-awase[/url] cards.

The basic idea of any e-awase karuta game is to be able to quickly determine which card out of an array of cards is required and then to grab the card before it is grabbed by an opponent. The two types of e-awase karuta decks that are most often seen are the uta-garuta and iroha-karuta. In uta-garuta, players try to find the last two lines of a waka given the first three lines. It is often possible to identify a poem by its first one or two syllables. The poems for this game are taken from the Ogura Hyakunin Isshu and are traditionally played on New Year's Day.
name: Karuta

description: This character is [URL=https://en.oxforddictionaries.com/definition/cheerful]cheerful[/URL], seeming to always be in a good mood. They're happy and wear big, bright smiles.

Often used for professional purposes but this trait can also apply to those who wear it as a fashion statement.

[URL=http://www.occidental-leather.com/adjustable/9855.jpg]Example 1: Builder[/URL]
[URL=http://multifiles.pressherald.com/uploads/sites/4/2011/04/UtilityBeltGraphic0411-1024x914.jpg]Example 2: Police officer[/URL]
[URL=http://www.thefoamcave.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/41Iqk2V-MoL.jpg]Example 3: Generic/Unspecified[/URL]

A [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Straitjacket]straitjacket[/URL] is a garment shaped like a jacket with overlong sleeves and is typically used to restrain a person who may otherwise cause harm to him/herself or others.

Once the arms are inserted into the straitjacket's sleeves, they are then crossed across the chest. The ends of the sleeves are then tied to the back of the wearer, ensuring that the arms are kept close to the chest with as little movement as possible.
name: Straitjacket

A director is a person who directs the making of a film, movie or TV show.

A middle brother is a male sibling who is older than his younger sibling, but at the same time he's younger than his elder sibling.
name: Middle Brother

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trans_woman]transwoman[/url].

Transsexual people experience a gender identity that is inconsistent or not culturally associated with their assigned sex, and desire to permanently transition to the gender with which they identify- usually seeking medical assistance to help them align their body with their identified sex or gender.

A transwoman is a woman who was assigned male at birth, but who has already made a permanent or partial transition, or have recently started to transition to the opposite sex (this could be before or during the story).

Please note that transwomen and [URL=https://vndb.org/i737]futanari[/URL] are not the same- transwomen only have one set of genitalia whereas futanari possess both male and female genitalia.
name: Transwoman

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trans_man]transman[/url].

Transsexual people experience a gender identity that is inconsistent or not culturally associated with their assigned sex, and desire to permanently transition to the gender with which they identify- usually seeking medical assistance to help them align their body with their identified sex or gender.

A trans man is a man who was assigned female at birth, but who has already made a permanent or partial transition, or have recently started to transition to the opposite sex (this could be before or during the story).
name: Transman

description:
This character is confined in a [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simulated_reality]simulated reality[/URL], involuntarily or voluntarily.

A specific variation of this trope is called a "Lotus-Eater Machine". In this, a character, usually the protagonist, is knocked out or goes to sleep and wakes up in their own personal paradise. In reality, they're being held prisoner by another character who, using technology, magic or other methods, induces very intense and very realistic hallucinations. Sometimes the lotus-eater doesn't know it's all fake. Sometimes they do know but don't care. [Edited from [url=http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/LotusEaterMachine]TV Tropes[/url]]

NOTE: By the very nature of this trait, the majority- if not all- of its instances would be spoilers. Please apply spoilers accordingly.
name: Confinement in a Simulated Reality

description:
This character is involved in a romantic relationship that doesn't work out and they "dump" their partner.

A relationship breakup, often referred to simply as a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Breakup]breakup[/url], is the termination of an intimate relationship by any means other than death. The act is commonly termed "dumping [someone]" in slang when it is initiated by one partner or "getting dumped by [someone]" for the partner on the receiving end.

Please refer to the "Subject of/[URL=https://vndb.org/i2406/]Breakup[/URL]" for characters that are on the receiving end of a breakup.
name: Breakup

description:
This character is a [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nun]nun[/URL].

A nun is a member of a religious community of women, typically one living under vows of poverty, chastity, and obedience. She may have decided to dedicate her life to serving all other living beings, or she might be an ascetic who voluntarily chose to leave mainstream society and live her life in prayer and contemplation in a monastery or convent. 

The term "nun" is applicable to Catholics (eastern and western traditions), Orthodox Christians, Anglicans, Lutherans, Jains, Buddhists, Taoists, Hindus and some other religious traditions.
name: Nun

description:
This character engages in a specific type of [URL=https://vndb.org/i557]cosplay[/URL]- dressing up as an animal.

NOTE: For characters that only engage in sexual cosplay, please use the more specific [URL=https://vndb.org/i2458]Sexual Animal Cosplay[/URL] trait instead.
name: Animal Cosplay

description: This character engages in a specific type of [URL=https://vndb.org/i557]cosplay[/URL]- dressing up in sexualised animal costumes.
name: Sexual Animal Cosplay

description:
This character is a priest for a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Priest#Christianity]Christian[/url] sect, ie, Catholic, Anglican, Orthodox.

A priest performs mass and takes care of a church.
name: Christian Priest

description: This character engages in [URL=https://vndb.org/i557]sexualised cosplay[/URL], meaning that they participate in sexual activities whilst dressing up either as a different fictional character, or creature (real or fictional).
name: Sexual Cosplay

description:
This character gives birth from the anus, through anal [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Viviparity]viviparous[/url] birth, to any kind of non-human creatures or monsters during the course of the story. 
[b]In case of anal eggs laying just use [url=/i3968]Engages in > Anal Egg Laying[/url][/b].

Important note: Only use this trait if the birth of the baby monsters are part of the story. If it's just implied or covered by a time-jump and only the result (e.g. monsters are running rampart where there were none before) is shown, then do NOT use this trait!
name: Anal Monster Birth

description:
This character works as a dentist. 

A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dentist]dentist[/url], also known as a dental surgeon, is a surgeon who specializes in dentistry, the diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of diseases and conditions of the oral cavity. The dentist's supporting team aids in providing oral health services. The dental team includes dental assistants, dental hygienists, dental technicians, and, in some states, dental therapists.

This trait can also be used for those who work in the aforementioned dental supporting team.
name: Dentist

description:
This character engages in creating a pornographic production against the actor's will, where the actor is raped, is under the influence of drugs, mind control, magic, or another means that prevent them giving a valid consent, or where the "actor" is unaware they are being filmed. The character works as a producer, director, cameraman, or another member of the staff, but is not involved as an actor in front of the camera. Use [url=/i1358]Non-consensual Porn Filming[/url] for the non- consenting actors involved in the shoot.

If the character is both a consenting actor and the one producing the shoot, as might happen in low budget amateur productions, use this trait in addition to [url=/i1853]Non-consensual Porn Acting (volunteer)[/url].
name: Non-consensual Porn Production

description:
This character wears a collar for slavery purposes.

A slave collar is a band encircling the neck which is placed on the wearer by another person to indicate the wearer's submission or enslavement.

In sexual situations, this often incorporates [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Collar_(BDSM)]collar use in BDSM[/URL].
name: Slave Collar

description:
A character with this trait wears a pet collar.

A [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Collar_(animal)]pet collar[/URL] is a piece of material put around the neck of certain pet animals, such as dogs or cats, for control, identification, or other purposes. Identification tags and medical information is often placed on collars. Collars are also useful for controlling the animal, as they provide a handle for grabbing or means of leading.

[URL=https://vndb.org/c9473]Example 1[/URL]
[URL=https://vndb.org/c14653]Example 2[/URL]
[URL=https://vndb.org/c54555]Example 3[/URL]

NOTE: This trait is intended for [pet] animals wearing collars, not humans wearing collars in a slavery and/or sexual context.

For collars worn in slavery contexts (including in sexual contexts), please use [URL=https://vndb.org/i2465]Slave Collar[/URL]. 
For collar-styled neck accessories (usually worn by humans), please use [URL=https://vndb.org/i1568]Choker[/URL].
name: Pet Collar

description: This character is a [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Animal]real-life animal[/URL].
name: Animal

description:
This character is in an open relationship.

An [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_relationship]open relationship[/URL] is an umbrella term for any relationship that is open to new sexual and/or romantic partners.

Specifically, it is an interpersonal relationship in which the parties want to be together but agree to a form of non-monogamous relationship. This means that they agree that other people relating in a flirting manner, sexual or physical, or intimate way with their partner is permitted, or often times tolerated. Generally, an open relationship is when the parties involved have two or more sexual relationships occurring at the same time either as a short-term relationship, such as dating, or a long-term relationship, such as marriage.
name: Open Relationship

description:
This character wears a band- usually a collar or bracelet- with lethal functions designed to force them into participating in a death game.

The band is typically unable to be removed by the person who wears it, and is equipped with a mechanism that causes the person's death, such as exploding or injecting poison into their body.
name: Death Game Accessory

description:
Another character farts on this character's face. Apply [url=/i2402]Face-farting[/url] to the character doing the farting.

Face-farting is a bonding activity where a person, usually a girl, sits on a boy's or another girl's face and forces them to smell their farts. Normally, it is done for sexual pleasure for either side.
name: Face-farting

description: [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massage]Massage[/url] involves working and acting on the body with pressure – structured, unstructured, stationary, or moving – tension, motion, or vibration, done manually or with mechanical aids. Massage can be applied with the hands, fingers, elbows, knees, forearm, feet, or a massage device. Massage can promote relaxation and well-being, can be a recreational activity, and can be sexual in nature.
name: Massage

description: [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erotic_massage]Erotic massage[/url] or sensuous massage is the use of massage techniques by a person on another person's erogenous zones to achieve or enhance their sexual excitation or arousal. In the case of women, the two focal areas are the breasts and pubis, while in case of men, the focal area is the male genitals.
name: Erotic Massage

description:
This character [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spitting]spits[/url] on another character during a sex scene in order to produce erotic excitement or sexual arousal. Apply [url=/i2475]Subject of (Sexual) > Erotic Spitting[/url] to the other character, or [url=/i2476]Engages in (Sexual) > Spit Drinking[/url] if they're drinking it.

Erotic Spitting can be done, but not necessarily, as a type of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erotic_humiliation]erotic humiliation[/url] and usually contains elements of submission for the person being spat on, and dominance, for the person spitting.
name: Erotic Spitting

description:
Another character [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spitting]spits[/url] on this character during a sex scene in order to produce erotic excitement or sexual arousal. Apply [url=/i2474]Engages in (Sexual) > Erotic Spitting[/url] to the spitting character.

Erotic Spitting can be done, but not necessarily, as a type of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erotic_humiliation]erotic humiliation[/url] and usually contains elements of submission for the person being spat on, and dominance, for the person spitting.
name: Erotic Spitting

description:
This character drinks another character's spit in a sex scene. Apply [url=/i2474]Engages in (Sexual) > Erotic Spitting[/url] to the spitting character.

Erotic Spitting can be done, but not necessarily, as a type of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erotic_humiliation]erotic humiliation[/url] and usually contains elements of submission for the person being spat on, and dominance, for the person spitting.
name: Spit Drinking

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Godparent]godparent[/url].

A godparent, in many denominations of Christianity, is someone who bears witness to a child's baptism, although the term has also been used in a legal sense. In both religious and civil views, a godparent tends to be an individual chosen by the parents to take an interest in the child's upbringing and personal development, and to take care of the child should anything happen to the parents.
In fairy tales, a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fairy_godmother]fairy godmother[/url] is a fairy with magical powers who acts as a mentor or parent to someone, in the role that an actual godparent was expected to play in many societies.
name: Godparent

description:
This character is a godchild.

A godchild, in the Christian religion, is a child whose moral and religious development is partly the responsibility of two or more [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Godparent]godparents[/url].
name: Godchild

description:
This character has a human-like appearance. Features include two-legged bipedalism and at least two arms and hands.

This trait is to describe [url=/i408]nature[/url] characters that feature human-like features. Do not apply this trait to characters who are pure human beings.
name: Humanoid (Non-human)

description:
This character is seen wearing a bunnygirl costume/dress. 
Bunny girl cosplay are far more common in Japan than normal bunny/rabbit cosplay.

The key parts of a bunny girl costume/dress are: bunny kemonomimi headband and leotard. Other items usually added to the costume are: fishnet or normal pantyhose, high heels, bunny tail, cuffs, bowtie.

In case of sexual roleplay use it in conjunction with [url=https://vndb.org/i2458]Sexual Animal Cosplay[/url] and [url=https://vndb.org/i1370]Petplay[/url] (if applicable).

Bunny girl costume:
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/30/101330.jpg]Example[/url]
Bunny girl cosplay with sexual petplay:
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/31/101331.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/32/101332.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]
name: Bunnygirl Cosplay

description:
Spanking is a common form of corporal punishment involving the act of striking the buttocks of another person to cause physical pain, generally with an open hand. Spanking can be done for punishment or behavior correction, primarily to children.

This tag applies to the character subjected to this act.

If a character is subjected to erotic spanking, use i1139 instead.
name: Spanking

description:
Spanking is a common form of corporal punishment involving the act of striking the buttocks of another person to cause physical pain, generally with an open hand. Spanking can be done for punishment or behavior correction, primarily to children.

This tag applies to the character performing the act.

If a character is performing erotic spanking, use i1688 instead.
name: Spanking

description: [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Color_blindness]Color blindness[/url], also known as color vision deficiency, is the decreased ability to see color or differences in color.
name: Color Blindness

description:
This person doesn't have much enthusiasm for the sexual act and might do other stuff during the intercourse (like fiddling with their phone, playing video games or reading manga). They even may not show any emotions while being fucked.

Only use the trait for characters engaging in consensual sex scenes, and not for non-con content where the victim enters an emotionless state.
name: Unenthusiastic Sex

description:
The character is fully aware that they are in the game and break the illusion of reality of the game's setting by either indirectly or directly addressing the audience.

Alternatively, they may interact with their creator (the writer or director of the novel, etc.). This is more akin to breaking one of the walls of the set, but the existence of a director implies the existence of an audience, so it's still indirectly Breaking The Fourth Wall.

This trope is usually used for comedic purposes.

Read more on [url=http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/BreakingTheFourthWall?from=Main.BreakTheFourthWall]TV Tropes[/url].
name: Breaking the Fourth Wall

description: This character is a temporary protagonist for a short while, before the game switches to the main protagonist
name: Temporary Protagonist

description:
This character is a member of a school literature club.
They meet to talk about books and writing.
name: School Literature Club Member

description: This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Single_parent]single parent[/url]. They are raising, or have raised, one or more children on their own. This is most often a result of the parent separating from a partner, having a child unintentionally, or becoming widowed. However, a person can also choose to have or adopt a child by themselves.
name: Single Parent

description:
This character has a sex scene with someone other than the protagonist, but this event can be avoided by making different choices, succeeding better in earlier segments of the story or getting onto a different route.

For example, c24783 from v114, in the game's bad endings.
name: Avoidable Sex with Others

description:
This character wears their clothing unfastened, untidy, and unsecured. Distinctively, they're often seen with open [url=/i160]shirts[/url] and untied [url=/i999]ribbons[/url].

Only apply this trait to characters who primarily wear (at least a few) clothing articles unfastened. Do not confuse with [url=/i2106]Oversized Clothing[/url], where the character wears clothing apparently big for them.
name: Loose

description:
This character wears a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bedlah]bedlah[/url]-type costume.

In the world of belly dance the term bedlah refers simply to the costume that a dancer wears. Most commonly it is used to refer to the matched set of bra and belt that cabaret dancers use, but technically it encompasses all parts of the dancer's costume as well, such as the jewelry, headband, skirt, pants and veil. This is often referred to as a Complete Bedlah.

Occasionally it also refers to just one piece of the costume such as the highly ornate belt that tribal dancers wear which may or may not have a matching bra.

Examples:
[url=https://s.vndb.org/ch/20/65920.jpg]Example 1[/url] - c54802
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/20/112320.jpg]Example 2[/url] - c1545
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/21/112321.jpg]Example 3[/url] - c21209 (Non-dancer type)
name: Bedlah

description:
This character rejects the confession of another character because they do not share the same feelings.

Note: Please ONLY use this trait when there is a clear confession of love and a clear rejection follows it up.
name: Turndown

description:
This character had previous sexual experiences involving anal penetration before the game's story begins. They might still keep an active sexual life.

Regarding this trait, the virginity of character's other holes doesn't matter. The trait applies if they had been anally penetrated with a penis before the start of the story.

Do not use the trait for the anal penetration with fingers or dildos, but only where the actual sexual intercourse is involved.
name: Not an Anal Virgin

description:
This character is part of a volleyball club or team associated with their school.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Volleyball]Volleyball[/url] is a team sport in which two teams of six players are separated by a net. Each team tries to score points by grounding a ball on the other team's court under organized rules.
name: School Volleyball Club Member

description:
This character [url=/i1128]Engages in > Monster Birth[/url] from the nipples.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/19/112019.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Nipple Monster Birth

description:
This character wears a [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/14/112414.jpg]tennis outfit[/url].

A tennis outfit usually consists of shorts, t-shirt or polo for men and t-shirt and mini-skirt or tennis dress for women.
name: Tennis Outfit

description: A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goblin]goblin[/url] is a monstrous creature from European folklore, first attested in stories from the Middle Ages. They are ascribed various and conflicting abilities, temperaments and appearances depending on the story and country of origin. They are almost always small and grotesque, mischievous or outright malicious, and greedy, especially for gold and jewelry.
name: Goblin

description: The [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zucchetto]zucchetto[/url] is a small, hemispherical, form-fitting ecclesiastical skullcap worn by clerics of various Catholic churches.
name: Zuchetto

description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flagellation]Flagellation[/url] (Latin flagellum, "whip"), flogging, whipping or lashing is the act of methodically beating the human body with special implements such as whips, lashes, rods, switches, the cat o' nine tails, the sjambok, etc. 

Typically, flogging is imposed on an unwilling subject as a punishment; however, it can also be submitted to willingly, or performed on oneself, in religious or sadomasochistic contexts.

Apply this trait on characters whipping someone in a sexual context . Apply its [url=https://vndb.org/i1676]counterpart[/url] to the characters being whipped. If the whipping happens in a non-sexual context, consider simply applying [url=/i427]Engages in > Torture[/url] instead.
name: Whipping (BDSM)

description:
A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vacuum_bed]vacuum bed[/url] is a body size latex envelope in frame with breathing holes. After the subject lays into it, the air is pumped out of it, holding the person inside tight.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/51/113151.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/39/101339.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/37/101337.jpg]NSFW Example 3[/url]
name: Vacuum Bed

description:
These are the traits regarding [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crime]crime[/url].

Crime is an action or omission which constitutes an offence and is punishable by law.
name: Crime

description:
These are the traits regarding [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crime]crime[/url].

Crime is an action or omission which constitutes an offence and is punishable by law.
name: Crime

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dominatrix]dominatrix[/url].

The dominatrix is a female archetype which operates on a symbolic mode of representation, associated with particular attire and props that are drawn on within popular culture to signify her role—as a strong, dominant, sexualised woman—linked to but distinct from images of sexual fetish.

This trait applies to both paid professionals (pro-dommes) and characters who habitually adopt a dominant persona in BDSM activities. It should not be applied to characters who cosplay as a dominatrix for a single sex scene, or who are the dominant partner but just act casually and don't assume a persona.
name: Dominatrix

description:
This character wears the male version of a chastity belt called [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/51/113551.jpg]penis cage[/url].

A penis cage is a locking item of clothing for men designed to prevent sexual intercourse and masturbation. Penis cages are commonly used in VN related to [url=https://vndb.org/g1117]BDSM[/url] and [url=https://vndb.org/g718]female domination[/url].

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/52/113552.jpg]NSFW Penis Cage 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/54/113554.jpg]NSFW Penis Cage 2[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/53/113553.jpg]NSFW Penis Cage 3[/url]
name: Penis Cage

description:
This character nipples becomes darker during the course of the VN due to [url=https://vndb.org/i484]pregnancy[/url].

It’s pregnancy hormones that are responsible for changes in the color of the nipples since they stimulate a temporary increase in the amount of melanin your body produces.

Do NOT use this trait for random dark nipples, it's related to pregnancy only nipple darkening.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/47/113547.jpg]NSFW Example Before Darkening 1[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/48/113548.jpg]NSFW Example After Darkening 1[/url] 
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/49/113549.jpg]NSFW Example Before Darkening 2[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/50/113550.jpg]NSFW Example After Darkening 2[/url]
name: Darker Nipples (Pregnancy)

description: This character is clearly dubbed by a person of a different gender than him/her, if it is a male character, he has a woman voice, and vice-versa.
name: Opposite Gender Voiced

description:
This character has a weapon(s) with a name(s).
The weapon has a name because it is a mythical/legendary weapon or the character just gave a nickname to their weapon.
Example: In BlazBlue Jin's sword is called Yukianesa.

Do not use this trait if the weapon has just a model name, e.g. AK-47.
name: Named Weapon

description: This character is a [url=https://vndb.org/i311]Girlfriend[/url] but her relation with her lover is intentionally hidden from other people.
name: Secret Girlfriend

description: This character is a [url=https://vndb.org/i310]Boyfriend[/url] but his relation with his lover is intentionally hidden from other people.
name: Secret Boyfriend

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/President] president[/url].

A president is the head of state and government in most republics.
name: President

description: [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Circumcision]Circumcision[/url] is the removal of the foreskin of the penis, either for religious or cultural reasons or as a medical treatment for phimosis or other conditions. It is common in the United States and parts of Africa and Southeast Asia, but uncommon in Japan and most of the rest of the world.
name: Circumcised

description: This character wears a sleeveless shirt with a turtleneck.
name: Turtleneck Tank Top

description:
An [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eating_disorder]eating disorder[/url] is a mental disorder defined by abnormal eating habits that negatively affect a person's physical or mental health.

They include binge eating disorder where people eat a large amount in a short period of time, anorexia nervosa where people eat very little and thus have a low body weight, bulimia nervosa where people eat a lot and then try to rid themselves of the food, pica where people eat non-food items, rumination disorder where people regurgitate food, avoidant/restrictive food intake disorder where people have a lack of interest in food [...]. These disorders do not include obesity.
name: Eating Disorder

description:
This character loses their job.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Termination_of_employment]Termination of employment[/url], is an employee's departure from a job and the end of an employee's duration with an employer. Termination may be voluntary on the employee's part, or it may be at the hands of the employer, often in the form of dismissal (firing) or a layoff. Dismissal or firing is generally thought to be the fault of the employee, whereas a layoff is generally done for business reasons (for instance a business slowdown or an economic downturn) outside the employee's performance.
name: Termination of Employment

description: [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marine_mammal]Marine mammals[/url] are aquatic mammals that rely on the ocean and other marine ecosystems for their existence.
name: Marine Mammal

description:
This character [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Weight_loss]loses weight[/url].

Weight loss can occur if the character controls their food dietary habits to prevent them from gaining calories. Weight loss can also occur if the character exercises frequently to improve fitness to expend more energy into their work and metabolism to incur weight loss.

Sometimes, weight loss may occur unintentionally from a health-related sickness.
name: Weight Loss

description:
The character have a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_dysfunction]sexual dysfunction[/url]. It can be temporary or permanent, occur before or during the events of the game.

May be used for various problems related to sexual activity whether they are positive (such as an erection that doesn't stop at all), negative (such as an erection disorder) or not very important (as the premature ejaculation that doesn't prevent to procreate).

This trait isn't limited to the gender of the character.
name: Sexual Dysfunction

description:
This character wears contact lenses.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Contact_lens]Contact lens[/url] is a small, thin lens placed directly on the surface of the eye. Contact lenses are considered medical devices and can be worn to correct vision, or for cosmetic or therapeutic reasons. Colored contact lens can be used to change the eye color.
name: Contact Lenses

description: This trait means a character who is fond of motion pictures.
name: Cinephile

description:
This character is shown with a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Video_game_console]gaming console appliance[/url]. Characters seen with video game controllers or handheld consoles can fall into this trait.

A video game console is a computer device that outputs a video signal or visual image to display a video game that one or more people can play. The term "video game console" is primarily used to distinguish a console machine primarily designed for consumers to use for playing video games, in contrast to arcade machines or home computers.
name: Gaming Console

description: This character is an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amphibian]amphibian[/url].
name: Amphibian

description: This character is fanatical with their religious beliefs that are considered to be far outside the acceptable mainstream attitudes of society.
name: Religious Extremist

description:
This character has an unconventional amount of more than two legs.

Please only use i2039 if the character has exactly four legs.
name: Multiple Legs

description:
This character has sex with a partner that he/she has no intention of having sex or maybe even meeting with ever again after the act.

Note: Use this for consensual sex only.
name: One-night Stand

description: This character works as a [url=https://counselor-license.com/careers/mental-health-counselor/] therapist[/url]. They are medical professional who helps patients achieve emotional wellness. Counselors often see patients on an ongoing basis as one part of a treatment plan. These professionals work with a variety of patients and may specialize in areas such as trauma, addiction, or youth services.
name: Therapist

description: This character creates toys for children to play with.
name: Toymaker

description: This character wears a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Feather] feather[/url] in their hair or somewhere on their body.
name: Feather Accessory

description: This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jor%C5%8Dgumo]jorōgumo[/url]. It is a yokai with the form of a spider, that can change its appearance into that of a seductive woman when it wants to eat a human.
name: Jorougumo

description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Infidelity]infidelity[/url], but this event can be avoided by making different choices, succeeding better in earlier segments of the story or getting onto a different route.

Subordinate only to the shōgun, daimyōs were the most powerful feudal rulers from the 10th century to the middle 19th century in Japan.

There is a large negative stereotype of Southern accents, being associated with cognitive and verbal slowness, lack of education, bigotry, and religious and political conservatism, with labels for the accent such as "hick" or "hillbilly".

In criminal law, rape is a type of sexual assault usually involving sexual intercourse, which is initiated by one or more persons against another person without that person's consent.

description:
This character wears armor made out of leather.

Leather armor is light-weight protective gear made out of toughened animal rawhides. They are specifically made to be resilient and durable to protect the wearer.

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Minotaur]minotaur[/url]. A minotaur is a mythical creature portrayed in Greek Classical times with the head and tail of a bull and the body of a man.

According to the [url=https://monstergirlencyclopedia.miraheze.org/wiki/Minotaur]monster girl wiki[/url], a minotaur is a beastman type monster with the characteristics of an ox. They are monster warriors that have freakish strength and can effortlessly swing enormous weapons. Their temperament is extremely rough, and since they don’t think much and their actions are guided by emotion, they are exceedingly dangerous monsters. 

A Holstaur is a subspecies of the minotaur where the character has the characteristics of a cow instead.
name: Minotaur

description: A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Murder%E2%80%93suicide]murder–suicide[/url] is an act in which an individual kills one or more other persons before killing themselves.
name: Murder-Suicide

description: This character has a catheter inserted into themselves. A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catheter]catheter[/url] is a long thin tube used to transport liquids from the body, primarily urine. Use the tag [url=https://vndb.org/i2296]body fluid tube[/url] if scat or an enema is involved.
name: Catheter

description:
This character wears clothing with small pieces of fabric sewn together. In other words: A patched-up clothing.

Either distinctively sewn messy, clothing that seems to show visible sewn threading combining pieces of fabric are patchwork.

Formal patchwork clothing also exist, often carefully sewn in patterns.

In terms of the actual sewing technique:
[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patchwork]Patchwork[/url] or "pieced work" is a form of needlework that involves sewing together pieces of fabric into a larger design. The larger design is usually based on repeating patterns built up with different fabric shapes (which can be different colors). These shapes are carefully measured and cut, basic geometric shapes making them easy to piece together.
name: Patchwork

description: A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Magazine]magazine[/url] is a publication, usually a periodical publication, which is printed or electronically published (sometimes referred to as an online magazine). Magazines are generally published on a regular schedule and contain a variety of content. They are generally financed by advertising, by a purchase price, by prepaid subscriptions, or a combination of the three.
name: Magazine

description: This character is is from [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polynesia]Polynesia[/url], a region of land that encompasses than 1,000 islands scattered over the central and southern Pacific Ocean that includes Hawaii, New Zealand, and Eastern Island.

description:
A character with this trait, by their deliberate actions/inactions, or by the agreement with the significant other, orchestrates for their committed partner to engage in sexual relations with other people. Only their significant other (whether they are male or female) has sex with others.

Under normal circumstances neither side of the couple has a desire to cheat, but due to the desires of one partner, their significant other will end up having sex with other people. This can be a mutually agreed act with a trustworthy person, which the partner convinces their significant other to have sex with, or a selfish act, with the partner selling or whoring their significant other for personal gain (money, blackmail material on someone, etc.).

In every case, the partner is (at least initially) fine with their significant other being sexually involved with other people, and possibly even enjoys it.

Apply the trait to the partner who shares their significant other with other people.

Don't confuse with [url=/i1605]Swinging[/url] where both romantic partners have sex with others, or [url=/i2177]Polyamory[/url], which is a long time agreement involving romantic feelings, while Netorase is a momentary satisfaction of a kink.
name: Netorase (their SO is shared)

description:
This character performs [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seppuku]seppuku[/url].

Seppuku is a form of Japanese ritual suicide by disembowelment. It was originally reserved for samurai, but was also practiced by other Japanese people later on to restore honor for themselves or for their family. A samurai practice, seppuku was used either voluntarily by samurai to die with honor rather than fall into the hands of their enemies (and likely suffer torture) or as a form of capital punishment for samurai who had committed serious offenses, or performed because they had brought shame to themselves. 

The proper method for committing the act—developed over several centuries—was to plunge a short sword into the left side of the abdomen, draw the blade laterally across to the right, and then turn it upward.
name: Seppuku

description:
[Url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Knitting]Knitting[/url] is a method by which yarn is manipulated to create a textile or fabric for use in many types of garments.

Knitting creates multiple loops of yarn, called stitches, in a line or tube. Knitting has multiple active stitches on the needle at one time. Knitted fabric consists of a number of consecutive rows of intermeshing of loops. As each row progresses, a newly created loop is pulled through one or more loops from the prior row, placed on the gaining needle, and the loops from the prior row are then pulled off the other needle.
name: Knitting

Cancer is a disease involving abnormal cell growth with the potential to invade or spread to other parts of the body. It is often treated with some combination of radiation therapy, surgery, chemotherapy and targeted therapy. Cancer may or may not be [url=https://vndb.org/i273]terminal[/url].

description:
This character [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drag_(clothing)]performs in drag[/url].

Drag is a type of performance that relies on exaggerated gendered traits. Drag artists who take on a feminine persona are called [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drag_queen]drag queens[/url], and drag artists who take on a masculine persona are called [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drag_king]drag kings[/url]. While most drag queens are men and most drag kings are women, crossdressing is not a requirement for drag. Drag shows frequently involve singing or lip-syncing, dancing, stand-up comedy, and/or skit performances.

This trait should not be used for characters who crossdress solely in a non-performance context.
name: Drag Performer

description: This character becomes [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paralysis]paralyzed[/url]. Paralysis is the loss of the ability to move (and sometimes to feel anything) in part or most of the body, typically as a result of illness, poison, or injury.

Do not confuse with the [url=/i753]exhibitionist[/url] trait, as such a character exposes themselves for their own sexual gratification, while this trait encompasses both accidental exposures as well as the exposure being forced on the character.

If the character has [url=https://vndb.org/i1193]sex[/url] or [url=https://vndb.org/i2280]masturbates[/url] in front of an audience while naked use of those traits is preferred.

description:
[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_abstinence]Sexual abstinence[/url] or sexual restraint is the practice of refraining from some or all aspects of sexual activity for medical, psychological, legal, social, financial, philosophical, moral, or religious reasons.

Use the trait both for voluntary and forced abstinence, where it is clearly expressed that the character is refraining from sexual intercourse due to his own wish or due to being forced by another character.

In order to prevent misapplication, don't apply the trait to virginal characters, unless they clearly express that they do not intend to have sex until marriage, or something similar.

description: This character has a [url=https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suppository]suppository[/url] inserted into themselves. Rectal suppositories are the most common type of suppository.

description:

Erotic photographs are normally intended for commercial use, including mass-produced items such as decorative calendars, pinups and for men's magazines but sometimes the photographs are intended to be seen only by the subject's partner.

Do not confuse with [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pornography]pornographic photography[/url], which is of a sexually explicit nature (preferably use traits related to porn production in that case).

A school sports club is a administration-approved student-based school organization focusing on a selected sport. Tennis is a racket sport that can be played individually against a single opponent (singles) or between two teams of two players each (doubles). Each player uses a tennis racket that is strung with cord to strike a hollow rubber ball covered with felt over or around a net and into the opponent's court.

A school [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tennis]tennis club[/url] president leads the members of the student club in day to day training and prepares them for competitions.

Not to be confused with the [url=https://vndb.org/i1438]School Computer Club[/url] that is only interested in computers.

description:

description:
This character engages in tickling torture. Apply [url=https://vndb.org/i2366]i2366[/url] to the receiving victim.

Tickle torture is the use of tickling to abuse, dominate, humiliate or even "prank" someone. The victim laughs even if he or she finds the experience unpleasant because the laughter is an innate reflex rather than social conditioning. Tickle torture can either be consensual or forced, depending on the circumstances. 

If tickle torture is consensual, it is usually done as a part of some sort of sexual ritual or another mode of affection. Forced tickle torture can either be used for mild interrogation purposes or simply for a harmless method of dominating someone.

English: Thou, thee, thy, ...
Japanese: 吾 (ware), 我輩 (wagahai), 汝 (nanji).

The most commonly accepted boundaries place Asia to the east of the Suez Canal separating it from Africa; and to the east of the Turkish Straits, the Ural Mountains and Ural River, and to the south of the Caucasus Mountains and the Caspian and Black Seas, separating it from Europe.

For the purpose of clarity, the trait should apply to all people hailing from the geographic continent of Asia, which also includes a large part of culturally and ethnically different Middle East region.

description:
This character is a high-class prostitute.

This can take many forms: working as a host or hostess for a high-class club and providing sexual services aside of other things, being an escort (providing sexual services) for rich businessmen, being a paid mistress of a high-class client, a personal entertainer of sorts (eg. geisha) offering sexual services aside of other forms of entertainment and so on. The point is, that this character isn't a street prostitute or a high school-girl doing the dirty in a love hotel. Instead, they are sought after for their services by the elite of society who are willing to pay fortunes for a night spent with them. A night, that often includes dinners in high-class restaurants, escorting, private dance or music performances and the like, not just sex.

Note that a lot of the above mentioned jobs (hostess, geisha, escort, etc.) can be done without any sexual connotations. Please only tag the characters who actually offer sexual services as well.

A tablet computer, commonly shortened to tablet, is a mobile device, typically with a mobile operating system and LCD touchscreen display processing circuitry, and a rechargeable battery in a single thin, flat package. Tablets, being computers, do what other personal computers do, but lack some I/O capabilities that others have. Modern tablets largely resemble modern smartphones, the only differences being that tablets are relatively larger than smartphones, with screens 7 inches (18 cm) or larger, measured diagonally, and may not support access to a cellular network.

Narcolepsy is a sleep disorder that causes a person to have uncontrollable sleep attacks. It is characterized by excessive sleepiness, sleep paralysis, hallucinations, and in some cases episodes of cataplexy (partial or total loss of muscle control). It can occur randomly at any time of the day.

description:
This character engages in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Origami]origami[/url]. 

Origami is the art of paper folding, which is often associated with Japanese culture. The goal is to transform a flat square sheet of paper into a finished sculpture through folding and sculpting techniques.
name: Origami

description:
This character is seen carrying a baton. 

A baton is a short or long stick that has multiple uses. It can be passed from runner to runner in a relay race, carried and twirled by a drum major, or used by a conductor to direct an orchestra or choir.
name: Sports Baton

description:
This character engages in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Karate]karate[/url].

Karate is a Japanese martial art that involves striking, punching, kicking, knee strikes, elbow strikes and open-hand techniques such as knife-hands, spear-hands and palm-heel strikes.
name: Karate

description:
This character engages in [url=http://www.aikidofaq.com/introduction.html]aikido[/url].

Aikido is a Japanese marital art that involves throws and joint locks. Aikido focuses not on punching or kicking opponents, but rather on using their own energy to gain control of them or to throw them away from the user.
name: Aikido

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Teaching_assistant]Teaching assistant[/url] is an individual who assists a teacher with instructional responsibilities. By definition, TAs assist with classes, but many graduate students serve as the sole instructor for one or more classes each semester.

description: This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barista]barista[/url]. A barista is a person, usually a coffeehouse employee, who prepares and serves espresso-based coffee drinks. Baristas often also prepare other types of coffee and serve other beverages and snacks.

name: School Soccer Club President

description:
A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mummy]mummy[/url] is a deceased human or an animal whose skin and organs have been preserved by either intentional or accidental exposure to chemicals, extreme cold, very low humidity, or lack of air, so that the recovered body does not decay further if kept in cool and dry conditions.

Traditionally fictional mummies are considered a type of undead that have lived in distant times and belong to ancient and extinct cultures. 

Mummies are commonly associated with the culture of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ancient_Egypt]ancient Egypt[/url] or [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pre-Columbian_era]pre-Columbian[/url] civilizations.
name: Mummy

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rokurokubi]Rokurokubi[/url].

This youkai is a Japanese Monster that are often depicted as ordinary women by day, but at night their necks elongate. (Nukekubi is a variation of the youkai where their head completely detaches).
name: Rokurokubi

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baku_(mythology)]baku[/url].

This youkai is a Japanese monster that has a similar appearance to a tapir. They watch over humans and act as a guardian spirits. They feed on the dreams of humans – specifically bad dreams. Evil spirits and yokai fear baku and flee from them, avoiding areas inhabited by them. Therefore, health and good luck follow a baku wherever it goes.
name: Baku

description: This character behaves in a primitive way, acting instinctively, and can even be described as a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Primitive_culture]savage[/url].
name: Primitive

description:
This character used to be (or to a degree, still is) famous in the media: a singer, a musician, an artist, a reality TV star, whatever. But they either faded out of the spotlight unwillingly (eg. reality TV stars once their reality show ends) or retired and no longer pursue whatever career was their claim to fame (a perfect IRL example would be Sir Sean Connery who retired in 2006, only did reprisals of his old characters like two times since then and the last time was 9 years ago, has been avoiding publicity and interviews to boot).

Associated the trait corresponding to his/her former profession with this one if it is known.
name: Former Celebrity

description:
This character has [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tusk]tusks[/url].

Tusks are elongated, continuously growing front teeth, usually but not always in pairs, that protrude well beyond the mouth of certain mammal species. They are most commonly canine teeth, as with warthogs, pigs, and walruses, or, in the case of elephants, elongated incisors.
name: Tusks

A braided crown is a braid hairstyle tied circularly on the head in a horizontal axis. The length can be halfway through (half-crown) along the sides of the head or a full circle (crown) around and above the forehead.

description:
The [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stole_(vestment)]stole[/url] is a liturgical vestment of various Christian denominations. It consists of a band of colored cloth, formerly usually of silk, about seven and a half to nine feet long and three to four inches wide, whose ends may be straight or may broaden out. The center of the stole is worn around the back of the neck and the two ends hang down parallel to each other in front, either attached to each other or hanging loose. The stole is almost always decorated in some way, usually with a cross or some other significant religious design.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/59/124159.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/60/124160.jpg]Example 2[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/62/124162.jpg]Example 3[/url] (broader ends)
name: Stole

description:
This character overuses or overemphasizes the word "nano" at the end of their sentences.

Sometimes appended with "desu" at the end.

"Nano" or "no" at the end of a sentence is the formal equivalent (and somewhat feminine) to putting "~n desu/da" pattern. In simple terms, "nano" is used to place emphasis on what the speaker is saying.

In fiction, immature / childish characters are prone to this pattern.
name: Nano

description: Chess is a board game of strategic skill for two players, played on a chequered board on which each playing piece is moved according to precise rules. The object is to put the opponent's king under a direct attack from which escape is impossible
name: Chess

description: A person who draws or creates pictures for magazines, books, advertising, etc.
name: Illustrator

description:
This character is in charge of the students in the student government.

A student government is a student organization present in many colleges, universities and has started to appear in some high schools. In higher education, the student union is often accorded its own building on the campus, dedicated to social and organizational activities of the student body.
name: Student Council Advisor

description: Japanese traditional dance has a long history, the oldest known ones may be among those transmitted through the kagura tradition, or folk dances. There are large number of these traditional dances, which are often -odori, -asobi, and -mai, and may be specific to a region or village. Mai and Odori are the two main groups of Japanese dances, and the term Buyō was coined in modern times as a general term for dance.
name: Japanese Traditional Dance

description:
This character has [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Allergy]allergies[/url].

Allergies are a number of conditions caused by hypersensitivity of the immune system to typically harmless substances in the environment.

These common diseases include hay fever, food allergies, atopic dermatitis, allergic asthma, and anaphylaxis. Symptoms may include red eyes, an itchy rash, sneezing, a runny nose, shortness of breath, or swelling. Food intolerances and food poisoning are separate conditions.
name: Allergies

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Romance_(love)]romantic[/url].

A romantic is inclined toward or suggestive of the feeling of excitement and mystery associated with love, and/or of an idealized view of reality when it comes to romance. They value their emotions greatly, and like the subtler aspects of romance, as well as most romance-themed situations, like confessions or happy couples. They appreciate gestures that are romantically pronounced, like offering flowers, and are fans of environments that contribute to a romantic mood, like a full moon. The person may be a romantic due to a traditional upbringing, or a naive ignorance of love, sometimes influenced by fiction.
name: Romantic

description:
This character observes and analyzes people they meet.

They usually do so to better understand them, judge their characters, or uncover their intentions, reactions or habits. Unlike pure curiosity, the intentions of such a person may be either good, bad, or neutral, are often backed by an ulterior motive, and are usually limited to certain people or environments.

Can also be applied to characters who observe and pay attention to their surroundings, sometimes even quickly noticing changes in people, environments, or even moods/atmospheres, but without reaching the knowledge or sharpness of being insightful.
name: Observant

description:
Anthropomorphic Animal - a bipedal hybrid of an animal in a humanoid form. For a character to be considered anthropomorphic animal, either human and animal traits should be pronounced in about equal measure, or the latter should be dominant.

Do not use the trait to describe characters that look mostly human, but have minor animal characteristics, like animal ears (use [url=/i677]Kemonomimi[/url] instead) or a tail (use [url=/i561]Tail[/url]).

Only use the trait to describe the characters, for whom the anthropomorphic form is the primary one. Do not use it for shapeshifters, who can turn into an alternative animalistic form (e.g. a werewolf).
name: Anthropomorphic Animal

description: This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cousin]cousin[/url] but who does not share kinship ties, either because of an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adoption]adoption[/url] or by [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Remarriage]remarriage[/url].
name: Non-blood-related Cousin

description: This character is a part of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yuri_(genre)]yuri fandom[/url]. Yuri fandom refers to people with obsessive interest in anime, manga and novels that feature romantic relationships between girls (is sometimes called shōjo-ai by Western fandom).
name: Girls' Love Fan

description: A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Poncho]poncho[/url] is an outer garment designed to keep the body warm. A rain poncho is made from a watertight material designed to keep the body dry from the rain. Ponchos have been used by the Native American peoples of the Andes and are now considered typical South American garments.
name: Poncho

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nymph]nymph[/url].

Nymphs are divine spirits who animate or maintain Nature for the environments where they live, and are usually depicted as beautiful, young graceful maidens. The name nymph literally means Bride. Although nymphs do not age and can live for a very long time, this does not mean they are immortal.
name: Nymph

description:
This character uses "atai", one of the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronouns for "I"[/url], to address themselves.

"Atai" is a more informal variant of "atashi" used by women to address themselves.
name: Atai

description:
This character engages in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pole_dance]pole dancing[/url].

Pole dance is a performance art that combines dance and acrobatics centered on a vertical pole. It consists of the dancer using their upper body strength and flexibility to motion around the pole with fitness and using muscular endurance to hang on the pole and suspend themselves in the air.

Pole dancing is usually associated in gentlemen's clubs and erotic dances such as strip clubs. However, pole dancing as exercise and recreational activity also exists, used both as aerobic and anaerobic workout.

The trait can be used in tandem with [url=/i1575]Striptease[/url] where applicable, however these traits do not necessarily always go together, as pole dancing can be performed without stripping and vice versa.
name: Pole Dancing

description:
Kyūjutsu is the traditional Japanese martial art of wielding a bow as practiced by the samurai class of feudal Japan. Kyūjutsu was actually considered a more vital skill for a significant portion of Japanese history. The bow was almost exclusively the symbol of the professional warrior, and way of life of the warrior was referred to as "the way of the horse and bow. 

Kyūdō is the Japanese martial art of archery. Kyūdō is based on kyūjutsu.
name: Kyujutsu

description:
This character is a member of an Kyudo club associated with a school.

A school sports club is a administration-approved student-based school organization focusing on a selected sport. Kyudo is the art, practice, or skill of self-improvement.

Kyudo is more of a meditative Zen exercise than simply shooting a bow to hit a target, and the point is to perform its steps and movements perfectly and exactly, while bringing your mind to focus, what you are doing, and nothing else, in a clear and alert, but relaxed and flowing state
name: School Kyudo Club Member

description: Manga are comics or graphic novels created in Japan or by creators in the Japanese language, conforming to a style developed in Japan in the late 19th century. They have a long and complex pre-history in earlier Japanese art. Manga are made by Mangaka

description:
This character is the central focus receiver of a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gang_bang]gang bang[/url]. 

A gang bang or gangbang is a situation in which several people engage in physical sexual activity with one particular individual sequentially or at the same time. Normally, there is a single individual who is the central focus of the sexual activity; for example, one man or woman surrounded by several men or women.
Rather than serial couplings by two people, the gang bang is defined by the number and simultaneity of the various sex acts, such as vaginal, anal or oral sex or double penetration.

Gang bangs are not defined by the precise number of participants, but usually involve more than three people and may involve a dozen or more.

Gang bangs also differ from group sex, such as threesomes and foursomes, in that most (if not all) sexual acts during a gang bang are centered on or performed with just the central person.

A character with this trait possesses one of the variations of the [url=https://tanuki-kimono.tumblr.com/post/134047853321/nihongami-japanese-hairstyles-part-312]Hyogo[/url] hairstyle.

Tate Hyogo is said to have been worn by female kabuki dancers. But it’s mostly associated with middle rank Yuujo (prostitutes). Upper rank prostitutes never wore this style.
Yoko Hyogo was worn by high rank Yuujo in Yoshiwara and Shimabara from mid Edo era. It was a of variation Tate Hyogo with bigger chignons. Each red light districts had its own way of setting the many decorative pins and haircombs.
Date Hyogo was only worn by Oiran (top rank Yuujo). With its big chignons and lavishly decorated ornaments, from pins to combs and golden ropes, this hairstyle was the most gorgeous of all.

description:
This character is seen in [url=https://www.per-spex.com/articles/fashion-history/2019/2/16/sukeban-the-forgotten-story-of-japans-girl-gangs]Sukeban[/url] fashion. [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sukeban]Wikipedia[/url]

The sukeban was a truly unique subculture in Japanese society. The term 'sukeban' was created by Japanese police to categorise and explain the rise of teenage all-female street gangs in the 1960s. Meaning 'delinquent girl' or 'girl boss', the sukeban were groups of teenage girls that protested against society with their altered fashion, radical solidarity and being involved in offences such as, violence, theft and drug use. They protested against mainstream gender norms and feminine expectations in a male-dominated society. The idea of a woman 'behaving badly' went against the gender norms of how a woman is supposed to act, and provided a thrilling way to challenge society. In addition, the expectations of how a woman dressed were restricting and sexist, and the sukeban weren't going to accept this anymore and that's why they altered their look.
The common signifiers of sukeban fashion include:
 - long skirt opposed to mini-skirt 
 - blouses were cut short to expose the waist
 - brightly dyed or permed hair 
 - school shoes were replaced with Converse sneakers
 - wearing coloured socks
 - rolled up sleeves
 - weapons like chains, baseball bat or katana 

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/69/129569.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/68/129568.jpg]Example 2[/url]
[url=https://vndb.org/c20349]Example 3[/url]
[url=https://vndb.org/c30794]Example 4[/url]
name: Sukeban

description:
The [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_school_uniform#Gakuran]gakuran[/url] and the tsume-eri are the uniforms for many middle-school and high-school boys in Japan. The color is normally black, but some schools use navy blue.

The top has a standing collar buttoning down from top-to-bottom. Buttons are usually decorated with the school emblem to show respect to the school. Pants are straight leg and a black or dark-colored belt is worn with them. Boys usually wear penny loafers or sneakers with this uniform. Some schools may require the students to wear collar-pins representing the school and/or class rank. 

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/44/129644.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/43/129643.jpg]Example 2[/url]
name: Gakuran

description:
This character is subjected to an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Exorcism]exorcism[/url].

Exorcism is the religious practice of evicting demons or other spiritual entities from a person or an area which they are believed to have possessed. Depending on the spiritual beliefs of the exorcist, this may be done by causing the entity to swear an oath, performing an elaborate ritual, or simply by commanding it to depart in the name of a higher power. The practice is ancient and part of the belief system of many cultures and religions.
name: Exorcism

description:

description:
This character has trimmed pubic hair. 

The look is achieved by removing excess hair through procedures, like [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bikini_waxing]bikini waxing[/url], [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shaving]shaving[/url], [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chemical_depilatory]chemical depilation[/url] and etc.

description:
This character has [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cornrows]cornrows[/url] hairstyle.

Cornrows, also called canerows in the Caribbean, are a style of hair braiding, in which the hair is braided very close to the scalp, using an underhand, upward motion to make a continuous, raised row.
Cornrows are often formed in simple, straight lines, as the name implies, but they can also be formed in elaborate geometric or curvilinear designs.
name: Cornrows

description: This character typically speaks in very short sentences or sentence fragments, even in situations where most people would use full sentences.

description:
This character is [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazilians]Brazilian[/url].

Brazilian people are from a multiethnic Portoguese speaking nation in South America called Brazil. Brazilians are predominantly Roman Catholic. Brazil is a multiethnic society, which means that it is home to people of many different ethnic origins. As a result, majority of Brazilians do not equate their nationality with their ethnicity, usually embracing and espousing both simultaneously.
name: Brazilian

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Babysitting]baby sitter[/url].

Babysitting is temporarily caring for a child. Babysitting can be a paid job for all ages; however, it is best known as a temporary activity for young teenagers who are too young to be eligible for employment in the general economy.
name: Babysitter

description: Unapplicable category to collect characters that wear a traditional japanese coat.
name: Japanese Coat

description:
This character wears a [url=https://wiki.samurai-archives.com/index.php?title=Jinbaori]jinbaori[/url].

Jinbaori (literally "military camp haori") are a style of surcoat typically worn over armor.

Originally a rather simple jacket worn over armor as a protection against the weather, jinbaori evolved over the course of the Sengoku period into far more elaborate garments, decorated with various motifs as an expression of the wearer's wealth, power, and aesthetic taste. 

[url=https://vndb.org/c31540]Example[/url]
name: Jinbaori

The character is an antagonist for the main characters. The key difference is that they oppose them against their own will.

There are basically two main reasons for why. They might be coerced/blackmailed by another character to do that, or they have been brainwashed/mind controlled.

Frequently the trait will be a spoiler, as the real reasons why the antagonist opposes them might not be immediately apparent to the main characters.

description:

A character of this trait prefers not to be wasteful or extravagant in their resource consumption, especially with money. They might have reasons behind it, such as living in poverty, or simply being well-taught by their parents. They are often, but not necessarily, viewed by others to be stingy.
name: Thrifty

This does not necessarily mean the person must actually be in a life-threatening situation, for many are aroused from dreams and fantasies of such.
