description: Slavs are European people who speak the various Slavic languages of the larger Balto-Slavic linguistic group. They are native to Eurasia, stretching from Central, Eastern and Southeastern Europe all the way north and eastwards to Northeast Europe, Northern Asia (Siberia) and Central Asia (especially Kazakhstan and Turkmenistan), as well as historically in Western Europe (particularly in Eastern Germany) and Western Asia (including Anatolia).
name: Slav

description:
This character commits [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Manslaughter]manslaughter[/url], but it is possible to avoid this outcome by satisfying some game conditions or make choices leading otherwise.

Manslaughter is a legal term for the killing of a human being, in a manner considered by law as less culpable than murder.

The law generally differentiates between levels of criminal culpability based on the mens rea, or state of mind. This is particularly true within the law of homicide, where murder requires either the intent to kill – a state of mind called malice, or malice aforethought – or the knowledge that one's actions are likely to result in death; manslaughter, on the other hand, requires a lack of any prior intention to kill or create a deadly situation.
name: Avoidable Manslaughter

description: This person tends to get lost very easily, even in familiar environment.
name: No Sense of Direction

description:
This character cuts their own hair to signify moving on from something.

The meaning comes from the Edo period, when samurai would cut off their top-knot (or chonmage) as a way of stepping down from their position. 

To this day, this remains a symbol of a dramatic break with the past. This is one of those things that's mostly done for dramatic, symbolic effect in movies and anime. It's useful visual symbolism, looks dramatic, and makes for great storytelling, even if it doesn't come up often in real life.

Do not use if it's done only for cosmetic purposes.
name: Symbolic Hair Cutting

description: During the course of the VN, the character invokes a supernatural force (usually a spirit, ghost, demon or deity), or in some cases a person or a creature, to appear by means of teleportation, dimensional travel, portal creation, or some other way. This may also result from a previous summoning contract, which creates a connection between the summon and summoner.
name: Summoning

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Promotional_model]Promotional Model[/url]. A promotional model is a model hired to drive consumer demand for a product, service, brand, or concept by directly interacting with potential customers. Most promotional models are conventionally attractive in physical appearance. They are often used in motorsports, other sports, or at trade shows.

In Japan they are often known as 'Campaign Girls' or 'Image Girls' or 'Race Queens' when hired to promote motorsports.
name: Promotional Model

description: Claustrophobia is the fear of confined spaces.

description:
A character with this trait is subject of netorare, i.e. they are stolen from their significant other, a very close friend, or in some cases, a close relative. This could happen by someone seducing, coercing, blackmailing, outright raping them, or by using other techniques. The trait does not apply if this character is an unrequited crush or a potential hero(ine) on a different route, as the the close ties between the partners and their forcible separation is important to the netori/netorare fetish.

It doesn't necessarily mean that they are literally stolen, but the negative feelings experienced by their significant other might make it seem so.

Netori/Netorare is more than a simple act of infidelity, but the fetishization of jealousy and other negative feelings commonly associated with it. The one who loses their loved one almost always finds out about the situation and suffers from jealousy and the feeling of helplessness arisen from an inability to change anything. The one committing netori and/or the stolen loved one might rub it in by humiliating the loser in private or in public.

Please apply the [url=/i1325](Engages in) Netori[/url] trait to the character doing the stealing, and [url=/i1326](Subject of) Netori[/url] trait to the character whose romantic partner was stolen from them by Netori.
name: Netorare (they are the stolen SO)

description: The character believes in irrational, unscientific, and/or supernatural forces.

description:
A person who holds the view that any ultimate reality (such as God) is unknown and probably unknowable.

One who is not committed to believing in either the existence or the nonexistence of a god/gods.
name: Agnostic

description: This character acts like they're a parent of another character even though that's not actually true. They are generally overprotective and often jokingly refer to another character as their child. Such relationships can serve as both a comedic factor and, over time, develop into romantic ones.
name: Parent Act

description:
This character wears a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unitard]unitard[/url].

A unitard is a skintight, one-piece garment with long legs and sometimes long sleeves, usually stopping at the wrists and ankles. It differs from a leotard in that a leotard does not have long legs. The garment can be considered a combination of a leotard and tights.
Unitards are worn by acrobats, gymnasts, dancers, equestrian vaulters, athletes, circus performers, and amateur wrestlers, as well as others who require overall body coverage without impeding flexibility.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/59/139459.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/61/139461.jpg]Example 2[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/62/139462.jpg]Example 3[/url]
name: Unitard

description:
This character plays [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bowling]bowling[/url].

Bowling is a target sport and recreational activity in which a player rolls a ball toward pins (in pin bowling) or another target (in target bowling). The term bowling usually refers to ten-pin bowling, though in the United Kingdom and Commonwealth countries bowling could also refer to lawn bowls.

In pin bowling, the goal is to knock over pins on a long playing surface known as a lane. A strike is achieved when all the pins are knocked down on the first roll, and a spare is achieved if all the pins are knocked over on a second roll.
name: Bowling

description: This character acts like she's an older sister of another character which is indicated by them calling her Onee-chan and whatnot, even though she's not actually their sister, adopted or otherwise.

description:
This character is a interior designer.

An interior designer enhances the function, safety and aesthetics of interior spaces while taking into account how different colors, textures, furniture, lighting, and space work together to meet occupants' or visitors' needs.

description: Different from [url=/i390]police[/url], who is legally bounded, a vigilante is a member of a self-appointed group of citizens who undertake law enforcement in their community without legal authority, typically because the legal agencies are thought to be inadequate.

This character engages in the acts of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vandalism]vandalism[/url]. 

Vandalism is the action involving deliberate destruction of or damage to public or private property.

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Poet]poet[/url]

A poet is a person who creates poetry. Poets may describe themselves as such or be described as such by others. A poet may simply be a writer of poetry, or may perform their art to an audience.

In sectoral heterochromia, sometimes referred to as partial heterochromia, areas of the same iris contain two completely different colors.

description:
This character engages in sexual scenes that pertain to Wet and Messy fetish.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wet_and_messy_fetishism]Wet and messy fetish[/url] is a form of sexual fetishism whereby a person becomes aroused when copious amounts of a substance are applied to the naked skin, face, or to clothing.

Messy substances most commonly focused on by WAM participants include whipped cream, raw eggs, milk, [url=/i3126]lotion[/url], paint, oil, mud, pudding, chocolate sauce, fruit juice, beer, shaving foam, shampoo, soap, custard, baked beans, treacle, ketchup, ice cream, peanut butter, slime, and cake batter, among others.

[b]A fetish for bodily fluids such as feces, urine, vomit, semen, and female ejaculate is not considered part of WAM.[/b]

Can be used together with [url=/i1195]Food Play[/url], if the items involved are food products.

description: This character's job is to take care of very young children, mostly infants and toddlers.
name: Daycare Worker

description: A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Majorette_(dancer)]majorette[/url] is a [url=https://vndb.org/i2887]baton[/url] twirler whose twirling performance is often accompanied by dance, movement, or gymnastics; they are primarily associated with marching bands during parades. Majorettes can also spin knives, fire knives, flags, light-up batons, maces and rifles. They do illusions, cartwheels, and flips, and sometimes twirl up to four batons at a time. Majorettes are often confused with cheerleaders; baton twirling, however, is more closely related to [url=https://vndb.org/i882]rhythmic gymnastics[/url] than to cheerleading.
name: Majorette

description: This character wears a traditional Japanese wedding dress associated with a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shinto_wedding]Shinto wedding[/url].

The clothes of the character have studs in them. They're usually made from metal.

Metal studs are a common decoration in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Punk_fashion]punk[/url] and [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heavy_metal_fashion]metal[/url] fashion styles.
name: Studs

description:
This character spends a significant amount of their time [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Volunteering]volunteering[/url].

Volunteer work can include helping the homeless, disaster victims, etc. without getting paid for it.

description:
This character overuses or overemphasizes the word "mon" at the end of their sentences.

"Mon" is a feminine way to express dissatisfaction with a turn of events, or an emotional response, explaining the reason for the response or action. It may also indicate desire to be pampered or indulged.​

A grandaunt is the aunt of one's father or mother, i.e a sister or sister-in-law of one's grandparent.

This character is an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Online_streamer]online streamer[/url].

Online streamer is a person who broadcasts themselves online through a live stream or prerecorded video. The scope of online streamers has grown to include different genres ranging from playing video games, tutorials, or even solo chats.

This trait is for the non-sexual streaming only. For sex related online streaming, use [url=/i2794]Role > Webcam Model[/url].

Deer are hoofed ruminant mammals. The two main groups of deer are the Cervinae, including the muntjac, the elk (wapiti), the red deer, the fallow deer, and the chital; and the Capreolinae, including the reindeer (caribou), the roe deer, the mule deer, and the moose.
name: Deer

description:
This character slaps another person's face with a penis. Use [url=/i3302]Cockslapping[/url] for the character who gets slapped.

Cockslapping is the practice in slapping someone's face with your penis, usually when erect for sexual pleasure or to assert one's power over another.
name: Cockslapping

A virtual YouTuber is an online entertainer who uses a virtual avatar generated using computer graphics. Real-time motion capture software or technology are often—but not always—used to capture movement.

Use the trait for the actual person who performs the virtual online streaming. Apply both this trait and [url=/i3375]Role > Virtual Avatar[/url] concurrently for their avatar, if it figures prominently in the game.

In some instances, they'll even believe that they are destined to be the "hero" everyone needs, regardless of whether that is true or not.

This not only helps make them feel more helpless, but also makes their other senses, like touch, more sensitive to stimuli. This usually results in an intensely erotic experience.

description:
This character wears yoga pants.

Yoga pants are specially designed with flexible fabric, such as nylon and elastane, allowing the wearer to bend and move easier. They come with a broad waistband, which helps to keep the pants right in the place, no matter how much or however they move.

They are specifically designed to work out, jog or practice yoga comfortably.

General leggings are not always necessarily made of stretchy and flexible fabrics.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/76/144876.jpg]Example[/url]
name: Yoga Pants

description: This character plays [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flute]flute[/url].
name: Flutist

description:
This character has their hair in a bun or a simple bun-like updo with tips of the hair sticking up at the top.
Their hair is gathered at the back of the head, folded up, pinned to back of head (typically secured with a hairclip), forming a shape similar to a bird wing, with hair tips sticking up at the top of the "bun".

Contrary to the name, the hair tips don't have to be spiky, they can be blunt as well. The tips can droop a little, but if they are drooping lower than the "bun" part of the hairstyle, consider using [url=/i18]Ponytail[/url] instead.

[url=/c32470]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/ch/25/10725.jpg]Example 2[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/95/145495.jpg]Example 3[/url] 
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/ch/23/49723.jpg]Example 4[/url]

If the "bun" part of the updo is loose enough that you can see through it most of the time, use [url=/i2124]Hair Loopies[/url] instead.
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/ch/34/86634.jpg]Example 5[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/ch/71/44371.jpg]Counter-example[/url]
name: Spiky Bun

description:
This character is a fallen angel.

In some religions, fallen angels are angels who were expelled from heaven. The literal term "fallen angel" is used to describe angels who were cast out of heaven or angels who sinned. 

These types of angels often tempt humans to sin.
name: Fallen Angel

description: Discrimination is the prejudicial treatment of an individual based on his or her membership - or perceived membership - in a certain group or category.
name: Discrimination

description:
Shoe licking is performed on this character. Apply i3339 to the performing character.

Shoe licking is a non-penetrative sexual act where the footwear of a person is licked by someone. This is a sexual practice similar to feet licking, but wearing shoes or boots.
name: Shoe Licking

description:
This character licks the shoes of another person. Apply i3338 to the receiving character.

Shoe licking is a non-penetrative sexual act where the footwear of a person is licked by someone. This is a sexual practice similar to feet licking, but wearing shoes or boots.
name: Shoe Licking

description:
A human who has been magically bound into a servitude to a supernatural being, most often vampire, demon, or youkai. The binding might require exchange of bodily fluids, like blood or semen, or it might not. In return for their submission, the human usually receives longevity and a portion of their master's powers.

Differs from [url=/i816]Familiar[/url], which are spirits bound to the service of a magician or a supernatural entity, while Thralls are usually humans (or members of another mortal species).
name: Thrall

description: This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zashiki-warashi]Zashiki-Warashi[/url], a spirit-like youkai who is said to live in parlors or storage rooms, and performs pranks, and that people who see one would be visited with good fortune.
name: Zashiki-Warashi

description:
This male character wears an outfit with a low neckline or open front, exposing some or most of his bare chest.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/24/147424.jpg]Example 1[/url] (Showing modest cleavage)
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/25/147425.jpg]Example 2[/url] (Showing less modest cleavage)
name: Male Cleavage

description:
A character with this trait is afflicted with a delusion.

A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Delusion]delusion[/url] is a fixed belief that is not amenable to change in light of conflicting evidence. As a pathology, it is distinct from a belief based on false or incomplete information, memory error, dogma, illusion, or some other misleading effects of perception. 

A delusion is frequently a sign of an existing pathological mental state.
name: Delusion

description:
A character with this trait experiences hallucinations at least once in the visual novel.

A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hallucination]hallucination[/url] is a perception in the absence of external stimulus that has qualities of real perceptions. Hallucinations are vivid, substantial, and are perceived as real by the one experiencing them. While visual and auditory hallucinations are the most common, other senses can also be affected. Hallucinations can occur due to the drug use, sleep deprivation or neurological disorders.

Hallucinations differ from dreaming, which does not involve wakefulness; pseudohallucinations, which are accurately perceived as unreal; illusions, which involve distorted or misinterpreted real perception; imagination, which does not mimic real perception, and is under voluntary control, and "delusional perceptions", in which real perceptions are given some additional (and typically absurd) significance.
name: Hallucination

description:
This character is described as being atypically tall for a person their age, gender and species. This information can be stated directly, or inferred by comparing them to other characters in the same VN.

For example, if an adult character is described as tall relative to an elementary school student, this trait does NOT apply. However, if an adult man is described as tall relative to other adult men, or an elementary school girl is described as a head taller than the other girls in her class (and hasn't skipped a year), this trait DOES apply.

If the VN's text doesn't talk about the character's height, just assume they are average height for their age, gender and species, and don't bother adding any height traits to them.
name: Tall

description:
This character is described as being atypically short for a person their age, gender and species. This information can be stated directly, or inferred by comparing them to other characters in the same VN.

For example, if an elementary school student is described as short relative to an adult character, this trait does NOT apply. However, if an adult man is described as short relative to other adult men, or an elementary school girl is described as a head shorter than the other girls in her class, this trait DOES apply.

If the VN's text doesn't talk about the character's height, just assume they are average height for their age, gender and species, and don't bother adding any height traits to them.
name: Short

description:
This character is a member of a gardening club associated with a school.

Gardening is the practice of growing plants. Ornamental plants are normally grown for their flowers, foliage, overall appearance, or for their dyes. Useful plants are grown for consumption (vegetables, fruits, herbs, and leaf vegetables) or for medicinal use. A gardener is someone who practices gardening.
name: School Gardening Club Member

description: This character is a sister in a multiple birth of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multiple_birth#Triplets]triplets[/url] or higher, such as Quadruplets, Quintuplets, Sextuplets or more.
name: Triplet+ Sister

description: This character is a brother in a multiple birth of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multiple_birth#Triplets]triplets[/url] or higher, such as Quadruplets, Quintuplets, Sextuplets or more.
name: Triplet+ Brother

description: One of this character's ancestors was a god. This can manifest itself in some form of divine or spiritual powers.
name: Divine Blooded

description:
This character's [url=https://vndb.org/i1682]sidehair[/url] is longer on one side than the other.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/ch/48/112348.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/ch/32/59332.jpg]Example 2[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/ch/67/74767.jpg]Example 3[/url]
name: Asymmetrical Sidehair

description: This character is a non-Japanese that is obsessed with Japan in general and/or Japanese culture in particular.
name: Japanophile

description:
This character is a Vice-leader of a student club.

A student club vice-president helps student club president to achieve the goals of the club.
name: Student Club Vice President

description: This character overuses or overemphasizes the expression "Nanoja" in their sentences. "Nanoja" is an exaggeration on how old people say "na no da," which is a clause added to the end of a sentence.
name: Nanoja

description: A class vice president helps class president to preside over his class cabinet or organization within a student council. In a grade school, class presidents and vice presidents are generally elected by the class, a constituency composed of all students in a grade level.
name: Class Vice President

description:
This character speaks in a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_dialects]Japanese dialect[/url] outside of Hyoujun-go, or the standard Japanese dialect.

Japanese language is separated into several dialects with Tokyo dialect considered standard Japanese. The dialects fall into two primary clades: Eastern (which mainly consist of Tokyo dialect), and Western (consist of many diverse dialects, including Kansai-ben), with the dialects of Kyuushuu and Hachijou Island often distinguished as additional branches.
name: Japanese Dialect

description: This character has withdraw from their occupation or from one's active working life.
name: Retired

description:
The visual novel allows the addition or removal of anal hair for this character.

Anal hair in eroge characters is the extremization of a hairy character where hair usually grows only around the vagina. A character with anal hair is considered a careless character with poor grooming habits, and usually found in niche fetish VNs involving [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pubic_hair]pubic hair fetishisim[/url].
name: Anal Hair (activable)

description:
This character engages in gaping.

Gaping is the act of showing vagina or anus visibly stretched, often caused by large insertions or fisting. Gaping can also be achieved by spreaders/stretchers, specula or sexual toys.
name: Gaping

description: This character has a sexual toy or an object (other than a body part) inserted into their vagina.
name: Vaginal Object Insertion

description: This character has a sexual toy or an object (other than a body part) inserted into his anus.
name: Anal Object Insertion

description:
This character is subject of anal multiple objects insertion.

Anal multiple objects insertion consist in the insertion of more than one object or sexual toy (for example, multiple vibrators, pens, vegetables, etc.) into the anus of a person.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/25/90725.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Anal Multiple Objects Insertion

description:
This character is subject of vaginal multiple objects insertion.

Vaginal multiple objects insertion refer to the insertion of more than one object or sexual toy (for example, multiple vibrators, pens, vegetables, etc.) into the vagina of a person.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/24/90724.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Vaginal Multiple Objects Insertion

description:
This character is subject of sexual scenes involving a form of consensual sexual slavery informally called "public use" or "public cum dumpster".

"Public Use" or "Public Cum Dumpster" is a term used in hentai to identify a particular kind of sexual slavery where a character is left to be sexually used (and often abused) by every stranger or passerby.

Key factors of "public use (consensual)" trait are:
- The character is willingly offering to be used by people
- The character usually takes pride on being used by people and sometime can roleplay non-consensuality
- The character is usually restrained, stuck in pillory, enchained or stuck in cages or wall, closed in public places (toilet, market, square, ecc...) by his own will and he is free to go whenever he wants

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/50/100350.jpg]NSFW Example Pillory[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/51/100351.jpg]NSFW Example Stuck[/url]

description:
This character wears crotchless [url=https://vndb.org/i1072]spats[/url].

Crotchless spats are like spats but leaving the crotch area open.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/32/147432.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Crotchless Spats

description:
A character with this trait engages in incestuous relation between in-laws.

An in-law is someone who is a relative because of marriage, such as husband's sister, wife's father, etc.
name: In-law Incest

description: This character is penetrated or otherwise sexually teased by a vibrator.
name: Vibrator

description: This character is penetrated or otherwise sexually teased by a dildo.
name: Dildo

description: This is a meta-trait to house all traits about anal toys used in sex.
name: Anal Toys

description:
This character is the virtual avatar of another living character. Their real life counterpart may be known or they may only be presented as a virtual character.

In computing, an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Avatar_(computing)]avatar[/url] is a graphical representation of a user or the user's character or persona. It may take either a two-dimensional form as an icon in Internet forums and other online communities, or a three-dimensional form, as in games or virtual worlds.
name: Virtual Avatar

description:
This character wears an unfastened, untidy or unsecured [url=/i998]Ribbon Tie[/url].

Examples: [url=/c92302]Katsuragi Nanase[/url], [url=/c63973]Itsuki Yuri[/url]
name: Loose Ribbon Tie

description:
This character wears a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/School_uniforms_in_Japan]blazer school uniform outfit[/url].

A blazer school uniform is an outfit—a set of standardized clothes—worn primarily for an educational institution, based on Western-pattern catholic school uniform styles.
Usually the blazer has the school crest tailored in it.

[url=https://vndb.org/c63973]Example[/url]
name: Blazer School Uniform

description:
This character wears an unfastened, untidy or unsecured [url=/i157]Necktie[/url].

Examples: [url=/c92305]Urushibara Riko[/url], [url=/c16392]Aikawa Arisa[/url]
name: Loose Necktie

description:
This character wears an unfastened, untidy or unsecured [url=/i1463]String Ribbon Tie[/url].

Examples: [url=/c42351]Masubuchi Niko[/url], [url=/c19345]Toda Shion[/url]
name: Loose String Ribbon Tie

description: A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deerstalker]deestalker[/url] is a type of cap that is typically worn in rural areas, often for hunting, especially deer stalking. Because of the cap's popular association with [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sherlock_Holmes]Sherlock Holmes[/url], it has become stereotypical headgear for a detective, especially in comical drawings or cartoons along with farcical plays and films.
name: Deerstalker

description: This character is still hung up over a former lover, such as an ex-boyfriend/girlfriend, ex-fiancé/fiancée, ex-husband/wife, etc. in some way. For example, this character may still have existing or confused feelings for their ex after they have already broken up, are still mourning the death of a romantic partner, or never got any closure for a past lover's disappearance.
name: Fixation with Former Lover

description:
This character experiences significant feelings of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guilt_(emotion)]guilt[/url] at some point in the story.

Guilt is an emotional experience that occurs when a person believes or realizes—accurately or not—that they have compromised their own standards of conduct or have violated universal moral standards and bear significant responsibility for that violation. Guilt is closely related to the concept of remorse as well as shame.
name: Guilt

description:
This character is a member of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Social_organization]social organization[/url].

Social organization is a pattern of relationships among individuals that is created to achieve a common objective among its members. Social organization can include qualities such as leadership, structure, division of labor, communication systems, and so on. Those organization include non-profit organization, charities, unofficial organization, social groups, etc.

Only use this trait when the character doesn't fall into any other existing organization traits in the DB.
name: Social Organization Member

description:
This character is the leader of a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Social_organization]social organization[/url].

Social organization is a pattern of relationships among individuals that is created to achieve a common objective among its members. Social organization can include qualities such as leadership, structure, division of labor, communication systems, and so on. Those organization include non-profit organization, charities, unofficial organization, social groups, etc.

Only use this trait when the character doesn't fall into any other existing organization traits in the DB.
name: Social Organization Leader

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Croupier]croupier[/url].

A croupier or dealer is someone appointed at a gambling table to assist in the conduct of the game, especially in the distribution of bets and payouts. Croupiers are typically employed by casinos.
name: Croupier

description: This character is a half dwarf.
name: Half Dwarf

description: This character is arrested on suspicion of a crime at some point in the story. They may or may not be guilty of the crime they are suspected of committing.
name: Arrest

description:
This character identifies as someone who enjoys performing unpleasant, painful or humiliating acts on others, or feels positive emotions upon seeing such acts being committed. It doesn’t matter if the character expresses this inclination inside or outside of the sex scenes.

The trait applies if the character verbally or visually confirms to be a sadist, or if we can discern it through the words and actions of other people. It’s not necessary for the character to commit visible sadistic acts to be labeled a sadist – being identified as one is enough.

The trait does not apply to comedic characters with a personality which enjoys teasing others to an exaggerated extent, or those who engage in comedic violent acts.

Consider using [url=/i423]Sexual Sadism[/url] instead, if the character only displays sadistic impulses during the sex scenes.
name: Sadist

description:
This character identifies as someone who enjoys unpleasant, painful or humiliating acts being performed upon them, or feels positive emotions upon a threat of such acts being committed. It doesn’t matter if the character expresses this inclination inside or outside of the sex scenes.

The trait applies if the character verbally or visually confirms to be a masochist, or if we can discern it through the words and actions of other people. It’s not necessary for the character to commit visible masochistic acts to be labeled a masochist – being identified as one is enough.

The trait does not apply to comedic characters with a personality which enjoys being teasing by others to an exaggerated extent, or those who frequently end up on the receiving end of comedic violent acts.

Consider using [url=/i424]Sexual Masochism[/url] instead, if the character only displays masochistic impulses during the sex scenes.
name: Masochist

description:
The character has at least one scene in a visual novel, where they end up having sex in the air, while they don't use an aircraft, spacecraft or any means of flying transportation.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/65/5665.jpg] Example[/url]
name: Sex in the Air

description: A guard is a person who is paid or hired to protect property, assets, or people.
name: Guard

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Royal_guard]royal guard[/url].

A royal guard is a group of military bodyguards, soldiers or armed retainers responsible for the protection of a royal person, such as the emperor or empress, king or queen, or prince or princess. They often are an elite unit of the regular armed forces, or are designated as such, and may maintain special rights or privileges.
name: Royal Guard

description:
This character impersonates another character in the game.

Impersonation is the act of pretending or assuming the identity of an another individual. This can be fueled by various reasons, such as being a body double for someone, to gain various social advantages or to steal the identity for criminal purposes.

This trait is intended for characters that are pretending to be someone else for a significant amount of time. Do not use this trait if the character briefly impersonates another person, such us impersonating celebrities comedically for only several lines.
name: Impersonation

description:
This character is a target of impersonation from another character in the game.

Impersonation is the act of pretending or assuming the identity of an another individual. This can be fueled by various reasons, such as being a body double for someone, to gain various social advantages, or to steal the identity for criminal purposes.
name: Impersonation

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rodent]rodent[/url].

Rodents are mammals of the order Rodentia, which are characterized by a single pair of continuously growing incisors in each of the upper and lower jaws.
name: Rodent

description:
This character suffers from a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coronary_artery_disease]coronary artery disease[/url] and/or [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Congenital_heart_defect]congenital heart defect[/url].

Coronary artery disease, also called coronary heart disease, or simply heart disease, involves the reduction of blood flow to the heart muscle due to build-up of plaque (atherosclerosis) in the arteries of the heart. It is the most common of the cardiovascular diseases.

A congenital heart defect, also known as a congenital heart anomaly and congenital heart disease, is a defect in the structure of the heart or great vessels that is present at birth
name: Heart Disease

description:
This character uses "wachiki", an archaic [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronoun[/url] for "I", to address themselves. 

This pronoun was used by geisha and oiran in Edo period, it has two more variants: "achiki" and "wacchi".
name: Wachiki

description:
This character commits an act of betrayal against their will.

They or their loved ones might have been threatened for this to happen, or the betrayal might be the consequence of mind control. In an extreme case, the character might be a sleeper agent and not aware they are about to betray someone.
name: Unwilling Betrayal

description:
This women's hairstyle requires medium-length or longer hair. The hair is divided from the temples back and then fixed into bun, chignon or ponytail to secure into place (therefore, half the hair is in an 'updo'). If a woman has a fringe (bangs), that area is usually left free and not pulled into the 'updo'.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/46/151746.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/47/151747.jpg]Example 2[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/48/151748.jpg]Example 3[/url]
name: Half Updo

description: Humble characters tend to undersell themselves and don't try to take the spotlight. They are not haughty, proud or arrogant.
name: Humble

description:
This character wears an article of clothing that drapes over the breasts often weighted on the end.

Examples:
[url=/c94624]Kyun-Kyun na Olganite[/url]
[url=/c94620]Yumegasaki Mako[/url]
name: Breast Curtains

description:
This character engages in time stop.

Time stop is a concept where someone has the ability to make anything unable to move or act according to the flow of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Time]time[/url] for anything but their intended target, usually their own self.
name: Time Stop

description:
This character engage in manipulation of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Time]time[/url].

Time is the indefinite continued progress of existence and events that occur in an apparently irreversible succession from the past, through the present, into the future.
name: Time Manipulation

description:
This character is a member of an organization composed entirely or mostly of magic users.

Main members of this group can be called sorcerers, wizards, magus, magi, etc. but it could allow integration of other members with some other kind of innate power, strength or intelligence that makes them invaluable, powerful or deadly, depending on the setting.
name: Mages Organization Member

description:
This character wears a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dress_shirt]dress shirt[/url], also called tuxedo shirt or formal shirt.

A dress shirt is a garment with a collar and a full-length opening at the front, which is fastened using buttons or shirt studs mostly used in formal events, formal business, and some casual business where is expected or required its use, although it can be used as a casual garment (usually with a jacket or unbuttoned with a T-shirt).
name: Formal Shirt

description:
Importance of this character for game's story is so significant, that their name is literally in game's title. This can include the whole name, first name only, surname only and nickname or code name.

Examples: [url=/c87638]Salthe[/url], [url=/c66]Saya[/url]
name: Title Character

description:
This character is subjected to anal sex prior, after or during defecation. Alternatively, the character has anal sex without a preparation, which results in the visible mess.

In any case, the feces need to be clearly visible for the trait to apply.
name: Dirty Anal

description:
This character wears a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hanbok]hanbok[/url].

The hanbok (in South Korea) or Chosŏn-ot (in North Korea) is the traditional Korean clothes. The term "Hanbok" literally means "Korean clothing". Hanbok is characterized by its wrapped front top, long, high waisted skirt and its typically vibrant colours. Two piece clothing style of Hanbok is closer to the style of the nomadic tribes.
name: Hanbok

description:
This character is a  [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Feminist]feminist[/url].

Feminism is a range of social movements, political movements, and ideologies that aim to define and establish the political, economic, personal, and social equality of the sexes.

Make sure to only apply this tag when the character is explicitly described as a feminist or is mentioned to want equality between genders either by themselves or another character.
name: Feminist

description:
This character wears an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/%C3%81o_d%C3%A0i]Áo dài[/url].

The Áo dài is the national formal dress of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vietnam]Vietnam[/url]. The modern design of Áo dài consists of a two-piece garment: a long tunic that is usually collared, long-sleeved and is worn over trousers. This long tunic extends down to the wearer’s shin, or all the way to their feet and is split on both sides from the waist down, creating a front and rear flap. The Áo dài can also be paired with traditional headwear, such as the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asian_conical_hat]”Nón lá” conical hat[/url] or the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kh%C4%83n_v%E1%BA%A5n]”Khăn vấn” turban[/url].

The Áo dài is most often seen being worn by women and is usually portrayed with the appeal of feminine beauty. Because of this, the Áo dài is often thought to be a women’s only costume outside of Vietnam. However, there are Áo dài costumes for men, though they are more rarely seen than their female counterpart due to usually being worn only on traditional wedding or other formal occasions.
name: Ao Dai

description:
This character has a superhuman speed.

Superhuman speed for a given character would be such that it vastly exceeds the usual speed displayed by other persons of the same race, gender and bodybuild.
name: Superspeed

description:
This character commits a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proxy_murder]proxy murder[/url].

A proxy murder is a murder that is committed indirectly, most likely by one person ordering another person, or through the use of a third party.

A common example of a proxy murder would be a person contracting a hit man to kill someone.
name: Proxy Murder

description:
This character is subjected to a brand of Sexual Corruption, which results in them eventually switching sides from the side of Good, to Evil. Just like with other forms of Sexual Corruption, the character starts the game as pure/just/good, and is subjected to magic, mind control, rape & mindbreak, or other such techniques, that eventually make the character love/lust their corrupter and join their side.

As part of their fall, the character acquires a new form which represents an evil or corrupted version of themselves. This form needs to have a different appearance compared to the original form the character had.

The new corrupted form could be either the result of [url=/i342]Mahou Shoujo[/url] doing a [url=/i494]Henshin[/url] (transformation) into a lewder version of herself, or it could be a permanent form achieved through training (e.g. Venus Blood franchise).

For the trait to apply:
1) The game must be set in a universe with clearly defined sides of Good and Evil. If story is too complex and has shades of Grey, or if the Good/Evil dichotomy is not clearly defined, then the trait should not be used.
2) The character must change sides from non-Evil to Evil, achieved through sexual corruption perpetrated by the Evil side.

Do not confuse the trait with [url=/i3556]Evil Form[/url], which represents evil forms and transformations acquired through evil deeds of the character.

From [url=https://s2.vndb.org/ch/24/106424.jpg]Example A[/url] to [url=https://s2.vndb.org/ch/25/106425.jpg]Example B[/url]
name: Corrupted Form

description:
This character [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lock_picking]forces a lock[/url] to be opened by manipulating it's components without the original key. Method and tools varies depending on the lock and person who uses them.
Use this trait if the character in question is seen lock picking any lock (their own or others), with no bearing if the attempt was (un)successful or their intentions (criminal, locksmithing, hobby, etc.)

In some countries, such as Japan, lock-picking tools are illegal for most people to possess, but in many others, they are available and legal to own as long as there is no intent to use them for criminal purposes.
name: Lock Picking

description:
The character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mail_carrier]mail carrier[/url].

A mail carrier is a person who delivers mail and parcel post to residences and businesses.
name: Mail Carrier

description:
This character wears an armored tiara.

An armored tiara is the armored version of a tiara, used to protect the head in place of an helmet.
A famous armored tiara is the one worn by Wonder Woman.
name: Armored Tiara

description:
This character has one or more gems or [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gemstone]gemstones[/url] inserted or covering his body.

The gems should be a part of a natural genetic or race feature of this character.
Do NOT use this trait for characters wearing gems or jewellery, in that case just use something related to: [url=/i1863]Forehead Jewellery[/url]
name: Gems

description:
This character wears a reverse example of a bunnysuit typically with bunny ears and a tail. The costume portion normally covered by a bunnysuit is instead exposed and the portion normally exposed is covered leaving the person either functionally nude or wearing coverings such as [url=/i2482]pasties[/url].

NSFW Examples:
[url=/c94628]Sophia von Managras[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/27/150927.jpg]With Pasties[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/26/150926.jpg]Nude variant[/url]
name: Reverse Bunnysuit

description: This character only participates in the sex scenes that happen during the VN's game over endings, meaning this character is not part of the sexual activities in the canonic storyline. They just have a quick sex scene and then the game's over.
name: Game Over Sex Scenes Only

description: The character has a fear of touching or of being touched.
name: Haphephobia

description:
This character suffers from a mental age regression, where they, through various means, suddenly behave like a younger version of themselves.

This trait should be distinguished from [url=/i91]Amnesia[/url] where a character lose their memories without regressing their actual mental age. Although a character can carry both traits at the same time.
name: Mental Age Regression

description: This character engage in observation or imaging of celestial objects in the sky using either naked eye or astronomical tools such as telescopes and binoculars.
name: Stargazing

description:
This character becomes a victim of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trafficking_of_children]child trafficking[/url].

Trafficking of children is a form of human trafficking and is defined by the United Nations as the "recruitment, transportation, transfer, harboring, and/or receipt" kidnapping of a child for the purpose of slavery, forced labor and exploitation. This definition is substantially wider than the same document's definition of "trafficking in persons". Children may also be trafficked for the purpose of adoption.

Rather than being kidnapped, there is also a possibility of the child being sold by their parents, relatives or legal guardians.
name: Child Trafficking

description:
[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sharpshooter]Sharpshooter[/url] is highly proficient at firing firearms or other projectile weapons accurately. In general their skill in ranged combat is far higher than normal people.

For characters that specialized in firing from long-distance and concealed position, use the trait [url=https://vndb.org/i880]Sniper[/url] instead.
name: Sharpshooter

description:
This character is overall bad at cooking, and their efforts end up producing terrible-tasting food. This is often accompanied by a clumsy food preparation scene.

You should only use the trait if the character is explicitly described as a bad cook and all their efforts end up terribly. Don't base it simply on a single poor food preparation scene.
name: Bad Cooking

description:
A member of the armed forces who deserts.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Desertion]Desertion[/url] is the abandonment of a military duty or post without permission and is done with the intention of not returning.
name: Deserter

description: This character engages in an unofficial wedding ceremony not intended to be recognized by the state. Doesn't require anyone except for the bride and groom. Usually involves at least a wedding dress and an exchange of vows.
name: Pretend Wedding

description:
This character is the president of the tea ceremony club associated with a school.

Students involved in such a club may learn and practice how to prepare and drink tea in a traditional way.
name: School Tea Ceremony Club President

description:
This character is a female who prefers to use masculine speech.

Some languages have a more distinctive gender speech pattern than others, and it is unusual when one gender speaks like the other one. For example, in Japanese, only men usually use the ending particles "zo", "ze", "na", or use pronouns like "ore", "boku", or "washi". There are also word choices in general.

Use this trait when the character speaks distinctively in a masculine manner overall.
name: Masculine Speech

description: These are the romantic/sexual traits that most characters engage in, while being inside or outside of a committed relationship.
name: Sociosexual Events

description:
This character works as a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sailor]sailor[/url] or is a member of a ship, cruise, etc. crew without being a captain or a passenger.
If this character commands and takes responsibility of said transport, use [url=/i577]Captain[/url] instead.
name: Sailor

description:
This character has sex with another character while being broadcast to a wide general audience, such as through a news broadcast on [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Television]television[/url] or the internet.

Do not use the trait for instances where the broadcast only involves two (sometimes more) participants, its specifically directed at. Use [url=/i1737]Live Sex Chat[/url] instead. Neither use the trait for non-live sexually explicit material. That's what the pornography traits are for: [url=/i1359]Consensual Porn Filming[/url], [url=/i1853]Non-consensual Porn Filming[/url], [url=/i1358]Non-consensual Porn Filming[/url].
name: Live Sexual Broadcast

description:
This character draws comics or manga which focuses on explicit sexual contents.

Comics is a medium used to express ideas with images, often combined with text or other visual information. It typically takes the form of a sequence of panels of images. Textual devices such as speech balloons, captions, and onomatopoeia can indicate dialogue, narration, sound effects, or other information. 

One of the most known comic type is manga. Manga (漫画) are comics originating from Japan. Most manga conform to a style developed in Japan in the late 19th century, and the form has a long prehistory in earlier Japanese art. The term manga is used in Japan to refer to both comics and cartooning. Outside of Japan, the word is typically used to refer to comics originally published in the country or comics with art styling similar to it.
name: Erotic Comic Artist

description:
This character wears clothing with [url=https://wiki.mabinogiworld.com/view/Fur-trimmed_Coat]fur trim[/url].

[url=https://vndb.org/c8316]Character Example [/url]
[url=https://vndb.org/c20717]Character Example [/url]
[url=https://vndb.org/c3482]Character Example [/url]
[url=https://vndb.org/c94336]Character Example [/url]
name: Fur Trim

description: This character wears more than one [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Earring]piercing[/url] in one or both ears.
name: Multiple Earrings

description: These are the traits related to a character's wealth and social status.
name: Socioeconomic

description:
These are the traits that a represents a character behavior towards others, usually (but not always) in a friendly/romantic way similar to family.

Do not confuse with the traits under [url=/i247]Relationships[/url]; these are only meant to be used for characters whose acts and behaviors doesn't match to their actual relationship.
name: Relationship Acts

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nihilism]nihilist[/url].

In popular use, the term commonly refers to someone who has the belief that life is without intrinsic value, meaning, or purpose.

Only apply this trait to characters who are described as nihilists in universe, or have beliefs that are reflective of a nihilistic point of view.
name: Nihilist

description: This character dies in at least one [url=https://vndb.org/g1376]joke ending[/url]. Like the joke endings themselves, their death(s) here are not meant to be taken seriously, as the cause of death is likely improbable given what is established to make sense for the setting, or the death itself is not taken seriously by other characters no matter how little sense that might make.
name: Joke Ending Death

description: This character wears leather trousers.
name: Leather Trousers

description:
This character wears pajamas designed to look like an animal, for example a cow, a sheep, or even a dinosaur.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/58/156458.jpg]Example[/url]
name: Animal Pajamas

description: These are the traits that characters may be subjected based on the situations they are facing and their personalities.
name: Emotions

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Headband]headband[/url] with dog ears.

A headband is a clothing accessory worn in the hair or around the forehead, usually to hold hair away from the face or eyes. Headbands generally consist of a loop of elastic material or a horseshoe-shaped piece of flexible plastic or metal.
name: Inumimi Headband

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Headband]headband[/url] with cat ears.

A headband is a clothing accessory worn in the hair or around the forehead, usually to hold hair away from the face or eyes. Headbands generally consist of a loop of elastic material or a horseshoe-shaped piece of flexible plastic or metal.
name: Nekomimi Headband

description:
This character was [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rape]raped[/url] prior to the start of the story. This may or may not be shown with flashbacks.

This trait can overlap with [url=/i1669]Sexual Child Abuse[/url] if the character was a child when it occurred.
name: Pre-story Rape

description:
During the events of the story, this character becomes a victim of rape, but it is not shown to the reader. The entire incident may happen off screen, or the scene changes right before any sexually explicit content can be seen.

This trait is not to be confused with [url=/i3475]Pre Story Rape[/url], where the rape happens before the story begins, and where explicit sex might be shown in a flashback.
name: Off-screen Rape

description: This character is a half [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dragon]dragon[/url].
name: Half Dragon

description:
This character engage in an or acts in an effort to earn the forgiveness of others and sometimes oneself after they committed a mistake or wrongdoing, for example [url=https://vndb.org/i1120]betrayal[/url], [url=https://vndb.org/i691]treason[/url], or any other kinds of [url=https://vndb.org/i2554]crimes[/url] and evil deeds.

The character does not need to succeed for this trait to apply, just that they truly attempted the atonement.
name: Redemption

description: A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crown_prince]crown princess[/url] is the heir apparent to the throne in a royal or imperial monarchy. Crown Princess as a descriptive term has been used throughout history for the princess who is first-in-line to a throne and is expected to succeed (i.e. the heir apparent), barring any unforeseen future event preventing this.
name: Crown Princess

description: A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crown_prince]crown prince[/url] is the heir apparent to the throne in a royal or imperial monarchy. Crown Prince as a descriptive term has been used throughout history for the prince who is first-in-line to a throne and is expected to succeed (i.e. the heir apparent), barring any unforeseen future event preventing this.
name: Crown Prince

description:
This character is crucified for a period of time. [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crucifixion]Crucifixion[/url] is a method of capital punishment in which the victim is tied or nailed to a large beam or cross and left to hang sometimes until death from exhaustion and asphyxiation.

Do not use the trait to refer to crucifixions related to BDSM activities. Use [url=/i1773]X-Cross[/url] instead.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/02/155802.jpg]Example[/url]

description: [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Orchiectomy]Orchiectomy[/url] is a surgical procedure in which the character has one or both of their testicles removed.

description:
This character has sex with slimes.

[url=https://monster.fandom.com/wiki/Slime]Slimes[/url] are common types of monsters in many fantasy games. True to their name, they don't usually have any distinct shape and appear as large masses of gelatinous fluid. Slimes vary between mediums, with some being intelligent and capable of assuming basic shapes with others being nothing more than brainless piles of goo.
name: Sex with Slimes

description:
[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Castration]Castration[/url] is usually defined as any action, surgical, chemical, or otherwise, by which an individual loses use of the testicles. However, in common speech the term is used interchangeably with [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emasculation]emasculation[/url] or sometimes even [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Penectomy]penectomy[/url].

For the purposes of the database, this will be an umbrella term collecting all those traits.
name: Castration

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Formicophilia]Formicophilia[/url] is a form of zoophilia which refers to the sexual interest in being crawled upon or nibbled by insects, such as ants.
name: Consensual Sex with Insects

A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tentacle]tentacle[/url] is a flexible, mobile, elongated organ present in some species of animals, most of them invertebrates.

description:
The character engages in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Genocide]genocide[/url].

In 1948, the United Nations Genocide Convention defined genocide as "acts committed with intent to destroy, in whole or in part, a national, ethnic, racial or religious group, as such" including the killing of its members, causing serious bodily or mental harm to members of the group, deliberately imposing living conditions that seek to "bring about its physical destruction in whole or in part", preventing births, or forcibly transferring children out of the group to another group.
name: Genocide

description:
This character engages in creating a consensual pornographic production as a producer, director, cameraman, or another member of the staff, but is not involved as an actor in front of the camera. Use [url=/i1359]Consensual Porn Acting[/url] for the actors involved in the shoot.

If the character is both an actor and the one producing the shoot, as might happen in ultra low budget amateur productions, usually involving smart phones, use the trait in addition to [url=/i1359]Consensual Porn Acting[/url].
name: Consensual Porn Production

description: A collection of flowers in a creative arrangement. It can be used for the decor of homes or public buildings, or may be handheld. It is often given for special occasions such as birthdays, anniversaries or funerals.
name: Bouquet

description: Collects the traits associated with participating in or consuming pornography.
name: Pornography

description: This character acts like she's the wife of another character which is indicated by the fact of calling him husband, dear and whatnot, even though she's not actually his wife.
name: Wife Act

description:
This character commits a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deicide]deicide[/url].

Deicide is the killing (or the killer) of a god. It can be used for any act of killing a god, including a life-death-rebirth deity who is killed and then resurrected.
name: Deicide

description:
Sexual traits that happen in front of an audience are collected here.

Audience is at least one other individual that is not directly involved in the sexual acts between the participants (though the members of the audience might masturbate or engage in separate sexual acts).

Audience may exist within the same location as those that perform sexual acts, or they may watch them through a live broadcast. Consumers of recorded pornography are not considered an audience.
name: Audience

description:
Sexual traits that are performed in front of an audience, which is unaware they are happening, are collected here.

Audience is at least one other individual that is not directly involved in the sexual acts between the participants, and is oblivious of the sexual acts they are engaging in. However, audience must be aware of the presence of the participants themselves, otherwise there would be no need for them to be discreet.
name: Discretion

description:
The erotic humiliation traits, a character is subjected to, are gathered here.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erotic_humiliation]Erotic humiliation[/url] is consensual psychological humiliation performed in order to produce erotic excitement or sexual arousal for either the person(s) being humiliated or the person(s) humiliating, or both. It is sometimes performed before spectators, and can also be easily carried out over a long distance (such as online).

Humiliation does not need to be sexual in nature; as with many other sexual activities, it is the feelings that are obtained from the experience that are desired, regardless of the nature of the actual activity. Usually there is a feeling of submission for the person being humiliated and dominance for the person implementing the humiliation.

Erotic humiliation can be done verbally, physically, or both, and can be either private or public.
name: Erotic Humiliation

description:
The character is subjected to [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erotic_humiliation]erotic humiliation[/url] activities they consent to.

name: Consensual Erotic Humiliation

description:
This character has consensual sex with animals.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zoophilia]Bestiality[/url] is the practice of sexual activity between humans and non-human animals (bestiality), or a preference for or fixation on such practice.

Apply this trait to the human participant. Don't apply it to the animal participant.

description:

description:
This character starts the VN as a mortal, but experiences apotheosis over the course of the story.

[url=https://thewritepractice.com/apotheosis/]Apotheosis[/url] is when an individual is elevated to a godlike status. It can take the form of a literal deification, or it can be an abstract or metaphorical deification. For the purpose of the database, use the trait to describe only the literal cases of ascension.

Do not use the trait if some deity possesses or incarnates into the character - they themselves must become a god for the trait to apply.
name: Apotheosis

description:
This character wears a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Halloween_costume]Halloween Costume[/url], usually during or around Halloween and other related themes.
These costumes are usually centered around scary beings or fantastical creatures (like fairies or angels) but they can also be based on characters in mass media such as film, literature, and radio

[url=/i557]Cosplay[/url] trait can be used concurrently if the costume is used for a Cosplay event.
name: Halloween Costume

description:
This character is the victim of rape, which happens while the character is unable to provide a valid consent due to affected mental state.

Examples include being drugged with aphrodisiac, being under the effects of mind control or magic, which might even result in a character displaying a desire to have sex with the perpetrator, even if they wouldn't have given their consent in the normal circumstances.
name: Rape under Influence

description:
This character is the victim of rape, which happens while the character is unable to provide a valid consent due to being affected by drugs.

This might even result in a character displaying a desire to have sex with the perpetrator, even if they wouldn't have given their consent in the normal circumstances.
name: Rape Involving Drugs

description:
This character is the victim of advances that are sexual in nature (whether that were rape, sexual assault or something similar), which happen while the character is unable to provide a valid consent due to being affected by mind control.

This might even result in a character displaying a desire to have sex with the perpetrator, even if they wouldn't have given their consent in the normal circumstances.
name: Erotic Mind Control

description:
This character is subjected to [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brainwashing]mind control[/url] techniques that are [b]not[/b] sexual in nature.

They can be employed in a malevolent or benevolent way. Hypnotic therapy to quit smoking or to deal with a past trauma would be classified under the latter.
name: Non-erotic Mind Control

description: This character is a monster hunter, dedicated in tracking and killing or capturing supernatural beings, usually for money, power, revenge or fanaticism.
name: Monster Hunter

description: This character is a [url=https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/VampireHunter]Vampire Hunter[/url].
name: Vampire Hunter

description:
This character does not have a head at all, due to supernatural or other means.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/ch/46/123146.jpg]SFW Example[/url]
name: Headless

description: This character's penis is capable of moving of its own accord, grasping objects, and effectively functioning like another limb.
name: Prehensile Penis

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loan_shark]loan shark[/url].

A loan shark is a person who offers loans at extremely high interest rates, has strict terms of collection upon failure, and generally operates outside the law. Because loan sharks operating illegally cannot reasonably expect to be able to use the legal system to collect such debts, they often resort to enforcing repayment by blackmail and threats of violence.
name: Loan Shark

description:
This character receives an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inheritance]inheritance[/url].

Inheritance is the practice of passing on private property, titles, debts, entitlements, privileges, rights, and obligations upon the death of an individual.
name: Inheritance

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baron]baron[/url].

Baron is a rank of nobility or title of honor, often hereditary, in various European countries, either current or historical. Typically, the title denotes an aristocrat who ranks higher than a lord or knight, but lower than a viscount or count. Often, barons hold their fief — their lands and income — directly from the monarch. Barons are less often the [url=https://vndb.org/i2250]vassals[/url] of other nobles.
name: Baron

description:
This character gets swallowed or eaten alive during a sexual scene, the victim can both die or survive the act for this trait to apply.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vorarephilia]Vorarephilia[/url] is a sexual fetish and paraphilia where arousal occurs from the idea of being eaten, eating another, observing this process, or by the general process of eating. The fantasy most frequently involves the victim being swallowed alive, and may or may not include digestion.

Where the characters are eaten, swallowed or cannibalized in a non sexual way, just use [url=/i2665]Devouring[/url] instead.
name: Vore

description:
Another character defecates on this character in a sex scene. This may or may not lead to [url=https://vndb.org/i2359]coprophagia[/url].

This character will almost always be the submissive partner in the sex scene.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coprophilia]Scat[/url] is a fetish involving the act of defecation or the feces itself in a sexual context.

description: Panic disorder is an anxiety disorder where the character regularly has sudden attacks of panic or fear.

This is an organization that brings together the parents of children at a particular school and the teaching staff, intended to maintain good relations and communication between them and often to raise funds for the school.
name: Parent-Teacher Association Member

description:
Another character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fisting]inserts their fist[/url] into this character's vagina or anus in a sex scene.

Don't use this trait for cases where a character fists themselves. Use [url=/i592]Masturbation[/url] instead.
name: Fisting

description:
Bimbo is a trait that defines a certain type of female character. There are three primary characteristics that define a bimbo:

1. Looks: Bimbos dress in revealing and eye-catching clothing, wear gaudy make-up and lots of fashion accessories, dye their hair (blonde colour dominates, but other variations are possible). Frequently bimbos employ plastic surgery to enhance their looks. Tattoos and piercing are also occasionally proudly displayed.

2. Outlook: Bimbos crave hedonistic activity and frequently participate in parties and other social gatherings. They are usually sexually [url=/i1562]promiscuous[/url] and have multiple sexual partners. They might also be involved in sex work.

3. Intelligence: Bimbos are usually portrayed as shallow and lacking intelligence. Contrary to this belief, some of them can be pretty smart, but lacking a desire for hard work. This results in them taking the easiest paths toward their goal.
name: Bimbo

description:
This character is subject of anal multiple fisting.

Anal multiple fisting consist in the insertion of more than one fist into the anus of a person.
name: Anal Multiple Fisting

description:
This character is subjected to bimbofication. Bimbofication is a type of [url=/i2073]Sexual Corruption[/url], which results in the character becoming a [url=/i3547]Bimbo[/url]. The character is usually initially described as innocent/prude, smart, diligent, or simply unassuming, however the circumstances align to turn them into an oversexed sexpot, usually known as a [url=/i3547]Bimbo[/url]. The usual changes experienced by the character are these:

1. Looks: Character starts dressing in revealing and eye-catching clothing, wear gaudy make-up and lots of fashion accessories, dye their hair (blonde colour dominates, but other variations are possible). Frequently bimbos employ plastic surgery to enhance their looks. Tattoos and piercing are also occasionally proudly displayed.

2. Outlook: The character starts craving hedonistic activities and frequently participates in parties and other social gatherings. They usually become sexually [url=/i1562]promiscuous[/url] and start having sex with multiple partners. They might even get involved in sex work.

3. Intelligence: In fantasy/sci-fi settings the character usually is subjected to mental degradation that somehow decreases their intelligence. In real world setting, the character reprioritizes their lifestyle, usually dropping out of school, retiring from work, in order to seek a more hedonistic and social lifestyle. Drug use and abuse is also pretty common in such works.

A particular variation of the trope present in Japan is Gyarufication (and by extension Gangurofication), where a normal high school girl (or a young woman) usually falls in with a bad crowd, and over the course of the game starts displaying looks and attitude associated with the negative [url=/i1219]Gyaru[/url] / [url=/i1054]Ganguro[/url] stereotypes. The usual bimbo tropes of changing the looks, becoming morally lax, seeking hedonistic activities and sex, and not caring about studies or work tend to apply. Their lifestyle tends to be costly and will often lead to enjo-kousai and prostitution.

[i]Do NOT use this trait if the character is already a bimbo/gyaru/ganguro or they're already morally lax, corrupted at the beginning of the story.[/i]

Examples of Bimbofication

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/02/158002.jpg]1[/url], [url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/04/158004.jpg]2[/url], [url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/05/158005.jpg]3[/url]

Examples of Gyarufication / Gangurofication

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/06/158006.jpg]1[/url], [url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/07/158007.jpg]2[/url]
name: Bimbofication

description:
This character is subject of vaginal multiple fisting.

Vaginal multiple fisting consist in the insertion of more than one fist into the vagina of a person.
name: Vaginal Multiple Fisting

description:
This character is subjected to a brand of Sexual Corruption, which results in them eventually switching sides from the side of Good, to Evil. Just like with other forms of Sexual Corruption, the character starts the game as pure/just/good, and is subjected to magic, mind control, rape & mindbreak, or other such techniques, that eventually make the character love/lust their corrupter and join their side.

For the trait to apply:
1) The game must be set in a universe with clearly defined sides of Good and Evil. If story is too complex and has shades of Grey, or if the Good/Evil dichotomy is not clearly defined, then the trait should not be used.
2) The character must change sides from non-Evil to Evil, achieved through sexual corruption perpetrated by the Evil side.
name: Falling to Evil (sexual)

description: This is a meta trait for collecting gender and sexuality related traits.
name: Gender and Sexuality Related

description: This is a meta trait to contain all traits involving a sexual orientation change, whether it were consensual (discovery) or non-consensual (forced re-orientation).
name: Sexual Re-orientation/Discovery

description:
Against their consent, a character is subjected to the techniques and methods that over the course of the VN change their sexual orientation.

The usual case involves a gay character accosting a straight victim, and use hypnosis, magic, sci-fi technobabble or simply raping/mindbreaking them into becoming gay.

The reverse scenario of a gay character becoming a victim of a straight attacker and being "straightened out" is also possible, but much rarer in fiction due to the negative real world connotations.

Sometimes the change is not full, and the character becomes bisexual, instead of completely changing their orientation.
name: Sexual Re-orientation

description:
A character is subjected to consensual approaches that over the course of the VN makes them discover a new sexual orientation.

The usual case involves a gay character approaching a straight person, and seducing or manipulating them (without using outright illegal techniques) into becoming gay.

The reverse scenario of a gay character being on a receiving end of a straight seducer and being "straightened out" is also possible, but much rarer in fiction due to the negative real world connotations.

Sometimes the change is not full, and the character becomes bisexual, instead of completely changing their orientation.
name: Sexual Orientation Discovery

description:
This character has an Evil Form, which they acquire over the course of the game. This form needs to have a different appearance compared to the original form the character had.

The new Evil Form could be either the result of a [url=/i494]Henshin[/url] (transformation) into an evil version of themselves, or it could be a permanent form achieved through evil deeds.

If the Evil Form is a transformation, the character may already have it at the beginning of the game, if it is clearly established that the character is Evil.

Do not confuse the trait with [url=/i3427]Corrupted Form[/url], which represents lewd forms and transformations acquired through sexual corruption of the character.
name: Evil Form

description: This is a meta trait, collecting other traits related to body changes and modifications.
name: Body Changes/Modifications

description:
This character is an art teacher.

An art teacher typically works in the school system teaching students how to paint, draw, create sculptures and ceramics, and learn photography.
name: Art Teacher

description:
This character swallows or eats someone alive in a sexual scene, the victim can both die or survive the act for this trait to apply.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vorarephilia]Vorarephilia[/url] is a sexual fetish and paraphilia where arousal occurs from the idea of being eaten, eating another, observing this process, or by the general process of eating. The fantasy most frequently involves the victim being swallowed alive, and may or may not include digestion.

If the character eats, swallows, or cannibalizes in a non sexual way, just use [url=https://vndb.org/i481]cannibalism[/url] instead.
name: Vore

description:
This character subjects another character to torture using needles, nails, or other pointy objects in a sexual context. Use [url=/i1729]Subject of (Sexual) > Piercing Torture (BDSM)[/url] for the victim.

In case this happens in a non-sexual context, consider simply using [url=/i427]Engages in > Torture[/url] instead. This trait should not be used for unintentional perforation.
name: Piercing Torture (BDSM)

description: This female character becomes the victim of a rape perpetrated by a female character of the story.
name: Lesbian Rape

description:
This character wears a [url=https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Surgical_mask]surgical mask[/url].

A surgical mask, serves as a mechanical barrier that interferes with direct airflow in and out of respiratory orifices (i.e. nose and mouth). This prevents a surgeon or anyone else coughing, unintentionally spitting, etc germs and other contaminants onto a patient.
name: Surgical Mask

description:
This character performs fellatio on an inanimate object. Usually it's a dildo, a vibrator, a strap-on, a vegetable, or other phallic shaped objects.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/27/158627.jpg]NSFW Example (strap-on)[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/28/158628.jpg]NSFW Example (dildo)[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/29/158629.jpg]NSFW Example (cucumber)[/url]
