description:
This character possesses more than two breasts, either naturally or due to a temporary or permanent effect (magic, operation, etc...).

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/31/158531.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Multiple Breasts

description: This character's physical body becomes abnormally muscular through magical or other means.
name: Muscle Growth

description:
This character has genitals in an unexpected place on the body (e.g. hand, mouth, tail).

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/30/158630.jpg]NSFW Penis Tongue Example[/url]

If penises are on the nipples, use [url=/i1978]Dicknipples[/url] instead.
name: Adventitious Genitals

description:
This character has hair that resembles (or possibly behaves like) the natural elements.

[url=https://vndb.org/c102303]Fire hair example[/url]
[url=https://vndb.org/c53615]NSFW Water hair example[/url]
name: Elemental

description:
This character [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Weight_gain]gains weight[/url] over the course of the visual novel.

Weight gain occurs when more energy (as calories from food and beverage consumption) is gained than the energy expended by life activities, including normal physiological processes and physical exercise. If enough weight is gained due to increased body fat deposits, one may become overweight or obese.
name: Weight Gain

description:
This character's testicles grow in size, become larger than they originally were. There should be a focus on the testicles, but can be combined with [url=https://vndb.org/i2641]penis enlargement[/url] if both increase in size.

[url=https://e-hentai.org/s/353db2561e/2025461-1]NSFW Example Pre-Enlargement[/url]
[url=https://e-hentai.org/s/4cf056ae4d/2025461-5]NSFW Example Post-Enlargement[/url]
name: Testicular Enlargement

description: These are the romantic/sexual traits that most characters are subject of, while being inside or outside of a committed relationship.
name: Sociosexual Events

description: This person or entity was sealed by someone or something inside a living or non-living object or space, without the possibility to interact with the outside world until the seal is broken or weaken.
name: Sealing

description:
This character gets hymen magically or [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hymenorrhaphy]scientifically[/url] reconstructed making it possible to lose virginity another time throughout a single story.

Use this trait only for hymen reconstructions that leads to defloration.
For characters that naturally or magically regenerate or reconstruct hymen each time after being torn, just use [url=/i1131]Regenerative Hymen[/url].
name: Hymen Reconstruction

description:
At some point of the story, a parasite infects and start living inside this character's body, a process called [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parasitism]parasitism[/url].

A parasite is an organism, that lives on or inside another organism, the host, causing it some harm, and is adapted structurally to this way of life. Usually the parasite is smaller than the host because it needs to infect it undetected, but can grow larger and even take control of the host's physiology and mental faculties during the course of the VN.

Parasitism only covers physical infections perpetrated by a living organism. In case of metaphysical possessions just use [url=/i817]Possession[/url] instead.
name: Parasitism

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Street_performance]street performer[/url].

Street performance or busking is the act of performing in public places for gratuities. Performances are anything that people find entertaining, including acrobatics, animal tricks, and balloon twisting.
name: Street Performer

description: This is a meta trait to group all of the objects, used in a sexual way, related traits together.
name: Object (Sexual)

description: This is a meta trait to group all of the objects, used in a sexual way, related traits together.
name: Object (Sexual)

description:
This character shocks another by electricity in a sexual context. Apply [url=/i941]Subject of (Sexual) > Electric Shock (BDSM)[/url] to the one being shocked.

In case this happens in a non-sexual context, consider simply applying [url=/i427]Engages in > Torture[/url] or [url=/i632]Engages in > Assault[/url] as needed.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Electric_shock]Electric shock[/url] occurs upon contact of a (human) body with any source of electricity that causes a sufficient current through the skin, muscles, or hair. Typically, the expression is used to describe an injurious exposure to electricity. When exposed to a lethal electrical shock one is electrocuted.
name: Electric Shock (BDSM)

description:
This character has a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nose_piercing#Septum_piercing]nose ring[/url], specifically a piercing through the septum. Though some characters may wear it for fashion, it is commonly associated with BDSM culture or [url=https://vndb.org/i2292]livestock[/url].

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/32/159532.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Septum Ring

description:
[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Breast_torture]Breast torture[/url] is performed on this character. Apply [url=/i3593]Breast Torture[/url] to the performing character.

Breast torture is a sexual activity involving the application of pain or constriction to female breasts. This may involve directly painful or uncomfortable activities on female breast/nipples, such as breast bondage, wax play, spanking, squeezing, punching, flogging, electrocution, etc.

The recipient of such activities may receive direct physical pleasure via masochism, or emotional pleasure through knowledge that the play is pleasing to a sadistic dominant.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/08/159108.jpg]NSFW Example Breast Torture through Bondage[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/11/159111.jpg]NSFW Example Breast Torture through Breast Press[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/10/159110.jpg]NSFW Example Nipple Torture[/url]
name: Breast Torture

description:
This character engages in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Breast_torture]breast torture[/url]. Apply [url=/i3592]Breast Torture[/url] to the receiving character.

Breast torture is a sexual activity involving the application of pain or constriction to female breasts. This may involve directly painful or uncomfortable activities on female breast/nipples, such as breast bondage, wax play, spanking, squeezing, punching, flogging, electrocution, etc.

The recipient of such activities may receive direct physical pleasure via masochism, or emotional pleasure through knowledge that the play is pleasing to a sadistic dominant.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/08/159108.jpg]NSFW Example Breast Torture through Bondage[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/11/159111.jpg]NSFW Example Breast Torture through Breast Press[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/10/159110.jpg]NSFW Example Nipple Torture[/url]
name: Breast Torture

description: This is a meta-trait to house all traits about sex machines.
name: Sex Machine

description:
This character uses a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sybian]sybian[/url] during a sexual scene. 

A Sybian, or Sybian saddle, is a masturbation device primarily designed for use by women. 

It consists of a hollow saddle-like seat containing two electric motors, motor speed controller boards, gearing, pulleys and a platform on cranked axles such that a ridge on the top of the unit can be made to vibrate through a range of speeds as set using a wired external hand controller, and an upward pointing shaft set on an angle through the ridge can be made to rotate at speeds from zero rpm to several hundred rpm, again by use of the wired remote control. Flexible moulded attachments are supplied which fit over the vibrating ridge and shaft which mostly have integrated dildos on their top. In use, the rider locates the dildo into their body cavity for internal stimulation while pressing their external erogenous parts on the vibrating ridge

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/76/159376.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/75/159375.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]
name: Sybian

description: This character was chosen or sent by God in order to achieve his goal for him.
name: Messiah

description:
This character is being [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tutor#Private_tutors]tutored[/url] by someone.

A private tutor teaches a specific subject or skill to an individual student or small group of students. Such attention ideally allows the student to improve knowledge or skills more rapidly than in a classroom setting.
name: Tutoring

description:
This character suffered from poisoning or intoxication.

A poison can be any substance that is harmful to the body. It can be swallowed, inhaled, injected or absorbed through the skin. The poisoning can happen because of consumption of expired or wrongly prepared food, or due to the malicious actions of a third party towards the victim.
name: Poisoning

description:
This character engages in sexual activity while not in their original sex.

This usually happens after a character is transformed through magical, high-tec or mundane medical means from male into female or vice versa. For the trait to apply, the transformation must be complete.
name: Genderbent Sex

description:
This character has sex while wearing a wedding dress.

The trait can also be used in situations where the dress is taken off, but the veil, gloves, stockings or other wedding attire accessories stay on.
name: Sex in a Wedding Dress

description:
Parts or all of this character's clothing resembles genitals, whether it's on an armband, earrings, necklace, etc.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/85/160785.jpg]NSFW Bra, headband, and earrings example[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/86/160786.jpg]NSFW Helmet, piercings, and collar example[/url]
name: Genital Design

description: This female character rapes a female character of the story.
name: Lesbian Rape

description:
The character is someone who engages in the activities relating to the training and disciplining of sexual slaves. They might engage in that activity in the professional capacity or as a hobby.
The characters who are trained by the sexual trainer, may eventually end up subjected to [url=/i1879]Sexual Slavery[/url].

Do not confuse with [url=/i2016]Slave Owner[/url], as this character does not necessarily own any sex slaves, but only trains them.
name: Sexual Trainer

description: These are the role traits associated with characters' [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_orientation]sexual orientation[/url].
name: Sexual Orientation

description: This character is [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peruvians]Peruvian[/url].
name: Peruvian

description: This character is ethnically half-Asian. One of their parents is Asian, and the other one of a different ethnicity.
name: Half-Asian

description: This person has a fear of insects/arachnids in general, or towards certain species like cockroaches, spiders, bees, ants, etc.
name: Insectophobia

description: This character uses magic (or other forms of energy emanating from themselves) to fight enemies.
name: Magic/ESP Combat

description:
This person gets her cervix penetrated during sexual intercourse.

The [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cervix]cervix[/url] is the lower part of a woman's uterus and serve as a canal through which sperm must travel to fertilize an egg cell after sexual intercourse.
name: Cervix Penetration

description: This person was a King, Queen, or other regnant ruler in the past, but lost their position due to some circumstances.
name: Former Monarch

description:
This character is an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Informant]informant[/url]. 

An informant is a person who provides privileged information about a person or organization to an agency. It can also refer pejoratively to someone who supplies information without the consent of the involved parties.
name: Informant

description:
This character is subjected to sex so violently, they are bleeding during it. This may be due to rough intercourse, painful insertions, or type of restraints. This is different from [url=https://vndb.org/i104]virgin sex[/url], where the hymen can tear and bleed, as this fetish focuses on the pain of the victim.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/87/160787.jpg]NSFW Bloody Restraint Example[/url]

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/88/160788.jpg]NSFW Bloody Anal Example[/url]
name: Bloody Sex

description:
This character wears large, hoop-shaped earrings.

[url=https://vndb.org/c103021]Character Example[/url]
name: Large Hoop Earrings

description:
This character is a victim of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Revenge_porn]revenge porn[/url], where sexually explicit images or videos of them are distributed without their consent.

The material may have been made by a partner in an intimate relationship with the knowledge and consent of the subject at the time, or it may have been made without their knowledge. The possession of the material may be used by the perpetrators to blackmail the subjects into performing other sex acts, to coerce them into continuing a relationship or to punish them for ending one, to silence them, to damage their reputation, and/or for financial gain.
name: Non-consensual Porn Distribution

description:
This character wears [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roller_skates]roller skates[/url].

Roller skates are shoes or bindings that fit onto shoes that are worn to enable the wearer to roll along on wheels.
name: Roller Skates

description:
This character wears or has worn [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scrubs_%28clothing%29]surgical scrubs[/url].

Scrubs are the sanitary clothing worn by physicians, nurses, and other workers involved in patient care in hospitals. Some hospitals use scrub color to differentiate between patient care departments (i.e., Surgery, Childbirth, Emergency, etc.) or between licensed patient care personnel (nurses, radiologic technologists, respiratory and physical therapists, etc.).
name: Surgical Scrubs

description:
This character wears a [url=https://www.medicaldrape.com/blog/what-is-surgical-cap_b77]scrub cap[/url], also known as a bouffant cap.

Scrub caps are the sanitary headwear worn by physicians, nurses, and other workers involved in patient care in hospitals. Their usage is not limited to only nurses and surgeons: hospital patients are required to wear a bouffant cap when having surgery of any kind.
name: Scrub Cap

description:
This character performs [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Surgery]surgery[/url] on another.

Surgery is a medical or dental specialty that uses operative manual and instrumental techniques on a person to investigate or treat a pathological condition such as a disease or injury, to help improve bodily function, appearance, or to repair unwanted ruptured areas.
name: Surgery

description:
This character is a modeler or a fashion designer.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fashion_design]Fashion design[/url] is the art of applying design, aesthetics, clothing construction and natural beauty to clothing and its accessories. A fashion designer creates clothing, including dresses, suits, pants, skirts, and accessories like shoes and handbags, for consumers.
name: Fashion Designer

description:
[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peep-toe_shoe]Peep-Toe shoes[/url] are shoes in which there is an opening at the toe box which allows the toes to show.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/89/160789.jpg]Example[/url]
name: Peep-Toe Shoes

description:
This character wears a shirt with a pocket on their breast for the purpose of holding small objects inside. This type of shirt has become part of a "nerd" or "geek" fashion stereotype because of its association with engineers or students.

[url=https://vndb.org/c100701]Example[/url]
name: Pocket Shirt

description:
This character suffers from [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fear_of_the_dark#Nyctophobia]nyctophobia[/url] (fear of darkness).

Nyctophobia is a phobia characterized by a severe fear of the dark. It is triggered by the brain's disfigured perception of what would, or could happen when in a dark environment.
name: Nyctophobia

description: This character has inflicted a harm on other character during the course of the story, that has caused a minor or a major impact on his victim as the result. It can be an injury, wounding or poisoning - anything that inflicts a physical harm.
name: Battery

description: Tampering with evidence, or evidence tampering, is an act in which a person alters, conceals, falsifies, or destroys evidence with the intent to interfere with an investigation (usually) by a law-enforcement, governmental, or regulatory authority. It is a criminal offense in many jurisdictions.
name: Evidence Tampering

description:
Sugar baby is someone who engages in a transactional dating practice known as sugar dating, and receives money, gifts, support or other material benefits in exchange for providing the attention, company and sexual services to a wealthy benefactor.

The activity differs from prostitution in that the sugar baby doesn't constantly seek new clients but instead has only one or a few steady benefactors, who pay for their company. Moreover, while sex is expected, it's not essential in all interactions between the benefactor and the beneficiary.

Use [url=/i3653]Sugar Daddy[/url] for the benefactor.
name: Sugar Baby

description:
Sugar daddy is someone who engages in a transactional dating practice known as sugar dating, and provides money, gifts, support or other material benefits in exchange for receiving the attention, company and sexual services of a younger person in need of financial assistance.

The activity differs from hiring a prostitute in that the sugar daddy enters a long lasting agreement with only one or a few steady beneficiaries, who get paid for their company. Moreover, while sex is expected, it's not essential in all interactions between the benefactor and the beneficiary.

Use [url=/i3652]Sugar Baby[/url] for the beneficiary.
name: Sugar Daddy

description:
This character has usurped the power of a current ruler during the course of the story.

A coup d'état  (French for "blow of state"), often shortened to coup in English (also known as an overthrow), is a seizure and removal of a government and its powers. Typically, it is an illegal seizure of power by a political faction, rebel group, military, or a dictator. Many scholars consider a coup successful when the usurpers seize and hold power for at least seven days.
name: Coup D'état

description:
This character is an [url=https://dictionary.cambridge.org/ja/dictionary/english/adventurer]adventurer[/url]

Often see in fantasy setting , an adventurer is, but not necessary have to be:
- a capable warrior who fight monsters 
- working for a guild 
- taking requests/jobs as the source of income
- enjoys going to new, unusual, and exciting places (unexplored ruins, dungeons...)
An adventurer has similarities with a mercenary.

This trait is intended to cover a broad occupation often see in RPG games and their hybrids.
name: Adventurer

description:
This character is an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Afghanistan]Afghan[/url].
Afghan refers to a member of the Afghan people, a person from Afghan or of Afghanistan descent.
name: Afghan

description:
This character is an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ancestor]ancestor[/url] of another character in the story.

An ancestor is someone from whom a person is descended and who is usually more remote in the line of descent than a grandparent.
name: Ancestor

description:
This character is an online content creator.

An online content creator is someone who mainly creates material to be consumed by people on the internet. It could be a video, an edited image, a website, app, or anything in between. It might be monetized in order to make a living, or simply done as a hobby. Examples of online content creator are Bloggers, online publishers, newsletter authors, podcasters, YouTubers, course creators, and video game streamers.

Note that the content in question should be created intentionally in order to be served to an audience, so anything for personal use shouldn't be counted, e.g. a personal Virtual Avatar used in a game. A person whose social media is never intended to be served as "content" should not be counted either, even when they have a lot of followers.
What's important is an audience, content, and intention.
name: Online Content Creator

description: A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phoenix_(mythology)]phoenix[/url] is an immortal bird that cyclically reborn by arising from its ashes. Some legends say it dies in a show of flames and combustion, others that it simply dies and decomposes before being born again.
name: Phoenix

description:
This character wears a graduate [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Square_academic_cap]cap[/url].

A graduation cap is an item of academic dress consisting of a horizontal square board fixed upon a skull-cap, with a tassel attached to the center. The cap, together with a gown and sometimes a hood, forms the customary uniform of a university graduate in many parts of the world.
name: Graduate Cap

description: This character has a bounty over their head. Most of times a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wanted_poster]wanted poster[/url] is distributed to let the public know about the bounty.
name: Bounty

description:
Ass to mouth is a term primarily used to describe a sexual practice whereby an erect penis is removed from a receptive partner's anus and then directly put into their mouth, or possibly the mouth of another.

Apply the trait to the participant engaging in the anal sex and then introducing their penis to their partner's mouth. The trait can also apply if a strap-on or another sex toy is used instead.

name: Ass to Mouth

Sometimes the mantles are worn only once, but in other instances they may be worn or used on other occasions, such as during the opening of a session of the nation's legislature. description:
These characters are subjects of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Disownment]disownment.[/url]

Disownment occurs when a parent renounces or no longer accepts a child as a family member, usually when the child does something that is perceived as unbecoming and those actions lead to serious emotional consequences. Different from giving a child up for adoption, it is a social and interpersonal act and usually takes place later in the child's life, which means that the disowned child would have to make their own arrangements for future care. Among other things, it implies no responsibility for future care, making it similar to divorce or repudiation (of a spouse), meaning that the disowned child would have to find another residence to call home and be cared for.

Disownment may entail disinheritance, familial exile, or shunning, and often all three. A disowned child might no longer be welcome in their former family's home or be allowed to attend any major family events, such as birthday parties, graduations, or weddings, or be allowed to know about any such events taking place on any social media platform.
name: Disownment

Different from giving a child up for adoption, it is a social and interpersonal act and usually takes place later in the child's life, which means that the disowned child would have to make their own arrangements for future care. Among other things, it implies no responsibility for future care, making it similar to divorce or repudiation (of a spouse), meaning that the disowned child would have to find another residence to call home and be cared for.

Disownment may entail disinheritance, familial exile, or shunning, and often all three. Gender dysphoria is a term that describes a sense of unease that a person may have because of a mismatch between their biological sex and their gender identity. This sense of unease or dissatisfaction may be so intense it can lead to depression and anxiety and have a harmful impact on daily life.

Only apply the trait if the character is explicitly mentioned to have gender dysphoria in the visual novel. So, a transgender person who never mentions this shouldn't have the trait applied.

Stage fright is the anxiety, fear, or persistent phobia which may be aroused in an individual by the requirement to perform in front of an audience. Performing in front of an unknown audience can cause significantly more anxiety than performing in front of familiar faces.
name: Stage Fright

description:
These characters suffered from [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hypothermia]hypothermia[/url].

Hypothermia is defined as a body core temperature below 35.0 °C (95.0 °F) in humans. Symptoms depend on the temperature:
 - Mild hypothermia: there is shivering and mental confusion.
 - Moderate hypothermia: shivering stops and confusion increases.
 - Severe hypothermia: there may be hallucinations and paradoxical undressing, in which a person removes their clothing, as well as an increased risk of the heart stopping.
It may be caused by exposure to cold weather and cold water immersion, or by any condition that decreases heat production or increases heat loss.
name: Hypothermia

[url=https://vndb.org/c65543]Character Example[/url]

Gardening is the practice of growing plants. Ornamental plants are normally grown for their flowers, foliage, overall appearance, or for their dyes. Useful plants are grown for consumption (vegetables, fruits, herbs, and leaf vegetables) or for medicinal use. A gardener is someone who practices gardening.
name: School Gardening Club President

description:

A delinquent typically refers to a person of [url=http://vndb.org/i78]student age[/url] that occasionally breaks the school rules or engages in minor criminal activities.

Delinquent students are commonly seen [url=http://vndb.org/i264]smoking[/url] and/or [url=http://vndb.org/i262]drinking[/url].
name: Former Delinquent

description:
This character is an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elevator_operator]elevator operator[/url]. An operator is a person specifically employed to operate a manually operated elevator. 

Operators had to regulate the elevator's speed, which typically required a good sense of timing to consistently stop the elevator level with each floor. In addition to their training in operation and safety, department stores later combined the role of operator with greeter and tour guide, announcing product departments, floor by floor, and occasionally mentioning special offers. 

In Japan, they are known as shokoki garu ("up and down controller girl") or hakojo ("box girl") Erebeta girl remains the popular term for this occupation, a staple sight of urban Japan. Sporting tailored uniforms and robotic smiles, elevator girls are trained extensively in polite speaking and posture.
name: Elevator Operator

description:
The character has a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beak]beak[/url].

The beak, bill, or rostrum is an external anatomical structure found mostly in birds, but also in turtles, non-avian dinosaurs and a few mammals. A beak is used for eating, preening, manipulating objects, killing prey, fighting, probing for food, courtship, and feeding young.
name: Beak

description:
This character has a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fishing_rod]fishing rod[/url].

A fishing rod is a long, thin rod used by anglers to [url=https://vndb.org/i621]catch fish[/url] by manipulating a line ending in a hook.
name: Fishing Rod

description:
The character is based on the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/VTuber]Virtual YouTuber[/url].

A virtual YouTuber is an online entertainer who uses a virtual avatar generated using computer graphics. Real-time motion capture software or technology are often—but not always—used to capture movement.

Use the trait for the characters that are based on the known avatars of virtual online streamers, but not necessarily perform that role in a given game.
name: Based on a Virtual Streamer

description:
This character is seen with a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hookah]hookah[/url].

A hookah, shisha or waterpipe, is a single- or multi-stemmed instrument for heating or vaporizing and then smoking either tobacco, flavored tobacco (often muʽassel), or sometimes cannabis, hashish, and opium. The smoke is passed through a water basin—often glass-based—before inhalation.
name: Hookah

description:
This character is the recipient of a sexual scene involving breast smothering. Apply [url=/i2258]Engages in (Sexual) > Breast Smothering[/url] to the performing character.

Breast smothering is a particular type of erotic asphyxiation and is the act of depriving someone of oxygen by pressing his head against (usually huge) breast. Breast smothering is common in VN involving [url=https://vndb.org/g184]shotacon[/url], mother/son relationship or BDSM.

Smothering helps reinforce the dominant and submissive relationship of a BDSM couple, as the dominant has complete power. A submissive’s feelings of pleasure are often enhanced by the weight or pressure they feel on their body. They may also enjoy the taste and smell of their partner in such close proximity. As with any activity which cuts off a person’s air supply, the submissive may also feel euphoric sensations caused through lack of oxygen.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/64/94264.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/66/94266.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/65/94265.jpg]NSFW Example 3[/url]

description:
This character has [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Afro-textured_hair]afro-textured hair[/url]. 

Afro-textured hair, also called "kinky" or "coily" hair, is the hair texture of populations in and from Africa. Each strand of this hair type grows in a tiny, angle-like helix shape. The overall effect is such that, contrasted with straight, wavy or curly hair, afro-textured hair appears denser. 

Afro-textured hair is often styled into hairstyles such as Afros, twists, and dreadlocks.
name: Afro-textured

description:
Synesthesia is a neurological condition in which stimulation of one sensory or cognitive pathway (for example, hearing) leads to automatic, involuntary experiences in a second sensory or cognitive pathway (such as vision).

Simply put, when one sense is activated, another unrelated sense is activated at the same time.

This may, for instance, take the form of hearing music and simultaneously sensing the sound as swirls or patterns of color.

[From [url=https://www.psychologytoday.com/us/basics/synesthesia]Psychology Today[/url]]
name: Synesthesia

description:

The library committee is a student organization present in many colleges, universities or high schools with the main purpose of preserving the library and realizing transmits such as books being checked out.

description:

A lanyard is a light-duty tether worn around the neck or shoulders to conveniently carry items such as keys or identification cards, or as a safety harness to prevent accidental dropping of valuable handheld items such as a camera.
name: Lanyard

description:

3D glasses are a special type of glasses that allow the viewer to perceive 2-dimensional images as 3-dimensional. They contain two differently colored filters, one for each eye. 

[Url=https://vndb.org/c118842]Character Example[/url]
name: 3D Glasses

description:
This character engages in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taekwondo]taekwondo[/url].

Taekwondo is a Korean martial art that involves that involves punching and kicking techniques, with emphasis on head-height kicks, spinning jump kicks, and fast kicking techniques.
name: Taekwondo

description: This character wears a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hijab]hijab[/url]. A hijab is a headcovering worn by Muslim women. Many Muslims believe it is obligatory for every female Muslim who has reached the age of puberty to wear a head covering. While such headcoverings can come in many forms, hijab often specifically refers to a cloth wrapped around the head, neck and chest, covering the hair and neck but leaving the face visible.
name: Hijab

description: This character is the president of a cooking club associated with a school.
name: School Cooking Club President

description:
This character plays airsoft

A team game in which participants eliminate opposing players by tagging them out of play with spherical plastic projectiles shot with mock air weapons(usually powered by an electronic motor).

Although similar to paintball in concept and gameplay, airsoft pellets do not leave visible markings on their target and hits are not always apparent. Though the pellets leave bruises or welts on exposed skin (and so protective gear is recommended), the game relies heavily on an honor system in which players who have been hit are expected to call themselves out.
name: Airsoft

description:
This character is a substitute teacher.

A substitute teacher is someone who fills in for a full-time teacher’s absence due to illness, parental leave, or other reasons either for a day or sometimes much longer.
name: Substitute Teacher

description:
This character plays or engages in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hockey]hockey[/url].

Though there are several types, two teams will play against each other by trying to maneuver the object of play, either a type of ball or a disk (such as a puck), into the opponent's goal using a hockey stick.
name: Hockey

description:
This character has [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antler]antlers[/url].

Antlers are extensions of an animal's skull found in members of the Cervidae (deer) family. Antlers are a single structure composed of bone, cartilage, fibrous tissue, skin, nerves, and blood vessels. They are generally found only on males, with the exception of reindeer/caribou. Antlers are shed and regrown each year and function primarily as objects of sexual attraction and as weapons.
name: Antler

description:
This character always dies in all of the possible routes or before the branching point (also applies to linear/kinetic novels). Their death cannot be avoided.

The trait may be used even if the character is later resurrected through some means.
name: Completely Unavoidable Death

description:
This character has an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antisocial_personality_disorder]Antisocial personality disorder (ASPD)[/url], which is characterized by a limited capacity for empathy as well as a difficulty sustaining long-term relationships.

A sociopath has little regard for another person's emotions, rights, or experiences. They lack remorse for their actions, and they act in ways that show no regard for others, including lying, cheating, and manipulating.

The character may display arrogance, think lowly and negatively of others, and have limited remorse for their harmful actions and have a callous attitude towards those they have harmed.
name: Sociopath

description:
This character has a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unibrow]unibrow[/url]. 

A unibrow is a single eyebrow created when the two eyebrows meet in the middle above the bridge of the nose. The hair above the bridge of the nose is of the same color and thickness as the eyebrows, such that they converge to form one uninterrupted line of hair.
name: Unibrow

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dullahan]Dullahan[/url].

A Dullahan is a type of mythological creature in Irish folklore. He is depicted as a headless rider, on a black horse, who carries his own head held high in his hand or under his arm.
name: Dullahan

description: A hypocrite is a person who claims or pretends to have certain beliefs about what is right but who behaves in a way that disagrees with those beliefs.
name: Hypocrite

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henchman]henchman[/url].

A henchman is a loyal employee, supporter, or aide to some powerful figure engaged in nefarious or criminal enterprises. Henchmen are typically relatively unimportant in the organization: minions whose value lies primarily in their unquestioning loyalty to their leader.
name: Henchman

description: This character has a dysfunction revolving around their bladder. They may frequently need to use the restroom, or perhaps cannot [url=https://www.mayoclinic.org/diseases-conditions/urinary-incontinence/symptoms-causes/syc-20352808]control their bladder[/url] at all. In some cases, those with severe urinary incontience may need to wear adult diapers.
name: Urinary Dysfunction

description:
This character possesses an expressive [url=http://animanga.wikia.com/wiki/Ahoge]Ahoge[/url] for the majority of the game. Unlike normal ahoge, expressive ahoge shows the emotion or mood of the person by changing shape.
Expressive ahoge are usually longer than normal ahoge.

One example would include [url=/c2934]Tsuchiya Kei[/url] from [url=/v2250]Defcon☆One[/url].
name: Expressive Ahoge

description: This character is [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Venezuelans]Venezuelan[/url].
name: Venezuelan

description: This character has significantly larger than average testicles. This is either obvious in the art (e.g. [url=/c122196]Tanukijokyuul[/url]) or discussed by characters in the game.
name: Large Testicles

description:
A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freelancer]freelance worker[/url], or self-employed worker, is the person who are not necessarily committed to a particular employer long-term.
Sometimes, workers are represented by a company or a temporary agency that resells freelance labor to clients; others work independently or use professional associations or websites to get work.

Keep in mind that freelancers are workers who handle all activities by themselves, including contracts, legal issues, accounting, marketing, and other business functions. They might choose to pay for professional services or hire another worker to handle some of the workload, but for most cases, these are very short-term contracts.
name: Freelancer

description:
This character is seen or described as being part of [url=https://j-fashion.fandom.com/wiki/Gyaruo]Gyaruo[/url] fashion.

Gyaruo is the male version of Gyaru fashion. Like gyaru, the style was bold and became associated with rebellious youth. The -o suffix that is added to the word is one reading of the kanji for male (男). 

Gyaruo are most commonly characterised by their deep tans, dyed hair, party lifestyle, and a liking for all different types of trance music including para-para dancing music, Eurobeat, etc.
name: Gyaruo

description: This character has a [url=https://vndb.org/i55]slim[/url] build and visible muscle but is not bulky enough to be considered [url=https://vndb.org/i122]muscular[/url].
name: Toned

description:
This character engages in a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Performing_arts]performing art[/url].

The performing arts are arts which are performed for an audience, such as [url=https://vndb.org/i1039]music[/url], [url=https://vndb.org/i1581]dance[/url], opera, theatre and musical theatre, magic, illusion, mime, spoken word, puppetry, circus arts, stand up comedy, improv, professional wrestling and performance art.
name: Performing Arts

description:
This character wears a necktie around their neck and nothing else. Although accessories such as armbands, shoes and socks, and so forth may also be worn they are otherwise exposed.

See also [url=/i1818]Clothes > Naked Ribbon[/url] for the ribbon variant.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/80/175580.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Naked Necktie

description:
This character plays the role of an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Villain#Sympathetic_villain]antivillain[/url]. 

Just like antihero is a hero lacking traditional heroic traits and values, an antivillain is a character lacking conventional villainous attributes, who is ultimately still the villain. They might fight their opponents in a fair manner and spare the defeated enemies, while being pleasant in their behaviour. They are usually portrayed in a manner that is sympathetic or at least understandable from the reader's point of view and their personality might show attributes usually considered uncommon of a villain, like being kind and generous to their underlings and their opponents, being brave, wise and humble, but they still strive towards a villainous goal, or at least towards an outcome that is unpalatable for the heroic side.

Sometimes such a character has been forced into the life of villainy through circumstances, or they are a strong believer in their goal, even if achieving it would ultimately result in a lot of collateral damage.
name: Antivillain

description: It is a congenital, benign irregularity on the skin which is present at birth or appears shortly after birth—usually in the first month. They can occur anywhere on the skin.
name: Birthmark

description: This character engages in suicide ideation, which includes any thoughts of ending their life, wishing they were dead or wishing they could cease to exist.
name: Suicide Ideation

description:
This character enters a fake relationship with another character, typically a fake romantic relationship or a fake marriage.

A common trope in romantic media for female audiences where two characters put on the appearance of being in a relationship for practical reasons, such as avoiding proposals or advances from other people or getting an annoying family member or friend to shut up about their single status. Over the course of the relationship, the characters in the fake relationship typically start to see each other in a more romantic light and end up falling in love for real.
name: Fake Relationship

description:
This character engages in some sort of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Corruption]Organized Corruption[/url].

Some forms of Organized Corruption may involve [url=/i414]blackmail[/url], [url=/i2696]bribery[/url], money laundering, [url=/i1153]embezzlement[/url], influence peddling and many other illegal activities that allows a person, who is entrusted in a position of authority, acquire illicit benefits or abuse power for one's personal gain.
name: Organised Corruption

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shinsengumi]Shinsengumi[/url].

The Shinsengumi was a special police force of the late shogunate period.
name: Shinsengumi

description:
This character wears a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kabuto]kabuto[/url].

A kabuto is a type of helmet first used by ancient Japanese warriors. In later periods, it became an important part of the traditional Japanese armor worn by the samurai class and their retainers in feudal Japan.
name: Kabuto

description: This character has a strong psyche allowing them to withstand most of life’s hardships without breaking, experiencing mental breakdown or going insane.
name: Resilient

description:
This character has been seen with an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Electronic_cigarette]Electronic Cigarette[/url].

An E-cigarette is an electronic, battery powered device used for the inhalation of vaporized substances. An E-cigarette may be used to smoke many different types of substances, such as nicotine or cannabis.
name: Electronic Cigarrette

description:
This character is [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adaptive_behavior]adaptive[/url].

These characters are able to easily adjust to new situations and change their behavior to fit the demands of their environment. They are willing to bend and break habits, to challenge themselves when their circumstances change. They tend to face problems, pivot among distractions, and proceed forward. Adaptable people are prone to think ahead and consistently focus on improvement.
name: Adaptive

description: [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rattail_(hairstyle)]Rattail[/url] is a hairstyle in which a tail-like piece of hair is longer than the hair around it. Different from a ponytail in that with a ponytail, all or part of the hair is pulled back into the tail, usually with some sort of hair tie, while with a rattail, no hair is pulled back, the tail is simply there.
name: Rattail

description: Creative characters are excellent at using their imagination and thinking outside the box to come up with new ideas. They can come up with unexpected solutions and give a unique perspective on events.
name: Creative

description:
This character has lots of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patience]patience[/url].

Patient characters are able to keep calm in the face of disappointment, distress or suffering. They don't become annoyed when waiting for a long time or when dealing with difficult people.
name: Patient

description: This character gets somebody [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pregnancy]pregnant[/url] during the course of the game.
name: Impregnation

description:
This character practices [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Opportunism]opportunism[/url].

Opportunistic characters take immediate advantage, often unethically, of any circumstance of possible benefit to them.
name: Opportunistic

description:
This character [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gaslighting]gaslights[/url] someone.

To gaslight someone means to manipulate another person into doubting their own perceptions, experiences, or understanding of events. It often occurs in abusive relationships.
name: Gaslighting

description:
This character is being [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Interrogation]interrogated[/url] during the course of the story.

Interrogation is a process of asking someone a lot of questions for a long time in order to get information, sometimes using threats or violence.
name: Interrogation

description:
This character is [url=https://dictionary.cambridge.org/dictionary/english/dogmatic]dogmatic[/url].

Dogmatic characters are very firm in their convictions, which usually come from some authority. The authority is often religious, but it doesn't have to be. They are inclined to lay down principles as undeniably true even despite evidence to the contrary.
name: Dogmatic

description:
This character [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Interrogation]interrogates[/url] someone during the course of the story.

Interrogation is a process of asking someone a lot of questions for a long time in order to get information, sometimes using threats or violence.
name: Interrogation

description:
This character gets [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gaslighting]gaslighted[/url] by someone.

To gaslight someone means to manipulate another person into doubting their own perceptions, experiences, or understanding of events. It often occurs in abusive relationships.
name: Gaslighting

description: This meta trait is here to group together sexual acts involving the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vagina]vagina[/url].
name: Vaginal

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scottish_people?]Scot[/url].

In modern usage, "Scottish people" or "Scots" refers to anyone whose linguistic, cultural, family ancestral or genetic origins are from Scotland.
name: Scottish

description:
A television host is a person who introduces and hosts television programs, often serving as a mediator for the program and the audience.

[Edited from [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Television_presenter]Wikipedia[/url]]
name: Television Host

description: This character undergoes [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Capital_punishment]capital punishment[/url], the state-sanctioned practice of killing a person as a punishment for a crime. Executions are carried out by many methods, including hanging, shooting, lethal injection, stoning, electrocution, and gassing.
name: Capital Punishment

description:
This character will die in at least one of the routes and this is unavoidable. Use [url=/i3852]Subject of > Completely Unavoidable Death[/url] if the character dies in every route or before the branching point.

The trait may be used even if the character is later resurrected through some means.
name: Unavoidable Death

description: You can see every "proper ending" of the game without experiencing this character's rape. Their only rape scenes are reserved for premature bad endings, which you are not forced to read to access the other endings.
name: Completely Avoidable Rape

name: Unavoidable Rape

name: Completely Unavoidable Rape

description: This character always rapes somebody in all of the possible routes or before the branching point (also applies to linear/kinetic novels). The rape cannot be avoided.
name: Completely Unavoidable Rape

description:
This character wears a paper bag mask.

Usually it's just a paper bag with two eye holes cut into it, but in some cases it may have extra holes or decorations on the bag.
name: Paper Bag Mask

description: This character obsessively wishes for a marriage, whether to one specific person or to anyone at all. In extreme cases, they may force a marriage on someone.
name: Marriage Complex

description:
This character performs kabedon.

[url=https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/WallPinOfLove]Kabedon[/url] is a situation where one characters traps another against a wall, or other vertical surface, by slamming a limb (usually a hand) on it, often with an accompanying slam sound. 

Normally no physical restraining occurs, but sometimes the wall slamming is accompanied by some physical contact, like lifting the chin of the victim or trapping their wrist with the initial slam.

It is a common occurence in harem genre, as well as in media aimed at young women demographic. There, the intent is often romantic, and may be followed by flirting, a confession or a kiss attempt from the perpetrator.

[url=https://t.vndb.org/sf/30/182530.jpg]Arm Example[/url]
[url=https://t.vndb.org/sf/55/105555.jpg]Leg Example[/url]
[url=https://t.vndb.org/sf/31/182531.jpg]Text & Kabekui / Chin-lifting Example[/url]
[url=https://t.vndb.org/sf/32/182532.jpg]Tekubidon / Wrist-restraining Example[/url]
name: Kabedon

This character is on the receiving end of kabedon.

[url=https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/WallPinOfLove]Kabedon[/url] is a situation where one characters traps another against a wall, or other vertical surface, by slamming a limb (usually a hand) on it, often with an accompanying slam sound. 

Normally no physical restraining occurs, but sometimes the wall slamming is accompanied by some physical contact, like lifting the chin of the victim or trapping their wrist with the initial slam.

It is a common occurence in harem genre, as well as in media aimed at young women demographic. There, the intent is often romantic, and may be followed by flirting, a confession or a kiss attempt from the perpetrator.

[url=https://t.vndb.org/sf/55/105555.jpg]Leg Example[/url]

description:
This character's [i]sex[/i] changes from male to female.

The trait should only be used if the change happens during the course of the game and not before it even starts.
name: Sex Change (Male to Female)

description:
This character's [i]sex[/i] changes from female to male.

The trait should only be used if the change happens during the course of the game and not before it even starts.
name: Sex Change (Female to Male)

description:
This character talks like a gyaru.

Gyaru speech is a unique variant of Japanese youth language, primarily used by gyaru. It [b]heavily[/b] incorporates these characteristics:
- Strong use colloquial and slang words popular among young people in Japan, like マジ (maji) and ウケる (ukeru).
- More relaxed way of speaking, creating an impression of a more lazy and often least tangible speech.
- A distinct emphasis on the middle of words, discarding the standard pitch accents for a recognizable rhythm, e.g. darui (だるい) into darru (だっる)
- Vowel shifts, transforming words like ない (nai) into ねえ (nee).
- Reduced word, usually the sentence ending, but not limited to. For example, words such as jan (じゃん), -ssu (っす), and -ssho (っしょ), ttsu (っつ)

Additionally, the character may uses slang words known in gyaru community.
name: Gyaru Speech

description:
This character inserts their fist into another character's vagina in a sex scene. Apply [url=/i1137]Subject of (Sexual) > Vaginal Fisting[/url] to the character being fisted.

Don't use this trait for cases where a character fists themselves. Use [url=/i3135]Engages in (Sexual) > Vaginal Masturbation[/url] instead.
name: Vaginal Fisting

description: This meta trait is here to group together sexual acts involving the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vagina]vagina[/url].
name: Vaginal

description:
This character engages in a sexual scene involving adult breast feeding (they are the character sucking on another character's breasts). Apply [url=/i3957]Subject of (Sexual) > Adult Breast Sucking[/url] to the one who has their breasts sucked.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erotic_lactation]Erotic lactation[/url], also called adult breast feeding, is sexual arousal by breastfeeding on a female's breast.

Breast feeding is the act of sucking on the breast directly and does not require any milk to be visible or present. This tag must be used only in case of this specific fetish and not just normal child/mother breast feeding.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/51/95951.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Adult Breast Sucking

description:
This character is subject to adult breast feeding in a sexual scene (they are the character having their breasts sucked by another character). Apply [url=/i3956]Engages in (Sexual) > Adult Breast Sucking[/url] to the one who performs the sucking.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erotic_lactation]Erotic lactation[/url], also called adult breast feeding, is sexual arousal by breastfeeding on a female's breast.

Breast feeding is the act of sucking on the breast directly and does not require any milk to be visible or present. This tag must be used only in case of this specific fetish and not just normal child/mother breast feeding.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/51/95951.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Adult Breast Sucking

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Supervillain]supervillain[/url].

Supervillain is a character who possesses superhuman powers which they use in order to cause various villainous acts.

The trait should be used for the characters in a clearly defined morality setting (whether the definition is eventually revealed to be false or not), where people with superhuman powers on the opposing sides exist and fight against each other.
name: Supervillain

description: This is an umbrella trait to gather various personality complexes.
name: Personality Complex

description:
This character suffers from [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Post-traumatic_stress_disorder]Post-traumatic stress disorder[/url].

Post-traumatic stress disorder is a mental and behavioral disorder that develops from experiencing a traumatic event, such as sexual assault, warfare, traffic collisions, child abuse, domestic violence, or other threats on a person's life or well-being. Symptoms may include disturbing thoughts, feelings, or dreams related to the events, mental or physical distress to trauma-related cues, attempts to avoid trauma-related cues, alterations in the way a person thinks and feels, and an increase in the fight-or-flight response.
name: PTSD

description:
This character is subject of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Smoking_fetishism]smoking fetishism[/url].

Smoking fetishism is a sexual fetish based on the pulmonary consumption (smoking) of tobacco or cannabis, most often via cigarettes, cigars, and also pipes, vapes, and hookahs to some extent. As a fetish, its mechanisms regard sexual arousal from the observation or imagination of a person smoking, sometimes including oneself.
name: Smoking Fetishism

description:
This character engages in anal liquid expulsion.

This character expels liquid introduced into their anus, usually through enema, though the expulsion of a large amount of semen or even piss after [url=/i3538]Internal Pissing[/url] might be possible.

Use this tag alongside [url=/i1169]Scat[/url] if the expelled liquid also contains feces inside it.

[url=https://t.vndb.org/sf/90/183190.jpg]Example[/url]
name: Anal Liquid Expulsion

description:
A character with this trait, by the deliberate actions/inactions, or by the agreement with their significant other, is convinced to engage in sexual relations with other people. Only they (whether they are male or female) have sex with others.

Under normal circumstances neither side of the couple has a desire to cheat, but due to the desires of one partner, their significant other will end up having sex with other people. This can be a mutually agreed act with a trustworthy person, which the partner convinces their significant other to have sex with, or a selfish act, with the partner selling or whoring their significant other for personal gain (money, blackmail material on someone, etc.).

In every case, the partner is (at least initially) fine with their significant other being sexually involved with other people, and possibly even enjoys it.

Apply the trait to the partner who is shared by their significant other with other people.

Don't confuse with [url=/i1605]Swinging[/url] where both romantic partners have sex with others, or [url=/i2177]Polyamory[/url], which is a long time agreement involving romantic feelings, while Netorase is a momentary satisfaction of a kink.
name: Netorase (they are the shared SO)

This character lay eggs from the vagina, through a phenomenon also known as [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oviparity]oviparity[/url].

[url=https://t.vndb.org/sf/01/183201.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]

This character has one or more tentacles sucking on his breast, nipple or tit. 
In case tentacles are used for milking purposes use this trait in conjunction with [url=/i2381]Subject of (Sexual) > Milking (Sexual)[/url].

[url=https://t.vndb.org/sf/26/183226.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url]

[url=https://t.vndb.org/sf/29/183229.jpg]NSFW Milking Example[/url]

description:
This character has eggs implanted into his body. Egg implantation is the act of implanting eggs into a person's body, typically into the uterus or rectum.

Eggs are usually implanted by monsters, insects or tentacles by the use of an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ovipositor]ovipositor[/url], but thay can also be implanted by other magical or scientifical means.

[url=https://t.vndb.org/sf/10/183210.jpg]NSFW Tentacle Example[/url]
